[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rang 'grel smad dum bzhugs so//_
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pa nad sbyang ba'i sman sde sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga pa bshad par bya'o/_/skyug sman gyi sde la/_sman po son cha dang /_shing mngar dang /_ka lam pa dang /_
[\[1b.2\]]nim pa dang /_bim pi dang /_bi sha la dang /_ga gon ro kha ba'i thor to dang /_'bras bu dang /_in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs dang /_mur ba dang /_de ba ta li dang /_lto'i srin bu gsod pa'i byi tang ga dang /_bi dul dang /_tsi tra ka/_
[\[1b.3\]]kru drug tres dang /_ba to la'i sa bon dang /_ka rany+dza dang /_pi pi ling dang /_lce myang tsha dang /_shu dag dang /_sug smel dang /_yungs kar dang /_'di rnams ni skyug sman du gtong ba'i sman gyi sde'i rnam grangs su gtogs so/_/de
[\[1b.4\]]la bkru sman du gtong pa'i sman ni/_tri bi da/_shing nye rong /_dan ti dang /_'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_bi sha la'i rtsa ba dang /_shing gi khu ba snu hag shi ra dang /_me tog shang gi ri dang /_ni li
[\[1b.5\]]dang /_ro d+ha seng phrom dang /_dong ga dang /_ki bi l+yaka dang /_su bar+Na shi ra dang /_byar nu dang /_ba gcin dang /_'di rnams ni bkru sman du gtogs so/_/bkru sman mas gtong ba'i sman gyi sna grangs ni/_po son cha dang /_dug mo
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]yungs dang /_ru rta dang /_de ba ta li dang /_shing mngar dang /_shu dag dang /_rtsa ba'i sman sna bcu la/_sa la par+Ni dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_bri ha ti dang /_gzem thog drung rtsa thon dang /_'di rnams ni sman gyi rtsa ba phra mo lnga zhes bya'o/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba dang /_
[\[2a.2\]]ag ni man+tha dang /_s+yo na ka dang /_tang bal dang /_pa ta li dang /_'di lnga'i rtsa ba ni rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ste/_rtsa ba che phra gnyis gcig tu bsdus pa ni rtsa ba bcu zhes bya ba dang /_de ba da ru thang shing dang /_rasna dang /_ya ba ni la la phud dang /_sha ta puSh+pa sha ti dang /_kri ta be d+ha na dang /_
[\[2a.3\]]rgya sran nag po dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_lce myang tsha 'am/_rgyam tsha shing nye rong 'di rnams ni bkru sman mas gtong ba'i sde tshan du gtogs so/_/mgul ba yan chad mgo'i nad dang /_mig nad dang /_sna nad dang /_log nad la sogs pa ci na yang rung ste/_sman sna nas btang zhing nad sbyang ba'i sman
[\[2a.4\]]sde la/_bel la dang /_a pa marga dang /_tsha ba rnam pa gsum po na le sham dang /_li dong gra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyer ba'i rtsa ba dang /_su ra la'i sa bon dang /_shi ri sha'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_pri ha ti'i lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_sdong bu dang /_
[\[2a.5\]]rtsa ba dang sna lnga dang /_shi kru'i lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_sdong bu rtsa bar bcas pa lnga dang /_seng ldeng dang /_shing ma du ka'i me tog dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_mig sman skyer khaN dang /_pha bong gi dreg pa dang /_sug smel dang /_ldum bu pris rtsi ka dang /_sman sde 'di rnams ni
[\[2a.6\]]mgul ba yan chad klad pa'i nad thams cad sel zhing sbyong pa'i sman du gtogs so/_/de la rlung nad sel zhing zhi bar byed pa'i sman gyi rnam grangs ni/_de ba da ru thang shing dang /_rgya spos dang /_ru rta dang /_sman gyi rtsa ba bcu rnams dang /_ba la dang /_a ti ba la dang /_sman bi ra ta ra'i
[\[2a.7\]]sder gtogs pa la sogs pa dang /_sman bi da ra'i sder gtogs pa rnams ni rlung nad sel to/_/mkhris pa'i nad tsha ba rnams sel ba'i sman gyi sde ni/_rtswa dUr ba dang /_pUr+Na rna ba dang /_nim pa dang /_sman ba sha ka'i lo ma dang /_rtsa ba'i bar du sna lnga dang /_ad+ma kub ta kha sral phre'u dang /_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'ol ma se'i rtsa ba dang /_nye'u shi la dang /_shi ta pa ki dang /_gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang /_shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa dang /_shing shug pa dang /_sman thi ra rnam gnyis dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba dang /_thal tres la sogs pa 'di rnams ni mkhris pa'i nad sel to/_/bad kan gyi nad rgyas pa la ni dong
[\[2b.2\]]ga la sogs pa dang /_shing arka la sogs pa'i lo ma me tog sna lngar bcas pa dang /_shing mus ka ka la sogs pa rtsa ba dang 'bras bur bcas pa sna lngar bcas pa dang /_shing o sa na la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu'i bar sna lnga dang /_bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang /_gla sgang
[\[2b.3\]]chen po la sogs pa dang /_in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs la sogs pa sman sde 'di rnams bad kan sel bar byed do/_/sman dzi ban ti'i sder gtogs pa la/_dzi ban ti dang /_ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang /_me da dang /_mahA me da rnam gnyis dang /_mon sran sde'u mung+ga dang /_mon sran
[\[2b.4\]]ma sha gnyis kyi lo ma dang /_ldum bu ri sha b+ha ga zangs rtsi ba dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_'di bcu'i ming ni 'tsho byed ces bya'o/_/yang khar zhim la lus kyi sha 'tshag tshon por byed cing rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman sde'i rnam grangs la/_bi da ra dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]dong ga dang /_'bri lci ka li dang /_pur+Na rna ba dang /_de ba dang /_sa ha de ba dang /_bu ba par n+ya dang /_kha sral dang /_dzi ba ti tsa phra mo sna bcu dang /_shing sha ri ba thal tres kyi rtsa ba dang /_lcug ma dang /_hang sa pa ti dang /_de ltar 'di rnams kyi spyir bi da ri'i grangs su gtogs
[\[2b.6\]]te snying la phan/_sha tshag brta/_rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad sel/_lus skem pa sha skye/_skran dang lhu tshigs dang /_nywa gzhi na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_'di rnams sel zhing phan pa'i grangs su gtogs so/_/yang lus tsha ba dang /_khrag dang
[\[2b.7\]]mkhris pa rgyas te skom dad che zhing rims kyis btab pa 'di rnams sel ba'i sman ni/_shing sha ri ra ba thal tres dang /_u shi ra dang /_ka ma ri dang pa la/_shing ma du ka zhes bya ba dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_dmar po sna gnyis dang /_shing mngar dang /_ba ru sha ka dang /_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'di rnams tsha ba'i nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang /_khrag rgyas pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_rims kyis btab pa la phan no/_/shing shug pa dang /_li kha ra'i shing pun tra gnyis dang /_rid d+hi dang /_brid d+hi dang /_ri dgas kar ka ta'i rwa shing gi zhes bya ba dang
[\[3a.2\]]sle tres dang /_dzi ba na sna bcu dang /_'di rnams ni nu zho skye/_rlung nad dang /_mkhris pa'i nad sel/_lus nyam chung zhing khong pa rmya ba lta bu la/_khong brta/_sha cher skye/_tsho bar byed/_bud med la nyal phod par 'gyur ro/_/yang sman pa ru sha ka dang /_'bras bu gsum po a ru ra
[\[3a.3\]]dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_shing ni ri shi kad pa la'i shun pa dang /_shing ka ta'i 'bras bu dang /_shing tog rA dza dang /_bal po se'u'i 'bras bu dang /_rgya sne'u dang 'di rnams skom dad che ba dang chu sri ba dang rlung nad sel to/_/yang lig bu mig dang /_
[\[3a.4\]]gan d+ha pri yang ku dang /_spang spos dang /_me tog pad+ma dang /_me tog ut+pa la dang /_skyer khaN dang /_sug smel dang /_shing mngar dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_'di rnams ni dug nad sel/_lus tsha ba dang mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad sel to/_/pa to la dang /_ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel
[\[3a.5\]]dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_shing mngar dang /_sle tres dang /_shing pa tha dang /_'di rnams ni/_bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang /_mdze dang /_rims dang /_dug dang /_rtag tu skyug bro ba dang /_zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_mig ser gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel to/_/yang gu ru
[\[3a.6\]]tse sle tres dang /_shug pa dang /_shing nim pa dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_tsan+dan dmar po dang /_'di rnams ni mkhris pa dang /_bad kan rgyas pa dang /_rims kyis btab pa dang /_skyug bro ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_nad 'di rnams kyang sel to/_/zas
[\[3a.7\]]'ju pho ba'i drod skye/_dong ga dang /_in+d+ra ya bdug mo yungs dang /_pa li'i me tog dang /_ka ka tig ta dang /_nim pa dang /_sle tres dang /_rtswa dUr ba dang /_shing mngar dang /_pa tha dang /_tsir tig ta zhes bya ba ci skrigs dang /_shing shergya ka nI la puSh+pa dang ba na zhes kyang bya ba dang /_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa to la dang /_ka na dza rnam gnyis dang /_sab ta tsha zhes bya ba dang /_shing gi 'dab ma rnam bdun dang /_tsi tra ka/_kru trug tres dang /_su sha bi dang /_po son cha dang /_shi ba na dang /_gon ta dang /_'di rnams kun 'dra ste dong ga la sogs pas skyugs pa gcod/_mdze dang /_
[\[3b.2\]]dug dang /_rims dang /_bad kan rgyas pa dang /_g.yan pa dang /_gcin snyi ba dang /_rma de ba 'byang ngo /_/yang na sab ta tsha dang /_shing lo ma bdun pa dang /_shing ti ni sha dang /_gro ba dang /_shre ta ba ha dang /_sri ki ya ka dang /_shing seng ldeng dang /_shing ka da ra dang /_
[\[3b.3\]]b+han d+hi dang /_shing sha pa dang /_me sha shrI ga dang /_tri hi ma dang /_tal dang /_rgya skyegs kyi shing dang /_a ka ru dang /_rgya sne'u dang /_shing sA la dang /_shing d+ha ba dang /_ka bu ka dang /_ka lang ka zhes bya ba dang /_in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs dang /_tsha ga kar+Na dang /_a shwa
[\[3b.4\]]kar+Na tha ram dang /_de ltar a sa na la sogs pa sman 'di rnams ni/_sha bkra dang /_mdze dang /_bad kan gyi nad dang /_khong na srin bu yod pa sel/_nad skya rbab dang /_gcin snyi ba dang /_tsho ches pa'i tshil nad 'di rnams sel to/_/shing ba ra'i me tog dkar po dang /_
[\[3b.5\]]shing she rgya ka'i me tog sngon po la ba na dang /_nye'u shing pa dang /_tsitra ka dang /_mo ra ta dang /_shing bil ba dang /_a za shwa gi dang /_bri ha ti rnam gnyis ka rany+dza rnam gnyis/_dza ya rnam gnyis la/_ag ni man tha sna gnyis dang /_shing shi kru'i 'dab ma/_bo'u pa la pa
[\[3b.6\]]dang /_rtswa ku sha dang /_ru rta 'di rnams ni shing bar na la sogs pa zhes bya ste/_bad kan gyi nad dang /_tsho ches te tshil skyes pa'i nad dang /_zas mi 'ju ste drod chung ba las/_rlung nad cher skyes pa sel/_klad pa na ba la phan/_skran dang /_an ta bid tra b+hi khong 'bras 'di rnams
[\[3b.7\]]sel to/_/yang sman bri sha ka dang /_spangs ma dang /_shing kun dang /_nag tshur rnam gnyis te/_nag tshur dang /_nag tshur bya bal ma dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shi la dza tu dang /_'di rnams ni chu sri ba dang /_rde'u yod pa dang /_khong na skran yod pa dang /_lus kyi tshil ches
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]pa dang /_bad kan sel to/_/sman be lan tar dang /_a ran ni dang /_su ga dang /_bri sha dang /_a sham be ta sru sru dang /_go kan ta gze ma dang /_ka ta dang /_sa ha ra dza dang /_ba na nI la puSh+pa dang /_rtswa dUr ba dang /_br-ik+Sha da ni dang /_na la ku sha rnam
[\[4a.2\]]gnyis dang /_kun tha dang /_gun dra dang /_ba lu ka dang /_mor ta dang /_ka ru ka ta dang /_shing ram pa dang /_parta dang /_sman sde 'di rnams ni/_rlung nad du gyur pa sel/_chu son rde'u yod pa dang /_gcin sri ste 'ong du mi rung ba dang /_'di rnams sel to/_/yang sman sha ba raka ro
[\[4a.3\]]seng phrom dang /_bad thika ro d+hA dang /_rgya skyegs kyi shing dang /_dzi na dzi ni dang /_thang shing par la dang /_shing kad pa la'i shun pa dang /_kud tsi tam pa dang /_ldum bu chu skyes kyi me tog dang /_me tog gi rtsa ba dang /_shing a shwa ka dang /_shing bita sho ka dang /_e la ba lu ka
[\[4a.4\]]dang /_sa ri pel ba dang /_mo tsha rnams te/_de ltar sman rod+hA la sogs pa 'di dag ni tshil che ba dang /_bad kan gyi nad sel bar byed/_bud med kyi mngal na ba la phan/_'khru ba gcod/_sha mdog bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/dug nad sel to/_/shing ar ka'i rtsa ba dang /_
[\[4a.5\]]shing a lar ka dang /_nag dan ti dang /_bil shal ya dang /_b+har gi dang /_rasna dang /_pris rtsi ka li dang /_sri ki rgya dang /_shing a pa marga'i me tog dang /_pi ta te la zhes bya ba ka ka da ni dang /_ud kir yang dang /_mahA she da dang /_shing ing gu dang /_de ltar ar ka'i
[\[4a.6\]]sder gtogs pa sman 'di rnams ni bad kan rgyas pa dang /_tshil ches pa dang /_dug nad rnams sel to/_/lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_mdze nad zhi bar byed/_lhag par ni rma red par 'byang ste 'tsho'o/_/bye'u rug pa rnam gnyis te nag po dang /_ser po dang /_ku the rag zhim thig le
[\[4a.7\]]dang /_ka lam la dang /_srin bu sel ba'i sman byi tang ga dang /_khar pad tra dang /_bri sha kar+Ni dang /_kad pa la zhes bya ba ro hi ni dang /_ka sam mar dka dang /_sha bka dang /_shing ka pi ta'i lo ma dang /_b+har gyi ka sra'i rtsa ba dang /_rak+ta many+dza ri dang /_ka ka ma rtsi mon sne'u
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dang /_ku la har dang /_bi sha mus+thi dang /_bu srin dang /_buta ke shi 'bam po dang /_sman 'di rnams ni bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/_bad kan rgyas pa dang /_tshil che ba dang /_lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_'di rnams sel/_cham pa na ba dang /_zas yi
[\[4b.2\]]gar mi 'ong ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_'di rnams la phan te rma rid pa 'byang /_mus ka ka dang /_sud+ha shi ri dang /_'bras bu gsum ste/_a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_rgya skyegs shing dang /_shing d+ha ba dang /_shing
[\[4b.3\]]sha ba dang /_'di rnams ni skran dang /_gcin sri ba dang /_chu son rde'u yod pa dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_tshil che ba dang /_gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang /_bad kan dang /_khu chu rnams sel bar byed do/_/dug mo yungs dang /_shing mur ba dang /_pu tse shel dang /_na le sham dang /_
[\[4b.4\]]al bi sha dang /_gan d+hi ra chu sgog dang /_sug smel dang /_ba tha sna gnyis dang /_zir dang /_shing ar la'i 'bras bu dang /_a za mo dang /_yungs kar dang /_shu dag dang /_zi ra nag po dang /_shing kun dang /_srin bu'i sman byi tang ga dang /_pa shu gan+d+ha dang /_pany+tsa ko la zhes bya
[\[4b.5\]]ba la/_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la rtse lag dang /_dbyi mo'i lo ma dang /_tsitra ka dang /_li dong gra 'di lnga dang /_sman de rnams ni rlung dang /_bad kan dang /_tshil ches pa dang /_cham pa dang /_skran dang /_rims na ba dang /_gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel bar byed do/_/
[\[4b.6\]]shu dag dang /_gla sgang chen po dang /_thang shing dang /_sgron shing dang /_li dong gra dang /_bong nga dang /_a ru ra dang /_skyer pa dang /_yung ba dang /_shing mngar dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_sman 'di rnams ni shu dag dang skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangs su gtogs te/_
[\[4b.7\]]zas ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs dang /_rab tu 'khru ba'i nad rnams zhu zhing gcod do/_/tshil ches pa dang bad kan rgyas pa dang /_rlung nad dang /_bud med kyi nu ma na ba 'di rnams sel to/_/gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang /_mig sman ra gan gyi dud pa dang /_lig bu mig dang /_stang zil dang /_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]me tog pad+ma'i ze ba dang /_lcim rtsa dang /_btsod dang /_ya ba sha ka dang /_shing shal ma shi li dang /_shing shal ma li'i khu ba dang /_pu na nA ga dang /_sa mang ga dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_me tog d+ha ta ki dang /_am pa sh+tha dang /_shing mngar dang /_nam ska ri
[\[5a.2\]]dang /_nam ti bri ga sha dang /_rgya skyegs shing dang /_ro d+hA seng phrom dang /_da ta ki dang /_shing bil ba dang /_pe shing ka dang /_ka tang ga dang /_pad+ma'i ge sar ze ba dang /_sman 'di rnams ni sman sde rnam gnyis te/_gan+d+ha pri yaM hang bu'i sde grangs su gtogs pa dang /_sman am
[\[5a.3\]]bash+tha la sogs pa de rnams ni kha zas zhu ba'i tshad par 'khru ba gcod do/_/sman 'di dag ni 'khru ba yang gcod/_nang gi sha chad dang pags pa'i sha byung ba slar 'phros pa 'byor bar byed de phan/_mkhris pa rgyas pa la phan/_rma red pa yang 'tsho bar byed do/_/gla sgang dang /_shu
[\[5a.4\]]dag dang /_tsi tra ka/_kru trug tres dang /_skyer pa dang /_yung ba gnyis/_kha ba rnam gnyis la/_ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel dang /_ka ka tig ta dang /_go bye dang /_pa tha dang /_'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_bong nga nag
[\[5a.5\]]po dang /_khra bo dang /_ru rta dang /_sug smel dang /_shu dag dang /_'di rnams ni bud med kyi mngal na ba dang /_nu ma na ba dang /_dri ma bshang gci ba dang /_rngul dang /_rngu ma dang /_rna spabs pa la sogs pa sel cing 'byang ngo /_/shing n+ya gro d+ha dang /_shing a shwat+tha dang /_shing u
[\[5a.6\]]dum+bA ra dang /_paT+Ti ka ro d+ha sna gnyis/_'dzam bu gnyis la/_bri had pha la dang /_d+has swa pha la gnyis/_shing ardzu na dang /_shing som bal ka dang /_shing p+pak+sha dang /_shing amra dang /_shing ma bany+dzu la dang /_shing pi la ya dang /_rgya skyegs shing dang /_shing nan ti ke li dang /_
[\[5a.7\]]shing bir la dang /_shing mngar dang /_shing ma du ka dang /_'di rnams ni shing n+ya gro la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/_rma 'tsho ste phan/_'khru ba gcod/_chag thur byung na 'byor/_tsho ste tshil ches pa dang /_mkhris pa rgyas pa dang /_khrag rgyas pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_lus
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]kyi khong tsha ba dang /_bud med kyi mngal na ba dang /_'di rnams sel te phan no/_/sug smel dang /_ma he la dang /_tu ruska dang /_ru rta dang /_gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang /_spang spos dang /_ba lang b+h+ya ma ka dang /_sprig ka 'bug sug dang /_zhog tang ku dang /_tso tsa dang /_gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_rgya spos dang /_
[\[5b.2\]]sti ni ya dang /_spu ma zhes bya ba sri shing gi me tog gi khu ba dang /_nya phyis dang /_rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i chu srin gyi sen mo dang /_thang shing dang /_a ka ru dang /_shri bas ga dang /_gur kum dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gu gul dang /_sa tsi ras dang /_pog dkar po nu ma ka dang /_sun na ma dang /_
[\[5b.3\]]nA ga ge sar dang /_'di rnams ni sug smel la sogs te 'di dag dri zhim po'i sder gtogs te/_rlung nad dang bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel/_dug thub/_pags pa'i sha mdog bzang po sdug gur 'gyur/_g.yan pa dang /_thor bu dang /_bas ldag pa'i nad 'di rnams kun sel to/_/
[\[5b.4\]]sh+ya ma dang /_dan di dang /_dra ban ti dang /_ka mu ka dang /_dri bid shing nye rong dang /_shang khri ni dang /_pa tal dang /_su bar+Na shi ri dang /_gab ga shi dang /_shi kha ri dang /_kam pi l+yaka dang /_sle tres dang /_shing ka rany+dza dang /_ba stad tri dang /_bya d+hi ga ta dang /_b+ha la dang /_ba hu ra
[\[5b.5\]]sa dang /_shing ro tsha ba rnams kyi 'bras bu ni sman sha ma la sogs pa'i sder gtogs te/_skran dang /_dug 'thungs pa dang /_zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_bad kan rgyas pa dang /_snying na ba dang /_chu 'gags pa dang /_nad 'di rnams sel to/_/de ltar sman gyi grangs sum cu rtsa
[\[5b.6\]]gsum bshad pa la/_de dag gi nang nas sman la la ma rnyed na yang /_sman gyi ro dang /_mthu dang yon tan 'dra ba las sman sna sbyor cig_/bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pa nad sbyangs pa'i sman sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa/_sman sde'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga pa
[\[5b.7\]]rdzogs so//_//snum dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug bshad par bya'o/_/snum gyi nang na mchog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_zhun mar dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dang /_til mar dang bzhi'o/_/de ltar snum de dag ni spyir ni 'ju dka' ste lci/_bsil/_khong 'khru/_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]lus kyi khong snum par byed/_'jam par byed rtsa thams cad du 'gro bas na zhib mnyen/_lus kyi khong rlan par byed do/_/zas snum bag 'di dang 'dra ba'i sman snum bag can du gtogs pa phal cher yang de dang 'dra'o/_/snum dang sman de dang mi 'dra ba
[\[6a.2\]]gzhan ni rtsub pa zhes bya'o/_/de la yang snum de dag gi nang na yang zhun mar sman dang sbyar te btsos pa ni ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du phan no/_/rkang dang tshil dang til mar gsum ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rlung sel to/_/de la zhun mar bas ni til mar 'ju dka'o/_/til mar bas ni
[\[6a.3\]]tshil 'ju dka'o/_/de la snum rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar ro/_/snum rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar dang rkang mar gsum mo/_/snum rnam bzhi ni zhun mar dang rkang dang tshil dang til mar bzhi la snum chen po bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la snum gyi sman dpyad bya ba'i
[\[6a.4\]]nad dmigs ni/_chang nad du gyur pa dang /_bud med kyis dub pa dang /_drag shul dang /_ngal ba'i las byas pa dang /_sems las chen po la zhugs pa dang /_mi rgan po dang /_byis pa dang /_nyams stobs chung ba dang /_skem po dang /_lus kyi khong na snum med de/_rtsub por gyur pa dang /_
[\[6a.5\]]khrag zad pa dang /_khu chu zad pa dang /_rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa dang /_mig rab rib khyer te rtul ba dang /_rna ba mi gsang ste legs par mi thos pa dang 'di rnams lta bu la/_snum gyi bcud kyis lus brta bar bya'o/_/brta bar bya ba de la yang thog mar dugs byas la phyis bkru sman
[\[6a.6\]]gyis bkrus te/_sbyangs nas de'i rjes la snum gyi dpyad bya'o/_/ha cang khong pa me'i drod ches pa dang /_lus sbom pa dang /_nyam chung zhing rid pa dang /_brla rengs pa dang /_tshad pas rab tu 'khru ba dang /_ma zhu be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang /_lkog ma na ba dang /_
[\[6a.7\]]dbyig dug gis phog pa dang /_lto ba'i nang dmu rdzing lta bu dang /_brgyal ba dang /_rtag tu skyugs pa dang /_zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_bad kan gyi nad yod pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_chang gis phog ste ra ro ba dang /_bud med bu btsas pa dang /_sman sna nas btang ba dang /_bkru
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]sman gyis bkrus pa 'di lta bu la snum gyi dpyad bya zhing sbyin du mi rung ngo /_/de la zhun mar gyi yon tan ni sems rno mi brjed cing dran pa dang /_yid gzhungs/_lus skem zhing rid pa 'di lta bu la phan no/_/til mar ni lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_tshil ches pa dang /_rlung nad can du gyur
[\[6b.2\]]pa 'di lta bu la til mar phan no/_/lus khong yang ba dang /_lus khong grims shing sha mkhrang ba dang /_lto sra ba 'di lta bu la rkang zos na phan no/_/lus la rlung dang nyi tshan gyis gdungs pa dang /_lam ring por bgrod pas khong dub pa dang /_smra mangs pa dang /_bud med la
[\[6b.3\]]drags pa dang /_drag shul dang /_las ches pa dang /_srog zungs bdun lta bu zad pa dang /_lus kyi khong na snum med de/_rtsub por gyur pa dang nyon mongs pa byas pas lus rid pa dang /_pho ba'i drod ha cang ches te zas ha cang 'ju ba dang /_rtsa sgo kun rlung gis 'gags
[\[6b.4\]]shing 'tshangs pa 'di lta bu la tshil zos na phan no/_/de la tshil ni lhag par rus pa'i tshigs kha bye ba dang /_rus pa chag pa dang gnad snad pa dang /_lto ba'i nang grol na ba dang /_mes tshig pa dang /_lus rmas te rma byung ba dang /_rkang lag gi tshigs bur ba dang /_mo mtshan
[\[6b.5\]]na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_'di lta bu la tshil phan no/_/til mar ni lhag par dbyar zla tha chungs dang /_ston zla ra ba'i ngo la phan no/_/zhun mar ni ston zla 'bring po dang /_tha chungs kyi ngo la phan no/_/rkang dang tshil ni dpyid ka phan no/_/snum 'di rnams gang yang
[\[6b.6\]]rung dus tshigs dang mi sbyor bar 'phral gang bab du gtong na/_tshes grangs kyi nyi ma bzang ba dang /_srin dang yul ngan med cing yul bzang ba'i tshe thong shig_/til mar ni dgun zla grang lhags che ba'i tshe btang na phan no/_/zhun mar ni dbyar zla ra ba dang /_'bring po tsha ba'i dus
[\[6b.7\]]na mtshan mo 'thungs na phan no/_/mkhris pa dang rlung nad du gyur na zhun mar ni mtshan mo yang gtang du rung ngo /_/yang rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu nad sna gnyis 'dres par na na/_til mar dang zhun mar mtshan mo gtang bar rung ngo /_/rlung dang bad kan gyi nad du gyur na/_zhun mar
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dang sman dang sbyar ba nyin par thong shig_/de bas na sman zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba'i til dang kha zas la sogs pa rnams dang /_sman mas gtong ba dang /_sman sna nas gtang ba dang /_lus mar gyis bsku ba dang /_sman bskol ba'i khu ba khar blugs shing dbo
[\[7a.2\]]ba dang /_mgo dang rna ba dang mig tu sman bsku zhing blugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ran pa tsam du gtang ngo /_/ro rnam drug la sogs pa sna re re ba dang /_ro sna gnyis pa dang /_ro sna gsum pa dang /_sna bzhi sa dang /_sna lnga pa la sogs pa sman sbyar ba'i ro bro ba'i sna grangs drug cu rtsa bzhi la
[\[7a.3\]]sogs par phye ba de las/_snum gyi dngos po mar la sogs pa ro logs shig na tha dad pa ma yin te/_ji lta zhe na/_sman mar sbyor ba yang /_sman sna mang po sogs la/_mar nyung ngu byas pas na/_mar gyi ro zil gyis gnon to/_/lhag par bro ba med pas na ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du
[\[7a.4\]]'dus so/_/dper na ji skad du bstan pa/_sman bskol ba'i khu ba dang dngas ma btung ba'i ro de yang chu'i ro ci bro ba la sogs shig na rgyu lhag pa med de/_ro drug cu nyid kyi nad du 'dus so/_/yang ni sman mar myur du gang phan pa de bzang ste/_de la thun chung ngu zos na thun gnyis kyis
[\[7a.5\]]'ju'o/_/tshod 'bring du zos na thun bzhis 'ju'o/_/tshod cher zos na nyin zhag gcig gis 'ju'o/_/de ltar sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar ram/_sman mar gang za yang rung ste/_mi'i nyams dang nad kyi dmigs la sbyor la/_sngar ni tshod chung ngu nas bza' bar bya'o/_/yang bkru sman gyis
[\[7a.6\]]bkru bar 'dod na khar rtsang lta bu zas zos la/_da nang lta bu zhu ste khong na yang /_zhun mar dang dngas ma 'ba' zhig tshod cher mang du bza'o/_/mar 'thungs pas nad zhi bar byas pa zhig la zas kyang cher ma zos te khong bkres na mar 'bring tsam du zos na phan no/_/sman mar gyis
[\[7a.7\]]nyams btsag brta zhing sha skye bar bya na/_dro khar sman mar nyung zad bzhu ste/_sha khu gdus la dro tsha tsam gyi nang du blugs la 'thungs nas/_de'i rjes kha zas snum bag zos la chang gis mnan na phan no/_/yang byis pa gzhon nu lta bu dang /_mi rgan po dang /_rtag tu skom dad che
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]ba dang /_mar za ba'am/_'thung mi phod pa dang /_chang dad che ba dang /_rtag tu bud med dang phrad de/_rtag tu kha zas snum bag za ba lta bu dang /_drod chung de kha zas mi 'ju ba lta bu dang /_skyid de bde bar 'dug 'dug pa'i mi dang /_sman stobs chung ba'i mi nyon mongs pas
[\[7b.2\]]'jigs pa lta bu dang /_lto snyi ba dang /_nad dkyel mi che ba lta bu dang /_so ga tsha ba'i dus dang /_nad kyis rid par gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mar gtang ba ni/_dro ba sman mar nyung shas bzhu ste gcig tu 'thung ngam/_khu ba dron pos phul te 'thungs pa'i rjes la/_kha zas
[\[7b.3\]]snum bag dang chang 'thung shig_/de la nad dmigs kyi rim pa dang sbyar te sman mar gtang ba'i thabs ni/_lus kyi stod na nad yod na ni kha zas zos pa'i rjes la mar phyis btung ngo /_/khong pa'i nang lus kyi bar na nad yod pa ni kha zas phyed zos nas sman mar btung ngo /_/lus
[\[7b.4\]]kyi smad na nad yod na ni/_dro khar lto stong la sman mar btang na/_rjes la kha zas dang tshil nan 'thungs na nad sel to/_/sman mar gtang ba'i thabs rim pa 'di ltar byas na phan pa'i stobs mthu yang /_lus kyi rim pa bzhin du skye'o/_/de ltar sman mar 'thungs pa las mar cung
[\[7b.5\]]zad ma zhu na/_chu tshan gdu gdu ba'i dngas ma kha zas bzod tsam 'thungs na/_mar bde blag tu 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/sman mar la sogs pa zos te/_snum kha'i nang du chags na/_chu tshan gdus pa khas bzod tsam gyis kha bkru'o/_/e raN+Da'i khu ba gdus pa dang /_
[\[7b.6\]]ba la ta ka zhes bya ba go be dang /_'di gnyis su gdus pa'i khu ba ni btung du mi rung ngo /_/gal te khar rtsang ngam/_khar nyin lta bu sman mar 'thungs pa las zhu 'am ma zhu gtol med de the tsom za na/_chu tshan gdu gdu ba yang 'thung shig_/de 'thungs par khong du ma zhu
[\[7b.7\]]la/_ma zhu ba'i gdung sgregs mnan po ma yin sgregs pa yang tha mal par 'ong /_khong yang zhing zas yi gar 'ong bar gyur na/_kha zas ran tsam du bza' zhing 'tshal nan kyang ci ran du 'thung shig_/de ltar sman mar 'thungs nas zhu ba'i rjes la/_kha zas bza' ba
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]ni khu ba dro bag dang /_zas bad kan du mi 'gyur ba dang /_ha cang zas snum bag nyid ma yin pa dang /_kha zas grang dro ma 'dres par bza'o/_/sman mar 'thungs pa lta bu kha lag kyang chu dron pos bkru/_bud med dang 'phrad du mi rung /_mtshan mo yang gnyid
[\[8a.2\]]nyal/_bshang gci 'ongs na mi dgag_/drag shul gyi las mi bya/_khro zhing tshig pa za ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_grang ba'am/_nyi tshan la 'dug pa'am/_rlung drag po langs pa'i khar 'gro ba'am/_rta zhon te phan tshun 'khyams pa'am/_lam du zhugs pa dang /_mang du smra
[\[8a.3\]]ba dang /_stan ha cang mtho ba la 'dug pa dang /_sngas ha cang mtho ba 'am/_dma' ba 'di rnams lta bu mi bya'o/_/nyin par nyal ba dang /_dud pa dku ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang /_rdul khrod na 'dug pa 'di rnams kyang mi rung ste/_de lta bas na sman mar ci srid 'thungs pa de srid kyi
[\[8a.4\]]bar du/_cho ga de ltar bya zhing mi rung ba rnams spang ngo /_/sman mar dang 'dra bar bkru sman btang ba dang /_sna nas btang ba dang /_sman mas gtong ba rnams kyang tshul de dang 'dra bar nad byang gi bar du cho ga yun de srid du bsrung bar bya'o/_/de la nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_sman
[\[8a.5\]]mar gtang ba'i cho ga ni bkru sman dang 'dra ste/_sman mar gyi cho ga yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/de la lto snyi na ni sman mar nyi ma gsum du gtang ngo /_/lto sran ni nyi ma bdun du gtang ngo /_/sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil te/_khong legs par snum par gyur na/_de phan chad kha zas kyi cho ga
[\[8a.6\]]bya'o/_/de ltar sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil bar gyur na/_stod smad du dbugs dbyung ba tha mal par 'ong /_pho ba'i me drod ches te 'bar/_bshang ba snum la mi sri ba 'byung /_mar dang snum bag mi 'dod de skyo/_lus snyoms te 'di ltar gyur na/_nad rtse zhil zhing lus kyi khong
[\[8a.7\]]legs par snum por gyur pa yin no/_/lus kyi khong rtsub na ni tshul 'di dang 'dra ste/_'di las bzlog ste blta'o/_/gal te sman mar dang snum gyi tshod ma zin tam/_phan pa ma yin par zos sam/_gtang ba'i dus ma yin par 'thungs sam/_kha zas log pa ha cang snum ches
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]pa'am/_bsil zhing rtsub pa'am/_zas ma zhu bzhin du zos pa'am/_mtshan mo mi nyal zhing nyin par phan tshun 'khyam pa dang /_mi mthun pa log pa byas pa 'di lta bu las sman mar ma zhu ste/_snum drags par gyur na/_gdong pa dang lus kyi sha mdog ser/_snabs dang mchil ma
[\[8b.2\]]mang /_thur du tshad par 'khru ste/_de lta bu las nad ni lus skrangs pa dang /_gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ngo /_/khong rmya lus dgye sgu mi shes te/_rengs bag tu 'dug/_sems myos te blong bag tu 'dug_/g.yan ba dang /_mdze dang rims nad rtag tu skyugs pa
[\[8b.3\]]dang /_khong na lto sbo/_mgo 'khor la sogs pa dang /_'di lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu la dpyad bya ba ni zas dang skom dbri zhing bsdam pa dang /_skyug sman gtang /_dugs bya/_zas dang skom rnams rtsub pa'i bag gtang /_'tshal nan dar ba dang /_
[\[8b.4\]]a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_'di lta bu mnan pa'i khu ba dang /_dar ba bskol ba dang /_nas dang /_tsi tse rgod dang /_khre rgod dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra gsum/_sbrang rtsi la sbyar te btang pa'am/_yang na a
[\[8b.5\]]ru ra btags pa dang /_ba gcin dang gu gul bsres nas 'thungs na phan no/_/mdor na nad dmigs ji ltar mi bde ba dang sbyar la dpyad byas na/_mar drags pa'i nad 'byang ngo /_/yang de lta bu la dpyad du bya ba ni kha zas mi bza' ba ni bza' bar smyung ba mi nus na yang /_
[\[8b.6\]]kha zas rtsub po bza' ba'i dpyad byas na smyung ba byas pa dang 'dra'o/_/gal te mar drags pa'i nad las bkru sman gtang dgos par gyur na/_nyi ma gsum gyi bar du kha zas snum pa khu ba drod bag dang /_yul skams nas byung ba'i sha las khu ba drod pag tu byas pa dang /_
[\[8b.7\]]kha zas drod bag zos la nang nub tu dugs bya zhing /_nyi ma gsum du snum bag gi drod dang /_dugs de ltar byas nas/_de'i rjes la bkru sman gtang ngo /_/skyug sman gtang ba ni mi sha dang tshil ches/_bad kan mang /_drod ma snyoms te/_zas res 'ga' 'ju/_
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]res 'ga' mi 'ju ba de lta bu ni nyin zhag gcig bad kan skye ba'i kha zas sbyin la/_phyi de nyin skyug sman thong shig_/yang zas snum bag gis bskyed bskyed pa/_bad kan can de lta bu la sngar zas rtsub po byin te/_de'i rjes la kha zas snum bag gis khong snum
[\[9a.2\]]par byas nas bkru sman thong shig_/dpyad de ltar byas na mar dang snum bag las nad du gyur pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mar dang snum lta bur ma 'phrod de nad du gyur pa kha zas kyi dpyad byas pas ma byang na/_sman btang ba'i dpyad byas pas nad kyi dri ma phyin par 'gyur ro/_/byis
[\[9a.3\]]pa chung ngu dang /_rgan po la sogs pa mar dang snum bag spong mi nus la/_cho ga dka' na 'phral du snum gyi dpyad 'di skyo zhing gnod par yang mi 'gyur gyi gyis shig_/bya ba'i thabs la mar brngos la sha khu las btang ngam/_thug pa'i nang du btab la blud do/_/yang
[\[9a.4\]]na til btags pa'i nang du mar btab la/_bu ram bskol ba'i khu bas btang ste btung ngo /_/yang na 'bras dang til mar dang sran ma sha dang /_sna gsum gyi thug pa nang du yang mar 'di bzhin du btab la btung ngo /_/'o ma bskol ba dron mo'i nang du mar btab pa'i
[\[9a.5\]]thug pa'am zho mngal ma zhog chu bor la/_bu ram gyis btab ste blud pa'i thug pa de lta bu rnam pa drug dang /_mar rkang tshil dang til dang sna bzhi 'bras dang sna lnga'i thug pa dang /_spyir drug dang /_yang thug pa rnam pa lnga po 'di dag dang /_thug pa sna bdun po 'di rnams ni 'phral
[\[9a.6\]]du lus kyi khong snum par 'gyur te/_lan tshwa cher gdab bo/_thug pa 'di dag ni bad kan du mi 'gyur ro/_/lus rtsub par mi 'gyur/_yang mdze nad lus skrang bag dang /_gcin rtag tu 'ong zhing snyi ba 'di lta bu la/_bu ram yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang /_
[\[9a.7\]]lo ma dang til dang /_sran ma sha dang /_chang dang zho rnams bzar mi rung ngo /_/snum gyi cho ga dang /_dpyad byas nas gnod par ma gyur na/_sman 'bras bu gsum po dang /_pi pi ling dang /_a ru ra dang /_gu gul la sogs pa bskol la thong shig_/de ltar btang na
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]nad rnying la yang 'byang la/_lus kyi khong nas drod skye/_khong pa nang gi nad kun 'byang /_srog zungs bdun 'phral du brta/_nyams stobs dang bzhin mdog bzang por 'gyur/_dbang po rnams brtan/_rgan sra/_lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/_mar rtag tu bza' ba'i yon
[\[9b.2\]]tan de ni de ltar 'gyur ro/_/snum la dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so//_//de nas dugs bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de la dugs kyi bye brag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_dugs bya ba dang /_bag zan dang sman du sbyar bas lus la bcing zhing
[\[9b.3\]]dugs bya ba dang /_dugs tha mal pa dang /_chu lums dang rnam pa bzhi'o/_/de la dugs zhes bya ba ni me la bsros pa yin te/_de la yang ji lta zhe na/_me mdag la gos sam/_thong lcags sam lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa la sogs pas dugs bya'o/_/bag
[\[9b.4\]]zan dang sman du sbyar ba'i dugs lus la glan cing bcing ba ni bag phye 'am 'bru sna tshogs btags la sman shing tsha dang phabs dang nye'u shing dang thang shing dang gu gul dang /_a ru ra dang /_ldum bu ra sna dang /_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang /_yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang /_
[\[9b.5\]]tshwa dang /_dar ba dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_'di rnams kyis sla mor sbrus la lan tshwa cher btab ste btsos la ras kyi steng du bdal te/_lus gar na sar glan zhing bcings na dugs 'dis ni rlung nad 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bad kan dang 'dres pa'i nang
[\[9b.6\]]du gyur na ni dugs de'i nang du bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang sbyar la dugs bya'o/_/mkhris pa'i nad la ni shing shug pa dang sbyar ro/_/dugs glan te de ltar sbyar ba las/_gal te sla bas lus la mi chags shing ras kyis mi thub na mar dang til mar la sogs pa snum gyis
[\[9b.7\]]bsnan te/_yang dang yang bswo zhing pags pa ma rul ba dri mi zhim pa ma yin pas phyi rol nas dugs bya'o/_/phags pa de lta bu ma rnyed na sman rlung sel ba'i lo ma a shwa gan+d+ha'am/_e raN+Da'am/_dar ram bal snam mam ras kyis g.yogs shing dkris la mtshan mo dugs byas
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]na ni nyin par mi dgos kyi khrol cig_/nyin par dugs byas na ni mtshan mo mi dgos kyi khrol cig_/de la dugs tha mal pa zhes bya ba ni bag phye dang mar dang chur sbyar te/_btsos pa'i bag zan sla mos/_gang na ba'i thog tu glan cing bdugs pa dang /_gyo mo'i
[\[10a.2\]]dum bu dang /_phag dum dang /_rdo ba dang /_sa phye ma dang /_gso ma'i lo ma dang /_'bras la sogs pa 'bru rnams dang /_lug gi ril ma dang bye ma dang /_phub ma la sogs pa thabs du mas btsos sam/_brngos pa'i dugs kyis yul gyi rnams dang dus dang sbyar zhing dugs bya'o/_/
[\[10a.3\]]de la sman khu'i lums bya ba'i dpyad ni/_shing shi kru dang /_shi kru'i rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa ji snyed pa dang /_shing e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang /_lo ma la sogs pa dang /_ka rany+dza dang /_byi'u rug pa dang /_kardza ka dang /_shing shi ri sha dang /_ldum bu ba sha
[\[10a.4\]]dang /_'od ma dang /_shing arka dang /_ma li ti dang /_dir+g+ha bin ta dang /_gso ma'i lo ma dang /_shu dag la sogs pa dang /_yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang /_nya dang /_ngang ngur la sogs pa'i sha dang /_sman gyi rtsa ba sna bcu pa dang 'di rnams la sogs pa nad dmigs
[\[10a.5\]]dang sbyar la nad lci na sman 'di kun sna tshang bar bsogs te brdungs la chang dang tshwa dang 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa dang sbyar te btsos la bum pa'i nang du blugs la gang na bar sman gyi rlangs pa dron mos gar na ba'i dmigs su bdug cing lums bya'o/_/yang na rlangs pas mi bdug par sman btso
[\[10a.6\]]btso ba'i khu ba dro tsha tsam bum pa'i kha phra mor btod pa'am/_sbu gu ring por btod pa'i/_blugs pa'i kha nas sman gyi khu ba'i rgyun byung nas nad kyi steng du blugs shing sman khu'i lums bya'o/_/de ltar sman khu'i lums byed pa'i tshe lus la gos kyis kyang g.yogs la de'i steng du sman
[\[10a.7\]]khu'i chu lums kyis lus la bde ba ran par blugs shing lums bya'o/_/yang na sman khu dron mo de gzhong khung lus tshad chen po'i nang du gang bar blugs la de'i nang du lus zhugs na rlung nad thams cad la phan par 'gyur ro/_/nad pa chu lums de lta bu'i nang du zhugs te 'dug
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]na gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ba dang chu 'gags te gcin sri ba dang /_rlung nad la sogs pa la phan no/_/de lta bu'i lums bya zhing 'jug pa la kha zas snum bag bza' zhing zas zhu nas snga dro chu lums bya'o/_/de ltar lums bya ba'i tshad ni nad pa'i nad dmigs che chung dang /_
[\[10b.2\]]yul rnams dang dbyar dgun gyi dus dang sbyar la lums che chung 'bring gang ran pa tshod de las dpag ste bya'o/_/de las bad kan gyi nad dmigs shas che na ni sman khong rtsub par 'gyur ba dang sbyar la chu lums bya'o/_/mi rang bzhin rlung dang bad kan can zhig la rlung nad skyes te
[\[10b.3\]]rtsub par gyur na/_sman rtsub pa dang snum bag yod pa gnyi ga dang sbyar ba'i chu lums bya'o/_/yang nad pa pho ba'i nang du rlung nad zhugs pa la/_long ka'i nang du bad kan gyi nad zhugs par gyur pa 'di lta bu la ni sngar pho ba'i gnas la phan pa'i lums rtsub mo'i lums bya'o/_/
[\[10b.4\]]long ka'i nang na bad kan yod pa ni so so'i gnas kyi bye brag dang sbyar te snum bag yod pa'i lums bya'o/_/de la dugs dang lums gang byed kyang rung ste/_sta zur dang chu so'i bar dang /_mig dang rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang /_snying dang 'di rnams la dugs chung du bya'o/_/yang
[\[10b.5\]]na ni ma byed cig_/lums legs par byas pa'i tshul ni khong grang zhing bsil ba kun med/_zug cing na ba byang /_lus dang rkang lag 'jam pa de lta bur gyur na lums legs pa yin te lums kyi rjes su lus dal gyis mnye zhing de'i rjes la chu dron pos lus khrus byas nas
[\[10b.6\]]de'i 'og tu snum gtong ba'i cho ga gyis shig_/yang lums ha cang drags na nyen du gyur pa'i nad dmigs ni/_mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas te tsha ba'i nad skye/_skom dad che/_myos shing brgyal ba'am/_bog par 'gyur/_skad 'gags/_rkang lag na/_mgo
[\[10b.7\]]'khor/_rkang lag gi tshigs kun na/_rims tsha bas 'debs/_lus kyi sha tshig ste nag po dang dmar po thig thig por snang /_lums ha cang drags na skyug bro ba 'di lta bu'i nyen du 'gyur ro/_/lums de ltar ha cang drags te/_tsha ba dang mgo 'khor ba dang /_skyug bro
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ba la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang dug gis phog pa dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i tsha la sogs pa'i sman btang ngam/_me btsa' btab bam/_mes tshig gam/_tshad pas btab bam/_skyug bro 'am/_snying mi dran te myos pa 'di rnams lta bu la/_lums
[\[11a.2\]]rtsi eN+Da dang /_nye'u shing lta bu dang /_nya dang chu bya sna tshogs lta bu ni/_bsil zhing lci ba'o/_/tsha zhing rno ba na le sham lta bu dang /_drod che ba'i sman tshid ka dang /_dbyi mo'i lo ma 'di lta bu rnams sbyar te so so'i nad dmigs la lums ci rigs par byas na nad dmigs kyi nyen de lta
[\[11a.3\]]bur mi 'gyur ro/_/lums rtsir bzang ba ni rlon zhing zhu ba yod pa sra ste tshos dka' ba spyi bag dang /_'byar bag tu 'dug pa dang /_snum bag dang /_rtsub pa'i bag dang /_rtsa ba'i nang du 'gror rung ba/_zhib pa de lta bu'i sman ni lums rtsir bzang ngo /_/lums kyis nad dang /_nyen
[\[11a.4\]]du mi 'gyur ba'i sman rtsi ni 'jam pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_zhib pa dang /_'byar ba spyi bag 'dug pa dang /_zhu ba gsher bag can 'di lta bu la sbyar na lums ma legs te nad du gyur pa las rtse zhil te phan par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na sman kha ba dang /_bska ba dang /_mngar bag 'di
[\[11a.5\]]gsum yod pa phal cher sbyar na lums nyes pa'i nad thams cad rtse zhil zhing phan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lums ha cang drags pa las nad du gyur pa de slar bcos pa'i thabs kyis nad rtse zhil bar 'gyur te/_phan pa'i rtags ni gang du lums drags pa'i nyen smos pa'i nad rnams
[\[11a.6\]]byang la/_nyams stobs skye bar tshor na de ni lums drags pa'i nad phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/yang lums drags ches te nad du gyur pa de rtse zhil ba'i thabs ha cang drags ches na yang /_sha mdangs kyi pags pa dang /_chu ba dang /_rkang lag rnams 'khums par 'gyur/_snying
[\[11a.7\]]'phar zhing na/_smra mi nus/_'grams pa'i nya byung ste ltung /_mchu dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_pags pa rnams nag por 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ha cang rtse zhil drags pa'i nad yin no/_/de la dugs byar mi rung ba'i dmigs ni ha cang tshon po sbom po dang /_rlung ches
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]te khong rtsub pa dang /_rid par gyur te nyam chung ba dang /_brgyal ba dang sngar lums drags pa las slar gso zhing dpyad bya dgos pa dang /_glo na ba dang /_glo rdol ba dang /_srog zungs bdun po zad de lus skam por song ba dang /_lus khur ram las kyis dub pa lta bu dang /_
[\[11b.2\]]chang las nad du gyur pa lta bu dang /_mig rab rib za ba dang /_dmu rdzing du gyur te lto cher skyes pa dang /_shu ba mched pa dang /_mdze nad dang /_'or nad skrang bag dang /_tsha ba mkhris pa'i nad yod pa dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang mar 'thungs pa dang /_sbrang rtsi 'thungs
[\[11b.3\]]pa dang /_bkru sman btang ba dang /_lus snad pa dang /_gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_mya ngan gyis btab pa dang /_'jigs shing bag tsha ba lta bu yod pa dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa'am mig ser gyis btab pa 'am/_skya rbab
[\[11b.4\]]kyi nad yod pa 'am gcin snyi ste rtag tu 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang /_spyir mkhris pa'i nad yod pas tsha ba'i nad che ba 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung /_bud med sbrum ma dang /_zla mtshan zag pa dang /_bu btsas pa lta bu dang /_'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung ngo /_/gal te
[\[11b.5\]]sbrum ma 'am zla mtshan zag pa dang bu btsas pa 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung ba 'am/_dug gis phog ste lums bya dgos na yang lums mi drags pa 'jam por gyis shig_/de la lums bya ba'i nad kyi dmigs ni bad kan ches te dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa lu
[\[11b.6\]]ba dang /_cham pas btab pa dang /_skyigs bus btab pa dang /_lto sbos pa dang /_bshang gci gnyis ka 'gags te dbyung du mi rung ba dang /_mgul subs shing skad 'gags pa dang /_rlung nad kyis bag tu mi bde ba dang /_bad kan rgyas pa dang /_be'u snabs
[\[11b.7\]]yod de mchin pa na ba dang /_lus dgye sgu mi shes te khong rengs pa dang /_lus lci ba dang /_rlig rlugs kyi nad yod pa dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang /_da rgan lus nang du sgu ba 'am/_phyir dgye ba'i nad kyang rung rlung nad kyis zug thabs su na ba dang /_chu
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'gags pa dang /_thor bu chen po byung ba'am/_rmen bu skrangs pa'am pags pa'i nang du thor bu 'byung la phyir rdol du mi rung ba lta bu dang /_skyes pa khu ba 'gags te 'ong du mi rung ba dang rlung nad che ba dang /_'di rnams lta bu la so so'i nad dmigs dang
[\[12a.2\]]mthun par sman sbyar la lums dang dugs bya'o/_/yang mi la rlung nad yod pa'am tsho ste tshil ches pa'am/_bad kan rgyas pa de lta bu la lums btsos shing gdu gdu ba mi dgos par khang pa rlung med pa dron po'i nang du gos bsros la dron po gyon te rngul dbyung ba dang gos lci bar gyon
[\[12a.3\]]cing rngul bar bya ba dang /_dngang bar bya zhing rngul gdon par byas na lums bya mi dgos par phan no/_/yang me la btso ba'i lus btsan po che ma yin par tha mal par zan dang /_sman du sbyar bas btsos pas lus la dkri zhing bdugs pa dang /_chang mang du blud la dugs byas na phan
[\[12a.4\]]no/_/rngul mang du dbyung ba'i thabs dang /_khro bar bcas pas rngul dbyung ba dang /_bkres par bya ba dang /_skom par bya ba dang /_nyi tshan la gzhag pa 'di lta bus kyang bad kan la sogs pa'i nad lums bya mi dgos par phyin par rung ngo /_/de lta bas na lus dang khong pa nang gi
[\[12a.5\]]nad yod pa la mar dang til la sogs pa snum gyi dpyad kyis ni nad bsrul lo/_/nad bsrul de khong pa nang khrol gyi nang du song yang rung /_srog zungs bdun gyi nang du song ngam/_rtsa'i nang du song ngam/_rkang lag gi nang du song ngam/_nad rung ba'i nang du zhen kyang rung /_
[\[12a.6\]]de lta bu la lums sam dugs byas na snum gyis bsrul ba'i nad de snyi zhing sla bar gyur nas khong du sdud do/_/khong du nad lus pa dang bkru sman gyis bkrus te nad kyi dpyis dbyung ngo /_/dugs dang lums kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//_//skyug sman dang
[\[12a.7\]]bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa bshad par bya'o/_/bad kan rgyas pa'i nad dam bad kan rgyas pa rlung ngam mkhris pa dang 'dres kyang rung ste/_de lta bu'i sman la skyug sman thong shig_/tshul 'di dang 'dra bar mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la ni bkru sman thong shig_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]yang rims gsar pa dang /_tshad pas 'khru ba dang /_thur du mkhris pa dang khrag tu 'khru ba dang /_glo gcong chen po skem byed dang /_mdze dang gcin snyi ba dang /_'brum chen dang thor bu 'byung ba'i nad dang /_rkang pa cher skrangs pa'i nad dang snying mi dran te myos par gyur pa dang /_
[\[12b.2\]]lud pa lu ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_snying 'phar ba dang /_bud med nu ma na ba dang /_ro stod yan chad kyi nad mi bde ba 'di rnams dang nad thams cad la skyug sman btang na phan no/_/de la skyug sman gtang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni bud med sbrum ma dang /_rlung
[\[12b.3\]]nad yod de khong rtsub pa dang /_bkres pa dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang /_mi rgan po dang skem po dang tsho ste sbom po dang /_glo skam na ba dang /_mtshon gyis rmas pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rtag tu slon pa dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /_mig rab rib
[\[12b.4\]]khyer ba dang /_lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_khar khrag dang /_rlung du 'dres par 'byung ba dang /_so na ba dang /_skad 'dzer ba dang /_chu sri ba dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_skran dang /_sman btang ba yang slon du mi rung ba dang /_ha cang drod che ba dang /_gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang /_
[\[12b.5\]]rtug skam gyis btab pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_rtsib logs rdo bzhin du sra bas rem rem por nad dkyel chags pa dang glo na ste rtsib logs su zug pa dang /_rlung nad kyi bag 'di lta bu la skyug sman gtang du mi rung ngo /_/yang khrag sman gtang du mi rung ba ni btsan dug
[\[12b.6\]]'thungs sam/_dbyig dug 'thungs sam kha zas ma zhu ba 'am kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa'am/_be'u snabs las rims su gyur tam/_rtag tu skyug sman btang yang skyug tu mi rung ba la skyug sman mi gtang bar/_gong du smos kyang dug 'thungs sam/_skyug sman mi btang
[\[12b.7\]]du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs zhig yin na 'di rnams lta bu la skyug sman thong shig_/nad dmigs gzhan dang sbyar te skyug sman btang ba'i rjes la sman gyi dud pa sbu gu nas btang ste bdug tu rung ngo /_/btsan dug dang dbyig dug gis phog pa dang /_zas ma zhu ba 'am/_kha zas mi
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]'phrod pa zos pa 'di rnams lta bu la skyug sman btang ba'i rjes la dud pa sbu gu nas btang zhing bdug pa dang /_zas kyi cho gas bstan pa 'di rnams byar mi rung ngo /_/de la bkru sman gyis bkru zhing gsor rung ba'i nad ni skran dang gzhang 'brum khrag tshad dang 'brum bu
[\[13a.2\]]dang gzhogs phyed na ste bskyod mi nus pa dang /_mig ser dang /_rims yun ring du lon te bying ba dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_dbyig dug dang /_rtag tu skyug pa dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /_sha mdog ser por gyur pa'i nad dang /_mig rab rib za ba dang /_mig sngon por gyur pa dang /_
[\[13a.3\]]mig rtsi bor za ba dang /_long ka na ste lte ba'i 'og tu na ba dang /_mo mtshan na ba dang /_pho mtshan na ba dang /_khong pa'i nang kun na ba dang /_lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_rma red pa dang /_dreg gam/_khar khrag dang rlung 'dres par skyug gam/_mgo bo yan chad kyi nad dang /_khrag rgyas
[\[13a.4\]]pa dang /_gcin 'gag cing sri ba dang /_rtug skam gyis btab pa 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman gyis bkrus na phan no/_/mdze nad dang /_gcin snyi ste za khur byung ba la ni/_skyug sman btang na phan no/_/rims sar pa dang /_pho ba'i drod chung ba dang /_mkhris pa dang /_khrag tshad
[\[13a.5\]]byung ba dang /_glo rdol tam/_lus rmas sam/_gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba 'am/_tshad pas 'khru ba'am/_khong du mtshon lus te ma phyin pa dag lto sra ste 'khrur mi rung ba dang /_lus tsho ste tshil che ba dang /_skem po dang 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman btang zhing bkrur mi rung ngo /_/de la
[\[13a.6\]]skyug sman dang bkru sman gnyis gang yang rung ba'i dus ni grang dro ran pa'i dus la bya ste/_de yang dpyid zla 'bring po dang dbyar zla tha chungs dang /_ston zla tha chungs dang zla ba 'di rnams la bkru sman dang skyug sman gang yang rung ba gtang du rung ngo /_/dus 'di'i tshe snum gtang ba'i
[\[13a.7\]]cho ga bzhin du yang byas/_dugs dang lums kyang cho ga bzhin du bsal/_sang skyug sman btang na deng bad kan slong ba'i kha zas nya dang til dang /_ma sha mon sran gre'u dang bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas rnams zos la/_mtshan mo gnyid log par byas nas kha zas
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]legs par zhu ba dang /_nang par lus bsrung ba'i bkra shis byas la kha zas gzhan mi za bar skyug sman gtang /_mi rgan po dang /_byis pa dang /_nyam chung ngu skye ba dang /_sman stobs chung zhing zhan pa 'di rnams so so'i rigs par gtang ba'i thabs ni mkhris pa rgyas shing tshab che na
[\[13b.2\]]'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/_bu ram gyi khu ba las thong shig_/rlung nad la ni sha khu 'am/_mar khu'am/_thug pa dang /_snum bag las thong shig_/bad kan rgyas pa la ni sbrang rtsi'i khu ba dang /_chang dang chu dron po las gtang ngo /_/rgan gzhon dang nyams che chung gi
[\[13b.3\]]thabs kyang tshul 'di bzhin du sbyar ro/_/skyug sman btang ba yang babs cher 'thungs te gre ba man chad gang bar gyis la slon no/_/so so'i nad dmigs dang sbyar te/_skyug sman du gtong ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_lce myang tsha yang btab la mi'i
[\[13b.4\]]tshod dang /_skyug pa sra snyi'i drod du sbyor la sman thong shig_/sman gtong ba'i tshe nad pa kha shar phyogs su bltas la sman blud do/_/sngags kyis kyang gdab par bya'o/_/bra h+ma dak+Sha shi be/_bud d+hen dra/_b+hA tsan+d+ra arka nI la na la/_ri dir su ma b+hU ta sang+g+has tsa
[\[13b.5\]]pan tu pa/_sa ra ye na me ba ri Shi na ma de bA na me bA me mer ta ma su d+he bot+ta ma nA ga nAn b+he Sh+ya dz+yam na mastu ste/_skyug sman 'thungs la skad cig ci ran du bsdad la de nas slon bro ba'i sems bskyed la/_dong gar 'khyil zhing khar mchil ma mang po 'ong bar gyur na bya sgro 'jam po'am/_
[\[13b.6\]]chu ba snyi ba 'jam po bkug cing drang ngo /_/bkug cing slon pa ni gre ba dang lce khyi ba'i drung ma smad par slon to/_/de la skyug mi bro bzhin du yang nan gyis skyugs shing slon du mi rung ngo /_/skyug bro bzhin slon par gyur na yang ma 'gegs par slon cig_/de ltar slon pa'i tshe na stan mthon
[\[13b.7\]]po pus mo'i thad ka tsam du mtho ba'i steng du tsog pur 'dug la dpral ba dang /_glo g.yas g.yon mis brten nas slon to/_/de'i tshe slon pa de lte ba'i thad kar btsir/_rgyab nas btsir zhing gyen du phul la slon cig_/de la bad kan rgyas pa'i skyug sman rno ba'i bag la na le sham lta
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bu dang /_bsil bag tu u shi ra'am/_tsan+dan nam/_ga pur lta bu la sogs pa la sbyar ro/_/drod che ba'i bar la tsi tra ka_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa lta bu dang /_tsha bar gtogs pa tsha ba rnam gsum dang /_shi kru la sogs pa 'di lta bu las skyug
[\[14a.2\]]sman du sbyar te gtang ngo /_/mkhris pa rgyas pa'i skyug sman ni ro mngar bag shing mngar 'o ma 'am bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/_kha ra 'am/_rgun 'bru lta bu dang /_bsil bag tu u shi ra 'am/_tsan+dan nam/_ga pur la sogs pa la sbyar ro/_/rlung dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad la ni
[\[14a.3\]]mngar bag dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa las sbyar la gtang ngo /_/de ltar skyug sman du sbyar te gyen du phul nas nad phyin pa'i tshad ni bad kan 'byung ba zad nas mkhris pa snang gi bar du slon cing skyugs shig_/gal te skyug sman btang ba las sman gyi mthu shugs zhan te/_babs cher mi
[\[14a.4\]]slon tam sman 'ga' zhig slar brgal na bsnan pa'i dpyad ni/_pi pi ling dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_yungs kar rnams shel tsha dkar po'am lce myang tsha'i chur sbyor la/_yang yang slon cig_/sman gyis de ltar bsnan kyang slon du mi rung na/_skyug sman nyes pa yin te/_de'i nyen ni
[\[14a.5\]]mchil ma mang /_g.yan par 'gyur/_thor bu mang /_rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/skyug sman btang legs na dang por bad kan 'byung /_de'i rjes la mkhris par slon/_mjug tu rlung gi tshul dbu ba lta bu 'byung ba ni skyug sman legs pa yin no/_/
[\[14a.6\]]de la ha cang skyug sman drags pa 'am nad dkyel che na mang du slon pa'i rjes la dbu ba dang khrag tshon bag can du byung na gso dka' ba yin no/_/de ltar sman drags te ma legs sam nad dkyel ches te nyam chung la slon drags na khong rmya/_lus tsha/_gre ba skam/_mig gis mi mthong ste mun
[\[14a.7\]]par snang /_rlung nad yang ba ldang /_khong nas srog ces bya ba'i khrag yod pa de slon cing 'byung na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/skyug sman btang legs na de'i rjes la ci ran cig ngal bso ste/_de nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la/_dud pa rnam gsum gang yang rung ba cig gis bdugs la
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]de'i 'og tu snum bag gtang ba yang gong ma dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/de nas kha zas bza' ba ni phyi 'phred nub ka'am/_yang na sman legs par ma zhu 'am/_rjes ma chad na phyi de nang par tsam na gdod kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing bkres na chu dron po ran pas khrus byas la kha zas kyi rim pa
[\[14b.2\]]'bras thug rkyang rkyang po la rim pa bzhin du bza' bar bya'o/_/bza' ba'i rim pa de yang dang po 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa rkyang rkyang po blud do/_/de nas 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa phyar langs tsam du byas la blud do/_/de'i rjes la thug pa kha gzar gyis bcu rung ba blud do/_/de'i
[\[14b.3\]]rjes la sran tshod yu sha zhes bya ba bal po se'u 'bru dang sran bu dkar sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras chan du spags shing bza'/_de nas sran mung+ga dang /_bal po se'u 'bru dang spod sna tshogs su sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras chan du spags shing bza'/_mjug tu ni khu sha dang 'bras chan
[\[14b.4\]]du spags shing bza'o/_/de ltar slon pa'i rjes la kha zas tshod che chung bza' ba'i tshad skyug sman legs te/_legs par slon la dang ga sang sang por byas na thug pa dang /_sran tshod yu sha dang khu sha gsum char zos kyang rung ngo /_/'bring tsam du slon na ni 'bras thug dang /_
[\[14b.5\]]sran tshod yu sha dang /_rnam pa gnyis ka bzar rung ngo /_/slon pa'i babs chung ste/_chen por ma slon na ni khu sha dang kha zas 'bras dang sbyar zhing stsal lo/_/dper na me phyung ste gso ba ni lci ba dang /_rta rtug dang /_rtswa la sogs pas bags kyis gso zhing me khad kyis
[\[14b.6\]]sbar na me che ba brtan pa dang /_thams cad tshos par byed nus pa de dang 'dra ste/_skyug sman gyis nad bsal te/_dang ga sal sal por bya ba la thog mar kha zas drags na mi rung ste/_'bras thug sla mo la sogs pa ran par sbyin zhing drod cher bya'o/_/de la skyug sman gyis lan
[\[14b.7\]]bzhi bzhi slon na phabs chung ba'i tshad do/_/lan drug slon na slon pa'i 'bring tshad do/_/lan brgyad du slon na skyug sman legs pa'i tshad do/_/de la bkru sman gyis bkrus pa'i chung thang ni/_lan bcu 'khrus pa'o/_/'bring tshad ni bcu gsum mo/_/che thang ni lan
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bcu bdun no/_/de las 'khrus pa'i babs chung thang ni drug phul gang gi tshad do/_/'bring ni drug phul do'i tshad do/_/'khrus pa'i che thang ni drug phul bzhi 'gyur ro/_/de la skyug sman gyis slon te cho ga'i tshad ni 'khrus pa'i phyed tsam ste/_mjug tu
[\[15a.2\]]mkhris pa byung na chog cing ran pa'i tshad do/_/de la bkru sman gyis bkru ste/_bkrus pa'i mjug tu bad kan byung na ran te chog go/_/bkru sman btang ba'i tshe dang po la thur du lan gnyis gsum tsam byung ba ni khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba ni 'khrus pa'i grangs su mi brtsi'o/_/skyug
[\[15a.3\]]sman btang ba ni skyug sman 'thungs nas bkrus te slon pa dang /_mjug tu mkhris pa 'byung ba'i tshad kyis gzung ngo /_/skyug sman gyis slon pa'i 'og tu snum bag btang ba dang /_dugs bya ba yang zhag gsum mam lnga'am bdun cho ga byas nas de'i rjes la gdod bkru sman
[\[15a.4\]]btang ste/_de yang nang par bad kan gyi dus yol te/_lto sra snyi'i tshod bzung la bkru sman gtang ngo /_/de la mi'i rang bzhin mkhris pa che zhing mang la lto snyi ste 'o mas kyang 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rang bzhin rlung gi shas che na lto sra ste bkru sman dri bong dang dan ti la sogs
[\[15a.5\]]pas kyang bkru dka'o/_/de la mkhris pa che ba la sman bkru sman ro bska ba dang mngar ba las gtang ngo /_/bad kan che ba la sman tsha ba las gtang ngo /_/rlung che na snum pa dang drod che ba dang lan tshwa las gtang ngo /_/sman btang yang 'khrur mi rung na chu bskol ba dron mo blud do/_/
[\[15a.6\]]lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa'am/_gos me la bsros bsros pas dugs bya'o/_/bkru sman btang ba las de nyin par chen po mi 'khru na thong de zan byin la phyi de nyin bkru sman thong shig_/gal te nad pa zas yi gar mi 'ong ste kha zas mi tshud dam lto sra ba zhig na snum gtang
[\[15a.7\]]ba'i cho ga zhag gsum mam lnga'am bdun du gtang bar bshad pa de bas zhag grangs bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du snum bag thong shig_/de'i rjes la lus la dugs kyi cho ga byas nas de'i 'og tu gdod bkru sman gtang ngo /_/bkru sman btang ba de yang sngar lan cig 'khrus pa'i tshe/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bkrur ma btub pa de dmigs kyis nyes pa dang /_ci las gyur pa legs par bltas te/_sngar cis nyes pa dran par byas la de las thabs ji ltar legs par bkru sman gtang ngo /_/bkru sman btang ba las ma legs pa'i nad dmigs snying na/_lto ba na/_zas mi 'ju
[\[15b.2\]]ste/_gsud sgregs mnam por 'byung /_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_bad kan mkhris pa gnyis rgyas pa slon par 'gyur/_g.yan pas 'debs/_tsha ba skye/_lus la thor bu 'byung /_cham pas 'debs/_thur du dbugs mi 'byung /_bshang ba 'byung sra ba 'di
[\[15b.3\]]lta bu byung bar gyur na bkru sman ma legs pa yin no/_/de las bkru sman legs pa'i tshul ni ma legs pa'i gnad bshad pa las bzlog par bya ste/_de la dang por ni khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba je 'byung ngo /_/de'i rjes la mkhris pa de nas bad kan tha ma rlung 'byung zhing de ltar 'khru
[\[15b.4\]]ba ni legs par blta'o/_/de la bkru sman babs che ste ha cang drags pa ni bad kan zad de med pa dang /_mkhris pa yang zad de med/_chu skya bor 'khru/_chu nag por 'ong /_yang na sha bkrus pa 'dra ba rtsa snar bag can nam chu ser lta bur 'byung /_tshil lta bu'i nar nar po'am/_
[\[15b.5\]]rus bu lta bu 'byung /_gzhang phyir 'byung zhing ltogs/_kha skom/_klad pa 'khor/_mig tshags te phugs su bros pa 'di lta bur gyur na bkru sman ha cang drags pa'i tshul yin no/_/bkru sman drags pa dang skyug sman gtang ba'i zas kyi cho ga dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/skyug sman ltar gtang ba'i
[\[15b.6\]]cho ga las dud pas gtang ba'i cho ga mi dgos so/_/bkru sman gyi rjes la kha zas bza' ba'i rim pa yang skyug sman gyi cho gar bshad pa dang 'dra ste/_kha zas rim pas bza' zhing bags kyis kha zas nar ma yang phyi nas bza'o/_/gal te bkru sman btang ba las drod chung bas bkru sman ma
[\[15b.7\]]zhu zhing nad ma phyin la long brnyas pa ni med/_nad dkyel ni che ba tsam ma yin na sman khong du ma zhu ba'i tshul de ltar gyur na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni/_bkru sman 'thung ba'i nyin thog thag zan mi za bar mtshan yal nas nam zhu zhu ba'i bar du bsdad cing kha zas mi za'o/_/yang na sngar
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byas la phyis bkru sman btang ba nad gcung la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/bkru sman btang ste bkrus pa dang gtar ga btab pa dang /_snum gyi cho gar sbyar te btang ba dang /_zas mi za bar smyung bar byas pa 'di rnams kyis ni drod chung zhing
[\[16a.2\]]nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po dang 'bras thug sla ba la sogs pa blud cing bags kyis gtang ngo /_/bkru sman btang bas mkhris pa dang bad kan bri ste chung ngur gyur pa dang /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa che ba'i mi skom dad che ba de lta bu'i mi
[\[16a.3\]]la ni thug pa blud du mi rung ste de dag la kha zas bsod pa la sogs pa khad kyis brta ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/nad ma smin pa la ni skyug sman gtang ngo /_/nad smin par gyur te bkru sman gtang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang ste nad bsal bar bya'o/_/skyug sman gtang ba ni bkru
[\[16a.4\]]sman ltar gtang ba'i dus la ma bab par nad smin pa la bsdad mi dgos par rung ngo /_/yang mi nyam chung zhing nad mang ba de lta bu la ni nad nyid smin cing bkru sman gtang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman gtang mi dgos par 'khru bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[16a.5\]]sngar bkru sman btang ste nyam chung ba dang nad kyang bri ste chung du gyur pa dang /_mi sha chung ste skem pa dang /_lto sra snyi tshod ma zin pa 'di lta bu la sman thun chung ba dang sman 'jam po thong shig_/de lta bas na ches sman lan mang du 'thungs pa bla'o/_/dogs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa'i
[\[16a.6\]]sman thun cher ni gtang du mi rung ngo /_/nad pa nyam chung ba lta bu la ni sman 'jam zhing thun chung bas nad zhi bar bya'o/_/nad pa nyam chung ba la de ltar dpyad bya ste/_nad mang po cung zad khad kyis bri na de yang sman bags kyis btang zhing nad khad kyis bstsal lo/_/nad dkyel che bas phyin phyin
[\[16a.7\]]pas nad pa yun ring du nyon mongs pa de lta bu drod chung /_lto sra bar gyur pa yin te de la dpyad du bya ba ni thal sman rnon pos gsha' ra dang /_che tsha dang mar du sbyar ba btang na khong pa'i me drod skye ste/_zas 'ju rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyang zhi nas de nas 'khru sman thong shig_/nad pa'i
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]nyams che la khong rtsub/_rlung gi shas che/_lto sra la rtag tu rtsol ba'i ngang tshul can/_khong pa'i drod che ba de lta bu ni bkru sman btang ba yang sman zhu bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de lta bu la ni sngar sman ma btang ba la nyams brtas nas phyis bkru sman 'jam po thong shig_/gal te 'khrur
[\[16b.2\]]mi rung ngam lan 'ga' zhig 'khrus nas sman rnon po cung zad sbyar ba'i sman reng reng por mas bcug nas/_nad thur du 'khrus te ma phyin pas khong yang 'jam la bkru sman legs pa bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gong du bkru sman btang nas sngar snum gyi cho ga bya bar bshad pa de yang dug
[\[16b.3\]]gis phog pa'i mi dang /_mtshon gyis rmas pa lta bu dang /_thor bu byung ba dang /_mdze nad dang /_'or nad dang /_me dbal dang /_mig ser dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_za khu'i nad yod pa dang /_'di lta bu rnams la ni snum gyi cho ga ha cang cher mi bya ba dang bkru sman
[\[16b.4\]]thong shig_/de la snum bag gi cho ga bya ba dang /_bkru sman btang ba dang thams cad la nad med pa'i khong snum pa la snum gyi cho ga bya ste brtas la skyug sman dang /_bkru sman la sogs pa las bya zhing gang btang yang rung ste/_de dag gi bar dang /_skabs skabs su snum
[\[16b.5\]]gyi cho ga dang dugs kyi cho ga bya'o/_/de ltar snum bag gi cho ga byas pa'i rjes la kha zas kyi nyams 'tshag brtas nas bkru sman gyis nad bsal ba ni dper na gos dri ma can sbangs la bkru ba dang 'dra'o/_/de la snum gyi cho ga dang dugs la sogs pa ma byas par rang gar bkru sman
[\[16b.6\]]gtong ba de ni shing skam po dgug tu mi rung ba bzhin du lus ma rung ba'i nyen du 'gyur ro/_/de la cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bkru sman gtang ba legs par bya ba ni sems gsal ba dang dbang po rnams dang /_srog zungs rnams brtan pa dang khong du drod che/_me 'bar/_
[\[16b.7\]]zas myur du 'ju/_rgas sra bar 'ong ste/_bkru sman btang legs pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//sman mas gtong ba nyams brta bar bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bcu dgu bshad par bya'o/_/rlung nad
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]kyi shas che ba de lta bu la ni sman mas gtong zhing brta ste/_lus kyi khong snum par bya ba'i cho ga bzang ngo /_/de lta bas na sman dpyad kyi bya ba thams cad kyi nang nas sman mas gtong zhing khong snum zhing nyams brta bar bya ba 'di ni dpyad kyi mchog yin no/_/
[\[17a.2\]]de yang nad rnam pa gsum ste nad 'khrur rung pa khong du bsdu ba'i sman mas gtong ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas gtong ba dang /_rnam pa gsum mo/_/sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga 'di gsum gyis skran dang lto sbos pa dang /_rkang pa na ste 'theng ba dang /_mcher pa na
[\[17a.3\]]ba dang /_rlung nad kyis lto 'khru ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_rims bying ba dang /_cham pa na ba dang /_rlung nad kyis khu chu 'gags pa dang /_rlung nad las rtug skam du gyur te 'byung du mi rung ba dang /_rlig rlugs dang /_rde'u nad dang /_khu chu la nad yod pa dang /_rlung nad dkyel
[\[17a.4\]]chen por gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas gtong ba rnam pa gsum gyis nad kun bsal bar bya'o/_/de la sman mas gtong zhing bkrur mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni snum bag btang ha cang drags pa dang glo rdol ba dang lus ha cang skem che ste nyam chung ba lta bu dang /_mchin pa na ste be'u
[\[17a.5\]]snabs su 'khru ba dang /_rtag tu slon bro ba dang /_bkru sman gyis bkrus zin pa lta bu dang /_sna nas sman btang zin pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ste rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang /_lud pa lu ba dang mchil ma mang ste rtag tu 'dor ba dang /_gzhang 'brum khrag tshad kyis btab pa dang /_
[\[17a.6\]]skyigs bus btab pa dang /_lto sbos pa dang /_drod chung ste zas 'jur mi rung ba lta bu dang /_gzhang kha skrangs te na bas sman mas gtong du mi rung ba lta bu dang /_kha zas zos zin pa lta bu dang /_dmu rdzing gi nad kyis rtsa sgo kun 'gags pa dang /_mdze nad dang za khu can
[\[17a.7\]]du gyur te gcin sbrang rtsi'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang /_bud med sbrum ma zla ba bdun las ma lon pa dang /_'di rnams lta bu la ni sman mas gtong zhing byar mi rung ngo /_/de la sman mas gtong zhing nyams brtas te khong snum par bya ba dang /_sman mas gtong ba'i bkrur rung ba'i nad
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]dmigs ni drod ha cang che ba dang /_khong rtsub pa dang /_rlung nad 'ba' zhig na ba las dmu rdzing du gyur pa lta bu dang /_cham pas btab pa dang /_ha cang sbom ches pa dang /_lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_rlung nad kyi shas ha cang ches pa dang /_dbyig dug 'thungs pa dang /_'brum bus
[\[17b.2\]]btab pa dang /_rkang bam gyi nad dang /_lba ba can dang /_'di rnams lta bu'i nad la sman mas gtang zhing bkrur rung ngo /_/sman mas gtong ba de dag gi cha spyad sbu gu ni gser la sogs pa dang /_shing dang /_rus pa dang /_'di rnams kyis gce'u ma gas pa drang la 'jam pa kha zlum
[\[17b.3\]]por byas te/_tshad ni byis pa na gzhon te lo gcig ma lon na srid sor lnga'o/_/lo bdun ma lon na srid sor drug go/_/lo bdun lon na srid sor bdun no/_/lo bcu gnyis lon na sor dgu'o/_/lo nyi shu lon pa phan chad la sor bcu gnyis so/_/de yan chad lo grangs kyi bye brag
[\[17b.4\]]dang /_na tshod dang /_nyams stobs dang /_lus bong las sbu gu'i tshad bskyed do/_/sbu gu'i tshad kyi sbom ni mthe bong shong ba'i tshad du bya'o/_/rtse mo'i sbom ni mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya'o/_/byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa man chad sor mo'i tshad las phyed phyed kyis de
[\[17b.5\]]bskyed de zhabs kyi bu ga'i sbom rab tu che ba dang /_sor mo gsum gyi rtse mo nang du shong ba tsam du bya'o/_/gce'u'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad ni mon sran sde'u dang /_sran chung dang /_sran ma 'di rnams btsos pa shong ba dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong ba'i tshad che chung gi rim pa
[\[17b.6\]]de ltar bya'o/_/gce'u'i rtse mo'i gong du khog pa gdags pa'i tshad ni gce'u'i bu ga sbom pa'i tshad dang mnyam par bya'o/_/gce'u nas sman gtong ba'i tshe gce'u'i rtse mo'i kha bkab pa'am/_pags pas bcad de ma bo bar byas nas gtang ngo /_/gce'u'i zhabs sbom
[\[17b.7\]]po'i kha nas yang sor gnyis su gzhal bar khog pa can de nas mar rim pa gnyis su btags la/_bug pa gnyis kyi bar du sman blugs pa'i snod lug dang ra dang ma he la sogs pa'i lgang pa legs par mnyes pa tshon gyis dmar por btsos pa sra ba phur ma thag thug dang dri nga
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ba dang rtsa'i ri mo 'di rnams med cing 'jam la sra ba de lta bu'i gce'u dang sbyar te srad bus legs par bcings la sman blugs nas bde bar bya'o/_/gal te lgang pa'i rkyal bu med na rgyal pa'i dpung pa'am/_byin pa'i bags pa'am/_ras stug po thags
[\[18a.2\]]bzang ba spra tshil gyis byugs pa de lta bu la snod du bya'o/_/de la sman mas gtong ste bkru ba'i tshad ni byis pa chung ngu lo gcig la srang gcig gtang ngo /_/byis pa chung ngu de lta bu las lo re re lon zhing sman srang re re bskyed de/_lo drug lon nas srang bcu gnyis gtang ngo /_/
[\[18a.3\]]de yan chad kyang lo grangs las srang gnyis gnyis su bskyed de lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang /_lo bco brgyad lon pa nas lo bdun cu lon pa man chad la spyir sman gtang ba'i tshul ni thun rab tu che na yang srang nyi shu gtang ngo /_/sman mas gtong ste bkru ba'i thun srang ji snyed cig btang
[\[18a.4\]]ba de las dpags te nyams brta zhing khong snum par byas pa'i sman mas gtong ba bzhi cha gcig gi tshad du bya'o/_/de lta bas na nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong du rung ba'i snum bag btang ba dang /_dugs bya ba'i cho ga yang byas/_bkru sman btang ste nang gi nad kyang bsal/_
[\[18a.5\]]'bras thug sla mo dang gar po la sogs pas nyams 'tshag kyang brtas nas nyams brta ba'i sman gtang du rung bar shes na thog ma nyid du nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba yang dgun zla bzhi dang dpyid zla gnyis kyi tshe ni nyin par thong shig_/
[\[18a.6\]]kha cig na re zla ba 'di drug gi tshe mtshan mo yang gtang du rung zhes zer ro/_/so ga dang dbyar dang ston gyi tshe ni mtshan mo thong shig_/de la khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya na/_cho ga sngar bya ba la lus mar gyis bsku zhing lde gus dril la chu dron pos lus
[\[18a.7\]]dag par bkru/_dro'i kha zas kyi tshad snga na ci za ba'i thang las bzhi gsum ni bza' bzhi cha cig ni mi bza'/_kha zas ci za ba yar phan pa yang ba snum ches pa yang ma yin/_rtsub ches pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu zos la khu ba la sogs pa skom gyi gor btung ba dang /_tshal nan yang btung ngo /_/
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]kha zas zos pa'i rjes la bcag par byas na bshang gci bstsal la mal bde bar 'dug na sngas smad nas ro smad bstod de/_glo g.yon gyis phab nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum rkang pa g.yon pa ni rkyong shig_/de nas gce'u'i nang nas sman mas gtong ste gce'u'i kha dang gzhang kha yang
[\[18b.2\]]snum gyis bsku'o/_/gce'u'i lgang pa nang du sman blugs la dbugs phyir phyung nas kha bcings pa/_sman pa nad pa'i rgyab logs su 'dug nas/_rtabs bag tu sman myur du btang ba'am/_dal zhing thogs pa ma yin par bya zhing gce'u'i nang nas sman nang du btang zhing btsir ba'i
[\[18b.3\]]shugs ha cang drags pa'am/_dal ba yang ma yin ran par cig car lan cig tu btsir cing thong shig_/lgang pa'i zhabs na rlung lus pa yod kyi sman gyi lhag ma ma lus par gyis shig_/sman btang zin nas brla dang rkub tsos la thal mos brdab cing gan rkyal du bzhag
[\[18b.4\]]la nad pa nyid rang gi lam la rkang pa'i rting pas brdung bar bya'o/_/sman pa'am/_nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rkang pa nas bteg ste lan gsum gsigs shig_/de nas nad pa sngas bcug nas brkyang ste/_nyal la rkang pa'i rting par nad g.yog gis khu tshur gyis brdung
[\[18b.5\]]ba'am/_brla dang byin pa la yang khu tshur gyis brdung zhing lus snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya'o/_/lus la brdung zhing mnyes la mi bde bar byas pa des/_sman slar myur du phyir mi dbyung ngo /_/gal te sman slar myur du phyir byung bas phan mi byed par gyur na/_sman mar phyi
[\[18b.6\]]ma gzhan yang sbyar la gtang ngo /_/khong pa'i drod che bas sman mas gtong ba zhu na nub kar kha zas kyang bza'o/_/zas zos nas de phan chad mtshon thog thag tu ci yang mi bza' mi btung bar nyol cig_/gal te sman phyir 'byung du ma rung na sman sbyar ba'i star bu'am/_sman rnon po
[\[18b.7\]]lgang pa nas mas gtong zhing khong na sman mar lus pa phyir dbyung ngo /_/gal te khong pa'i nang na ha cang rtsub ches pas sman ma zhu ste phyir ma byung ba dang /_khong pa'i drod chung bas sman ma zhu ste/_phyir ma byung la nad du gyur pa med na bsdad par bya zhing mtshan mo de bzhin du
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'dug par bya'o/_/nang par li dong gra dang /_'u su bskol ba'i chu 'am yang na chu 'ba' zhig gdus pa btung bar bya'o/_/nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong na nyi ma gsum mam/_nyi ma lnga lon na yang thong shig_/gal te 'ju ba'i drod che bas sman
[\[19a.2\]]zhu ba'am/_yang na rlung gi shas ha cang ches pa dang /_rtag tu rtsol zhing bcag par byed pa dang /_me'i drod ha cang che ba dang /_khong pa'i nang rtsub pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas gtong ba'i nyi ma re re gtang du rung ngo /_/de ltar khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba
[\[19a.3\]]lan gsum lan bzhi btang nas lus kyi khong dang rtsa 'jam zhing snum par gyur nas nad dbyung zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_bkru ba'i sman mas gtong zhing sbyar bar bya'o/_/snga na lus kyi khong rtsub pa las snum par bya ba'i 'og tu nyi ma lnga lon na tshes grangs bzang po'i nyi ma
[\[19a.4\]]cung zad phyed yol tsam na sman pas gtor ma dang bkra shis kyi tshig byas la nad pa lus til mar gyis byugs/_dugs byas/_bshang gci'i dri ma bstsal la/_ha cang bkres pa tsam ma yin par 'dug la nad kyi dmigs dang sman la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i mi dang /_gang de
[\[19a.5\]]la mkhas pa mang po dang /_lhan cig tu 'gro zhing sman mas gtong ba'i bkru sman drag po de la sman gyi khu ba sbangs pa chu srang brgyad cu'i bzhi cha gcig ste srang nyi shu dang /_po son cha'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgyad dang sbyar te btso zhing de'i nang du mar ni sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i bzhi cha
[\[19a.6\]]gcig nang du blugs te btso ma 'di ni rlung nad la btang na thabs de ltar sbyar ro/_/mkhris pa na ba la btang ba dang /_na ba med pa nyams tha mal pa la btang na sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu rtsa drug cha gcig gi thang du blugs te btso bar bya'o/_/bad kan gyi nad che ba la btang na sman
[\[19a.7\]]gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te btso bar bya'o/_/yang na nad thams cad la sman gyi khu ba'i brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te btsa'o/_/bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba btso ba de yang ha cang mi ska mi sla bar sbyar zhing btso'o/_/de'i nang du bu ram
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]srang gcig tsam dang sbrang rtsi dang /_lce tsha la sogs pa nad dmigs dang sbyar zhing ci rigs par sbags te/_sman lhag ma sbyar te/_sman de thams cad snod cig tu blugs la/_bum pa chu tshan bskol ba'i rlangs pa'i khar bsro zhing /_sman dkrugs la gtong ba'i gce'u rkyal
[\[19b.2\]]pa'i nang du blugs te/_ha cang mi tsha mi grang /_ha cang mi snum mi rtsub/_ha cang mi rno mi 'jam/_ha cang mi gar mi sla/_ha cang mi nyung mi mang /_je tsha med pa'am tsha bar yang mi bya/_de dang 'dra bar 'bras tsam yang mi mang mi nyung bar sbyar te/_sman mas gtong zhes mkhas
[\[19b.3\]]pa kha cig ni de skad zer ro/_/yang sman pa kha cig na re mar dang sbrang rtsi gnyis kyi tshad so sor srang gsum gsum dang na ba med cing nyams tha mal pa zhig la btang na lce tsha zho gnyis po son cha dang shu ti la sogs pa srang gnyis sbangs pa'i khu ba dang lhag ma'i khu ba srang bcur
[\[19b.4\]]sbyar te sman khu sbangs sbangs pa mar dang btsos la sbrang rtsi dang lce tshar sbyar te/_rim pa 'di ltar byas la sman gtang ba'i rkyal bur blugs la/_bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga de ltar bya'o/_/de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas gtong zhing bkru bar sbyar na shing nye rong
[\[19b.5\]]dang lce tsha se na ba dang nye'u shing pa dang /_a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_e raN+Da'i lo ma sman dang sa shing 'jam pa dang skyur ba dang dro ba'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i sman rnams ni rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas gtong bar bzang ngo /_/mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman mas gtong zhing bkru
[\[19b.6\]]ba'i rnam grangs la gtogs pa la shing n+ya gro d+ha dang /_shing u dum+bA ra dang /_shing p+lag sha dang /_sha pa dang /_shing mngar dang /_'o ma dang /_nye'u shing dang /_'bri mar dang /_ro mngar zhing bsil ba rnams dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba sbrang rtsi dang 'di rnams mkhris pa'i nad
[\[19b.7\]]sel ba'i sman mas gtong zhing bkru bar bzang ngo /_/bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel ba ni dong ga dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_pa ta li ga dang /_chis khrims dang /_shing nim pa dang /_sle tres dang /_pa Ta dang /_ka tu ha ro ha ni dang /_shing gi khu ba she le ya kha dang /_pu ti ka rany+dza dang /_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]rak+ta ka rany+dza dang /_sap+ta par+Ni zhes bya ba tshigs re la lo ma bdun yod pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang /_sman ro tsha zhing rno ba dang drod che ba rnams dang tsha ba rnams sbyar te btsos la sman mas gtong zhing bkrus na/_bad kan gyi nad sel to/_/de la rlung nad dang
[\[20a.2\]]mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi nad 'dus par gyur na yang /_de gsum gyi sman gong du bshad pa las nad so so'i sman ci ran du shas shas kyis gdus pa btsos pa'i thun spyir mi che ba ran par mas gtong ba'i bkru sman drag po gtang ngo /_/rtas bkru ba'i sman mas btang
[\[20a.3\]]nas sngas kyis brten te gan rkyal du sems gud du mi g.yengs par sman btang ba de la yid gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas thur du bkru zhing 'ong bar gyur na langs te tsog pur 'dug la bshang bar gyis shig_/gal te 'khyims na skad cig thogs te phol du ma rung na sman 'di nyen che
[\[20a.4\]]ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta bu nyen du gyur pa la slar btsos shing dpyad du bya ba la mar dang nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal sman rnon po dang /_ba gcin dang 'bras kyi rtsabs kyi khu ba skyur mo dang sbyar la btsos pa 'jam zhing rno la dro bar sbyar te/_sman mas gtong ba'i rkyal bu gzhan
[\[20a.5\]]du blugs te bshams la mas gtong zhing tshir cig_/yang na po son cha las sbyar ba'i sman gyis gdab mu las gzhug pa bya zhing sdang ba yang bya'o/_/yang na 'di ltar ma gyur te sman mas gtong yang 'ong bar gyur na sman phyi ma sbyar te/_rkyal bur blugs la lan gsum lan bzhi'i
[\[20a.6\]]bar du yang sman drag po mas gtong zhing legs par btang nas de'i rjes la kha zas kyi cho ga ni bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bar shes par byas la kha zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol du chu dron pos khrus byas nas kha zas bza' ba'i thabs ni 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po dang /_'bras thug sla mo
[\[20a.7\]]btung /_sha khu sla mo dang 'bras chan du sbyar te bza'/_sman drag po mas gtong ste bkrus pas khong pa'i dri ma nad kun phyin na/_khong pa nang 'phyang bag tu 'dug pa dang /_nyam chung ste khong rmya ba de lta bur gyur pa de la chu dron po bde bas khrus byas nas kha zas cho ga bzhin du zos na
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]lus zhig cing rmya ba la phan te/_zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sman de ltar mas gtong ste/_bkrus pa las rlung nad kyi bar du khong pa sbo bas grang bar 'gyur te/_mi bde na yang de'i mod la 'phral du rlung zhi bar 'gyur ba'i sman btsos te mas gtong zhing khong 'jam zhing snum par 'gyur
[\[20b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/sman mas gtong ste bkrus pa legs pa'i tshul dang /_ha cang drags pa dang thun chung ste ma 'khrus par gyur pa 'di rnams kyi tshul ni sngar snum gyi cho ga bya zhing btang ba legs/_ma legs par bshad pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/sman mas gtong ste
[\[20b.3\]]bkrus pa'i rjes rlung nad du gyur pa la khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa'i sman mas gtong ba cung zad tsam zhig bsdad na khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba dang bcas te sman mar dang cig car 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thur du dbug pa yang sman mar lhan cig 'ong bar gyur na/_khong snum zhing
[\[20b.4\]]'jam par 'gyur ba'i sman mas gtong ba legs pa yin no/_/yang bad kan gyi bag che na de la khong brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan gcig gam lan gsum gyi bar du thong shig mkhris pa rgyas pa'i shas che na/_brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan lnga 'am lan bdun gyis shig_/
[\[20b.5\]]rlung nad la brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan dgu 'am bcu gcig tu thong shig_/de ltar brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba'i lan grangs zung du ma gyur par byas nas gal te de'i rjes la bkru ba'i sman mas gtong bar 'dod na yang thong shig_/de ltar sman mas gtong ba'i rjes la
[\[20b.6\]]bad kan dang mkhris pa dang /_rlung nad sel ba'i kha zas mon sran sde'u'i tshod ma khu ba can dang /_'o ma dang khu sha 'di gsum zos na nad kyi rim pa bzhin du phan no/_/de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman drag po mas gtong zhing khong snum la brta bar bya na/_shing nye rong dang lce
[\[20b.7\]]tsha sne bda' ba dang sbyar te snum dang /_mngar dang 'bras rtsabs skyur ba dang /_sha khu dang drod che ba'i bag sbyar te bskol la rkyal bur blugs te btang ba 'di ni rlung nad gcig pu la phan no/_/mkhris pa'i nad la ni n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangs su gtogs pa dang /_
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]shug pa dang kha ra dang /_mngar bag bsil bag dang mar dang 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang 'di rnams sbyar te gdus la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_sman mas gtong na mkhris pa'i nad 'byang zhing me'i khong brta la snum par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyi nad la dong
[\[21a.2\]]ga la sogs pa dang /_dug mo yungs la sogs pa dang /_sman rtsub pa rnams dang /_ba gcin dang sman rno ba dang /_drod che ba dang /_ro tsha ba dang /_'di rnams bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_mas gtong na bad kan gyi nad 'byang ngo /_/de la rlung nad la ni lan gcig gtang ngo /_/
[\[21a.3\]]mkhris pa'i nad la lan gnyis gtang ngo /_/bad kan gyi nad la lan gsum gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad la yang sman dpyad de gsum rim pas btang na 'dus pa'i nad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sman dpyad kyi slob dpon spyod pa can na re/_
[\[21a.4\]]yang mi'i nad gzhi ni rlung dang bad kan dang /_mkhris pa gsum du zad de nad 'di gsum bstsal ba'i dpyad bkru ba'i mas gtong ba las gud na dpyad rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba med de/_de'i phyir sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad/_khong nas bskyod
[\[21a.5\]]cing sdud pa dang /_nad bkru ste byang bar bya ba dang /_nad zhi bar byas te/_'di lta bu yang rim gyis bya ba yin te/_de'i phyir nad rnam pa gsum bkru ba'i dpyad mas gtong zhing bkru bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de ltar sman btang ba yang nad dmigs dang sman la sogs pa'i mthu dang /_
