[\[21a.6\]]nad pa'i nyams stobs dang /_de thams cad kyi tshod zin par byas la sman gtang ngo /_/bkru sman btang ba legs pa'i tshul mthong /_ma dpags kyi bar du bkru ba'i sman btang ba'i rjes gcad du mi rung ngo /_/yang khong snum zhing 'jam pa bda' ba'i sman mas gtong ba dang /_bkru
[\[21a.7\]]ba'i sman mas gtong ba gang yang rung ste/_lan gcig gtang yang mi rung lan mang du gtang ba yang mi rung ngo /_/de la khong brta zhing snum pa'i sman mas gtong ba ni nad khong nas bskyod cing bsdu ba dang /_khong pa'i drod ni chung bar 'gyur ro/_/bkru ba'i sman btang ba la 'jig pa'i
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rten ni rlung nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/sman mas gtong ba'i rim pa ni sngar lus kyi khong 'jam zhing snum par bya ba'i sman de gtang ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ngo /_/de'i rjes la khong brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/sman mas gtong ba'i dpyad byas
[\[21b.2\]]pa ni rlung nad dang /_bad kan mkhris pa'i nad gsum char sel te khong snum zhing brta bar bya ba'i sman mas gtong ba dang /_bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga rig par bya ba ni de lta bu yin no/_/yang sman mar thun chung ngu'i thang du tshod bzung ste/_btung ba dang khong 'jam zhing
[\[21b.3\]]brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba thun chung ngu'i thang du tshod bzung ste rtag tu gtang bar bya'o/_/de la sman mar thun chung ngu'i thang du btung na/_nad pa'i drod dang nyams las kyang dpags te srang gcig tsam btung ngo /_/brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba ni srang gnyis tsam thong shig_/
[\[21b.4\]]de la sman mar thun chung ngur btang ba'i mi ni byis pa dang rgan po dang /_lam rings kyis dub pa'i mi dang /_khur gyis dub pa dang /_bud med la brten drags pa'i lta bu dang /_drag shul byas pa lta bu dang /_sems las che ba dang /_rlung nad kyis lus zhom pa dang /_rid pa
[\[21b.5\]]dang /_drod chung ba dang /_rgyal po dang phyug po lta bu bde zhing longs spyod pa dang /_'di rnams lta bu la sman mar thun chung ngu gtang dgos te/_thun chung ngu rtag tu 'thungs na nad kun sel/_kha zas kyi cho ga la sogs pa bsrung zhing spang ba med pa la sha skye/_bshang gci dri ma
[\[21b.6\]]snyi ste bde blag tu 'ong ste bde bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med rnams kyi nad mo mtshan na ba dang /_mngal gyi gnas na ba dang /_sman mas gtong ba'i rim pa ni dang por khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa'i sman mas je btang la/_de'i 'og tu bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan gnyis sam
[\[21b.7\]]gsum thong shig_/mjug tu ni nyams 'tshag brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/de la skyes pa chu so na rde'u yod pa lta bu dang chu 'gags pa lta bu la pho mtshan nas sman mas gtong nas gce'u'i srid tshad ni nad pa nyid kyi sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du gser dngul la sogs pa las
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]brdung sa pa'i zlum po ba mjug lta bu zhabs dang bar gnyis ka'i rna ba btags la rtse mo'i bu ga ni yungs kar btsos pa shong ba tsam du btod la/_/'jam par byas te/_gce'u'i rtse mo me tog kun da'am/_sri shing gi me tog lta bu rtse mo byin gyis phra zhing sra
[\[22a.2\]]bar bya zhing /_sman gtong ba'i snod rkyal bu ni 'jam zhing yang bar bya'o/_/tshad ni pho ru gang shong ba tsam las che chung gang rigs par bya'o/_/de ltar sman mas gtong bar byed pa sngar khrus la kha zas 'ju sla zhing yang bar na par zos nas khong snum zhing 'jam pa'i sman cho ga bzhin du pho
[\[22a.3\]]mtshan nas thong shig_/de ltar sman gtang ba'i thabs ni khri'u'i 'phang pus mo tsam la drang po bde bar 'dug nas pho mtshan brtags la drang por byas nas pho mtshan gyi sbu gu'i nang bstsal te/_sman gtang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/_pho mtshan bu ga nas srubs kyi thad ka'i nang thog thag
[\[22a.4\]]rlig pa'i mgo tsam du thur ma 'jam po phra'u btang la de'i 'og tu rkyal bu'i gce'u lag pa mi 'dar bas sman mas gtong ba bzhin du thong shig_/de ltar sman btang nas de'i rjes bda' ba'i sman mas gtong ba yang /_rim pa bzhin du bya'o/_/de yang na lan gsum yang na lan bzhi'i
[\[22a.5\]]bar du 'jam zhing snum pa'i sman thong shig_/'jam zhing snum pa'i sman gtang ba'i cho ga rgyas par ni sngar thams cad bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/_/bud med rnams zla mtshan dbyung ba'i tshe mngal gyi kha phye ba bu chags par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe snum zhing brta bar bya bar 'gyur ba'i sman
[\[22a.6\]]thong shig_/na na ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus la ma bab par sman gtang dgos so/_/mo mtshan gyi nang gi mo mtshan nyams pa dang /_mo mtshan na ba dang /_mo mtshan ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_khrag 'byung ba 'di lta bu la sman mas gtong na phan te/_gce'u'i srid ni sor
[\[22a.7\]]bcu'o/_/rtse mo'i bu ga ni mon sran btsos pa shong bar bya'o/_/sman gyi gce'u ni bu 'chag pa'i mngal gyi mngal du sor bzhi gtang ngo /_/chus 'gags te na na gcig gi lam du sor gnyis gtang ngo /_/bu mo chung ngu dang byis pa rnams la ni sor gcig go_/thun 'bring
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ni srang gcig go_/bu mo rnams la ni phu rum gang gi tshad zho gnyis so/_/sman gtang ba'i thabs ni mal du gnas te 'dug la rkang pa dang brla bskum la/_pus mo gyen du bstod la nyin zhag gcig la mal lan gsum mam lan bzhir sha 'tshag brtas par gyur pa'i sman
[\[22b.2\]]gtang ste/_de ltar zhag gsum du thong shig_/sman mas gtong ba de yang bags kyis thun chung ngu nas bskyed cing gtang ngo /_/sman btang nas zhag gsum ngal bsos la de nas zhag gsum du sman thong shig_/sman de ltar gtang na sngar skyug sman btang nas zla ba phyed
[\[22b.3\]]lon pa dang /_bkru sman gyis bkrus la yang zla ba phyed lon pa dang /_bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ngo /_/dper na ras kyi tshon leb rgan can chu'i nang du bkrus na dmar ba phyin cing med pa bzhin no/_/de dang 'dra bar snum pa'i sman mas gtong bas ni lus kyi khong snum gyis brlan
[\[22b.4\]]cing bangs par gyur pa dang /_nad thams cad 'byin par 'gyur te/_lus kyi yan lag dang /_khong pa'i nang grol dang gnad dang /_mgo bo man chad lus kyi yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad kyi nad dang /_rlung dang bad kan dang /_mkhris pa'i nad du gyur pa'i nad gzhi sel
[\[22b.5\]]ba'i sman dpyad 'di las long shig_/gzhan cung zad kyang med do/_/bad kan dang /_mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad khong du song shing dkyil skyes pa dang bshang gci dri ma khong du bstsags te skyes pa de lta bu sel zhing 'byin pa'i nad rkyal bu nas mas gtong ba med na sman dpyad de las
[\[22b.6\]]gzhan med do/_/de bas na sman rkyal bu nas mas gtong ba'i tshig gcig pu'i nang du dpyad thams cad 'dus so/_/sman dpyad gzhan ni sman mas gtong ba'i phyed tsam du zad do/_/gzhan yang nad rnying dang /_nad gsar pa dang gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba la yang sman rkyal bu
[\[22b.7\]]nas mas gtong na phan par 'gyur ro/_/sman mas gtong ste/_nyams brta bar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so//_//sman sna nas gtang ba'i cho ga le'u nyi shu pa bshad par bya'o/_/thong ka yan chad klad pa'i nad la sman sna nas btang na lhag par phan no/_/sna ni klad
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/_de bas na klad pa'i nad thams cad la sna nas btang ste bkrus shing bsal na nad phyin par 'gyur ro/_/de la nad dmigs ni klad pa na ba dang /_lus blong bag tu gyur pa dang /_kha dang sna nas bad kan mang du 'byung ba dang /_lkog ma na ba dang /_
[\[23a.2\]]kha gdong dang klad pa skrangs pa dang /_thor bu byung ba dang /_lus la srin bu yod pa dang /_rtsa mdud byer ba dang /_mdze dang smyo bag dang /_cham pa na ba dang /_'di rnams la sman sna nas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/_/mgul pa yan chad klad pa rlung gi bag la mi bde ba la sman
[\[23a.3\]]mar sna nas btang na phan te brta bar 'gyur ro/_/nang par nyi ma shar nas nyi ma phyed kyi bar du klad pa gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_skad 'gags pa dang /_kha sna bskams pa dang /_skad mi phyin pa dang /_mi gsal te go dka' ba dang /_dpung pa ltung ba snyam du byed cing bskyod mi
[\[23a.4\]]nus pa dang /_'di rnams ltar mi bde ba la sman sna nas btang na phan te zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gi 'bras bu sngon por gyur pa dang /_dpung pa bem bem por gyur te tshor ba med cing bskyod mi nus pa dang /_skra'i nad dang /_mig dmar por gyur pa 'di rnams la dpyad du bya ba
[\[23a.5\]]mgul pa yan chad rlung nad du gyur te na ba la btsod dang /_shing mngar dang /_pra puN+Da ri ka stag tsher ba dang /_dzi ba ka ri sha pha ka dang /_ram nye dang /_bu tshang rdo dang /_sha ri ba dang /_pur+Na rna ba dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_byi dang ga dang /_sle tres dang /_ka ka na sa dang /_sgron shing
[\[23a.6\]]dang /_'di rnams cha mnyam par byas te zhib tu btags la til mar srang brgyad la btson ni sman 'di rnams srang gnyis gnyis kyi thang du bya/_til mar srang bcu drug la btson sman srang bzhi bzhi'i thang du sbyar ro/_/sman btso ba'i chu ni til mar las bcu 'gyur du bskyed do/_/'o ma ni til
[\[23a.7\]]mar dang thang mnyam par byas la chu dang 'o ma du ba'i bar du btsos te/_tshos pa'i tshod ni tshigs ma dril du btub cing dbu ba cher byung na tshos pa'i tshad yin te/_de nas sman mar btsags te btsir la snod bzang por lugs shig_/sman 'di'i ming ni btsod la sogs pa las sbyar
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ba'i til mar zhes bya'o/_/gal te mgul pa yan chad mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad du gyur na btsod la sogs pa sman 'di rnams snga ma dang 'dra ba 'bri mar ram ba mar las snga ma bzhin du btsos pa'i tshad ni til mar dang mi 'dra bar dril du btu na tshos pa yin no/_/de nas btsags te btsir
[\[23b.2\]]la sman mar snod bzang por bzhag la mkhris pa'i nad la sna nas gtang ngo /_/de la mgul pa yan chad bad kan du gyur te na ba'i sman sna nas gtang ba sbyar ba ni sman sbyor ba phal ni snga ma dang 'dra ste/_btsod la sogs pa de rnams kyi steng du sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_/
[\[23b.3\]]chang rnams kyis bsnan te/_snga ma dang 'dra bar til mar nang du btsos la bad kan gyi nad la sna nas thong shig_/de ltar sman 'di rnams kyis rlung nad dang /_mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad la so sor btang zhing kha nas bad kan la sogs pa drang zhing bkru bar bya'o/_/sna nas
[\[23b.4\]]btang ba'i rjes la mgul pa yan chad brtas shing bde bar bya ba'i dpyad sna nas gtang ba 'u su dang sha khu dang sha btsos pa'i khu ba dang 'o ma dang chu dang mar 'di rnams sbyar te snga ma bzhin du btsos la/_tshos pa dang btsags pa'i sman mar sna g.yas g.yon gyi bu ga nas btang ste sna
[\[23b.5\]]nas gtang ngo /_/chog tshad ni mar gyi nang du mdzub mo'i rtse mo nas mdzub mo'i tshigs su dbu ma man chad nub par bcug pa la sman mar ji tsam chags pa'i thun de tsam re re sna g.yas g.yon nas btang zhing bkru'o/_/yang klad pa na ba la li dong gra dang /_na le sham dang /_rgyam tshwa
[\[23b.6\]]dang /_pi pi ling dang 'di rnams la sogs pa brdungs te chu dang 'o ma dang til mar gyi nang du mnyes te/_btsags shing btsir ba'i khu ba sna nas gtang ngo /_/yang klad pa na ba la li dong gra dang /_pi pi ling la sogs pa tsha ba ro rno ba zhib tu btags te/_sbu gu sor drug pa kha
[\[23b.7\]]gnyis btod pa'i nang du sman phye ma blugs la/_sna g.yas g.yon gyi bu ga gnyis ka'i nang du kha'i dbugs kyis bus na bad kan la sogs pa'i klad pa'i nad rnams 'byin cing byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sman phye ma zhib tu btags pa sna nas bus te btang bas ni klad pa'i nad phal cher sel
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]cing 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/spyir sman mar lta bu sna nas btang ba'i tshad ni mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis man chad mar gyi nang du nub par smyugs te phyir phyung ba la mar thigs pa bcu'am brgyad dam drug chags pa dang /_'di rnams gsum ni thun che thang zhes bya ba ste/_/
[\[24a.2\]]de la sman mar zhig sna nas btang ste che na thigs pa bcu/_'bring na thigs pa brgyad/_chung na thigs pa drug go/_/yang sman mar ma yin pa sman gyi khu ba btsir te sna nas gtang ba che thang gi rim pa ni thigs pa bcu las gnyis phri ste brgyad gtang ngo /_/thun 'bring thigs pa brgyad las
[\[24a.3\]]gnyis phri ste drug gtang /_thun chung ngu thigs pa drug gtong ba la thigs pa gnyis phri ste thigs pa bzhi btang ste/_thun che thang gi bye brag rim pa ni 'di ltar sbyor cig_/yang de la sman sna nas gtang du mi rung ba'i dmigs ni chu 'thungs pa dang /_chang 'thungs pa dang /_dug
[\[24a.4\]]'thungs pa dang /_mar 'thungs pa rnams dang /_'phral du 'thung bar 'dod pa dang /_kha zas zos pa dang /_mgo bkru ba dang /_khrus byed 'dod pa dang /_gtar ga gdab pa dang /_cham pa sar pa dang /_bshang gci 'ong bar 'gyur te/_mi bde ba dang /_bud med bu btsas
[\[24a.5\]]ma thag pa lta bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pas bkar ba dang /_skyug sman dang /_bkru sman gyis bkrus pa dang /_rkyal bu nas sman mas gtong ba rnams dang /_dus ma yin par char 'bab pa lta bu'i tshe dang yul ngan 'byung ba dang /_dus 'di lta bu'i tshe sman sna nas
[\[24a.6\]]gtang du mi rung ngo /_/gal te na ba'i dmigs kyi tshul gyis sman sna nas mi gtang du mi rung bar gyur na ni nyen 'di rnams bsrung mi dgos te/_sman sna nas gtang ba'i cho ga gyis shig_/de la mgul pa yan chad kyi nad kyi bad kan gyi tshul du na na bad kan gyi dus ni nad par yin te/_
[\[24a.7\]]nad par thong shig_/mkhris pa na na dus nyin phyed yin te phyed na thong shig_/rlung nad kyi bag tu na na phyi 'phred dang srod la gtang bar bya'o/_/na ba med cing nyams tha mal pa zhig la sman sna nas btang na ston dang dpyid kyi tshe ni snga dro nas gtang ngo /_/dgun ni nyi ma gung gi tshe na
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]thong shig_/so ga na na phyi 'phred kyi tshe na thong shig_/dbyar gyi tshe na nyi ma dron po'i tshe na thong shig_/klad pa rlung nad kyis thibs te cher na na skyigs bus btab pa dang /_mgo 'dam pa dang /_gnye'u rengs kyis btab pa dang /_skad 'gags pa dang /_'di rnams lta
[\[24b.2\]]bu'i nad la nang par nyi ma shar sgab kyi 'og tsam dang /_nub ka dang dus gnyis su zhag bdun bar du nyin gcig bzhin thong shig_/nad 'di rnams ltar na ba med pa la sna nas btang na ni nyin gcig btang la nyin gcig bar bcad mi gtang ngo /_/de la sman sna nas gtang ba'i
[\[24b.3\]]cho ga'i thabs ni sngar bshang gci'i dri ma bsal la mgo bo mar gyis bsku/_dugs ran pa tsam du byas la mal rlung med par dron por 'dug nas/_mgul ba yan chad dugs ran pa tsam byas la/_de nas lus gan rkyal drang por brkyang la rkang lag brkyang /_rkang pa cung
[\[24b.4\]]zad tsam bstod la/_mgo bo'i sngas cung zad cig smad la sna'i bu ga ya gcig nas sman mar btang ste/_de yang sngar btang ba'i sman mar de/_snar gtong ba'i sbu gu can gyi nang du blugs te chu dron po'i nang du bsros la gtang ngo /_/snar blugs pa ni snod mchu can du btod pa'am
[\[24b.5\]]yang na ras mas blangs te snar gtigs shig_/snar blugs zin nas rkang mthil dang phrag pa dang lag pa dang rna ba la sogs pa nyes shig_/sman snar btang ba de mtshul pa nas sna'i nang du brngubs la mchil ma glo g.yas g.yon du bor cig_/de bzhin sman snod mchu can gyi
[\[24b.6\]]nang na yod pa de cung zad kyi bar du sna g.yas g.yon du res kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du thong shig_/gal te sman rno drags pas brgyal bar gyur na gdong pa dang brang du chus gtor cig_/mgo bor ni chus ma 'debs shig_/de ltar sman sna nas btang ste bkrus pa'i rjes la nad kyi
[\[24b.7\]]tshul dang yang sbyar te/_rlung nad du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/_sman mar snum bag tu 'gyur ba sna nas thong shig_/snar snum btang nas grangs brgya'i bar du gan rkyal du 'dug par bya'o/_/de nas de'i rjes la sbu gu'i dud pa kha gsum kha snar btang zhing khong du brngubs nas gre ba
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]mtshul pa bde zhing dag pa sang sang por bya ba'i phyir/_chu dron pos mkhur ba bkang la bsdad cing dbo'o/_/de ltar sna nas btang legs par gyur na dbugs bde/_gnyid legs par 'ong /_sems gsal/_mig gsal la rno bar 'ong ngo /_/gal te sman
[\[25a.2\]]sna nas btang ma legs na mig rtsub/_skya bo har har por snang /_kha sna skam/_klad pa'i nang stong par gyur pa snyem byed/_gal te snum ha cang btang drags na g.yan par 'gyur/_mgo dang lus lci/_snabs dang mchil ma mang /_yi ga 'chu/_cham pas 'debs pa nyen 'di lta bu
[\[25a.3\]]'byung ngo /_/sman sna nas btang zhing bkru legs na mig gsal zhing rno la yang kha'i nang dag ste sang bag can du 'gyur/_skad gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/sman sna nas btang zhing bkru ma legs na mgul pa yan chad dang klad pa'i nad snga bas dkyil skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bkru ba'i sman
[\[25a.4\]]sna nas btang drags te/_ha cang cher 'khrugs par gyur na khong rmya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gal te nad pa glo rdol ba dang nyam chung ste/_khong rmya ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang /_mi rgan po dang /_skyid cing longs pa'i mi 'di rnams lta bu la ni gong du sna nas sman pas thang chung ngur bshad
[\[25a.5\]]pa de ltar thong shig_/nad dmigs dang sbyar nas sman sna nas gtang dgos par gyur na dbyar sman sna nas gtang ba'i dus ma yin par yang rung ste/_sman sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/yang cham pa drag po btab pa dang /_de bzhin du chang 'thungs pa dang /_rna ba mi gsang ba dang /_
[\[25a.6\]]klad rgyas kyi nang du srin bu zhugs pa dang /_nad khong nas bsdus la phyir ma phyin par gyur pa dang /_'di rnams lta bu la ni sman snar gtang ba thun chung ba'i thang du gtang du mi rung ngo /_/snar sman gtang ba'i chung thang ni yang na ba med cing nyams tha mal par 'dug pas sman mar nyung shas
[\[25a.7\]]rtag tu snar gtang ngo /_/de'i thabs ni nyin par zas zos pa'i rjes dang slon pa'i rjes dang /_nyin par gnyid log pa'i rjes la dang /_lam rings 'gron du song bas dub pa dang /_bud med la drags pa dang /_mgo bo mar gyis byugs pa dang /_chu dron pos mkhur ba bkang
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]zhing bor ba'i rjes dang /_bshang gci'i dri ma bsal ba'i rjes dang /_so shing gis bkrus pa dang /_gad mo dgod pa'i rjes dang 'di rnams lta bu mar thigs pa re re sna'i nang du bskus na 'di rnams lta bu kun la phan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sna nas btang ba'i 'di ni chung thang zhes
[\[25b.2\]]bya'o/_/sman mar sna nas lan lnga btang na rna ba dang /_mig la sogs pa'i nang gi bu ga kun la phan par 'gyur ro/_/sman mar sna nas lan gsum btang na ngal zhing dub pa rnams med de brtas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rjes la yang snar lan lnga btang na mig rno zhing gsal ba'i mthu skye'o/_/
[\[25b.3\]]de'i 'og tu sman mar sna nas btang na so brtan la stod kyi rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/byis pa lo bdun ma lon pa la sman sna nas gtang du mi rung ngo /_/lo brgyad cu 'das pa'i rgan po la yang sman sna nas gtang du mi rung ngo /_/lo bco brgyad du ma tshang ba la dud pa kha sna nas gtang
[\[25b.4\]]du mi rung ngo /_/byis pa lo bco lnga ma lon pa la chu dron pos mthur ba bkang zhing 'dor ba yang mi rung ngo /_/gzhon nu lo bcu ma lon pa la bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pa gtang du mi rung ngo /_/lo bdun cu 'das pa'i rgan po la yang bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pa gtang du
[\[25b.5\]]mi rung ngo /_/sman snar btang ba thang chung du gong du dmigs kyis bstan pa bzhin snar bskus te yang thun che chung rnam pa bzhir shes par bya'o/_/de la thun chung ngu'i che thang ni thigs pa gnyis snar gtang ngo /_/thun chung ngu'i 'bring thang ni thigs pa re re bas kyang chung ba tsam zhig sna g.yas g.yon
[\[25b.6\]]gyi nang du bskus na klad pa lta bu nad dmigs ci yod pa snga ma langs pa ldang bar mi byed pa yin no/_/thun chung ngu'i rab ni sna'i nang du nad dmigs bskus te snabs mtshul ba nas snar brngubs la phyir bor ba'i nang na mar mngon du snang bar byed pa ni thun chung ngu'i thang zhes bya'o/_/de ltar thun chung
[\[25b.7\]]ngu rnams las gang ran pa tsam nam 'tsho ba'i bar du tshe gcig la rtag par bsku zhing btang na snum brngub par bya ba'i sman mas gtang ba dang 'dra/_sna nas gtang ba'i thun che chung bstan pa dang 'dra ste stod kyi nad ci la yang phan zhing bde ba'i yon tan du 'gyur ro/_/sna nas gtang ba'i sman chung
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ngu rtag tu gtang ba la/_cho ga srung zhing spang ba yang med/_nyen du gyur pa'i nad kyi 'jigs pa yang med do/_/de nas sman mar zhes bya ba ni/_dmigs kyis til mar nyid la bya ste til mar rtag tu btang na phan te dge'o/_/yang mgo bo ni bad kan gyi gnas yin
[\[26a.2\]]pas na na ba med cing nyams tha mal pa lta bu la sman mar thong shig_/de la sna nas gtang ba'i sman mar sbyar ba ni dzi ban ti dang /_dza la dang /_sgron shing dang /_gla sgang chen po dang /_shing tsha dang /_pu shel tsi dang /_go yu dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_skyer ba'i rtsa ba dang /_shing mngar
[\[26a.3\]]dang /_gla ba dang /_a ka ru dang /_nye'u shing dang /_pun da dang /_bil ba dang /_ut+pal dang /_d+ha ban ti dang /_u ra b+hi dang /_thi ra dang /_byi dang ga zhes bya ba srin bu gsod pa dang /_gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_sug smel dang /_ha re Nu ka dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba ge sar dang /_ba la dang /_sman
[\[26a.4\]]'di rnams sna tshang bar ci snyed du sbyar te cha snyoms la til mar ci tsam btso ba de las chu ni char pa'i chu brgya 'gyur du bskyed pa'i nang du sman brdungs la btsos te chu'i khu ba srang dgu bcu ni du/_phyi na srang bcu tsam zhig lus pa dang /_btsags pa sman gyi khu ba phyin brgya'i bcu cha gcig lus
[\[26a.5\]]pa de la til mar dang sman gyi khu ba bcu cha gcig dang sbyar te btsos la tshos pa dang /_btsags la til mar gyi nang du sman gyi khu ba phyi mas kyang bsnan la btso'o/_/'di bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan dgu'i bar du bsnan cing btsags la mjug tu lhag ma sman gyi khu ba bcu
[\[26a.6\]]cha dang til mar ci tsam yod pa'i ra'i 'o ma de tsam dang snyoms te btsos la tshos pa'i rtags dbu ba byung ba dang btsags par bya'o/_/sman mar 'di'i ming ni til mar gyi 'bru mar thigs phran zhes bya'o/_/sman mar 'di rtag tu sna nas btang ba'i phan yon ni lus brtan zhing drang /_
[\[26a.7\]]pags pa'i sha mdog bzang zhing gsal/_phrag pa dang mjing pa dang /_dpung mgo dang 'di rnams brtan zhing mkhregs la ma zhum par mtho bar 'gyur/_bzhin dang kha'i nang gsal bar 'gyur/_dbang po rnams gsal zhing brtan/_skra dkar med par 'gyur ro/_/sman sna
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]nas gtang ba'i cho ga ste le'u nyi shu pa rdzogs so//_//sman gyi dud pa gtang ba'i cho ga ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bshad par bya'o/_/mgul pa yan chad kyi nad ni klad pa na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_kha sna nas bad kan dang mchil ma mang ba dang /_mgo bo lci ba dang /_klad pa
[\[26b.2\]]gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_cham pas btab pa dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_kha zas ci zos kyang ro bro bar mi tshor ba dang /_kha nas bad kan dang mchil ma ha cang mang du 'ong ba dang /_skad 'dzer zhing 'gags pa dang /_sna nas rnag zag pa dang /_kha nas rnag
[\[26b.3\]]'ong ba dang /_skyigs bus btab nas mgul pa na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_nyam chung zhing rid pa dang /_zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_'gram pa na ba dang /_gnye'u rengs su gyur pa dang /_so dang skra dang klad pa'i nang du srin bu zhugs pa dang /_mgul pa yan chad dang /_mgo
[\[26b.4\]]bo g.ya' ba dang /_skya rbab tu gyur pa dang /_skra la gza' zhugs pa dang /_'byi ba dang /_sbrid pa 'byung du mi btub pa 'am/_sbrid pa ha cang mangs sam/_mgo yang khyer ba dang /_gnyid che ba dang /_'di rnams la sogs pa'i nad kun ni gzhi rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i nad
[\[26b.5\]]ma zhu bar gyur te/_mi bde ba yin no/_/de lta bu'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_dud pa rnam gsum rngub cing btung ngo /_/rnam gsum ji ltar gtang zhe na mgul pa yan chad rlung nad du gyur na sman 'jam zhing snum pa'i dud pa gtang ngo /_/rlung nad dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad la sman
[\[26b.6\]]gyi dud pa mi 'jam mi rno ba ran par gtang ngo /_/bad kan gyi nad la ni sman rnon po'i dud pa gtang ngo /_/de la mkhris pa rgyas pa dang /_khrag rgyas pa'i nad la bkru sman btang ste bkrus pa dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_za khu la sogs pa 'di rnams la ni sman gyi dud pa gtang du mi rung ngo /_/
[\[26b.7\]]mig rab rib khyer ba dang mgul pa yan chad klad pa'i bar du rlung zhugs pa'i nad dang sman mas gtong bar gyur pa dang /_lto sbos pa dang /_nya zos pa dang /_chang 'thungs pa dang /_zho dang bu ram dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar 'thungs pa dang /_dug 'thungs pa dang /_mgo
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bo snad pa dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman gyi dud pa gtang du mi rung ngo /_/gal te 'di rnams ltar mi bde ba la sman gyi dud pa btang na nyen du gyur pa'i nad khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad dang /_mig long rna ba 'on skom dad che ba
[\[27a.2\]]brgyal ba dang rmongs shing myos par byed do/_/gal te dus ma yin par dud pa btang ngam/_dud pa ha cang cher btang drags na de la nad dpyad du bya ba'i cho ga ni sman bsil bas 'phral ba dang mgo bsku/_bsil ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na phan no/_/de la sman gyi dud pa gtang
[\[27a.3\]]ba'i dus dang /_dmigs ni bkres pa dang /_glal byung ba dang /_bshang gci dri ma bsal ba dang /_bud med la brten pa dang /_gtar ga gdab pa dang /_gad mo dgod pa dang /_so shing gis so drud pa 'di rnams lta bu byas pa'i 'og tu dud pa mi drag pa 'jam po chung ngu
[\[27a.4\]]zhig thong shig_/yang bkres pa dang /_glal byung ba la sogs pa'i dus 'di lta bu'i tshe mtshan mo kha zas zos pa dang /_sman mar snar btang ba'i rjes la yang dud pa 'bring tsam sna nas gtang ngo /_/yang gnyid log pa dang sman mas gtang ba dang /_mig sman gyis bskus pa dang /_
[\[27a.5\]]lus khrus byas pa dang /_skyug sman btang ba 'di rnams lta bu'i rjes la dud pa snar btang ste bkru ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/dud pa kha snar gtang ba'i dpyad ni mas gtong ba rkyal bu gser dngul la sogs pa las brdungs pa dang 'dra bar byas te/_de yang gce'u kha gsum pa dang drang ba
[\[27a.6\]]zhabs kyi drung ni sbom mthe bong shong tsam rtse mo'i sbom ni rgya shug gi tshi gu shong tsam du bya'o/_/gce'u srid ni sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dang /_sor sum cu rtsa bzhi pa dang /_sor bzhi bcu pa dang /_de ltar che chung rnam gsum du bya'o/_/de la bad kan gyi nad la dud pa'i sman rnon po btang
[\[27a.7\]]na/_gce'u sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa las gtang ngo /_/rlung nad la sman gyi dud pa 'jam zhing snum pa btang na gce'u sor sum cu rtsa gnyis pa las gtang ngo /_/rlung dang bad kan 'dres pa'i nad la sman gyi dud pa rno 'jam ran pa gce'u sor bzhi bcu pa las gtang ngo /_/snar dud pa
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]gtang ba'i thabs ni drang po tsog pur 'dug la sems gud du mi g.yeng bar dud pa gtang ba la bsams te kha gdangs la khar dud pa lan gsum gtang ngo /_/de nas sna'i bu ga ya gcig bkag la bu ga ya gcig nas dud pa btang zhing rngub bo/_/sna'i mtshul pa'i nad dang /_klad
[\[27b.2\]]pa'i nad dmigs la dud pa kha nas btang bas nad bskyod cing bsdus par gyur pa de la sna nas dud pa brngubs na nad de phyin cing sel bar 'gyur ro/_/kha nas dud pa brngubs na ni slong zhing bskyod par byed do/_/kha nas gre ba'i nang du slebs par dud pa brngubs na nad zhi bar byed
[\[27b.3\]]do/_/dud pa kha nas rngub cing phyir slon pa'i thabs su dbyung ngo /_/snar rngub cing phyir dbyung ba ltar byas na mig la gnod de mi rung ngo /_/khar rngub cing slon pa'i thabs ni khar lan cig gre ba'i bar du brngubs te de nas phyir slon pa'i thabs su phyung shig de ltar lan gsum gsum
[\[27b.4\]]bya'o/_/sman gyi dud pa 'jam po nyin par snar lan cig gtang ngo /_/rlung dang bad kan 'dres pa la sman gyi dud pa rno 'jam ran pa ni lan gnyis thong shig_/bad kan sel bar sman gyi dud pa rnon po ni lan gsum mam lan bzhir thong shig_/de la snar dud pa gtang ba'i sman 'jam po ni
[\[27b.5\]]a ka ru dang /_gu gul dang /_gla sgang chen po dang /_s+tho ne ya dang /_pha bong gi dreg pa dang /_spang spos dang /_pu shel tsi dang /_ba le ka dang /_shing tsha dang /_ha re Nu ka dang /_me tog ban+d+hu ka dang /_shing bil ba rkang dang /_e la ba lu ka dang /_shi re be sta ka dang /_pog sa tsi
[\[27b.6\]]ras dang /_rgya ma ka dang /_ma tsa na dang /_gla ba dang /_pog nag po sha la ya ki dang /_gur kum dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_nas dang /_pog dkar po nu ma ka dang /_til dang /_shing tog bzang po mar yod pa dang /_star ga urba ni ka dang /_snum bag tshil dang /_rkang dang /_lto
[\[27b.7\]]tshil dang /_mar dang /_rkang dang 'di rnams yin no/_/nad zhi bar bya ba'i dud pa'i sman ni pog nag po sha la ya ki dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_phri thir ka dang /_me tog pad+ma dang /_me tog ut+pal dang /_shing n+ya gro d+ha dang /_shing u dum+bA ra dang /_shing a shwang+tha dang /_shing p+lag sha
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dang /_seng phrom dang /_shing tsha dang /_li kar dkar po dang /_shing mngar dang /_rngub rna shi ri'i shun pa dang /_shug pa dang /_btsod dang /_spod ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_bad kan la sman rnon po'i dud pa btang ba ni dzo ti sma ti dang /_skyer ba dang /_
[\[28a.2\]]yung ba sman gyi rtsa ba bcu dang /_ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_sman spos dri zhim po'i nang na ro rno ba'i grangs su gtogs pa rnams dang /_'di rnams kyi dud pa sna nas btang zhing mgo bo'i nad bkru bar bya'o/_/sman
[\[28a.3\]]gyi dud pa gtang ba sbyar ba'i thabs ni sman rnams zhag gcig chu'i nang du spangs te chu dgas su zhib par btags la shing bu drang zhing 'jam po sra mo sor bcu gnyis pa la dud pa'i sman lde gu btags btags pa lan lnga'i bar du byugs shing grib ma la bskams la sman gyi gdar bu
[\[28a.4\]]sbom mtheb mo tsam thog drung phral/_dbus sbom ste nas 'dra bar byas la/_bskams pa dang rlung nad dang bad kan so so'i nad la phan pa'i rlung gis kyang byugs nas nang gi shing bu ni drongs la phyung shig_/de nas sman gyi gdar bu'i drung mes bsregs la kham phor
[\[28a.5\]]kha sbyar la dbus su bu ga phug pa'i nang du bcug ste dud sman gyi gdar bu'i rtse mo gce'u bu ga'i nang du bcug la dud pa khar brngubs te lud pa lu zhing mi bden brdungs te sor bcu'am sor brgyad pa byas la dud pa brngubs na lud pa lu ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang cham
[\[28a.6\]]pas btab pa dang /_skad 'gags pa dang /_kha sna nas rnag mnam pa dang /_kha gdong la skya rbab kyi nad yod pa dang /_skra la gza' zhugs pa'am/_byi'am/_rna ba na ba dang /_mig rdzi bor ldongs te/_mchi ma mang ba dang /_mgul ba yan chad mgo bo g.ya' zhing
[\[28a.7\]]za ste/_'phrug 'dod pa dang slong bag can du gyur pa dang /_mgo yung khyer ba dang /_skyigs bus btab pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman gyi dud pa 'thungs na nad kyis mi tshugs so/_/sna nas gtang ba'i cho ga ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//_//sman gyi
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]khu bas mkhur ba bkang la mi bskyod par mgo bskyod de bsdad pa dang sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba bkang ste/_'gram pa g.yas g.yon du spo zhing bad kan la sogs pa'i nad drang ba'i cho ga'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa bshad par bya'o/_/sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba bkang ba rnam pa
[\[28b.2\]]bzhi ste/_til gyi 'bru mar dang /_zhi bar byed pa dang /_kha bkru zhing sel bar byed pa dang /_rma 'tsho bar byed pa'o/_/de la til gyi 'bru mar dang /_zhi bar byed pa dang /_bkru sman gyis bkru zhing bstsal ba dang /_'di gsum gyis ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi
[\[28b.3\]]nad bsal lo/_/mtha' ma'i rma'i nad gso bas ni rma'i nad sel to/_/de la til gyi 'bru mar ram/_mar las sman mar sbyar ba ni mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang /_sman drod che ba rnams brdungs la btags te/_chu dang sbyar ba'i khu ba 'am 'o ma yang rung sha
[\[28b.4\]]khu yang rung ste 'di rnams dang sman gyi khu ba dang til mar ram 'bri mar dang sbyar te btsos la tshos te btsir ba'i sman mar de dron po khas bzod tsam mkhur ba bkang zhing rlung nad zhi bar bya'o/_/de zhi bar bya ba'i sman mar sbyar ba ni sman ro kha ba dang /_bska ba dang /_mngar ba
[\[28b.5\]]dang /_bsil ba rnams dang /_pa ti la shing 'dzam bu'i shing thog dang /_me tog ma la ta'i yal ga'i lo ma dang /_ut+pal dang /_shing mngar dang /_khar dkar po dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_'o ma dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba dang mar la sogs pa 'di rnams sbyar te btsos pa'i mar
[\[28b.6\]]gyis ni mkhris pa'i nad zhi bar byed do/_/bad kan gyi nad sel ba ni sman tsha ba dang skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang sman drod che ba rnams klad nad bkru ba sna nas gtang ba'i sman rnams/_tshwa dang chang dang 'bras rtsabs dang /_ba gcin dang /_gzhan yang tsha ba dang skyur ba la sogs pa'i sman
[\[28b.7\]]rnams kyi khu ba dang sbyar te/_btsags pa'i dngas mas mkhur ba dgang zhing bor na bad kan gyi nad sel zhing 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/kha'i nang du rnyil dang mkhur ba'i nang gi rma gso ba'i dpyad ni sman ro bska ba a ru ra lta bu dang /_gla gor zho sha dang /_mngar bag la shing mngar dang /_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]sbrang rtsi lta bu dang /_bsil bag la tsan+dan dang /_pu shel tsi dang /_gla sgang chen po dang /_ci las nad du gyur pa'i sman so sor bshad pa rnams kyis kyang bsnan la sman gyi khu ba khar blugs so/_/de la rlung nad du gyur pa'i nad la til 'bru'i mar la sbyar te
[\[29a.2\]]mkhur ba dgang ba ni/_til mar dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang chu dang sbyar ba dang /_tshwa dang chang dang sha khu dang ba gcin dang /_'bras rtsabs kyi khu ba dang /_'di rnams gang 'byor ba dang nad sel ba'i dmigs su gang bab pa de ltar sman btags pa'i khu ba yang rung /_btsos
[\[29a.3\]]pa'i til mar yang rung /_dron po kha bzod pa tsam mkhur ba bkang nas so brtse ba dang /_so 'gul ba dang rlung nad kyis kha'i nang na bar gyur pa dang /_'di rnams lta bu la dron po khas bzod tsam mkhur ba bkang na phan no/_/yang drod cher gyur la/_rtsub pa dang /_tsha bar gyur pa
[\[29a.4\]]dang /_kha'i nang tshos pa dang /_kha'i nang du rma byung ba dang /_kha'i nang glo bur du 'phral la snad pa dang /_kha'i nang du dug reg pa dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i tshe thal sman rnon pos kha'i nang tshig pa dang /_kha'i nang mes bsregs te tshig pa 'di rnams lta bu la yang zhun mar
[\[29a.5\]]'khyags pa dang /_lo ma grang mos kha'i nang du dgang ngo /_/kha'i nang tshig pa'am rma byung ba las tshor ba med cing zas kyi ro bro ba mi tshor ba lta bu dang /_kha'i nang gi rma byung ba yang 'di lta bu las kyang mar dang 'o mas kha bkang na kha'i nang yang bag can du 'gyur ba dang /_rma 'tsho
[\[29a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrang rtsi dang chu sbyar te/_mkhur ba bkang na kha'i nang tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kha zas ro bro ba mi tshor ba dang /_kha mnam pa dang /_kha'i dri ma che ba 'di lta bu la 'bras rtsabs mkhur ba bkang zhing yon tan gyis skyon sel to/_/'bras
[\[29a.7\]]rtsabs de nyid dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_lce myang tsha gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba grang mos mkhur ba bkang zhing pho na kha skom pa'i nad la rab tu phan par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyi dkyel sogs shing skyes par gyur pa la nas tshig 'khus pa'i tshwa'am thal sman rnon po dang /_chur sbyar te
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mkhur ba bkang zhing pho na bad kan myur du sel bar 'gyur ro/_/kha'i nang lci zhing ldag ldag por gyur pa la chu dron po khas bzod tsam mkhur ba bkang zhing bor na kha'i nang yang zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhur ba'i nang du sman zhu 'am dron pos bkang ba'i cho ga byas na sngar rlung med pa
[\[29b.2\]]nyi ma dron po'i sar 'dug la/_'phrag so dang ske g.yas g.yon du dugs bya zhing mnyes la/_de nas sman gyi khu ba'am chu dron pos mkhur ba bkang ste gdong pa phyir bskyed de bstod la 'dug shig_/bsdad pa'i tshe ni kha'i nang bad kan nam gang gi bar du'am yang na sna'i nang
[\[29b.3\]]snabs kyis gang la mig mchi mas gang ba'i bar du bsdad do/_/bad kan gyi nad ni lan gsum lan lnga'am lan bdun du mkhur ba dgang ngo /_/mkhris pa'i nad rlung nad la ni de ltar kha dgang bar bya ba'i dpyad mi dgos so/_/de la sman gyi khu bas khar dgang zhes bya ba
[\[29b.4\]]ni sman gyi khu ba khar blugs la mkhur ba g.yas g.yon du spo ba med par gzhag go/_/sman khu'am chu dron po khar rngub pa zhes bya ba ni khar brngubs la mkhur ba g.yas su spo'o/_/de la sman khu'am chu dron mo mar brngubs la mkhur ba g.yas g.yon du spo ba byas na/_gnye'u
[\[29b.5\]]rengs pa dang klad pa na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_kha na ba dang /_mig na ba dang /_bad kan rgyas te snabs dang mchil ma mang ba dang /_gre ba'i nang na ba dang kha skams pa dang /_snying na ba dang /_glo bag can du gyur pa dang /_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_cham pas btab
[\[29b.6\]]pa dang /_'di rnams la phan te gso sla bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyi nad la sman lde gu dang /_sman btsos pa'i khu ba dang /_sman rnam gsum khar gzhib cing mur la sman gyi khu ba khar blugs pa dang 'dra ste phan no/_/sman gyis gdong byugs pa yang rnam gsum ste/_
[\[29b.7\]]rlung dang bad kan gyi nad la ni dron pos bkrus na dge'o/_/mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas pa'i nad la ni bsil sman bag gdong la bsku'o/_/gdong bsku ba'i sman gyi yon tan ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad sel/_dug nad sel ba bzhin mdog bzang por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]sman lde gdong pa bsku ba'i tshad ni rnam gsum ste sor bzhi cha'am sum cha'am sor gyi cha gnyis tsam gyis stug rngams de tsam du bsku'o/_/gdong sman ma skams kyi bar du gdong la chags te phan no/_/skams na pags pa'i sha mthang la gnod kyis chus sbangs
[\[30a.2\]]la khrus shig_/brkus pa'i rjes la mar ram til mar gyis gdong bskus la/_lde gus dril la phyis shig_/gdong sman lde gu de ltar byugs na nyin par nyal ba dang drag tu smra ba dang smra ba mang ba dang /_me tsha ba'am nyi ma 'de ba'am bud med la nyal ba 'am 'gro ba'i bag tu mi
[\[30a.3\]]rung ngo /_/de ltar gdong la sman gyis bsku legs na dus la ma bab par skra dkar por gyur pa 'am dpung pa lhung ste bskyod mi nus pa dang gnyer ma mang ba dang /_mig rab rib kyis khyer ba dang /_gdong pa khabs yod pa dang /_mig nad sngon por gyur pa 'di rnams sel te phan no/_/
[\[30a.4\]]sman lde gus byug tu mi rung ba'i dmigs ni cham pas btab pa dang /_kha zas ma zhu ba dang /_sman snar btang ba lta bu dang /_rnyil ba dang 'gram pa na ba dang /_zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_mtshan mo gnyid ma log par gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman bskur mi rung ngo /_/de la
[\[30a.5\]]gdong bsku ba'i sman lde gu ni rgya shug gi nang rkang dang ba sha ka'i rtsa ba dang sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang /_yungs kar 'di rnams ni dgun gyi lde gus byug pa'o/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /_til nag po dang /_skyer pa'i rtsa ba dang /_shing tsha dang /_nas rme'u dang /_'di rnams ni dgun
[\[30a.6\]]smad kyi lde gus bsku ba'o/_/rtswa dUr ba'i rtsa ba dang /_tsan+dan dang /_u shi ra dang /_shing shi ri sha dang /_sha ta puSh+pa dang /_'bras dang 'di rnams dpyid kyi'o/_/me tog ku mu da dang ut+pa la dang /_ka lha ra dang /_rtswa dUr ba dang /_shing mngar dang /_tsan+dan dang 'di rnams ni
[\[30a.7\]]sos ka'i tshe bsku'o/_/ka li ma ka dang /_til dang /_u shi ra dang /_spang spos dang /_rgya spos dang /_shug pa dang /_'di rnams dbyar gyi tshe bsku'o/_/bal bu dang /_kun tra pun tra ha dang /_shing mngar dang /_sap+ta par+Ni dang /_rgya spos dang /_'di rnams ni ston gyi lde gu bsku
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]ba yin no/_/de ltar dus tshigs drug gi bye brag dang sbyar te gdong bsku ba'i dpyad shes par bya'o/_/de ltar rtag tu gdong bkrus na mig la yang phan te lta ba la brtan par mthong ba dang bzhin 'jam zhing gnyer ma med pa dang bzhin mdog bzang po pad+ma'i lo ma dang 'dra bar
[\[30b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/til dang mar gyis lus bsku ba yang rnam pa bzhi ste mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus bsku ba yang mar blugs pa dang /_ras sam shing bal mar la bsgres te/_klad par gzhag pa 'am klad par mar ram til gyi 'bru mar gyis byugs la skyi dar gyis g.yogs pa dang
[\[30b.3\]]bzhi'o/_/de ltar mgo bo la bsku ba rnam pa 'di bzhi yang lhag ma bas 'og ma'i yon tan che zhing mang ste/_gong ma bas 'og ma bzang bar shes par bya'o/_/de la mar gyis byug cing bsku zhes bya ba ni mgo dang lus rtsub pa dang /_mgo dang lus g.ya' ba dang pags pa sha
[\[30b.4\]]mdog mi sdug cing dri ma can du gyur pa 'di lta bur mar byug cing bskur bar bya'o/_/mgo la glog pa zhugs pa dang /_klad pa zug thabs su na ba dang /_klad pa tsha ba dang /_rma rnags pa 'di lta bu la ni mar blugs pa'i dpyad bya'o/_/de la skra byi ba dang /_skra la gza'
[\[30b.5\]]zhugs pa dang /_bdug pa byas pa'i rjes dang mig har har por gyur pa'i nad 'di lta bu'i nad pa ni ras sam ras bal mar gyi nang du bsres te spyi bor glan no/_/mgo la tshor ba'i bag med de bem bag tu gyur pa dang /_kha yon por gyur pa dang /_gnyid med pa dang /_kha sna
[\[30b.6\]]skams pa dang /_mig rab rib kyis khyer ba dang /_klad pa mi bzod par na ba dang /_'di lta bu la klad pa la mar cher byugs te mar mi dbo bar pags pas g.yogs pa 'gab chings shig_/de ltar byas pa'i cho ga ni lus snum gyis byugs te lde gus phyis la khrus byas nas nub kar
[\[30b.7\]]pus mo'i 'phang tsam gyi stan khri'u stan rlon can 'jam po la 'dug nas ma he'am ba lang gi ko ba srid klad pa 'khor ba zheng sor bcu gnyis yod pa de lta bur byas pa dpral ba'i skra mtshams nas rna drung tsam du phyin par byas te 'gab bcing ngo /_/'gab bcing ba ni ras sam rang gi skras 'gab
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bcings kyang rung ngo /_/mar mi zag par sran ma sha'i lde gus kyang 'gab glan cing bsku'o/_/de nas nad kyi dmigs ci 'dra ba las mar ram sman dang sbyar ba'i til gyi 'bru mar dro 'jam tsam klad pa khor yug dang spyi bo man chad skra drung sor gcig nub pa tsam du blugs
[\[31a.2\]]la kha'i nang dang sna dang mtshul par mar gyi ro nam bro'i bar du bzhag ste/_de'i tshad kyang rlung nad la ni se gol bskor zhing gtogs pa lan khri'i bar du gzhag go/_/mkhris pa'i nad la ni se gol brgya stong gi yun tshun chad du gzhag go/_/bad kan gyi nad la ni se gol drug stong tsam gyi
[\[31a.3\]]bar du zhog shig_/yang sman pa kha cig na re nad nam phyin gyi bar du mar gzhag ces 'chad do/_/mar zag pa'am lhag mas ni phrag pa dang ro stod bsku zhing mnye'o/_/cho ga 'di 'dra bar bya ba lan grangs rab tu mang na zhag bdun bya'o/_/rna ba na ba la til mar las sbyar ba'i sman
[\[31a.4\]]rna ba'i nang du blugs te bkang la rna drung mnye zhing 'gram so bskyod do/_/bzhag pa'i yun ni nam nad rtse zhil gyi bar du gzhag go/_/rna ba min pa la mar blugs na se gol brgya'i yun gyi bar du gzhag go/_/rna ba la mar blugs na de ltar bgrang ba'i yun gyi tshad ni lag pa g.yas kyi
[\[31a.5\]]thal mo pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la rdo ba lta bu dang /_mig 'byed cing 'dzums pa lta tsam dang mnyam pa'i yun de tsam gyis bgrang ngo /_/klad pa sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar gyis byugs pa'i yon tan ni skra 'byi ba dang /_skra dkar dang /_skra kham pa dmar ser du gyur pa
[\[31a.6\]]dang /_skra la gza' zhugs pa dang /_klad pa'i nang du rlung zhugs pa dang 'di rnams lta bu la phan no/_/dbang po rnams gsal bar 'gyur la/_skad kyi gdangs dang mgrin pa snyan pa dang 'gram pa na ba dang klad pa na ba la phan la/_nyams stobs skye zhing nyams
[\[31a.7\]]'tshag brta'o/_/sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba dgang ba'i dpyad la sogs pa bshad pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//sman gyi thigs pas mig tu blugs pa dang /_sman gyis mig bsku ba'i cho ga bshad pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa bshad par bya'o/_/mig
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]nad thams cad la dpyad du bya ba ni mig nad gsar pa la dang por sman gyi thigs pa mig tu blugs na mig rdol la thug pa snyam byed cing na ba dang /_mig tu zug ste na ba dang /_mig g.ya' ba dang /_mig la drud pa snyam byed pa dang /_rdzi bor gyur te mchi ma zag pa dang /_mig tsha ba dang /_
[\[31b.2\]]mig dmar por gyur pa dang /_'di rnams lta bu'i nad sel te phan no/_/mig rlung nad kyi bag tu na ba la ni sman thigs dron po ldugs shig_/bad kan las mig nad du gyur pa la ni 'jam tsam ldugs shig_/khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad lta bu tsha ba'i bag la ni sman thigs kyi chu de bsil
[\[31b.3\]]bar gyis la ldugs shig_/sman thigs blugs pa'i cho ga ni rlung med pa'i gnas su 'dug la sngas smad de nya phyis kyi nang du sman gyi khu ba sbyar la ras bal lam srin bal lta bu bsnyad pa sor gsum tsam dri ma med pa bkrus/_bskams pa des nya phyis kyi nang nas mig phugs kyi grwa
[\[31b.4\]]sna drung du thigs pa bcu gnyis sam bcu ras bal las gtig cing blugs te mig tu blugs pa'i 'phang ni sor gnyis tsam las gtig cing blugs so/_/khad langs shing bsdad la sman khu de mig 'gram nas mur 'gram logs su pho la de nas gos 'jam pos phyis shig_/bad kan
[\[31b.5\]]nam rlung nad lta bu la ni mig phyis pa'i rjes la ras ma 'jam po chu dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du bcug la mig la dro 'jam tsam du dugs gyis shig_/mig tu sman gyi chu blugs pa de ha cang dro che ste tsha'am ro tsha ba'i sman dron po'am 'di lta bu'i bag btang na mig rdol la thug pa tsam du na ba dang /_
[\[31b.6\]]mig dmar por 'gyur ba dang /_mig rdul 'di lta bu'i bag tu 'gyur ro/_/mig sman ha cang drags ches pa mig tu blugs na mig tu zug cing na ba dang /_mig 'dzums mi shes te har har por 'gyur ba'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/mig tu sman gyi thigs pa blugs pa'i thun mong ste
[\[31b.7\]]drags na mig gi mchu sdud pa snyam byed cing rtsub pa dang /_mig 'byed mi nus shing dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/mig sman blugs pa ha cang thun chung na mig nad kyi dkyel skyes te mi phan no/_/mig tu sman blugs pa las ma pho na mig nad kyi dkyel skyes te slar na bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]mig sman bsku legs pa ni klad pa'i yul dang /_srubs dang /_rtsa dang /_kha sna dang /_rtsa'i nang dang /_mgo kun du sman gyis khyab nas mig gi nad kun sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang mig sman gyis mig tu bsku ba'i dpyad ni sngar skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis nad
[\[32a.2\]]sbyangs la mig bkru ba'i sman ni mig yog pa tsam gyi tshod kyis mig la bsku'o/_/de ltar bsku ba'i mig nad kyi dmigs ni mig nad rnying pa lta bu'i bag tu gyur pa cung zad tsam skrangs pa dang /_mig rab rib tu g.ya' ba dang /_mig 'byar bag dang /_mig gi grwar rngul ma chags
[\[32a.3\]]pa dang /_mig rab rib tu rtsub pa tsam ma yin pa dang /_mchi ma zag pa dang /_mig dmar por gyur pa dang 'di lta bu ni mig nad rnying par gyur pa'i rtags yin te 'di lta bu la sman mig tu skus shig_/mig nad mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rlung las mig nad du gyur pa 'di lta bu la
[\[32a.4\]]dmigs kyis bsku ba'i dpyad rnam pa gsum ste/_mig gi nad phyi zhing bsal ba dang /_mig nang rma lta bu gso ba dang /_mig gsal bar mthong bar bya'o/_/de la mig nad bsal zhing phyi ba'i sman gyis byugs pa ni ro bska ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_rgyam tsha dang na le sham dang
[\[32a.5\]]'di rnams so/_/mig gi rma gso ba'i sman ni ro kha bas bsku'o/_/mig rno zhing gsal bar bya ba'i sman gyis bsku'o/_/sman bsku ba'i thur ma'i srid ni sor bcu pa dbus ni phra ba'o/_/thur ma'i thor to ni sri shing gi me tog kha 'bus pa lta bu'o/_/mig nad bsal zhing phyi ba'i thur
[\[32a.6\]]ma ni zangs las brdungs pa ni bzang ngo /_/mig gi rma gso ba'i thur ma ni lcags nag po las brdungs pa'i thur ma dang mdzub mos phyi ba bzang ngo /_/mig rno zhing gsal bar bya ba'i thur ma ni gser dngul las bya'o/_/yang mig sman skyer khaN+Da lta bu'i gdang bu lta bu dang /_
[\[32a.7\]]sman dang sbyar ba'i zan gyi chang bu dang /_sman dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba lta bu'i lde gu dang /_mig sman phye ma dang rnam pa gsum yod do/_/de yang mig nad lci ba dang yang ba dang lci ba yang ma yin yang ba yang ma yin pa 'di rnam pa gsum gyi tshul las dpags te sman rim pa bzhin
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]du gtang ngo /_/sman de gtang ba ni nub mo nyal ba'i tshe dang mtshan mo dang /_nyin gung dang nyin mtshan dang 'di rnams lta bu la sman gtang du mi rung ngo /_/mig sman blugs sam bskus nas slar bkru ba drags sam/_btsir na mig nad kyi dkyel skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na sman gtang
[\[32b.2\]]ba'i dus ni nang par dang phyi 'phred kyi srid dang /_la yul drang ba'i tshe 'di lta bu'i dus la mig sman gyis rtag par bsku'o/_/sman pa kha cig na re sman tsha ba'i bag rnon pos ni nyin par mig bskur mi rung zhes zer ro/_/mig sman btang bas mig gi dri ma dang /_mchi ma phal cher byung
[\[32b.3\]]bas mig bkrus te/_mig legs par lta ba'i mthu chung bas 'di lta bu'i tshe nyi ma la bltas na mig la gnod de mi rung ngo /_/yang sman pa kha cig na re nyin par ni nyi ma'i 'od tsha ba'i dus la bab pas tsha ba'i tshe tsha sman btang yang gnod de mi rung ngo /_/mtshan mo ni zla ba'i dus te bsil
[\[32b.4\]]bas mig la phan te de bas na nub mo nyal ka dang /_mtshan mo'i dus su mig sman btang na mig la phan no/_/ji lta zhe na mig ni me'i rang bzhin yin/_mig sman ni bsil ba dang 'phrod de dpyad 'di ltar byas na mig rno zhing brtan par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bad kan rab tu
[\[32b.5\]]skyes sam mig nad bsal zhing phyi ba'i dpyad dgos par gyur na/_'di lta bu'i dpyad ni nyin par yang rung ste/_yul rab tu tsha ba'i dus la ma bab na mig sman rnon pos mig byug par bya'o/_/dper na lcags ni rdo ba las 'byung mod kyi lcags pas rdo ba de nyid rno ste rdo ba des
[\[32b.6\]]lcags la gnod par bya nus so/_/de bzhin du mig kyang me'i rang bzhin yin pas na me lta bu tsha ba rnams mig la gnod de mi rung ngo /_/yang na dgun lta bu lhags pa rab tu che na mtshan mo yang mig sman tsha ba rnon pos mig bskus na gnod de mi rung ngo /_/ji lta zhe na dgun ha cang
[\[32b.7\]]lhags pa che ba'i tshe ni/_mig sman gyis bskus kyang mig gi nad mchi mar dbyung du mi rung la mig 'byed cing 'dzums mi shes pa har har por 'dug gam mig g.ya' la mi gsal mi rno ba la sogs pa nyen du 'gyur ro/_/yang mig sman gyis byug tu mi rung ba'i dmigs ni
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]skrag par 'gyur ba dang /_skyug sman btang ba 'am/_bkru sman btang la kha zas ma zos pa dang /_bshang gci 'ong bar gyur pa'i dus dang /_khro ste rngam pa dang /_rims nad kyis btab pa dang /_mig nad kyis btab pa 'am/_mig phyir phyung ste rlo
[\[33a.2\]]rlo bor song ba dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_mya ngan gyis btab pa dang /_mtshan mo gnyid ma log par gyur pa lta bu dang /_nyi ma mthong ba dang /_mgo bo bkrus pa dang /_sman gyi dud pa sbu gu nas brngubs pa dang /_chang 'thung 'thung ba lta bu dang /_kha zas ma zhu ba dang /_nyi tshan
[\[33a.3\]]nam me tshan po che lta bu la 'dug 'dug pa dang /_nyin par gnyid log pa dang /_skom gyis gdungs pa dang /_'di lta bu la mig sman bsku zhing byug tu mi rung ngo /_/mig sman ha cang tsha zhing rno ba dang /_ha cang 'jam pa dang /_ha cang thun chung ste nyung ba dang /_thun ha cang
[\[33a.4\]]che ste mang ba dang /_ha cang sla ba dang /_ha cang ska ba dang /_ha cang rtsub pa dang /_ha cang grang ste bsil ba dang /_ha cang drod ches par byas pa'i sman 'di lta bu'i bag mig la bsku zhing gtang du mi rung ngo /_/mig sman bsku zhing byug pa'i thabs ni mig cung zad phye la sman phye la sman phye ma thur
[\[33a.5\]]mas bcus te sna drung gi mig sgo nas mig 'gram logs su dal gyis bsku zhing mig gi mchu'i nang du sman gyis byugs zin pa dang /_mig cung zad bskul zhing bskyod na mig sman rnon po des mig gi nang kun du sleb cing khyab par 'gyur ro/_/mig sman gyis bskus nas mig ha cang
[\[33a.6\]]phye zhing btsum pa'am/_mig btsum ste mig mchu'i pags pa bsdam zhing gzir ba'i thabs su btsum pa 'am/_mig chus bkru ba'i bag 'di lta bu ma byed cig_/mig sman gyis byugs pa las bkru ba'i dus tshod ni mig tu sman gyis byugs shing bskus pa rnams mig gi nang
[\[33a.7\]]du sman bskus pa bag la zhu ste na zhing gnod pa yang med de/_bde ba de'i tshe nad gzhi nad dmigs dang dus tshigs kyi tshul dang sbyar la chu dro 'jam tsam tsha grang gang rigs pas bkru bar gyis shig_/bkrus nas dar 'jam pos phyi'o/_/phyi ba'i thabs ni lag pa g.yas
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]kyi mdzub mo dang mthe bos mig ci ran du phye la lag pa g.yon pas gos 'jam po thogs la phyis shig_/mig g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yang tshul de ltar bya'o/_/mig g.ya' 'am rtul te gsal bar mi mthong ba la mig sman tsha ba rnon pos bskus la de'i rjes la mig tsha ba'i
[\[33b.2\]]gnod par ma gyur par bya ba'i thabs ni sman bsil bas mig la bsku zhing byugs par gyis shig_/sman gyi thigs pa mig tu blugs pa dang sman gyis mig bsku ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//mig brta ba'i cho ga zhun mar mig tu blugs pa dang /_
[\[33b.3\]]sman gyi phur ma bsregs shing bcos pa'i khu ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa bshad par bya'o/_/mig 'dzums mi shes te har bag tu gyur pa dang /_mig skam bag tu gyur pa dang /_mig gi nang rtsub por gyur pa dang /_mig snad pa dang /_mig rlung dang mkhris
[\[33b.4\]]pa'i nad du gyur pa dang /_mig zhum bag tu gyur pa dang /_mig gi rdzi ma byi ba dang /_mig rab rib khyer te sngon dmar du mthong ba dang /_mig legs par 'byed mi nus pa dang /_mig gi rtsa rnams brtse ba dang /_mig gis mi mthong ba dang /_mig gi sprin khrag gis rgyas te dmar
[\[33b.5\]]por gyur pa dang /_mig rdzi bor can mchi ma rab tu mang ba dang /_rdzi bor gyi dkyel skyes pa las kha zas mi 'phrod pa dang /_gnod pa'i bag brten pa las klad pa na zhing mig gi phyed dang /_mgo bo'i phyed na ste dkrugs pa snyam byed pa dang /_mig ling tog byung bas rlung nad du gyur pa
[\[33b.6\]]dang /_rlung nad kun du 'gro ba'i nad dang /_mig ling tog byung ba dang /_'di lta bu'i mig nad kyis btab pa rnams la mig nad dmar por gyur pa dang /_mig rdzi bor na ste mchi ma 'dzag pa dang mig na zhing mig sgor rngu ma chags la cung zad rtse zhil na/_de la dpyad du bya ba ni sngar bkru
[\[33b.7\]]sman dang /_skyug sman sna nas btang ste/_mgul pa yan chad stod kyi nad bkrus te bstsal la/_rlung nad kyi dus dbyar zla tha chungs lta bu'i ngo dang /_ston zla 'bring po la mkhris pa'i nad ldang ba'i dus dang bad kan ldang ba'i dus dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo la bab ste dus 'di dag gi tshe
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]so so'i nad dmigs kyi tshul dang sbyar la de'i tshe gan rkyal du nyal/_de nas sran ma sha btags te sbrus pa'i chang bus mig gi mtha' ma bskor la/_'phang sor gnyis tsam du mtho ba brtan por byas na mig nad rlung ngam mkhris pa'am/_bad kan ci las
[\[34a.2\]]gyur pa'i dmigs dang sbyar te sman mar btsos la sman mar de lta bus mig gi nang du ldugs la khong shig_/mig tu mar blugs pa de ni me la mi bsro bar chu tshan pos sros shig_/yang mtshan mo mig gis mi mthong ba dang /_rlung nad las gyur te mig rab rib khyer ba dang /_rna ba
[\[34a.3\]]mi gsang ste go dka' ba 'di lta bu la ni nang gi lto tshil las sbyar ba'i sman gong ma'i sman mar btang ba dang 'dra bar mig gi rdzi ma man chad nub par bkang la/_de nas mig bskyod cing dbye ba dang 'dzums pa yang byas la se gol gyi grangs bgrang zhing tshod zung shig_/tshad gzung
[\[34a.4\]]ba'i dmigs ni mig gi mchu'i pags pa na ba la ni grangs brgya'i bar du zhog shig_/mig 'gram gnyis na na grangs sum brgya'i bar du gzhag go/_/mig sprin la nad yod na grangs lnga brgya'i bar du zhog shig_/mig gi 'bras bu nag por nad yod na grangs bdun
[\[34a.5\]]brgya'i bar du gzhag go/_/mig gi 'bras bu nag po'i nang gi 'bras bu nag gu mthong bar byed pa la nad yod na brgyad brgya'i bar du zhog shig_/mig gi phyed dang klad pa'i gzhogs phyed dkrugs pa snyam du byed cing na ba la grangs stong gi bar du gzhag go/_/rlung nad las gyur
[\[34a.6\]]pa'i mig nad la grangs stong gi bar du gzhag go/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la grangs drug brgyar gzhag go/_/na ba med cing nyams tha mal pa zhig la mig sman blugs na yang grangs drug brgyar gzhag go/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad la grangs lnga brgyar
[\[34a.7\]]gzhag go/_/de nas so so'i grangs tshang ba dang /_glan pa byo ste mig 'gram logs su bzur te/_sman mar de gzag cing snod kyis bzed do/_/de'i rjes la sman gyi dud pa sbu gu nas khar rngubs shig_/sman de ltar btang nas nam mkha' la mi lta/_gzugs 'od can
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]lhang lhang po la ltar mi rung ngo /_/rlung nad las gyur pa'i mig nad lta bu la ni cho ga'i tshul dang 'dra bar nyin gcig bzhin gyis shig_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni sman nyin gcig blugs la nyin gcig mi blugs/_bar du gcod do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad
[\[34b.2\]]dang mig na ba med de/_nyams tha mal pa la gtong ba 'dra ste/_sman nyin gcig btang ba de phan chad nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du bcad de/_mi gtang bar byas la nyi ma bzhi lon pa dang yang gtong bar sbyar ro/_/mig tu mig sman blugs shing btang ba lan grangs su btang na
[\[34b.3\]]chog pa'i tshad ni mig gis gsal bar mthong shing rtogs nus la mig na ba med cing mig gi nad skyon gyi dri ma med cing gsal ba/_mig yang bar nam gyur gyi bar du sman btang ba de ltar gyur pa'i tshe na sman gtang mi dgos te chog pa'i tshad yin no/_/de ltar ma gyur gyi bar du ni
[\[34b.4\]]sman btang bas mi chog par blta'o/_/mig tu sman btang zhing blugs pa ha cang drags na ni bad kan gyi mig nad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mig tu blugs te btang ba de yang dper na mar 'thungs nas lus snyom zhing lci ba de dang 'dra ste/_mig de yang cung zhig mi gsal bar 'gyur
[\[34b.5\]]ro/_/de ltar mig na ba la sman mar blugs te mig tu gdab par bya ba'i cho ga byas pa'i rjes la mig gis mthong bar bya ba'i cho ga bya dgos te/_gong du smos pa'i mig nad mig gi grwa dang /_mig gi sprin la sogs pa rnam pa lnga lta bu la/_sman gyi chus ma btsos pa'i thigs pa btsir
[\[34b.6\]]te mig tu blugs par bya'o/_/de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni mar lta bu snum bag sman la btsos pa'i khu ba thong shig_/rlung dang bad kan du bcas pa'i mig nad la ni sman tsha zhing rno ba las sbyar bas mig nad srab cing sbyang ba byas na phan no/_/
[\[34b.7\]]mig mthong ba'i mthu chung ba dang /_mig la rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad yod pa dang /_khrag nad kyis mig dmar por gyur pa dang /_mig na ba med pa'i nyams tha mal dang 'di rnams 'dra ste/_mig rno zhing gsal bar bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de la mig sman snum bag las sbyar ba ni khung
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]dang phug na nyal ba sbrul dang gcan gzan rnams dang /_phyi ba la sogs pa dang /_bya khra rnams dang /_yul ser che ba'i tshil dang /_rkang dang /_lto tshil dang /_sha rnams ni snum bag tu sbyar ba'i sman yin te/_'o ma dang sbyar ba la sman dzi ban+ti'i sder gtogs pa'i
[\[35a.2\]]sna bcu yang brdungs/_btags la 'di rnams dang lhan cig sbyar te e raN+Da'i lo ma 'am shing 'ba' ti'i 'dab ma'am pad+ma'i 'jam pos dkris la 'jim pa bskus te/_shing 'dab pa dang /_lci ba'i mes bsregs la de'i khu ba btsir ba'i thigs pa dro 'jam tsam mig tu blugs
[\[35a.3\]]shing dgang ba ni gong du mig brta ba'i sman btang ba dang 'dra ste phur ma'i thigs pa blugs la grangs nyis brgya'am sum brgya'i bar du sdod cig_/'di ni snum bag phur ma'i sman dpyad yin no/_/mig nad dang /_srab cing sbyang ba'i dpyad ni ri dgas dang /_bya'i mcher pa
[\[35a.4\]]dang /_sha dang /_nor bu mu tig dang /_lcags dang /_zangs kyi phye ma dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_lig bu mig dang /_dung dang /_rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang /_ba bla dang /_'di rnams btags te zho ga chu dang sbyar la gong ma bzhin du phur mar byas te btsos pa'i khu ba btsir te mig tu
[\[35a.5\]]blugs na mig nad kyi skyon srab cing 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mig rno zhing gsal bar bya ba'i dpyad ni/_ri dgas dang bya'i mcher pa dang /_rkang dang /_lto tshil dang /_rgyu ma dang /_snying dang /_sha rnams dang /_sman mngar bag dang /_mar dang /_bud med kyi nu zho dang sbyar
[\[35a.6\]]te btags la gong ma bzhin du byug pa byas te dkris la bcings te 'jim pas g.yogs nas kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug ste/_kham phor gyi phyi rol chos pa'i tshad du bsregs la tshos pa dang /_'jim pa dang phyi shun bor ba la sman gyi khu ba btsir te dro 'jam tsam
[\[35a.7\]]mig tu blugs la ji tsam du bsdad pa'i yun kyang se gol gyi grangs snga ma bzhin du gzung ngo /_/phur ma bsregs pa'i dpyad de lta bu gang 'byor kyang rung ste sha dang sman lta bu sna re yang srang re'i thang du sbyar bar bya'o/_/mig nad kyi skyon byang zhing bsrab par bya ba dang /_rlung nad
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]las gyur pa'i mig nad la snum bag gi sman mig tu blugs pa ni sngar 'jam tsam du byas te blugs la phyi nas bsil bar blugs so/_/sman de gnyis btang ba'i rjes la dud pa sbu gu nas brngub par gyis shig_/mig rno zhing gsal bar bya ba la ni dud pa brngub mi dgos so/_/
[\[35b.2\]]mig brta ba'i sman dpyad gong du bshad pa dang 'dra bar 'dir yang mig mthong ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i cho ga mi lta ba dang /_phur ma bsreg cing btso ba'i dpyad bya ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/sman sna nas btang du mi rung ba la mig brta ba dang /_phur ma bsregs pa'i dpyad kyang byar mi rung
[\[35b.3\]]ngo /_/de ltar mig sman 'di lta bu btang ba'i tshe sman zhag grangs su btang ba de las kha zas bsdams pa'i cho ga'i grangs kyang nyis 'gyur du bskyed de bsdoms shig_/mig sman de lta bu btang ba'i tshe me tog dri zhim po dang /_spos dri zhim po nyin mtshan du lus dang mgul du thogs
[\[35b.4\]]shig_/de lta bas na mig mthong ba 'di nyams te ma rung bar gyur na dngos po sna tshogs dang /_sems can rnams mun pa dang 'dra bar tshul gcig tu gyur nas mthong ba med kyis de'i phyir mig gi mthu bskyed pa'i dpyad sna nas gtong ba dang /_sman gyis mig bsku ba dang /_
[\[35b.5\]]sman mar gyis mig tu blugs te brta bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dpyad la nan tan dang /_brtson 'grus cher gyis shig_/mig brta ba'i cho ga zhun mar mig tu blugs pa dang /_sman gyi thum po bsreg cing btsos pa'i khu ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste
[\[35b.6\]]nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//gzhang 'brum khrag tshad la thal sman rnon po gtang ba'i dpyad dang /_mtshan par rdol la sman gtang ba'i dpyad dang /_khong du mtshon lus pa la sogs pa drang ba'i dpyad kyi cho ga bshad pa'i le'u nyi shu lnga pa bshad par bya'o/_/dpyad
[\[35b.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs bshad par bya ste/_nad dmigs rnam pa sna tshogs sun pa la dpyad rnam pa sna tshogs nad dmigs kyi thog tu bab pa nang du btang la nad 'dren par byed pa'i thabs de ni dpyad ces bya ste/_de la yang gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang mtshan par rdol ba la sogs pa'i nad la
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]thal sman rnon po me dang 'dra ba btang ba'i tshe nad dmigs brtag cing dpyad dang sman pa de lus kyi sha gzhan la mi gnod pa'i dpyad rnams dang /_sman btang ba de lus kyi sha gzhan la mi gnod pa'i bsrung ba'i dpyad dang /_rkyal bu nas sman mas gtong
[\[36a.2\]]ba'i cha byad dang /_bum bu dang /_ku ba dang /_rwa dang dzam pa po la sogs pa'i cha byad kyi tshul rnam pa du ma sna tshogs blos rnam par brtags te mdo ci ran tsam du bstan te/_cha byad de rnams kyi rtse mo bya dang seng ge dang dom dang bya rog dang ri dgas la sogs pa'i kha mtshul 'dra
[\[36a.3\]]bar cha byad brdung zhing byas la ming yang de rnams la gdags so/_/spyad ni phal cher lcags las brdungs te srid sor bco brgyad yod pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/cha byad de rnams skam pa lta bu byas la gnyis kyi mgul pa'i sbrel mtshams kyi gzer bu sran chung gi dbyibs
[\[36a.4\]]dang tshad tsam gdab ste/_skam pa'i rtsa ba gnyis ni lcags kyu ltar yang dgug par bya ste/_de'i ming ni bde legs kyi cha byad zhes bya ste/_spyad des ni rus pa la zug rngu brtan par zug pa de 'byin pa la sbyar ro/_/yang skam pa gong ma dang 'dra ba gnyis byas la gcig ni lhag
[\[36a.5\]]ma ltar lcags kyi gzer bus gdab/_gcig gi gzer ni rtsig pa'i skud pa'i gzungs gdab ste/_de ni rtse mo bsgul par bde ba'i phyir yin no/_/de gnyis kyi srid du sor bcu drug bya ste des ni pags pa dang /_rtsa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_sha las zug rngu zug pa la spyad
[\[36a.6\]]do/_/yang skam pa srid du sor bcu drug pa byas la rtse mo rta sbrul gyi mgo 'dra ba byas pa 'gyed cing gzhum du rung bar byas te/_des ni zug rngu phra mo dang mig la zug rngu phra mo zug pa dang /_rdzi ma ma rungs pa 'byin pa la spyad do/_/yang skam pa rtsa ba gdu bu lta bu zlum po la rtsa mo shin tu
[\[36a.7\]]phra bar byas pa de ni spyad mu tsi tri zhes bya ste/_des ni sha'i nang du mtshon gting zug pa dang /_mig mdzer skyes pa 'byin pa la sbyar ro/_/yang nyis kha lta bu cha byad gnyis bya ste/_de yang bya'o/_/lhag ma ni gzhang 'brum gyi cha byad bzhin du bya ste/_des ni sna nang gi 'brum bu dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]thor bu bcad pa la sbyar ro/_/sman pa nad pa'i kha dang lkog ma'i nang du spyad pa na sman pa'i mdzub mo so'am shing las nang sbubs su byas te/_de yang dbyibs pa'i nu sor 'dra ba sor bzhi par byas te/_bu ga gnyis pa byas la sman pa'i mdzub mo bcug ste/_gzan du byas la de nas skud
[\[36b.2\]]pa gnyis kyis btags te mkhrig ma la brtod cing bcing ngo /_/mo mtshan gyi nang gi nad brtag pa'i cha byad thur ma bzhi/_srid du sor bcu drug pa byas te/_gdu bu ran pa zhig kyang byas la de'i phyogs bzhi nas thur ma'i dkyil dam du bcings na/_rtse mo pad+ma kha 'dzums pa ltar 'gyur te/_
[\[36b.3\]]'dzums phyogs de mo mtshan gyi nang du bcug ste nang du phyin pa dang /_thur ma'i rtsa ba bzhi po phyi rol na yod pa lag pas bsdams te bcangs na nang gi rtse mo kha gyed par gyur te/_cha byad de ni mo mtshan gyi nad blta ba la sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad 'jam rtsi sbu gu'i dbyibs 'dra ba srid du sor
[\[36b.4\]]drug par byas la rtse mo'i bu ga ni sran ma shong ba tsam bya/_rtsa ba lgang pa'i phyogs kyi bu ga ni mthe bong shong ba tsam du bya ste/_pags pa 'jam po'i nang du sman khu dang bkru ba'i chu dang snum dang bcas pa bcug ste/_gag pa'i rtsa bar bcings la 'jam rtsi thabs su btang ba de ni rma bug
[\[36b.5\]]'chos shing 'khyams pa dang /_rma dag pa'i phyir bkru ba la sogs pa'i cha byad du sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad 'o ma la sogs pa'i sbu gu'am/_rma bya la sogs pa'i sgro rtsa'i sbu gu gong ma gnyis ka nas kha yod pa 'di ni dmu chu dbyung zhing zag pa'i ched du spyad do/_/yang du ba brngub pa dang /_
[\[36b.6\]]mes gtong ba la sogs pa'i cha byad rnams ni rang rang gi nad gso ba las ltos shig_/de las rngabs ru ni dma' la gdab phyogs kyi kha'i zheng ni sor gsum la srid du sor bcu'am brgyad yod pa/_gzhib pa'i bu ga ni yungs kar gyi 'bru shong ba tsam byas te/_bu ga de'i phyi khyon ni
[\[36b.7\]]nu sor gyi tshad tsam du byas te/_rwa'i phyi rol nas pags pa srab mos legs par g.yogs par bya ste/_de ni rngabs ru'i tshad bstan pa'o/_/de la cha spyad ku ba ni srid du sor bcu gnyis la khyud 'khor du ni sor bco brgyad pa la de'i kha ni zlum po zheng du sor gsum mam/_bzhi pa
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]byas te de'i nang du rtswa ku sha 'am ras bal lam/_gro ga gang yang rung ba bsregs pa'i dud pas bkang la du bas gang ma thag tu dbyung long med par yan lag gar na bar kha sbub ste du ba dang bcas par bzhag na/_bad kan dang khrag nad mang du 'dren par byed do/_/
[\[37a.2\]]de bzhin du bum pa yang srid du sor bcu yod par byas pa de ni nya mgo lta bu'i cha byad zhes bya ste/_'di rna ba'i nang du mtshon zug pa dbyung bar spyad do/_/de la sbu gu'i cha byad ni nang khong stong sbu gu can rtse mo gcig gam yang na du mar byas te/_srid ji tsam par khyud 'khor bar yang de tsam
[\[37a.3\]]du byas te/_de ni bu ga rnams kyi nang du zug rngu zug cing zhugs pa dang /_nang na nad yod pa rnams blta zhing nang na yod pa'i mtshon dang me dang thal sman gyi las rnams kyang cha byad 'di 'dod pa yin no/_/des ni bu ga'i 'dzag pa 'gags pa la yang sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad srid du
[\[37a.4\]]sor bcu pa'i thur ma bzhi byas la yu ba gcig par byas te/_rtse mo bzhi la gdu bu lta bus spyi mdud du byas te/_zheng du khyud par sor lngas 'khor bar byas pa ni kha lnga pa zhes bya ste/_cha byad de ni gre ba dang mgrin pa'i zug rngu tsher ma dang gra ma la sogs pa'i zug rngu blta ba dag 'byin
[\[37a.5\]]pa la sbyar ro/_/cha spyad srid dang zheng gi tshad gong ma dang mnyam pa la 'dir thur ma gnyis pa rtse mo gdu bus bskor ba dbyibs gong ma dang 'dra bar byas te/_'dis kyang mgrin pa'i zug rngu rus tshal la sogs pa blta bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du cha byad kha gcig pa 'am kha mang du
[\[37a.6\]]yang rung ste/_nang stong pa sbubs can du byas pas mgul pa'i zug rngu blta bar bya'o/_/yang cha byad rtse mo pad+ma'i snying po 'dra ba'i srid sor bcu gnyis yod par byas la/_rtse mo phyogs bzhi cha khong stong du byas pa des ni zug rngu mi 'gul ba de la phul zhing 'byin pa yin no/_/gzhan
[\[37a.7\]]yang cha byad rgun 'bru 'go rta na zhes bya ba'i dbyibs 'dra ba srid du sor bzhi zheng du khyud pa sor lnga pa bya'o/_/bud med la ni khyud pa sor drug pa byas te/_de gnyis kyang nang khong stong sbubs can la sbu gu gnyis pa bya'o/_/des ni gzhang 'brum gyi nad blta bar bya'o/_/yang cha byad sbubs
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]can srid du sor gsum pa nang gi sbubs stong pas mthe bong shong tsam byas te/_de yang nang du bcug pa'i rtse mo'i sor phyed dang phyir lus pa'i rgyus sor phyed pa'i pad+ma'i snying po lta bu'o/_/cha byad nang khong stong la g.yas g.yon nas bu ga med pa khar dkrol lta bur byas pas ni gzhang
[\[37b.2\]]'brum mnan cing btsir ba la sbyar ro/_/mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad ni pad+ma'i snying po lta bu'i nad rma'i than 'khor dang steng du rma'i bu ga mang du byung ba la ni rnam pa thams cad du khar dkrol lta bu'i cha byad kyis dbyung zhing zhi bar bya ba ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis ni mi nus so/_/yang cha byad
[\[37b.3\]]sbubs can bu ga gcig pa srid du sor gnyis zheng du khyud par mdzub mo'i tshad tsam gnyis pa zheng du 'khor bar sor bco brgyad pa kha zlum po sor gsum mam sor bzhir byas te/_gong ma'i ras bal la sogs pa'i dud pas bkang la gar na ba glan na phan yon gong ma'i steng du skran
[\[37b.4\]]'ju bar byed do/_/mtshon gyi las kyi cha byad sna tshogs pa'i tshul de yang tshad ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/de la cha byad de rnams la rma tshol ni gnyis bya ste/_de yang srin bu gan rgya pa da'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/yang cha byad sran ma chung ngu'i lo ma lta bu'i so yod pa
[\[37b.5\]]gnyis bya ste de yang gcig gi srid ni sor brgyad par bya/_cig shos ni sor dgu par bya ste/_'dis ni bu ga'i nang du zug rngu zug pa gzung zhing gsal bar bya'o/_/de la yang dbye ba rnam pa drug ste phur ma lta bu'i cha byad srid du sor bcu drug pa dang /_sor bcu gnyis pa dang
[\[37b.6\]]gnyis bya'o/_/sbrul gyi kha lta bu thal sman gtang ba'i cha byad srid du sor bcu gnyis pa dang sor bcu pa gnyis bya'o/_/yang mda' ltong 'dra ba'i cha byad gnyis bya ste/_gcig gi srid sor bcu gnyis pa dang /_gcig gi srid sor bcu par bya ste/_cha byad de gnyis kyis ni
[\[37b.7\]]zug rngu bsgul zhing bskyod par bya'o/_/yang cha byad phur pa gnyis bya ste/_de yang rtse mo lcags kyu gug par byas pa des ni zug rngu drang zhing 'byin pa la sbyar ro/_/yang phur bu srid du sor brgyad pa rtse mo gug pa de ni mngal gyi cha byad kyi phur bu zhes bya ste/_des ni bu mngal nang du shi
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]ba drang zhing 'byin par byed do/_/yang cha byad sbrul gyi mgo bo gdengs pa bzhin du rtse mo gug par byas pa 'dis ni rde'u 'byin par byed do/_/yang cha byad mda' ltong lta bu sbom zhing rtse mo zlum pa srid sor bzhi pa byas pa des ni so drang zhing dbyung bar sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad
[\[38a.2\]]drug byas pa de'i rtse mo kun ras bal gyis dkris te de las kyang srid du sor bzhi dang bcu gnyis par byas pa 'jam pa gnyis kyis ni gzhang gi nang du nad nye ring gang na yod kyang rung ste/_thal sman dang snags pa las sbyang zhing bsal ba'i las bya'o/_/yang srid du sor drug pa dang /_bdun
[\[38a.3\]]par byas pa gnyis kyis sna'i bu ga'i nang du snags pa dang /_thal sman gyi las dang sbyar ba la sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad srid du sor brgyad pa dang /_sor dgu pa gnyis kyis ni rna ba'i nad snags pa dang thal sman gyi las dang sbyar ba la sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad a shwad+tha'i lo ma'i rtse mo lta
[\[38a.4\]]bu'am/_blugs gzar gyi kha lta bu'i cha byad des ni rna spabs dang /_dri ma sbyang zhing bsal ba la sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad sor re ba gsum bya ste/_des ni rma'i than 'khor 'dzam bu ltar dmar ba la gtsags pa dang /_thal sman dang /_me'i las re re la sbyar ro/_/yang cha byad khar ba lta
[\[38a.5\]]bu'i dbyibs la rtse mo dang dbus zlum po rtsa ba phyed pa ltar byas pa des ni mig mdzer dang /_rgyu ma sbom po dang phra mo la rma byung ba la sbyar ro/_/rgya shug gi tshi gu phyed bkas lta bu la/_so dang bcas pa'i cha byad kyis ni sna'i thor bu dang 'brum bu gcad par bya'o/_/yang cha byad srid
[\[38a.6\]]du sor brgyad dang /_rgyab sgur zhing sor cung zad gug pa gsum byas te/_de'i so yang mthe'u chung dang gung mo'i sen mo lta bu'i so byas pa de ni thal sman dang /_sman gyi byug pa dang /_bsku ba la sogs pa la sbyar ro/_/pho mtshan dang mig sman la sogs pa'i cha byad ni rang rang gi le'u las
[\[38a.7\]]bstan pa yin no/_/de la nye ba'i cha byad ces bya ba rdo khab len dang /_rtsa mun dza la sogs pa'i thag pa dang /_ras dang rdo dang /_tho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_srog chags kyi rgyu ma dang /_lce dang rta rnga dang /_shing gi yal ga dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_nye ba'i spyad de dag gis kyang /_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]phyi nang dang /_smin ma smin dang /_dus dang /_yud tsam la sogs pa'i nye ring dang /_snying stobs dang ldan pa'i nad pa dag la thabs kyi bye brag dang /_sbyor ba la mkhas pa'i sman pas nad kyi bye brag la ji ltar 'os shing rigs par sbyar zhing dpyad bya'o/_/cha byad kyi las kyang brdung ba dang /_bsrub
[\[38b.2\]]pa dang /_dgang ba dang /_rgyun srad dag par bya ba dang /_thal sman la sogs pa gdab pa dang /_mtshon dbyung ba dang /_bcing ba dang /_btsir ba dang /_gzhib pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_rma btsal ba dang /_drang por bya ba dang /_de dag gi gong du bstan pa'i cha byad kyi las mdor
[\[38b.3\]]bsdus pa yin no/_/bya kang ka'i mchu lta bu'i cha byad ni cha byad thams cad kyi nang na gtso bo yin te/_yan lag dang lus dang gnas gang du yang nad med cing 'jug par bde ba dang /_legs par zug rngu 'byin cing 'dzin par byed pa yin no/_/gzhang 'brum khrag tshad las thal sman rnon po gtong
[\[38b.4\]]ba'i dpyad dang /_mtshan par rdol ba la sman gtong ba'i dpyad dang /_khong du mtshon lus pa la sogs pa'i drang ba'i dpyad kyi cho ga'i le'u nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so//_//gtar spyad rnam pa sna tshogs pa bshad pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa bshad par bya'o/_/gtar spyad ni nyi shu rtsa drug
[\[38b.5\]]yod de mgar ba mkhas pas dpyad bzhin du brdungs la/_rno khyad ni spu chod pa/_gtar spyad kyi tshad ni phal cher ni sor drug pa sha stag byas la/_tshul legs shing ngar gdags legs pa/_yu ba gzung bde ba de lta bur bya'o/_/so la mtho dman gyi ya yo med cing lcags khong du
[\[38b.6\]]mkhregs shing 'thar legs pa rab tu rno bar byas pa mdog 'jam khyad me tog ut+pal dang 'dra ba de dag gi ming yang ming nyid dang 'dra bar cha spyad kyi tshul gzugs kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/gtar spyad sna tshogs kyi yu ba ma gtogs par 'bras kyi tshad ni sor phyed dang bzhi par
[\[38b.7\]]bya'o/_/gtar spyad kyi 'bras kyi tshad phal cher sor gnyis pa dang sor gsum par bya'o/_/de dag gi so so'i dbyibs kyi bye brag ni rtse mo'i dbyibs dkyil 'khor 'dra la so ni mdzub mo'i sen mo'i kha'i dbyibs 'dra bar bya'o/_/'dis ni bzhar cing gcod par byed de/_mig gi
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]mchu'i sha dang /_rnyil skyes pa dang /_rnyil skrangs pa dang /_kha dang gre bar sha lhag skyes pa dang /_lce'u chung bcad pa dang /_sha lhag dang sha rmen bzhar ba'o/_/'phel gtsags zhes bya ba'i dbyibs ni spu gri 'dra ste/_des ni gcod pa dang dral ba dang brtol bar
[\[39a.2\]]bya'o/_/gtsags rtse drang po zhes bya ba ni 'or nad dang skrangs pa la gdab po/_/skrangs pa'i rngams stug na ni gtsags bu de las gzhan du bsgyur ro/_/gtsags bu rtse gug ces bya ba ltag pa ni ring /_so ni thung ste nad kyi tshul ci 'dra las bya'o/_/gtsags bu dbyibs me tog ut+pa la 'dra
[\[39a.3\]]ba/_so'i srid la sor gnyis yod pa 'dis dral ba dang gcad par bya'o/_/gtsags bu kha dbrag sbrul gyi kha ltar 'dug pa/_so nyi tshe las sor gnyis 'dug pa 'di ni/_sna dang rna ba la thor bu byung ba dang /_gzhang 'brum gcad pa'o/_/nad dmigs btsal ba'i cha byad rta bla ba'i mgo bo
[\[39a.4\]]'dra bar byas pa des ni bcal cing dral ba'i snga rol du brtag par bya'o/_/gzhan yang khab rtse zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/_yu ba phug ste thags gzungs btags la 'dis ni dral bar bya'o/_/star bu'i lo ma 'dra ba'i gtsags bus ni dbug par bya'o/_/khrag gzag par bya ba mda'i
[\[39a.5\]]bu ga'i kha 'dra ba gsum du byas pa dang /_'jag ma ku sha dang /_rtsa a Ta'i rtse mo 'dra bar byas pa 'bras gnyis ka la sor gnyis yod pa des ni pho mtshan gyi nad la gdab bo/_/gtsags bu'i 'bras zla ba kham pa 'dra bar byas pa so nang du lta ba/_gtsags bu'i nang gi 'bras kyi
[\[39a.6\]]so la sor phyed yod pa 'dis ni rna ba na ba dbug pa dang /_'or du skrangs pa smin pa dang /_ma smin pa gnyis ka la gdab par bya'o/_/rtsa dang lta ba la gdab pa'i gtsags bu'i dbyibs rtse 'bras 'dra ba/_so'i 'bras la sor phyed dang gnyis yod pa des gdab po/_/'phral rtsa rus
[\[39a.7\]]pa'i steng na sbom po snang ba la gdab pa'i gtsags bu ste ra ba lang gi mdun so 'dra bar byas pa de'i yu ba gyen du bstan la/_'phral rtsar bem tol gyis gdab po/_/mo mtshan ma rungs par gyur pa la zangs ma'i thur ma ya thog ma thog gi thor to'i dbyibs me tog kha 'dus pa 'dra
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bar byas pa des/_pho mtshan gyi bu ga nas gsul te bsal lo/_/lce khyi ba skrangs te na ba la mtshon rgya 'dra ba'i tha ma lhag par phyir byung bar byas la/_sor phyed yod pa des rtse mo'i khor yug dkyil 'khor 'dra ba 'am/_yang na zhal zhal 'dra ba'i lcags bu 'dra bar byas pas/_
[\[39b.2\]]lce khyi ba'i thor to la rma byung ngam/_yang na bkas te/_khrag dbyung ngo /_/gre ba dang mgul pa skrangs pa dang /_'brum bu byung ba la mgul rgya yu ba can du byas te srad bus btags te mdzub mo'i thor to la btags la dril lo/_/lce khyi ba skrangs pa dang /_kha'i nang du sha lhag gam
[\[39b.3\]]thor bu chen po byung ba gzung zhing gcad pa'i lcags kyo rab tu gug par byas la drang zhing gcad do/_/rus pa lhag pa gcad pa'i sog le srid sor bcu/_zheng sor gnyis/_sog le'i so rab tu phra ba las yu ba dam por byas pa des rus pa gcad do/_/rma dang chu ba dang rgyus pa gcad pa
[\[39b.4\]]dang /_skra breg pa'i chan pa bya'o/_/chan pa 'dra ba yon po so drang ba so gnyis par 'dod pa'i sen mo breg pa la mtshon srid sor dgu par byas la des ni shing gi tshal pa zug pa dbyung ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gzal ba dang /_drud pa dag bya'o/_/phyi zhing bdar ba'i spyad gru bzhi
[\[39b.5\]]la so ya gcig btod la kha zlum por byas pa de ni so phyi zhing brdar ba dang /_so'i dreg pa phyi bar bya'o/_/khab kyi srid sor gsum pa la mgo zlum po mig gi zabs cher btod pa kha srab par byas pa de lta bu gsum dgos te mi sha chen po sar ni mgo zur gsum pa srid sor gsum
[\[39b.6\]]yod par bya'o/_/sha chung ba dang /_rus pa dang tshigs kyi bar na rma yod pa rnams la srid sor gnyis par bya'o/_/pho ba dang long ka'i gnas kyi phyi'i pags pa rdol na 'drub pa'i khab rtse nas kyi dbyibs 'dra ba gzhu 'dra ba'i dbyibs dgu'o/_/srid sor phyed dang gsum par
[\[39b.7\]]byas pa des drub po/_/brtsan sngon po 'am/_smug po lta bu'am lag pa bur te bskyod mi nus pa dang /_skra 'byi ba 'di lta bu la khab bdun nam brgyad kun kyang zlum por byas pa srid la sor bzhi yod pa gcig pu sbams te khri'u la rtsa ba btsugs la des gtsag cing zhal zhal byas te
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]khrag nad dbyung ngo /_/khab brgyad kyi so zlum po sor phyed par byas la/_sbams te sna'i bu gar bcug la lag pas gtsub ste sna'i khrag dbyung ngo /_/rna shal dbug pa'i smyung bu'i rtse mo zlum po me tog yu ti ka dang /_mu khu la kha 'bus pa 'dra ba sor phyed par byas pa
[\[40a.2\]]des rna ba'i drung dbug go_/smyung bu de'i zhabs sor bzhi pa bya'o/_/rma skrangs pa gsar rnying gi bag btsal ba yang 'di las bya'o/_/rma drung gi sha stug po la dbug pa'i smyung bu'i rtse mo kha sbom la sum cha sbu gu yod par byas te/_srid sor gsum pa des rna ba phug shig_/gzhan
[\[40a.3\]]yang gtar spyad kyi mtshon ma yin pa srin bu dza lu ka zhes bya ba chu nang na gnas pa dang /_thal sman rnon po gsha' ra dang /_me btsa' gdab pa dang /_me shel mching bu'i dum bu dang /_nor bu kun pin ta dang /_rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang /_rdo ba dang /_lci ba skam po dang /_sen mo
[\[40a.4\]]gdab pa 'di rnams ni/_gtar gas gdab pa'i mtshon gtsags bu 'dra ste/_nad kyi dmigs dang sbyor la gyis shig_/gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor gyi cha byad mkho bas nad thabs kyi dmigs dang sbyor ba byed pas 'dren cing 'byin pa dang /_dral ba dang /_drub pa dang /_nad
[\[40a.5\]]dmigs tshol bar byed pa dang /_phyi zhing snigs bya ba dang /_zhal zhal gdab pa dang /_gtsags pa dang /_gcad pa dang /_gshegs pa dang /_dbug pa dang /_gtsubs pa dang /_skam bus gzung ba dang /_me btsas gdab pa'i thabs bya'o/_/gzhan yang gtar spyad
[\[40a.6\]]kyis mtshon gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_phyi brdar bya ba thor to'i 'bras dang /_rtsa ba'i bar du mdzub mo dang /_gung mo dang /_mthe bong gsum gyis legs par bzung la gcad pa dang dral ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/khrag dbyung ba'i gtsags bu'i rtse mo'i so 'bras 'dra ba de
[\[40a.7\]]rtse mo'i drung du mdzub mo dang gung mo dang mthe bong gsum gyis bzung la yu ba chad pa'i nang du bcug ste gtar zhing khrag dbyung ngo /_/gtar zhing dbyung ba zhig yod na/_yu ba nas bzung la gdab po/_/gtar spyad sna tshogs kyi snod ni gso ras sam bal gyi snam bu 'am men tri 'am/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]du ku la'am/_pags pa 'jam pa rab tu stug por byas pa zheng sor dgu srid sor bcu gnyis yod pa/_nang snam bus bar tshang can du byas pa'i bar du gtsags spyad ma snad par bzhag la/_kha drubs pa sgro gu can du byas te drub tu rung bar byas la de'i nang du gtar spyad
[\[40b.2\]]stsogs shig_/khrag dbyung sla bar bya ba'i phyir chu'i nang na gnas pa'i srin bu pad pa zhes bya ba des/_khrag gang du dbyung ba'i sar khrag 'jib tu gzhug go/_/srin bu pad pa de chu ngan pa'i nang du 'dug gam/_nya dang lhan cig gnas sam/_sbal pa la sogs pa dang /_mi
[\[40b.3\]]ro dang chu rnyog ma can gyi nang nas byung ba pad pa'i kha dog dmar po dang dkar po dang /_srin bu rab tu gnag la ro rgod cing sbom pa 'byil ba dang 'ja' tshon ltar 'dug pa dang /_ro stod tshon sna tshogs su bkra ba dang pad pa'i lus la spu yod pa de rnams ni dug yod pa yin te bor
[\[40b.4\]]cig_/gal te de lta bus khrag gzhibs na g.yan pa dang /_rma kha skrangs te rnag zag pa dang /_rims dang mgo 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i nad kyis btab na dug bsal ba'i sman dpyad dang /_mkhris pa dang khrag nad bsal ba'i dpyad cho ga bya'o/_/srin bu pad pa
[\[40b.5\]]gdug pa ma yin pa khrag 'jib tu rung ba'i gnas chu mdog gsal ba/_nya lcibs yod pa'i nang nas byung ba mi gdug pa mdog rtsa snar ba/_lus gzugs zlum pa/_pad pa'i lus kyi stod sngo bkrar 'dug pa rgyab ngur smrig gi kha dog lta bu la/_lus phra ba/_lto na cung zad
[\[40b.6\]]tsam ser ba ni rung ngo /_/de yang sngar khrag 'thungs te legs par khrag ma skyugs pa dang /_rtag tu khrag 'thung du gzhug gzhug pa dang /_khrag 'thungs drags te myos pa dang de lta bu ni mi rung gi bor cig_/srin bu pad pa gdug pa ma yin pa de lta bu rnyed nas/_yung ba btags
[\[40b.7\]]pa dang chu sbyar ba 'am 'bras rtsabs kyi nang ngam dar ba'i nang du srin bu pad pa de dag dbugs phyung ste/_de nas gang du na ba'i dmigs der khrag 'jib tu gzhug na/_mar ram/_lde gu 'am/_bud med kyi nu zho 'am/_gzhan gyi khrag byung ba'i thigs pas bskus pa de la srin bu pad pa'i kha
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]glan te khrag 'thung du bcug la khrag 'thungs pa'i tshe na ro stod mtho bar gyur na khrag legs par 'thungs pa yin gyis steng du ras srab mo zhig gis g.yogs shig_/srin bu pad pa de nad khrag dang khrag bzang po 'dres par 'dug pa la dang por nad khrag 'thung bar
