[\[101a.1\]]rims nad smin pa'i rims so/_/de la dus kyi rims zhes bya ba ni sngar tsha ba'i rims kyis lus la btab pa'o/_/phyis rnying la tsha bar gyur pa ni yid kyi rims so/_/rlung dang bad kan gyi nad gnyis cig car byung ba ni grang ba'i rims so/_/mkhris pa'i
[\[101a.2\]]rims nad dang 'brel ba ni tsha ba'i rims so/_/nad sna gnyis 'dres pa ni rims zhes bya'o/_/khong pa'i nang du tsha ba'i rims na ba ni rims nad dkyel che ste/_/khong pa'i nang du na zhing bshang gci'i dri ma sri zhing 'gag go/_/lus kyi phyi rol tsha ba'i rims ni lus kyi sha dang
[\[101a.3\]]pags pa tsha zhing na bar zad de 'di ni gso sla'o/_/de la dus kyi rang bzhin gyi rims ni dus dus su ldang ba'i rims yin te/_dbyar dang /_ston dang /_dpyid gsum rlung nad la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du 'byung ba'i rims yin no/_/gyur pa'i rims ni de lta bu dus so so'i tshe/_
[\[101a.4\]]dus tshigs dang mthun pa'i rims ma yin pa de ni gyur pa'i rims nad ces bya ste gso dka' ba'o/_/rang bzhin gyi rims nad ces bya ba de yang phal cher rlung nad kyis slong ste dus bzhir rim bzhin 'gyur ro/_/dbyar gyi tshe ni rlung nad kyi nad bslangs nas mkhris pa dang bad kan
[\[101a.5\]]du ldan pa dang rims nad du 'gyur ro/_/ston ni mkhris pa'i nad slong ste de'i grogs bad kan gyis byas pas rims nad du 'gyur te de lta bu la kha zas smyung bar byas kyang /_ston nyams mthu skye ba'i dus yin pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/dpyid ka ni bad kan las nad du
[\[101a.6\]]'gyur ba'i dus yin te/_bad kan gyi rims nad langs pa'i zla la rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad kyang de'i rjes la 'byung ngo /_/mi nyams 'tshag che ba zhig la rims nad tsha bas chung ngu zhig gis sngar btab la phyi nas nad de ma yin pa gnod pa'i nad bla brnan gzhan lta bus
[\[101a.7\]]btab pa yang med na rims nad de lta bu ni gso sla ba zhes bya'o/_/yang nad pa'o cog gi nad gso ba la/_'tsho'am mi 'tsho dka' sla ci 'dra ba brtag pa ni nad pa'i kha gdong la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa'i tshul dang lta ba dang mtshan ma shes par bya ba'i dmigs bshad pa dang sbyor la/_
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]gso dka' sla shes par gyis shig_/de la rims nad ma smin pa zhes bya ba ni/_rims kyis dang po gsar du btab pa rtse ma zhil ba lta bu la bya ste/_de ni rims tshabs che la na/_khong rmya ba ma yin/_gcin mang /_thur du bshang ba 'gags te sri/_kha zas mi 'ju/_
[\[101b.2\]]skom dad chung /_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ste nad thabs 'di lta bu ni rims nad gsar pa zhes bya ste rims nad ma smin pa yin no/_/de la rims nad smin par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni rims nad rtse zhil bar gyur pa la bya ste/_de ni rims nad tshabs che bla zhing smra/_dbugs
[\[101b.3\]]kyi rngam pa drag_/mgo 'khor/_bshang gci dri ma mi 'gag par thur du 'byung /_slon par byed pa'i nad thabs 'di lta bu ni rims nad smin par gyur pa'i rtags yin no/_/yang rims nad rnam pa lngar bshad pa la rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan so so'i dus tshigs kyi dmigs
[\[101b.4\]]dang nad pa'i nyams 'tshag che chung las kyang 'gyur te/_rims nad rnam pa lnga car yang phal cher ni 'dus pa'i rims nad du 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rgyun gyi rims nad dang /_rtag pa'i rims nad dang /_rims nyin gcig pa dang /_rims nyin zhag gsum pa
[\[101b.5\]]dang /_rims nyin zhag bzhi pa'o/_/de la rgyun gyi rims ni lus kyi srog zungs bdun dang /_bshang gci dang /_rtsa kun la rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi rims nad kyis khyab par byas nas lus kun tsha bar gyur te/_srog zungs bdun dang /_bshang gci
[\[101b.6\]]la sogs pa'i nang du rims de mtshungs par zhugs nas tshabs cher skyes te rims kyi mthu chen lus lci/_rkang lag rengs bag tu 'dug ste/_de'i tshe rgyun gyi rims de ni dmigs kyis lus kyi nang na bcud dngas ma zhes bya ba la brten cing 'dug ste/_rims nad de la sogs
[\[101b.7\]]pa'i dpyad kyang dka' la/_bzod par yang rab tu dka'o/_/rims nad de lta bus khong pa'i nang gi bshang gci dri ma la bab ste/_tsha ba'i drod kyis smin cing tshos par byas nas ni myur du 'tsho sla'o/_/gal te nad lus kyi srog zungs bdun pa la bab ste rims nad tshabs che ba des myur du
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]smin cing tsha bas gdung bar byed na ni gso dka' ste mi rung ngo /_/'dus pa'i rims nad rgyun ces bya ba de rlung las gyur pa'i rims nad yin na ni zhag bdun du gnas te/_de yang gal te rlung ngam/_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan nyid las bab ste nad nyid la
[\[102a.2\]]gdung zhing smin par byed pa ni rims 'byang du rung ba zhes bya ste zhag bdun gyis 'tsho'o/_/srog zungs bdun po nyid khrag la sogs pa dang lus kyi dri ma bshang gci la bab ste/_rims tsha ba des gdung zhing tshos par byed na ni rims 'byang du mi rung ba zhes bya ste zhag bdun gyis 'chi
[\[102a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul de dang 'dra bar mkhris pa'i nad ni zhag bcus bye brag dbye'o/_/bad kan gyi nad gzhi bcu gnyis kyi bye brag dbye'o/_/de ltar 'dus pa'i rims nad rgyun zhes bya ba'i rims de 'tsho ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i bye brag ni de ltar blta'o/_/zhes gna'i
[\[102a.4\]]drang srong me bzhin 'jug de skad 'chad do/_/yang drang srong ljang sngo'i bu na re rlung las gyur pa'i rims zhag bdun gyis sos 'chi'i bye brag dbye zhes bya ba ni zhag bcu bzhis bye brag dbye'o/_/mkhris pa'i rims nad zhag dgus bye brag dbye zhes bya ba ni zhag bco brgyad
[\[102a.5\]]kyis 'tsho 'chi'i bye brag dbye'o/_/bad kan gyi rims nad zhag bcu gcig gis bye brag dbye zhes bya ba ni zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis bye brag dbye'o/_/de ltar rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum gyi rims nad 'dus pa'i rgyun zhes bya bas btab pa 'tsho 'chi'i bye brag
[\[102a.6\]]gi tshigs ni de ltar blta zhes 'chad do/_/rims nad grangs so sor bstan mod kyi 'on kyang nad pa nad rtse zhil na nyam chung ste rid pa/_kha zas mi 'phrod pa gcig zos sam bsten pa dang /_bya ba la sogs pa gnod pa zhig byas na nad dmigs chung ngus kyang srog zungs
[\[102a.7\]]bdun po sha khrag la gnod par byas te nad kyi dkyel dang dpung skyes nas rims nad de yun ring du na zhing nad la gnyen po med par 'gyur te/_res 'ga' ni tshabs che/_res 'ga' ni tshabs chung ste/_rims nad de rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan rang rang gi dus
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]kyi che nad kyi stobs skyes/_nad la bar chad byed do/_/de ltar rims rgyun ring du gyur pa la yang sman dpyad kyi mthu skyed na ni rims nad phyin to/_/sman dpyad kyi mthu chung na ni rims nad mi phyin to/_/rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad dmigs zad/_
[\[102b.2\]]rims ni chung la phra bar gyur pa'i tshe na rims nad de pho ba'i nang gi bcud dngas ma'i nang na 'dug go/_/de ltar rims de bcud dngas ma'i nang na 'dug par gyur na lus rid cing skem/_bzhin dang kha dog ngan/_rmongs bag tu 'dug_/khong snyom/_kha zas yi gar mi
[\[102b.3\]]'ong ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bcud dngas ma dang rims su 'dres te pho ba na 'dug pa'i rtsa thams cad kyi sgo yang de na kha bye zhing 'dus pas rtsa sgo kun gyi nang na bcud dngas ma rims dang 'dres pa der song na lus thams cad la rgyun gyi rims nad des myur du khyab ste
[\[102b.4\]]na bar byed do/_/de la rtag pa'i rims zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa'i rims rgyun zhes bya ba las tshul mi 'dra bar log par lta ste nad thams cad kyang mi 'dra'o/_/ji lta zhe na rgyun gyi rims de ni nyin zhag du ma zhig tu nyin mtshan rgyun du na'o/_/rtag pa'i rims 'di ni
[\[102b.5\]]nyin par lan gnyis nad ldang /_mtshan mo lan gnyis nad ldang zhing na bas de'i phyir mi 'dra'o/_/nad ldang ba'i dus kyang ma nges te res 'ga' snga dro/_res 'ga' phyi dro/_res 'ga' nyi ma gung la na/_mtshan mo yang nam stod nam smad la na ba'i dus nges
[\[102b.6\]]pa med do/_/thog ma nad kyis 'debs pa'i dus kyang nges pa med do/_/rtag pa'i rims 'di nyid ni khrag la phal cher brten cing 'dug pa de ni rtag pa'i rims zhes bya'o/_/kha cig na re rtag pa'i rims de ni nyin lan gnyis na zhing mtshan lan gnyis na zhes kyang 'chad do/_/
[\[102b.7\]]de la rims nyin gcig pa ni nyin gcig kyang lan re re na ba yin te/_rims de yang sha'i rtsa ba'i nang na brten cing 'dug pa yin no/_/nyin gcig pa'i rims 'di ni rims kyi nang na nad tshabs mi che ba yin te gso sla'o/_/de la nyin gsum pa'i rims zhes bya ba ni nyin gcig
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dang po rims kyis btab la de'i phyi de nyin ni mi na'o/_/de'i yang phyi de nyin na bar byed pa de lta bu'o/_/rims 'di ni tshil gyi rtsa ba'i nang na zhen cing 'dug pa yin te/_mkhris pa dang rlung gnyis glad pa'i spyi bor zhugs shing zhen na glad pa'i spyi bo
[\[103a.2\]]na'o/_/rkang pa man chad dku dor na na bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad yin no/_/rgyab na na rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i nad yin no/_/bzhi pa'i rims zhes bya ba ni/_dang po nyin gcig rims na la de'i 'og nyi ma gnyis ni mi na'o/_/de nas nyi
[\[103a.3\]]ma bzhi nang par yang na ba 'di ni bzhi pa'i rims zhes bya ste/_rims nad 'di lta bu ni myur du mi 'byang ste yun ring du na'o/_/rims nad 'di ni tshil lam/_rkang ngam/_rus pa'i nang na 'dug pa yin no/_/na ba'i thabs kyang rnam pa gnyis te bad kan byin
[\[103a.4\]]pa gnyis kyi nang na zhugs te na ba dang rlung glad pa'i nang du zhugs te na ba dang rnam pa gnyis yin no/_/yang bzhi pa'i rims de yang mi 'dra ba gzhan yang yod de/_rus pa dang tshigs gnyis kyi nang du zhugs te 'dug na nyi ma bzhi la dang po nyi ma gnyis rims na/_de'i 'og tu nyi ma gcig
[\[103a.5\]]mi na/_de'i phyi de nyin yang na bar byed na de lta bu ni bzhi pa'i rims zhes bya'o/_/rims nad de lta bu la kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa dang /_/gnod par 'gyur ba lus kyis bskyod pa'i las byas na/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad gzhi'i
[\[103a.6\]]mthu phyir skyes te na bar 'gyur ro/_/kha zas phan pa zos pa dang lus kyis bskyod pa'i gnod pa ma byas na nad dmigs kyi nyams dma' ste 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi rims nad can zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las las 'byung ste/_kha zas mi
[\[103a.7\]]'phrod pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba ma byas par rims nad kyis btab nas phyi phyir nad tshabs che ste/_na ba'i tshe rims nad gzhan dang 'dra bar na ba yin no/_/rims nad do cog gis btab ste na ba las tha mar 'byung du nye ba'i rtags ni lus kyi srog zungs bdun
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]po bcud dngas ma dang /_sha la sogs pa la rlung ngam/_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan gyis rims nad de dkrugs shing bslangs nas nad slong bar byed/_nad pa dbugs dang rngam pa drag tu 'byung /_lus rngul/_mkhun/_slong bar byed/_lus 'dar/_
[\[103b.2\]]rkang lag bya rmyang byed/_tshig mang du smra/_tsha ba'am grang bas lus dang bzhin gyi mdog dang gzi kun nyams par byas/_shes shing khong du chud pa'i bag med de rmongs bag tu 'dug_/rims nad tshabs cher na bas nyam thag ste mkhris pa'i tshul gyis
[\[103b.3\]]lta ba 'di lta bu'i tshe na ni rims de zhu zhing byang ba yin te/_de'i tshe 'phyen sgra dang bcas pa yang 'byung zhing /_thur du tshad pa sla bar shugs drag tu 'khrus nas de nas lus yang shing snyom/_rmya ba dang /_rmongs bag dang /_lus tsha ba'i bag dang /_kha'i
[\[103b.4\]]nang thor bu'i bag kyang med/_mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams brtas te na ba med/_lus la rngul yang 'byung /_sbrid pa yang 'byung /_na ba med cing rang bzhin gyis nyams tha mal par gyur te/_kha zas yi gar 'ong /_mgo bo g.ya' ste shig phrug
[\[103b.5\]]'dod pa 'di lta bu ni rims nad byang ba'i mtshan ma yin no/_/rims kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//khrag dang mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad las kha sna dang mig nas khrag 'byung ba dang /_thur du khrag 'byung ba
[\[103b.6\]]dang /_lud pa lu ba'i nad gzhi'i le'u gsum pa bshad par bya'o/_/rab tu drod che ba dang /_rab tu ro bro ba rno ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa la sogs te tsha bar 'gyur ba'i bag zos pa dang /_'bru bag la ko tra pa dang /_ud ta
[\[103b.7\]]la ka dang /_'di lta bu'i tsha ba'i bag dang /_na le sham dang /_dbyi mo dang /_/kru trug tres la sogs pa sman tsha ba'i bag mkhris par gyur pa ha cang bsten drags na mkhris pa'i nad du 'gyur zhing mkhris pa rgyas pa ste/_lud pa dang khrag rgyas pa'i nad
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]du 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa dang khrag gnyis phan tshun nad 'dres par gyur pa dang /_lus thams cad la khrag dang mkhris pas khyab nas nad du 'gyur ro/_/de bas na mkhris pa'i nad ces bya ba de ni khrag nad du gyur pa dang /_khrag dang
[\[104a.2\]]mkhris par 'dres pa dang /_khrag gis mkhris pa la gnod par byas pa 'di rnams lta bus mkhris pa de khrag gi dri dang /_khrag gi mdog dang mthun par 'jug cing gnas pas na de'i phyir khrag gis mkhris pa'i nad dmigs mtshon te bstan pa yin no/_/de
[\[104a.3\]]nas khrag gi gnas mcher pa dang mchin pa la mkhris pa'i nad de ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa'i nad langs pas glad pa lci zhing na/_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_tsha ba skyes pas grang zhing bsil bar byed/_slon zhing skyugs na skyugs pa dud kha la ro
[\[104a.4\]]skyur ba 'byung /_skyugs pa'i mdog btsog btsog ltar snang /_lud pa lu/_dbugs mi bde/_glad pa 'khor/_khong snyom/_kha nas skyugs pa dang /_khrag dang /_mchil ma 'ong zhing dri mi zhim ste/_g.ya' snyam du mnam/_kha dri mi zhim/_
[\[104a.5\]]nya rjen bzhin du mnam/_skad 'dzer te 'gags/_mig dang /_sha dang /_pags pa'i mdog dang /_sen mo dang /_bshang gci la sogs pa'i mdog rnams dmar la ljang sngon du 'dug pa mdog ser por snang ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam na yang
[\[104a.6\]]gzugs kyi kha dog de ltar 'byung zhing snang ngo /_/de ltar gyur na mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas pa yin no/_/mkhris pa dang khrag gi nad stod du rgyas pa ni/_sna dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_kha nas khrag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad
[\[104a.7\]]ro smad du rgyas na pho mtshan dang /_mo mtshan dang rkub nas khrag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rab tu rgyas te tshabs che na ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang khrag 'byung ngo /_/de ltar stod du kha sna nas khrag 'ong na ni gso sla ste/_stod bad kan gyi
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]rang bzhin yin pas na de'i phyir de lta bu la bkru sman gyis bkrus na phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i sman dpyad kyang mang du yod mod kyi/_mkhris pa'i nad ni bkru sman gyis bkrus pa las dpyad bzang ba med do/_/de ltar mkhris pa'i nad
[\[104b.2\]]bkru sman gyis bkrus te phyin na mkhris pa'i zla la bad kan gyi nad ci yod pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyi nad de phyin te byang nas sman dang /_kha zas ro bska ba dang mngar ba'i bag zos na gnod pa med de/_mkhris nad dang khrag nad lta bu sel te phan no/_/
[\[104b.3\]]sman dang /_kha zas ro kha ba dang bska ba'i bag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_des ni mkhris pa dang khrag nad kyang sel la/_bad kan gyi nad kyang sel bas phan no/_/thur du khrag dang mkhris pa byung ba de ni rlung las gyur pa'i sa bon yin te/_de ni myur du byar mi rung
[\[104b.4\]]ste/_de la skyug sman btang na gso sla ste/_myur du 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la skyug sman btang ba ni sman phran tshegs su 'gyur te/_phan pa'i dpyad ma yin/_mkhris pa'i zla la rlung nad yod pa yang skyug sman
[\[104b.5\]]gyis mi phan no/_/de bas na mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la skyug sman pas ni zas ro bska ba dang /_mngar ba phan par 'gyur ro/_/khrag dang mkhris pa rgyas te bad kan dang rlung gnyis ka 'dres te stod smad gnyis kar khrag 'byung bar 'gyur na ni gso dka' ste/_
[\[104b.6\]]skyug sman bkru sman gnyis kyang bad kan dang rlung nad de la mkhris pa'i nad kyang skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis phyin pa med la/_de bzhin du nad 'di 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yang med do/_/de ltar mkhris pa dang /_khrag nad rgyas pa dang /_rlung dang bad kan
[\[104b.7\]]gyi nad kun 'dres par gyur pa de lta bur nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i dpyad byas na phan no/_/de'i 'og nas zhib tu sman sbyar ba'i skabs su 'chad do/_/mkhris pa dang khrag gi nad de lta bur gyur pa nad de'i nang du rlung ngam/_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]gyi nad dmigs gang che brtag dgos te/_de ni gtar ga thob la khrag ci 'dra ba rtog shig_/mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas pa'i nad de las gzhan yang phran tshegs ci dang cir gyur pa yang rjes dpyad/_'tsho 'chi cir 'gyur ba nad pa'i
[\[105a.2\]]bzhin mdog la sogs pa las ltas su blta ba yang sbyor ba'i dpyad gyis shig_/lud pa lu ba glo nad rnam pa lnga'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o/_/glo na ste lud pa lu bas ni lus la gnod pa myur du byed pas na/_de'i phyir lud pa lu ba'i
[\[105a.3\]]dmigs 'dir bstan par bya'o/_/lud pa lu ba de yang rnam pa lnga ste/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_glo rdol ba dang /_lus kyi srog zungs bdun zad par 'gyur ba'i glo gcong skem byed dang lnga'o/_/glo nad 'di lnga las
[\[105a.4\]]rlung nad kyi lud pa bkar zhing na babs ni mkhris pa'i glo nad kyi nad dkyel che'o/_/mkhris pa'i glo nad pas ni bad kan las gyur pa'i nad che'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i nad pas ni glo 'grams te rdol pa'i nad che'o/_/de bas glo gcod skem byed kyi nad
[\[105a.5\]]che'o/_/glo nad 'di rnams gang na yang rung /_nad thabs kyi spyi ni lud pa lu/_gre ba'i nang g.ya'/_zas yi gar mi 'ong /_gre ba'i nang gra mas gang ba bzhin du rtsub la tsha/_rlung ro smad man chad du rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig yod pa de yang nad kyis
[\[105a.6\]]'gror ma ster/_de 'gags pas rlung de 'khyil nas phyir log ste/_ro stod du song nas brang dang mgul pa'i nang kun tu zhen te/_de nas glad pa'i nang dang stod kyi rtsa kun gyi nang du rlung des gang ba dang /_de'i phyi rol rlung des lus dang yan lag rnams gyen
[\[105a.7\]]du bteg cing sbar ba bzhin du g.yengs par byed pas lud pa lu/_mig ni rdol zhing byung la thug pa tsam du na/_rgyab dang brang rtsib logs su zug cing na bar byas nas rlung gyen du khar rgyu zhing 'byung ngo /_/rlung de lud pa lu zhing 'byung ba'i sgra ni khar ba'i
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]snod chag pa'i sgra skad zer ro/_/de ltar rlung nad las glo lu ba de yang nad gzhi'i bye brag tha dad pas/_rlung nad khong pa nang du 'gags shing zhen pa'i nad kyang tha dad par gyur te/_de'i phyir nad thabs kyang mi 'dra/_lud pa lu ba'i skad kyang mi 'dra
[\[105b.2\]]bar 'byung ngo /_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i lud pas bkar ba'i nad thabs ni/_rlung nad slong zhing ldang bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas zos pas brang dang /_thong ka dang /_gre ba'i nang kha bskams/_snying na/_rtsib logs dang /_brang dang /_
[\[105b.3\]]glad par zug cing na/_rmongs bag tu 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis lus thams cad kyi nang dkrugs pa snyam byed/_skad 'gags/_lud pa skam/_lud pa shugs drag tu lu/_lu ba'i tshe zug cing cher na/_lu ba'i sgra drag tu 'byung /_lus kun
[\[105b.4\]]rtsub la reg na brtse/_bad kan gyi bag khong na bskams te zad pas/_lud pa drag pa yun ring zhig tu lu lu na/_yang bad kan cung zad tsam zhig 'byung ba de lta bu ni rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa lu ba'i nad thabs yin no/_/de la mkhris pa'i nad las
[\[105b.5\]]gyur pa'i lud pa lu ba'i nad thabs ni/_lud pa lu na/_mchil ma'i ro kha/_kha'i nang gi ro bro ba yang kha/_mig ser/_rims kyis thebs/_mgo 'khor/_mkhris pa dang khrag tu slon par byed/_bad kan dang mchil ma dud pa 'dra ba nag
[\[105b.6\]]por 'byung ngo /_/skad 'gags/_skom dad che/_khong myos par 'gyur/_lud pa rtag par drag tu lu ba'i tshe mig lam du skar mda' 'phro bar byed pa lta bur snang /_nad thabs 'di lta bu ni mkhris pas bkar ba'i lud pa zhes bya ba'o/_/de la
[\[105b.7\]]bad kan gyis bkar ba'i lud pa'i nad thabs brang du zug pa'i nad tshabs ni mi che/_glad pa'i spyi bo dang snying ga ni lci la mer mer por gang ba snyam byed/_gre ba'i nang bad kan gyis skyang nul du byugs pa tsam du zhen la 'byung du mi rung /_cham pas 'debs/_
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]skyugs/_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_ba spu dang sha'i pags par reg na brtse/_lud pa lu na bad kan dkar po dkar la snum bag tu 'byung ngo /_/nad thabs 'di lta bu ni bad kan gyis bkar ba'i lud pa lu ba'i nad thabs zhes
[\[106a.2\]]bya'o/_/de la glo 'grams te rdol ba'i nad thabs ni stobs la sogs pa drag shul gyi bag lta bur byas pa dang /_stobs kyi tshan gyis mi nus bzhin du yang stobs sam/_khur lta bu tshan chen po phyung bas rlung gis glo ba rdol te dral nas/_de'i
[\[106a.3\]]rjes su mkhris pa yang zhugs te nad dkyel du gyur pa las lud pa lu nas lud pa de khar bad kan dang khrag 'byung ba kha dog ser po nag po rnag gi ljan ljin ril ril po dang 'dres pa'i bad kan cig 'byung ngo /_/gre ba'i nang bad kan rnag khrag 'ong ba'i tshe
[\[106a.4\]]na la brang dang /_nu 'jing dang /_thod ga phyogs su gzer ba bzhin du zug_/rus pa'i tshigs kha bye ba snyam byed la rims nad kyis 'debs/_dbugs mi bde/_skom dad che/_skad 'gags/_lus 'dar/_rtsib logs su zug cing na ste/_
[\[106a.5\]]mkhun zhing phug ron skad 'byin to/_/de ltar glo 'grams te rdol na bags kyis nyams stobs 'bri/_kha zas khad kyis yi gar mi 'ong /_pho ba'i drod dang nyams 'tshag dang /_bzhin mdog dang 'di rnams kyang khad kyis 'bri bar 'gyur ro/_/nad
[\[106a.6\]]thabs 'di ltar na na glo 'grams te rdol ba yin no/_/de la lus kyi srog zungs bdun zad par 'gyur ba'i glo gcod na ba'i nad thabs ni gcin khrag tu 'ong /_rgyab dang rked pa na/_mchog tu rlung nad kyis nang slong bar byed de de bas na zad par byed pa'i
[\[106a.7\]]nad 'di ni lus kyi nad la rgyal po ltar byed pas na nad kyi rgyal po zad byed ces bya'o/_/de'i nad thabs kyang lud pa lu zhing bad kan du 'byung ngo /_/bad kan du lu ba las kyang rul te rnag bzhin du 'byung la mdog ser mnam/_rtsa sngo zhing dmar/_rtsib
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]logs g.yas g.yon na mar gzhogs shing bcad pa snyom byed/_snying thur du 'phyongs shing ltung ba snyam byed de na/_glo bur du res 'ga' ni tsha bar 'dod/_res 'ga' ni bsil zhing grang bar 'dod/_kha zas mang du za phod la nyams 'tshag ni zad
[\[106b.2\]]de rke/_kha gdong ni mdog snum la gsal/_so dkar/_mig bzang por snang ba 'di lta bu'i tshul du gyur na de'i rjes la lus kyi srog zungs zad par 'gyur ba'i nad kyi tshul thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na lus srog zad par 'gyur ba'i
[\[106b.3\]]lud pas bkar bar 'gyur/_lud pas bkar zhing lu lu bas lus zad de ma rungs par 'gyur ro/_/nad pa de nyams 'tshag yod na ni glo gcod zad byed kyi nad dang /_glo 'grams pa'i nad gnyis ka yang de las ming la bar gso ba tsam du rung ngo /_/
[\[106b.4\]]glo 'grams pa dang /_lus zad pa bskams pa'i glo gcong gnyis ka gsar du byung na sman dpyad kyis gsor rung ngo /_/rlung ngam mkhris pa'am bad kan gsum gyi nad dar bar 'gyur ba'i glo gcong zad byed kyi nad kyis btab pa yang gsor rung ngo /_/
[\[106b.5\]]rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum lta bu las gang yang rung ste/_nad sna gnyis 'dres pa'i nad du gyur tam mi rgan po lta bu la glo gcod zad byed kyi nad kyis btab na de dag kyang nad de las mi 'gyur/_mi thu/_sla ba tsam du gsor rung ngo /_/
[\[106b.6\]]de lta bas na lus srog zad par byed pa'i glo gcong gi nad gso ba yal bar bor na dang po lud pa lu'o/_/de nas dbugs mi bde'o/_/dbugs mi bde ba las lus srog bdun po zad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas slon par byed/_de nas skad 'gags pa la
[\[106b.7\]]sogs pa'i nad rnams 'byung ngo /_/de bas na nad thabs 'di ltar gyur na gso ba'i dpyad myur du gyis shig_/khrag mkhris dang lud pa lu ba'i glo nad rnam lnga'i nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dbugs mi bde ba'i nad dang /_skyigs bus btab pa'i nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u bzhi pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la dbugs mi bde ba'i nad ni lud pas bkar ba'i nad dkyel cher skyes sam/_yang na dbugs mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas mi 'phrod pa
[\[107a.2\]]cig sngar zos la/_nad bslang ste dbugs mi bde bar gyur tam/_yang na kha zas ma zhu bas tshad par 'khrus sam/_kha zas ma zhu bas slon tam dug 'thungs sam/_skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab bam rims kyis btab bam/_'di lta bu gang yang rung ba'i nad gzhi dbugs mi bde
[\[107a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/dbugs mi bde ba'i nad de yang rnam pa lnga ste/_dbugs cung zad mi bde ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba mun pa bzhin snying rmugs kyis byed pa dang /_dbugs 'chad pa dang /_dbugs drag po mi bde ba cher 'byung ba dang /_dbugs phyir rgyu ba drag la nang du rngub
[\[107a.4\]]pa'i tshe dbugs 'chad de/_nang du mi rngub pa dang rnam pa de lnga'o/_/yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad thams cad ni dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la bad kan gyis chod de 'gags pa dang zas skom mid pa'i gre ba dang mgul pa'i sbu gu dang /_srog ces bya ba'i rlung phyi nang du rgyu ba zhig yod pa dang
[\[107a.5\]]'di dag la bad kan gyis 'gags te chod pas dbugs rgyu ba'i rlung 'gror mi ster zhing glo g.yas g.yon du 'khyil te 'dug la rtsa sgo yang bad kan gyi nad kyis 'gags na ma zhu ba'i gnas pho ba nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba de byung nas brang gi thad kar 'dug cing 'khyil nas dbugs mi bde bar
[\[107a.6\]]'gyur te na'o/_/de ltar na na ba'i tshul ni dang por snying dang rtsib logs na srog gi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba las gnod de na/_dbugs kyis gang ste bus pa'i thabs su na/_mur 'gram g.yas g.yon du zug ste na ba 'di ni dbugs mi bde ba spyi'i nad thabs yin no/_/de la dbugs cung
[\[107a.7\]]zad mi bde ba zhes bya ba'i nad thabs ni stobs rtsal drag shul gyi bag byas sam/_kha zas ha cang 'grangs ches par zos pa 'di lta bus 'phral du dbugs mi bde ste/_rngam pa drag tu 'byung bar byed do/_/dbugs mi bde ba 'di ni phran tshegs yin te 'di rang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]de la dbugs mi bde ba mun pa bzhin rmugs zhes bya ba'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis te/_bad kan las dbugs mi bde bar gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa tsha ba'i nad las dbugs mi bde bar gyur pa dang gnyis so/_/de la bad kan skyes na dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i rlung de 'gags te 'khyil nas
[\[107b.2\]]phyir 'byung du mi ster bar sbu gu dang rtsa'i nang na mar dbugs log par thur du rgyu bar byed/_glad pa na/_mgul pa'i nang gi sbu gu na/_brang dang rtsib logs su zug cing na'o/_/lud pa lu na gre ba'i nang sgra ngar ngar zer/_snying mi dran rmongs bag tu gyur/_kha zas yi gar mi
[\[107b.3\]]'ong ngo /_/cham pas 'debs/_skom dad che ste dbugs mi bde ba'i tshe na rab tu mi bde ste/_dmigs kyis ni srog ces bya ba'i rlung zhig yod de/_glo snying gi nang nas gyen du glad pa'i spyi bo'i bar du rgyu la de'i las ni sems dang zhing gsal bar byed/_mig dang rna ba la sogs
[\[107b.4\]]pa dbang po rnams dang zhing gsal bar byed/_sems brtan par byed mchil ma 'dor bar byed/_sbrid pa 'byung bar byed/_sgregs pa 'byung bar byed/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bar byed/_kha zas zas skom mid par byed pa de lta bu'i rlung zhig yod de/_bad kan gyis 'gags te
[\[107b.5\]]rlung rgyur mi ster ba dang /_dbugs 'gags te mi bde bas dbugs thum thum byed pas mun pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de la khong nas bad kan ngan pa cung zad tsam phyung na skad cig tsam bde'o/_/nyal ba'i tshe na dbugs rab tu mi bde'o/_/tsog tsog por 'dug na ni dbugs mi zad bde
[\[107b.6\]]bar byed/_dbugs mi bde ba'i tshe mig har har por 'gyur/_'phral ba na rngul 'byung ste rab tu mi bde/_kha skam/_dbugs mi bde bas rngam pa bstud mar 'byung /_bad kan las gyur pa'i dbugs mi bde ba yin pas dron po'i bag 'dod/_khong 'dar/_char pa 'bab
[\[107b.7\]]pa'am/_nam langs te yul grang ngam/_snga dro'i ser bus phog pa dang /_bad kan skyes nas dbugs mi bde ba'i nad las 'gyur te/_de lta bu la sman dpyad kyi cho ga byas na nad de las dkyel min pa tsam gsor rung ngo /_/dbugs mi bde ba'i nad de lta bus gsar du btab pa'am/_
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]nad pa nyams 'tshag yod na ni gso sla'o/_/de la tsha ba mkhris pa'i bag gis dbugs mi bde bar 'gyur la/_rims tsha bas btab bam myos te dbugs mi bde na ni sman bsil bag gis nad gso'o/_/de la dbugs 'chad cing dbugs mi bde ba'i nad
[\[108a.2\]]thabs ni dbugs mi bde ba'i rngam pa shugs drag po 'byung ba'i rjes la dbugs chad pa de lta bu bstud par na ste/_de'i tshe srog gi gnas yod pa kun kyang 'chad pa tsam du na/_rngul 'byung /_brgyal/_khong lcog_/lgang pa tsha/_gcin 'gag_/mig har har por 'og mig tu
[\[108a.3\]]thur du lta la mig ya gcig dmar por gyur/_yang dang yang mi dran te mong mong bor gyur/_kha skam/_smra ba'i shugs nyams te gsang dma'/_gzi mdangs nyams bzhin blag blag por gyur/_snying mi dran te myo myo po de ltar byed do/_/de la dbugs mi bde ba'i nga ro
[\[108a.4\]]cher 'byung ba'i nad thabs ni dbugs mi bde ba'i nga ro nyams pa'i sgra cher 'byung la rngam pa drag_/dbugs mi bde ba'i nga ro gnyis kyi sngur pa sgra bzhin 'byung /_dbugs mi bde ba'i dbugs drag tu 'byung ba'i tshe dbyar gyi glang rgyags te 'gying ba'i nga ro skad drag tu zer/_sngar
[\[108a.5\]]lobs shing shes pa rnams kyang brjed de mi dran/_mig gis mi mthong la 'khrul/_bzhin 'gyur/_ro stod dang dpung mgo zhum por 'gyur/_bshang gci 'gags te mi 'byung /_skad kyi gdangs nyams te gcom chung /_gre ba skams/_yang dang yang snying mi dran te
[\[108a.6\]]myos/_rna ba dang mur 'gram dang klad pa zug ste na'o/_/dbugs gyen du phyir 'byung ba yun ring du 'byung la nang du mi rngub/_'di'i nad thabs ni mgul pa dang sbu gu dang rtsa sgo rnams bad kan gyis chod de 'gags pa de ltar nang du rngub mi nus te dbugs bde la dbugs mnam por
[\[108a.7\]]'byung /_mig gyen du blta la mig 'khrul cing phyogs kun du yang blta/_gnad dang srog chad la thug pa tsam du nyam thag nas smre sngags 'don cing tshig mi 'byin/_nad thabs 'di lta bur gyur pa sna grangs tshang na ni gsor yang mi rung ngo /_/sna grangs 'di ltar ma tshang na ni gsor
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]rung ngo /_/dbugs mi bde ba'i nad thabs lnga ni de lta bu yin no/_/de la skyigs bus btab pa'i nad kyang spyi ni dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyi gzhi dang nad kyi thabs kyi tshul dang yang 'dra/_nad kyi ming gi rnam grangs kyang mnyam/_rang bzhin yang 'dra/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi
[\[108b.2\]]bde ba'i nad kyang 'dra'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_kha zas la skyigs bu tha mal pa dang /_drag shul las gyur pa'i skyigs bu phra mo dang /_skyigs bu zung du 'byung ba dang /_skyigs bu cher 'byung ba dang /_khong pa'i gting gi zabs nas skyigs bu 'byung ba dang lnga'o/_/de la kha zas las gyur
[\[108b.3\]]pa'i skyigs bu ni kha zas rings thabs su zos pa dang /_zas rtsub pa'am/_kha zas tshan mo'am/_kha zas sra ba'am/_zas skom snga na ma goms pa de lta bu drag tu zos pas btsir bar gyur pa'i rlung gis phul ba las skyigs bus btab ste na ba ma yin pa sgra mi grag par 'byung
[\[108b.4\]]sbrid pas 'debs so/_/de lta bu la sngan chad goms pa'i zas skom tha mal pa zos pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu ni zas las gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de la drag shul las gyur pa'i skyigs bu phran tshegs gang zhe na/_de ni drag shul las stobs rtsal gyi bag byas pas rlung
[\[108b.5\]]bskyod de des skyigs bu mi drag pa mgul ba'i nang nas byung ste/_na ba'i shugs kyang mi drag ste 'jam mo/_/de yang dag shul gyi bag byas na ni skyigs bu'i nad la'o/_/kha zas zos pa rnams kyis 'jam par 'gyur ro/_/de la skyigs bu zung du 'byung ba'i nad thabs ni
[\[108b.6\]]bstud mar lan gnyis tsam 'byung la/_de'i 'og tu kha langs tsam las mi 'byung zhing de nas yang bstud mar 'byung ba de lta bu yin no/_/de ni kha zas skyigs bus 'debs par 'gyur te/_de yang kha zas 'jur nye ba'i tshe na skyigs bus drag tu 'debs/_kha zas zhu phan
[\[108b.7\]]chad ni rang 'byung ngo /_/skyigs bus bstud mar 'debs pa'i tshe na lus 'dar/_klad pa dang mgul pa na/_khong lcog_/skom dad che/_tshig smra ba mang /_slon tshad pas 'debs/_mig har bag tu lta/_glal 'byung ngo /_/skyigs bu zung du 'byung ba ni 'di nad
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]thabs kyang drag la kha zas zhu ba'i tshe skyigs bu'i nad kyang ldang zhing mi bde bar byed pa yin no/_/de la skyigs bu cher 'byung ba'i nad thabs ni smin ma dang mur 'gram gnyis mnyam/_mig nas mchi ma'ang /_mig har bag tu lta/_lus rengs
[\[109a.2\]]bag tu byed/_tshig 'khrul/_dran pa dang shes pa 'khrul bag tu byed/_mid pa'i sbu gu 'gags/_srog gi gnad gsig cing skyod par byed/_rgyab tu rgyu/_lus kyi khog skam bag tu 'gyur ba'i skyigs bu drag tu 'byung ste/_skyigs bu de khong pa'i nang dma' ba nas 'byung /_
[\[109a.3\]]sgra cher 'byung /_skyigs bu 'byung ba'i tshe na ba'i tshabs che ste skyigs bu'i stobs kyi shugs drag par 'byung ba yin no/_/de la khong pa'i gting gi zabs nas skyigs bu 'byung ba'i nad thabs ni kha zas zhu ba'i gnas long ka'am/_lte ba'i thad ka tsam nas skyigs bu gong ma dang 'dra bar
[\[109a.4\]]'byung ste nad thabs kyang gong ma dang 'dra bar bstud ma yang dang yang 'byung zhing kha glal/_rkang lag bya rmyang byed/_skyigs bu 'byung ba'i sgra brag ca can zab mor 'ong ba ni nad thabs de lta bu yin no/_/de la skyigs bu thog mar rnam pa gnyis po ni gso sla'o/_/tha ma'i skyigs bu'i nad thabs su gyur pa ni gsor
[\[109a.5\]]mi rung ngo /_/skyigs bu'i nad thams cad kyi sna grangs kyang tshang la nad tshabs kyang che/_nad gzhan kun kyang tshogs la pho ba grang ste zas kyang ma zhu/_mi na rgas sam/_bud med la drags par gyur pa lta bu zhig gam/_nad kyis lus zad de gong ma dang kha zas bcad dam
[\[109a.6\]]ma chud dam/_glo 'grams te rdol tam/_sman tshabs chen por gyur pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ba la skyigs bu yong ba de lta bus btab na gsor mi rung ngo /_/yang na nad do cog gis kyang ma rungs par ni byed mod kyi/_skyigs bu ltar myur du ma rungs par byed pa nyid ma yin
[\[109a.7\]]no/_/skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gnyis ni nam 'chir nye ba'i tshe na 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbugs mi bde ba'i nad thabs dang /_skyigs bu'i nad thabs bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//glo gcong chen po lus kyi srog zungs zad par byed
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]pa'i nad gzhi'i le'u lnga pa bshad par bya'o/_/zad byed kyi nad glo gcong zhes bya ba 'di phyi bzhin nang du 'ong zhing 'brang ngo /_/nad mang po kun gyi thog mar 'gro bas na de'i phyir 'di'i ming ni nad gnod pa'i rgyal po zhes kyang bya/_lus zad par byed pa zhes kyang bya/_lus
[\[109b.2\]]skems par byed pa zhes kyang bya/_nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bya ste/_nad 'di gna' dang po ni rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze rnams la glo gcong gis 'debs pa'i rgyal por gyur pas na de'i phyir nad 'di la ming gnod pa'i rgyal po zhes kyang bya'o/_/sman yang zad/_lus kyang zad
[\[109b.3\]]par byed pas na glo gcong zad byed ces kyang bya/_mi'i bcud dang sha khrag la sogs pa skems par byed pas na glo gcong skems byed ces kyang bya'o/_/nad de dag gi nang nas rgyal po ltar gyur pas na rgyal po zhes kyang bya'o/_/de la glo gcong skems byed kyi nad kyang rnam pa 'di
[\[109b.4\]]bzhi gang yang rung ba las nad du gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_stobs kyi tshan gyis mi nus bzhin du nyams mthu gtugs te/_chad chad du drag shul byas pa lta bu'am bshang gci 'ong bar gyur na brnags te bkag pa'am bud med la drags te khu ba zad pa dang /_mdangs zad pa
[\[109b.5\]]dang /_khong na snum yod pa zad pa dang /_spyir khams bdun po zad pa dang /_zas skom sngon ma zos pa za ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma zos pa rnam pa 'di lta bu gang yang rung ba las nad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nad du gyur pa'i rgyu bzhi lta bu'i rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang bad
[\[109b.6\]]kan gyi nad bslangs nas lus thams cad dang /_rus pa'i tshigs thams cad kyi nang du nad zhugs nas de nas rtsa thams cad du gyes te 'phros nas/_rtsa chen po bcu'i nang du nad zhugs nas yang na ni rtsa de rnams kyi sgo 'gags par 'gyur/_yang na ni rtsa de rnams kyi sgo
[\[109b.7\]]'bye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du ro stod dang /_ro smad dang rtsib logs g.yas g.yon dang /_khong pa nang so so kun du nad kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i nad thabs ni cham pas 'debs sbrid pa rab tu drag po mang du 'byung /_kha nas mchil ma dang bad kan mang du 'byung
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]zhing 'dor/_kha'i nang mngar/_pho ba'i drod nyams/_rdza ma dang /_gzhong pa dang /_snod spyad la sogs pa kun dang /_zas skom la sogs pa gtsang bar 'dug kyang btsog cing /_kha zas kyi nang du sbrang bu dang /_rtsa dang skra la sogs pa song bar
[\[110a.2\]]mthong /_snying na/_slon bro/_zas yi gar mi 'ong /_kha zas rtag tu zos kyang nyams 'tshag zad/_lag pa rtag tu lta zhing lag ngar gyi mkhrig mar sbom phra 'jal 'dod/_rkang pa dang gdong skrang /_mig dkar khral khral byed/_lus mthong na 'jigs su rung /_snying la
[\[110a.3\]]bud med 'dod/_chang dang sha yi gar 'ong ba snyam byed/_zos na skyug bro/_klad pa'i spyi bo rtag tu 'gebs par byed/_sen mo dang skra rab tu ring /_rmi lam na phye ma leb dang /_rtsangs pa dang /_sdig sbrul dang /_spre'u dang /_gcan gzan dang /_bya rnams kyis bdag
[\[110a.4\]]la 'tshe bar mthong /_skra dang rus pa dang /_phub ma dang thal ba'i phung po la bdag 'dzeg cing 'gro bar rmi/_grong dang yul stong dang chu bo skams pa mthong /_skar ma ltung ba dang /_ri bsgyel zhing lhung bar rmi lam du mthong la shing skyes pa kun 'bar bar mthong /_gal te nad ro stod
[\[110a.5\]]yan chad du rgyas na ni cham pas thebs/_dbugs mi bde/_lud pas bkar/_phrag pa na/_klad pa'i spyi bor na/_skad 'gag_/zas yi gar mi 'ong ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gal te ro smad man chad du nad dkyel che na ni yang na tshad par 'khru/_yang na rtug skam du gyur
[\[110a.6\]]te 'khren pas 'dogs so/_/gal te nang grol gyi nang du nad dkyel cher gyur na ni slon par byed do/_/rtsib logs su nad babs na ni glo g.yas g.yon du thad kar zug cing na'o/_/rus pa'i tshigs kyi nang du nad babs na ni rims nad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nad gnod byed kyi glo
[\[110a.7\]]gcong gi nad thabs rnam pa bcu gcig yod pa de ni de lta bu yin no/_/glo gcong gi nad thabs 'di lta bus btab pa la nad bla brnan gzhan gyis btab pa ni skad 'jer te 'gag_/gre ba subs/_brang gi nu 'jing g.yas g.yon du zug cing na/_kha glal/_lus dang ro stod
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]brdung ba snyam byed de na/_kha nas mchil ma dang /_bad kan gyi bag 'dor ba mang /_pho ba'i drod nyams/_kha nas rnag mnam pa de lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ba 'di ni bla brnan gyi nad thabs yin no/_/de la glo gcong zad byed kyi nad ci las gyur pa'i bye brag so so'i dmigs kyang
[\[110b.2\]]bshad par bya ste/_nad de lta bu la rlung las gyur pa'i shas chen glad pa na/_rtsib logs su zug cing na/_mgul pa subs shing skad 'gags pa de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de la mkhris pa rgyas te tsha ba'i nad kyi shas che na ni lag mthil dang rkang mthil tsha/_tshad pas rab
[\[110b.3\]]tu 'khru/_khrag tu slon/_kha mnam/_rims kyis 'debs so/_/nad de la bad kan gyi shas che na ni zas yi gar mi 'ong /_slon/_lud pas bkar/_mgo dang lus dang rkang lag lci/_mchil ma dang bad kan mang du 'ong /_cham pas 'debs/_dbugs
[\[110b.4\]]mi bde/_skad 'gag_/pho ba'i drod nyams pa de lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/nad de lta bus btab ste/_gso dka' ba dang /_sla ba'i bye brag tu lta ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad kun rgyas la pho ba'i drod ni nyams te chung /_bad kan cher skyes pas pho ba'i nad
[\[110b.5\]]'gags shing chod de rtsa thams cad kyi sgo yang 'gags nas lus kyi srog zungs bdun dang /_bshang gci dang rngul dang rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan yan chad lus la yod pa rnam pa bcu gsum gyis drod chung ngur 'gyur ro/_/pho ba'i me drod des log par tsha zhing 'tshig par
[\[110b.6\]]byed pas kha zas zos pa'i bcud de zhu bar ma byas pas khrag dang sha la sogs par mi 'gyur la/_kha zas zos pa'i bcud de bad kan du gyur nas slar khar 'byung bar byed/_kha zas lto na yod pa yang zhu zhing bcud du 'gyur ba ni mi byed kyi dri ma bshang gci thur du 'gro ste/_de lta
[\[110b.7\]]bas khrag dang sha la sogs pa lus kyi srog zungs nyams 'tshag tu brta bar mi 'gyur bas/_kha zas ma zhu ba bcud du mi 'gyur/_bcud du ma gyur na khrag tu mi 'gyur/_sha la sogs pa'i srog zungs su ga la 'gyur te/_lto ba'i nang na bshang gci 'ba' zhig gi tshogs
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]kyis lus rgyas te/_de'i phyir lus sha kun ni med par gyur pas na zad byed kyi nad glo gcong zhes bya ste/_nad thabs 'di ltar sna ma tshang ste/_dkyel chung yang nad pa'i nyams 'tshag chung ste/_sman btang mi bzod pa dang na nas yun ring ba de lta bu ni sman
[\[111a.2\]]btang mi bzod de gsor mi rung ngo /_/nad thabs 'di ltar na nas ring po ma lon pa nyams 'tshag gis thub ste/_sman btang bzod na gsor rung ngo /_/skad subs shing 'gags pa'i nad thabs sna drug bshad pa skad subs shing 'gags pa yang /_rlung nad dam mkhris pa'am/_
[\[111a.3\]]bad kan gyi nad sna tha dad pa las kyang gyur/_nad 'di gsum car 'dus pa las kyang skad 'gags par gyur/_yang la las ni zad byed kyi nad glo gcong las kyang skad 'gag_/tshil las gyur pa'i nad kyis kyang skad 'gags te de ltar skad 'gags pa ni de rnams las 'byung
[\[111a.4\]]ngo /_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa'i nad thabs ni/_skad kyi gsang dma' zhing subs bag tu zer/_lus rmya la khong rtsub/_skad 'gyur/_gre ba'i nang gra mas gang ba tsam du rtsub ste/_mgul pa'i nang bad kan gyis kyang nul du 'byung ba snyam byed na
[\[111a.5\]]gre ba'i nang ngar ngar zer te skad mi phyin cing 'gag go/_/rlung nad dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad 'di gsum char las gyur te/_skad 'gags na ni nad thabs gong ma dang sna gsum char tshang bar na la skad subs so/_/zad byed kyi nad glo gcong las gyur te/_skad
[\[111a.6\]]'gags na ni gre ba'i nang na rtsub pos drud pa snyam byed la/_gre ba nas she rul lam/_bad kan dud kha lta bur 'byung zhing rab tu na'o/_/tshil nad las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa'i nad thabs ni bad kan las gyur pa'i nad thabs dang 'dra'o/_/de la skad 'gags pa'i
[\[111a.7\]]nad 'di rnams kyi nang na gong ma'i nad lnga po gang yang rung ste/_tshig gsal bar mi phyin la legs par gsor mi rung zhing /_skad cher subs pa de dag gso dka'o/_/tha ma'i tshil nad las gyur te skad subs pa 'di yang gso dka' ste thong shig_/yi ga 'chus pa'i nad
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]thabs sna lnga bshad pa/_rlung nad dam mkhris pa'i nad dam/_bad kan gyi nad/_nad dmigs tha dad pa gang yang rung ste/_lce'am pho ba la gnas na yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ro/_/de yang ji lta zhe na/_rlung las gyur na kha'i nang ro kha'o/_/bad kan las gyur na kha'i nang ro
[\[111b.2\]]mngar bar bro ste yi ga 'chu'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char las gyur na kha'i nang ro bro ba med do/_/mya ngan gyis btab ste/_snying mi dga' zhing yi ga 'chus na rlung nad las gyur pa yin no/_/khro ste rngam pa las yi ga 'chus na/_mkhris pa'i nad du gyur
[\[111b.3\]]pa yin no/_/de lta bas na yi ga 'chus pa'i nad dmigs rnam pa lnga ni de lta bu yin no/_/slon pa'i nad thabs sna lnga bshad pa/_skyug bro zhing slon par gyur pa'i nad thabs ni rlung ngam mkhris pa'am bad kan gyi nad tha dad pa las slon par 'gyur ba dang /_rlung dang bad kan mkhris
[\[111b.4\]]pa'i nad gsum char 'dus pa las slon par 'gyur ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong zhing skyug bro bar gyur pa'i dngos po mthong ba las slon par 'gyur ba dang de lnga'o/_/nad thabs 'di lta bu gang yang rung bas btab pa dang /_stod du rgyu ba'i rlung brang dang /_nam tshong na 'dug pa des gyen du
[\[111b.5\]]slong zhing phul te thams cad slon par byed do/_/slon pa'i thabs ni khar mchil ma bstud pa 'byung la/_dang ga mchu kha'i nang lan tshwa'i ro bro la yi ga rab tu 'chu zhing slon par byed de/_'di ni slon to cog spyi'i nad thabs yin no/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad thabs ni lte ba dang
[\[111b.6\]]rgyab tu zug ste na/_rtsib logs su 'ang zug ste/_chung zad skyug cing bar chad la/_skyugs pa'i ro bska zhing dbu ba can du 'byung ste/_sgregs pa dang bcas par 'ong /_skyugs pa mdog gnag pa dang /_khong nas slon pa'i tshe khong nas slong zhing /_phul ba'i shugs drag la/_
[\[111b.7\]]skyugs pa mang po mi 'byung ba ni lud pa lu/_kha skam/_snying dang glad pa na/_skad la gnod de 'gag_/khong snyom pa de lta bur gyur na rlung nad kyis slon pa'i thabs yin no/_/de la mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad thabs ni skyugs pa thal khu bzhin rtsa dmar la dud pa lta
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bu ljang gu sngo rtse ser/_skyugs pa'i nang na khrag kyang yod la/_ro skyur la skyugs pa tsha ste/_drod che/_skom dad che/_brgyal/_lus phyi nang du tsha ba'i nad thabs de lta bur slon to/_/de la bad kan las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad thabs ni slon pa'i skyugs pa'i mdog
[\[112a.2\]]snum zhing khar bsil/_bad kan du slon pa de nal nal byed de ring du drang du rung la/_skyugs pa'i nang na chu bur lta bu'i ril ril po yod/_slon pa'i ro mngar ba lan tshwa bro/_slon pa'i thabs ches te ba spu langs te/_sha dang spu brtse ste reg mi bzod/_kha gdong skrang /_
[\[112a.3\]]kha'i nang ro mngar bar bro/_blong blong por 'dug_/snying ga nas mchil ma mang du 'ong ba'i nad thabs 'di lta bu yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gsum char las gyur pa'i nad thabs ni nad sna gsum gyi nad thabs thams cad tshang bar na zhing slon to/_/de la yid du mi
[\[112a.4\]]'ong zhing skyug bro ba'i dngos po mthong na slon pa ni rul ba dang mi gtsang ba dang /_btsog pa dang /_skyug bro bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mthong ngam thos pas skyug bro ste slon par byed do/_/slon pa 'di lta bu'i nad thabs gang yang rung ste/_'chi bar 'gyur ba'i ltas sam/_mtshan ma
[\[112a.5\]]ngan pa byung na gsor mi rung ste/_dpyad ma byed cig_/snying na ba dang /_lto na srin bu yod pa'i nad thabs dang /_skom dad che ba'i nad thabs dang /_pho ba na be'u snabs yod pas mchin pa na ba la sogs pa'i nad thabs bshad pa'o/_/snying na ba'i nad thabs ni snying na ba yin
[\[112a.6\]]no/_/khong na srin bu yod na lhag par na ste/_snying na ba dang /_srin bu'i thabs kyi tshul nad thabs rnam pa lnga yod do/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i snying na ba'i nad thabs ni rab tu na la zug cing na ba de yang so sor 'phro bar byed/_brdungs sam bcom pa snyam byed/_
[\[112a.7\]]snying rengs pa snyam byed/_gsher bag med stong par gyur pa snyam byed/_glo bur du sems zhum par byed/_snying mi dga'/_'jigs/_sgra grag na mi bzod/_'phar zhing 'dar/_gzus pa snyam byed/_rmongs bag tu gyur te dbugs 'chad/_gnyid chung /_nad
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]thabs 'di lta bur gyur na rlung nad las gyur pa'i snying na ba yin no/_/mkhris pa'i nad las gyur te snying na ba'i nad thabs ni skom dad che/_mgo 'khor/_brgyal/_khong tsha/_lus rngul/_thang ga dang gre ba nas yar skyug_/lus snyom zhing sgyid skyur/_skyugs pa mkhris pa dang
[\[112b.2\]]ro skyur bar bro la dud khar 'ong /_sha mdog ser/_rims kyis kyang 'debs so/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i snying na ba'i nad thabs ni snying rengs pa snyam byed/_snying na rdo ba yod pa snyam byed/_khur thang gar blangs pa snyam byed de/_lud pa lu/_pho ba'i drod nyams/_kha nas
[\[112b.3\]]bad kan dang mchil ma mang du 'byung /_gnyid che/_khong snyom/_zas yi gar mi 'ong /_rims kyis 'debs pa'i nad thabs ni 'di lta bu yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad dang bad kan gyi nad gsum char 'dus pa las snying na ba'i nad thabs ni nad sna gsum gyi nad thabs kun
[\[112b.4\]]tshang bar na bar 'gyur ro/_/srin bu yod pa'i nad thabs ni mig spyir cung zad gnag_/mun par zhugs pa snyam du mi dran/_snying na/_lus skam/_lus g.ya'/_kha nas chu 'dzag_/mchin ngogs thog thag tu sog les drud pa snyam du tsha bar byed na srin bu yod pa yin te/_
[\[112b.5\]]srin bu'i nad thabs drag pa 'di lta bu ni myur du gnod par 'gyur ba yin no/_/dpyad myur du gyis shig_/de la skom dad lhag par che bar gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan so so la skom dad che bar gyur pa dang /_gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_rims nad
[\[112b.6\]]gyis btab pa las skom dad che bar gyur pa dang /_nad thabs drug yod do/_/skom dad skyes so cog ni rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis rgyas pa'i gzhis srog zungs bdun 'phrod snyoms shing 'dug pa las dkrugs te nad bslangs nas/_dang po bskams par byas nas lus thams cad
[\[112b.7\]]'dar/_mgo 'khor/_lus tsha/_skom dad che/_khong tsha/_rmongs par byed/_lce'i drung dang /_mgul pa dang /_glo dang /_bad kan dang skom 'thungs pa rtsar 'gro ba rnams bskams pa 'di lta bu'i nad gzhi las skom dad che ba'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nad sna drug las skom
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]dad cher skyes pa'i nad thabs kyi spyi ni/_kha bskams te skom 'thungs kyang mi ngoms la kha zas mthong na khro/_skad 'gag_/gre ba dang mchu dang lce rnams rtsub por gyur la lce 'byin par byed khong snyom/_tshig mang du smra/_sems myos pa yin te/_skem
[\[113a.2\]]gyis gdungs pa'i nad dam/_skom 'gags pa'i nad du gyur pa sngar bshad pa'i dmigs de dang 'dra bar nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i skom dad che ba'i nad thabs ni khong rmya/_nyams dman/_mur 'gram du zug_/klad pa 'khor/_snas dri ci bro ba mi tshor/_lces kyang ro ci
[\[113a.3\]]bro mi tshor/_rna bas kyang sgra mi thos/_gnyid med/_nyams 'tshag_/zas chu grang mo 'thungs na nad la phan par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa las skom dad du gyur na brgyal/_kha'i nang rul ro kha ba bro/_mig lam du dmar ba mthong /_rtag par kha skam/_khong tsha/_dbugs mnam
[\[113a.4\]]mo/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skom dad skyes pa'i thabs ni dang po bad kan gyis nang du 'gags shing chod pas rlung 'gags te 'khrugs pas skom 'thungs pa rtsar 'gro ba'i rtsa sgo de rlung des 'gags nas bad kan 'jim rdzab 'dra ba de yang rlung gis bskams pa dang /_mgul
[\[113a.5\]]pa'i nang gra mas gang ba bzhin du tsha la rtsub/_gnyid che/_kha'i nang ro mngar ba bro/_lto lbo/_mgo bo yo yo po la nyams mthong bag tu 'gyur/_slon kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_lus snyom/_zas mi 'ju'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum ka'i nad las
[\[113a.6\]]gyur te/_skom dad skyes pa'i na ba'i nad thabs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad dmigs so sor bshad pa'i nad thabs thams cad kun tshang bar na ba yin no/_/pho ba na be'u snabs yod pa las skom dad skyes pa dang /_mgul par kha zas thogs te mid du mi rung ba
[\[113a.7\]]yang skom pa'i lan yin te/_'di yang rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad las gyur pa yin no/_/pho ba'i me drod ha cang che ba la/_skom ha cang drags sam mangs na yang skom dad kyi nad du gyur te/_zas snum bag zos pa dang /_zas lci ba dang /_skyur bag dang /_lan tshwa che ba bag zos pa
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]'di lta bus kyang bad kan skyes pa'i skom dad kyi nad du 'gyur ro/_/bcud dang zas zad pa las skom dad du gyur na ni glo gcong zad byed kyi nad thabs bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/rims nad las skom dad skyes pa'i nad du 'gyur ba ni lus kyi khong bskams par gyur pa lta bu dang /_
[\[113b.2\]]za gur gyur pa lta bu dang /_rims la sogs pa nad yun ring por btab pa'i nad de lta bu gang yang rung /_na ba las skom dad skyes pa'i nad du gyur pa de ni rims nad kyi rang bzhin gyi nad thabs dang 'dra bar bshad do/_/nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u lnga pa rdzogs
[\[113b.3\]]so//_//chang gi nyes dmigs dang /_nad thabs la sogs pa bshad pa'i le'u drug pa bstan par bya'o/_/chang gi rang bzhin dang ro'i bye brag ni spyir rnam pa bcu ste gang zhe na/_rna ba drod che ba rtsub pa drag pa skyur ba bud med dang phrad par 'dod pa lus la myur du
[\[113b.4\]]khyab par byed/_lus yang 'bar te mdangs can du 'gyur/_'phral du gsal bar byed do/_/mi'i khong na mdangs zhes bya ba yod pa de ni bye brag bcu'i tshul du gnas te/_chang gi tshul 'di bcu las bzlog par blta'o/_/dug kyang rno ba la sogs pa rnam pa 'di bcu'i tshul du
[\[113b.5\]]gnas mod kyi de ni ha cang drags ches pas sems ma rungs par byed/_'chi bar byed do/_/chang gi mthu'i yon tan ni/_rno ba dang /_drod che ba la sogs pa yin no/_/mi'i khong na mdangs yod pa'i yon tan ni rngul ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rnam pa bcur blta'o/_/
[\[113b.6\]]de la chang gi yon tan de'i rnam pa bcus ni mi'i khong na mdangs yod pa'i yon tan rnam pa bcu gnas par byas nas sems bsgyur te/_khrid pa de ni ra ro ba zhes bya'o/_/de la dang po chang 'thungs pas/_thog ma bzi ba ni snying dga' ste/_gtam dang bzhad gad byed par 'gyur
[\[113b.7\]]ba yin no/_/de bas mang du 'thungs te ra ro ba ni rigs pa dang /_mi rigs pa cal col 'dren par byed pa dang /_bag med par gnas la rnam par rtog pa ngan pas bcos nas sems rmongs pa ste/_bde ba yin no snyam du bsams nas 'khrul bar byed do/_/de ltar chang gis
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]'bring tsam du ra ro ba dang /_gtu lum nyid du khom par ma gyur pa'i bar gyi tshe ni rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/de la rdul gyi rang bzhin ni tshig cal col mang du smra ba yin no/_/khro/_nga rgyal che/_ser sna byed pa de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[114a.2\]]la mun pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa'i sems med/_gnyid bro/_snyom/_snying la brtsams pa med par sems pa ste/_de lta bu ni glang po che smyon pa'am sbrul po che btags pa las shor ba dang 'dra ste/_ci la yang mi byed pa yin no/_/de lta bu'i tshe
[\[114a.3\]]ni ngang tshul ngan pa'i rang bzhin kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi gnas su gyur pas/_chang gcig pu las rang 'gro'i lam du mang po ston par byed do/_/gsum po'i tshe rabs su ra ro ba ni shi ba bzhin tshor ba med par nyal te 'dug go/_/de ni shi ba bas kyang sdig pa'i rang bzhin du
[\[114a.4\]]'gyur ba yin te/_de'i tshe ni rab tu sdig pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bas na chang la zhugs shing myos pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_don dang don med pa dang /_phan pa dang gnod pa'i dmigs mi shes par byed pa yin na de la lta
[\[114a.5\]]mdzangs pa su zhig bsten par byed/_chang gis ni myos par byed/_'jigs pa dang mya ngan du 'gyur/_khros pa dang srog gi bdud du 'gyur ba de lta bu yin/_smyo byed kyi nad dang /_brjed byed kyi nad dang /_myos pa dang brgyal bar gyur pa dang nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[114a.6\]]de lta bas na chang gcig pus dran pa nyams par byas pa de lta bu las nyes pa thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur na chang gi nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga po lta bshad kyang mi dgos te/_de lta bas na chang lta smos kyang mi dgos kyi/_kha zas mi rigs pa zhig zos na yang nad du 'gyur ba'am 'chi bar
[\[114a.7\]]'gyur ba yin no/_/yang chang gi nyes dmigs ni mis bsgrub pa'i mdo nor dang /_longs spyod dang thar pa'i lam don du gnyer bar bya ba dang /_'di gsum dang bro dang bstan par bya ba dang /_khrel dang ngo tsha shes par bya ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu yang med par byed do/_/de la chang la sra
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ste/_chang 'thungs kyang ha cang ra ro bar mi 'gyur ba ni nyams 'tshag yod de tshor ba dang /_sngar kha zas zos pa dang /_kha zas cher za phod pa dang /_rtag tu kha zas snum bag za ba dang /_snying stobs che ba'i mi dang /_na tshod dar la bab ste gzhon pa dang /_rtag tu chang mi 'chad
[\[114b.2\]]par 'thung ba lta bu dang /_pha ma'i rgyud kyis rtag tu chang 'thung 'thung bar gyur pa dang /_lus tshil dang bad kan gyi shas che la/_rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas ni chung /_pho ba'i me drod ni che zhing brtan par yang yod pa de lta bu ni chang la sra ste 'thungs na yang ra ro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la
[\[114b.3\]]chang la snyi ste ra ro zhing myos par 'gyur ba'i mi ni chang la sra ba'i dmigs sna re re nas bshad pa de las bzlog na/_chang la snyi zhing ra ro bar 'gyur/_chang la brkam zhing drag tu 'thungs pa dang /_spro thung zhing khro ba lta bu ni chang la snyi zhing myur du ra ro bar 'gyur ro/_/de la chang
[\[114b.4\]]gi nang na myur du ra ro bar 'gyur ba ni chang sar pa skyur zhing skyur ba lta bu mang du 'thungs na myur du ra ro bar byed/_de la chang nad kyi thabs kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/_rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang bad kan gyi nad dang /_'dus pa'i nad rnam pa bzhi las 'byung ngo /_/yang na chang las
[\[114b.5\]]nad du gyur na yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad kun tshogs par 'byung mod kyi/_ming ni rlung nad las gyur pa zhe 'am mkhris pa'i nad las gyur pa zhes so sor 'dogs so/_/de la chang nad do cog spyi'i nad thabs ni rab tu rmongs par 'gyur/_snying mi dga'/_tshad
[\[114b.6\]]pas 'khru/_rtag tu skom/_grang ba'i rims sam tsha ba'i rims kyis 'debs/_klad pa na/_rtsib logs kyi rus pa zug cing na/_lus dang rkang lag 'dar/_lus kyi srog gi gnad kun bcad dam brdungs pa snyam byed/_rked pa na/_brla na/_mig rab rib khyer/_
[\[114b.7\]]lud pas bkar/_dbugs mi bde/_mtshan mo gnyid med/_lus rngul bshang ba thur du 'byung ba 'dra bar 'ong /_lus skrang /_sems rmongs bag tu byed de/_'di man chad nad do cog spyi'i nad thabs yin no/_/de la chang las rlung nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_nad
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]thabs gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra la de las lhag par gnyid mi 'ong ngo /_/dbugs mi bde/_glad pa'i spyi bo logs su na/_rmi lam na phan tshun du 'gro/_gnam la 'phur/_gshin dogs lta bu dang lhan cig gtam zer ba de lta bu yin no/_/
[\[115a.2\]]chang las mkhris pa'i nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni tsha ba'i rims kyis 'debs/_lus rdul/_rmongs bag tu 'dug_/tshad pas 'khru/_skom dad che/_mgo bo 'khor/_mig rtsa dmar zhing rtsa ser/_mkhur tshos dmar por 'gyur ro/_/chang las bad kan gyi nad
[\[115a.3\]]du gyur ba'i nad thabs ni slon/_snying na zhing mi dga'/_gnyid che/_lus dang rkang lag 'dar/_khong lci'o/_/chang las 'dus pa'i nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni nad sna gsum gyi nad kun tshogs par na bar 'gyur ro/_/chang rtag tu 'thung 'thung ste goms par gyur pa lta bu
[\[115a.4\]]las chang cig car bcad de phyin chad mi 'thung ba de yang nad rnam gnyis su 'gyur te/_'joms byed ces bya ba'i nad dang /_lus bskam pa'i nad dang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/ci ste zhe na/_chang bcad pas rlung nad drag tu g.yo ba dang nyams 'tshag lhag par drag tu 'bri bar
[\[115a.5\]]gyur pa las mchil ma dang /_bad kan phyir 'dor bas mgul skam/_gnyid rab tu che ste/_sgra rnams grag pa mi bzod pa dang blong bag tu gyur pa de ni 'joms byed kyi nad ces bya'o/_/de la bskam par 'gyur ba'i nad thabs ni dpung pa dang klad pa na/_snying dang
[\[115a.6\]]mgul pa na/_mong mong por 'gyur/_lud pas bkar/_skom dad che/_skyugs pa mi 'byung bzhin du skam/_skyigs bus phul zhing skyug_/rims kyis 'debs pa de lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/su yang rung /_bag chang bcad de thub pa de ni nyes dmigs kun thub
[\[115a.7\]]pa'i rang bzhin can yin/_blo dang sems sngon gyi sar chud de/_dran zhing gsal ba yin no/_/lus dang sems kyi spyod pa 'khrul pa nam yang mi 'byung ba yin no/_/yang chang 'thungs te ra ro ba rdul gyi skyon las nad du gyur pa dang mun pa'i skyon las nad du gyur pa dang /_
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]kha zas mi 'phrod cing gnod par zos pas bcud dngas ma rgyu ba'i rtsa dang khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa rnams dang /_sems 'jug pa'i rtsa rnams 'gags pa las nad rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/_gang zhe na myos pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_kun tu song ba dang /_nad 'di rnam pa gsum lta bur gyur te nad dkyel yang go
[\[115b.2\]]rims bzhin che'o/_/de yang myos par 'gyur ba'i nad gzhi ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad las myos par 'gyur ba dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum 'dus pas myos par 'gyur ba dang /_khrag nad las myos par 'gyur ba dang /_chang las myos
[\[115b.3\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_dug gis kyang myos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung nad kyis myos par 'gyur ba'i nad thabs kyi tshul ni mang du smra ba la chags/_mang du smra/_tshig brkam par smra/_lus kyi byed pa rnams 'khrul zhing g.yo ba'i bag yod/_lus
[\[115b.4\]]rtsub la mdog gnag_/rtsa dmar/_'di lta bu ni rlung nad kyis myos pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/de la mkhris pa'i nad kyis myos pa'i thabs ni khro bzhin mdog dmar la ser bar snang /_tshig cung zad tsam gyi phyir yang 'thab par dga' ba de lta bu yin no/_/bad kan gyis myos pa'i
[\[115b.5\]]nad thabs ni bzhin mdog rtsa dkar ci yang mi smra mi byed par 'dug cing le lo che bar gyur pa de lta bu yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char 'dus pa las myos pa'i nad kyi thabs ni rlung la sogs pa rnam pa gsum ka'i myos pa dang 'dra'o/_/khrag nad kyis myos pa'i
[\[115b.6\]]thabs ni lus kyi yan lag rengs te brkyang bskum mi nus/_mig kyang phye btsums mi nus te har bag tu 'dug la mkhris pa'i nad kyis myos pa'i tshul dang yang 'dra bar blta'o/_/chang gis ra ro ste myos pa'i nad thabs ni skad kyi gdangs dang /_tshig dang lus 'gyur tshig gi
[\[115b.7\]]smra ba dang lus kyi byed pa rnams 'khrul bar byed do/_/dug gis myos pa'i nad thabs ni lus 'dar/_gnyid rab tu che/_gong ma'i nad thabs kun las lhag par nad che ba de lta bu yin no/_/de la rlung la sogs pa rnam pa bdun gyis myos pa'i nad kyis 'debs par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]de la rlung la sogs pa rnam pa de bdun gyis snying stor zab brgyal bar 'gyur ba'i nad thabs kyi dmigs ni rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa lta bu so so'i nad thabs kyi rtags gang cha ba las/_so so'i nad dmigs yin par shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du
[\[116a.2\]]khrag rgyas pa dang /_chang nad dang dug gis phog ste brgyal ba yang de bzhin shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung nad kyis brgyal bar gyur pa'i nad thabs ni nam mkha' la mig lam du sngon dmar ram nag po mthong la/_de nas mun thibs zhes byed de brgyal/_de nas myur du sangs par 'gyur
[\[116a.3\]]ba'i 'og tu snying 'dar/_klad pa 'khor/_lus sha skem/_bzhin mdog gnag la rtsa dmar te spyir smug pa 'di lta bur gyur na rlung gi rang bzhin las gyur pa'i brgyal ba'i nad thabs zhes bya'o/_/de la mkhris pa'i nad las brgyal bar gyur pa'i nad thabs ni gyen du nam mkha'
[\[116a.4\]]la mig lam du dmar po'am/_ser por mthong nas mun thibs zhes byed de brgyal lo/_/de nas sangs nas kyang /_lus rngul/_khong tsha/_skam/_phyi rol gyi sha thang tsha bas gdungs/_tshad pa'i mdog ser po'am sngon por 'khru/_mig lam du dmar po dang ser po long
[\[116a.5\]]long por snang ba'i nad thabs 'di ni mkhris pa las brgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/de la bad kan gyi nad kyis brgyal bar 'gyur ba'i nad thabs ni/_mig lam na sprin 'dra bar dkar po'i bag mthong nas/_mun thibs zhes byed de brgyal nas yun ring du lon pa dang /_gdod sangs
[\[116a.6\]]te sangs nas kyang /_snying na/_kha nas mchil ma dang /_kha chu mang du 'byung /_kha mig thom bag tu 'gyur la lus dang rkang lag pags rlon gyis dkris pa bzhin du lci ba lta bu ni bad kan gyis brgyal ba'i nad thabs yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char
[\[116a.7\]]gyis brgyal ba'i nad thabs ni brjed byed kyi gdon nad kyis btab pa'i nad thabs dang 'dra ba'i lus myur du sa la 'gyel te/_brgyal zhing mi dran te de'i tshe sngar mi sdug cing 'jigs pa'i tshul du byed pa'am/_ngan skyugs la sogs pa 'byung ba ni med de/_nad thabs gzhan ni
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyis brgyal ba'i thabs dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar snying stor brgyal nad rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan la sogs pas myos pa dang brgyal bar 'gyur te/_nad tshabs che yang sman dpyad bya mi dgos par nad rang dub cing zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[116b.2\]]nad kyis btab pa ni sman dpyad ma byas par rang dub cing 'tshor mi rung ngo /_/de la nad ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las byed pa dang 'di bzhin la/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad dkyel cher zhen te nad kyi mthu cher gyur pa dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad
[\[116b.3\]]rnams 'dus nas srog la bab ste der gnas shing brten par gyur pa dang /_nad des mi de shi ba dang 'dra bar byas te shi ba bzhin du 'dug pa de ni 'dus nad kun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ste/_nad 'di ni 'dus pa'i rims nad kyis btab pa'i rjes la 'byung ba zhes bya ste/_nad
[\[116b.4\]]'di la myur du rings par dpyad ma byas na/_dper na mtsho gting zab mo'i nang na chu srin 'dug pa de lta bu'i drung /_gad ka'i g.yang sa na lhung la thug pa dang 'dra bar 'dus nad kun tu zhugs pas btab pa yang de dang 'dra ba ste/_de lta bu'i nad pa la dpyad myur du gyis te gsos shig_/
[\[116b.5\]]chang nad dang rlung nad dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad kyis myos pa dang /_snying stor brgyal nad dang /_'dus nad kyis shi ba dang 'dra bar na ba'i thabs bshad pa ste le'u drug pa rdzogs so//_//gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa bshad
[\[116b.6\]]par bya'o/_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad du gyur ro cog gi gzhi ni zas gnod pas rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad las langs te sha dang pags pa dang /_tshil la zhugs pa dang gnod pa byas nas/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad sna tshogs su 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum
[\[116b.7\]]gyi nad ni kha zas mi 'phrod pa las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gzhang 'brum gyi nad de yang mdo rnam pa gnyis te/_dang po btsas pa nas nad dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang /_phyis gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'byung ba yin no/_/de la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_gzhang 'brum dkar po dang /_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gzhang 'brum khrag tu zag pa'o/_/gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom po la brten cing 'dug go/_/de la gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'byung ba ni gzhan khar sor phyed dang lnga man chad kyi nang na gnyer ma rim pa gsum yod pa gnyer ma re re la sor phyed dang gnyis gnyis te/_
[\[117a.2\]]de ltar gnyer ma'i rim pa gsum po de la sor phyed dang lnga yod par 'gyur ro/_/de la phugs kyi gnyer ma'i ming ni phyir phul ba zhes bya/_bar gyi gnyer ma'i ming ni phyir sel ba zhes bya/_gzhang kha'i gnyer ma ni 'dzums pa zhes bya ba gzhang kha'i phyi rol sor gcig tshun chad
[\[117a.3\]]kyi nang du 'brum bu 'byung ba la yang gzhang 'brum yin no/_/gzhang khor yug sor gcig po ma gtogs pa/_nas kyi srid phyed dang gnyis kyi khyon khor khor yug ma gtogs pa phan chad ni spu skye ste/_spu byung byung ba de phan chad du byung ba ni mtshan bar rdol gyi nad ces
[\[117a.4\]]bya'o/_/de la dang po btsas pa nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang lhan cig 'byung zhes bya ba ni/_thog mar pha dang ma kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa las sa bon nad can du gyur pa de lta bus bu byung na gzhang 'brum gyi nad du 'gyur ba yang yod/_la la ni sngon gyi sdig pa'i las
[\[117a.5\]]las nad du 'gyur ba yang yod/_nad dmigs 'di lta bu rnam gnyis las nad bslangs te nad gzhi 'di gnyis 'dus pa'i gzhang 'brum du gyur pa dang /_nad dmigs gzhan las gzhang 'brum gyi nad du gyur kyang rung ste mdor na pha ma'i rigs las gyur pa'i nad thams cad
[\[117a.6\]]dang /_dang po btsas pa nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad can du gyur pa 'di ni lhag par gso dka'o/_/yang gzhang 'brum rtsub por 'dug pa dang /_gzhang 'brum phugs su byung ste/_blta dka' ba 'di yang gso dka'o/_/yang gzhang 'brum mdog dkar por byung ba
[\[117a.7\]]dang /_gzhang 'brum byung ba las nad thams cad du gyur te/_nad gzhan yang gzhang 'brum gyi nad rnam pa drug yod de/_gang zhe na/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum gyi gzhang 'brum so sor 'byung ba dang /_rlung dang bad kan gyi nad sna gnyis las
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]gzhang 'brum du gyur pa ni kun 'dus pa las gyur pa yang smos so/_/dri ma bstsags pa las gzhang 'brum du 'gyur ba dang /_khrag nad las gzhang 'brum du 'gyur ba de dang drug go/_/de la rlung dang bad kan las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa ni gzhang 'brum dkar po'i khrag
[\[117b.2\]]dang /_mkhris pa gnyis las gzhang 'brum du 'gyur ba ni gzhang 'brum rlon pa zhes bya ste/_khrag tshad du 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi sngar bshad pa 'di lta bus nad bslangs nas khong pa nang gi pho ba'i drod bri ste nyams pa dang de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad dkyel du sogs
[\[117b.3\]]shing 'dug pa la de'i steng du bud med la ha cang drags pa lta bu dang /_bzhon pa mi bde bas khong 'khrugs pa dang /_stan mtho dman can mi bde ba dang /_stan srab la rkub rten tsog pur bcas pa dang /_lgang pa'i gce'u nas sman mas gtong ba dang /_bshang ba'i 'og tu rdo ba'am
[\[117b.4\]]phag dum mam/_bong pa'am lag pa'i thal mo 'am ra da 'am 'di lta bus phyis drags te gzhang kha snad pa dang /_chu rab tu grang bas rkub bkrus te/_grang ba khong du zhen pa dang /_rtug skam kha sra ba ha cang btsir drags te gzhang snad pa dang /_thur du dbugs byung ba dang /_gcin
[\[117b.5\]]snyom pa dang /_bshang ba 'ong ba la brnag cing ma btsal ba dang /_'di rnams mi 'ong bzhin nan gyis btsir ba dang /_rims kyis btab pa dang /_skrang nad tshad pas rab tu 'khrus pa dang /_pho bar be'u snabs chags pa dang /_'or nad dang skya rbab kyi nad dang /_rid de skem par
[\[117b.6\]]gyur pa dang lus la gnod par 'gyur ba'i dpyad dam/_lus kyi las su 'gyur ba'i gnod par 'gyur ba'i bag byas pa dang 'di rnams lta bu las gzhang 'brum gyi nad du 'gyur ro/_/yang bud med la gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dmigs ni byis pa zla grangs ma tshang bar rum nas
[\[117b.7\]]'phyil te byung ba lta bu dang /_zla grangs tshang ste bu che bar gyur pa'i bu nad kyis gzir ba'am/_'byung ba'i dus las yol bar gyur pas gzir te nad du gyur pa lta bu 'am/_gzhang gi nang na thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung zhig yod pa des rlung ngam/_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]gyi nad bslangs nas gzhang gi nang na gnyer ma gsum yod pa'i phrag tu zhen tam/_yang na rlung des thur du bshang ba'i dri ma gnyer ma'i phrag tu song bar byas pa de las gzhang 'brum du gyur te khrag tshad du 'ong ngo /_/de la gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'ong bar gyur na/_
[\[118a.2\]]sngar na ba'i nad thabs ni/_pho ba'i drod nyams te bri/_dri ma thur du byung ba sri ste skam bag tu 'ong /_brla na/_byin pa'i nywa na/_mgo 'khor/_lag ngar na/_mig skrang /_yang na ni thur du tshad pas 'khru/_yang na ni sri ste 'ong du mi rung ngo /_/lte ba'i 'og na rlung che ste/_khong
[\[118a.3\]]na khru lu lu zer/_rlung de dag kyang phal cher lte ba'i 'og man chad du rgyu zhing zug ste na la/_rgyu ma dang gzhang gi nang na bcad pa snyam byed/_rlung thur du 'byung /_gsal por 'byung ba yang sgra can du 'byung /_rgyu ma'i nang na sgra khru lu lu zer la lto sbo/_khong rmya zhing sgregs
[\[118a.4\]]pa sgra can du cher 'ong /_gcin ni rab tu mang /_bshang ba'i dri ma ni babs chung ngu 'ong /_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_skyugs pa dud ka la ro skyur par 'ong /_klad pa dang brang rgyab tu zug cing na/_khong snyom/_bzhin mdog mi sdug par 'gyur/_nyams glo bag tu 'gyur/_
[\[118a.5\]]dbang po rnams nyams shing mi gsal/_khro bar 'gyur/_phan pa'i dpyad bstan cing bsgo na bka' blo mi bde ste/_nad thabs 'di lta bur gyur pa la sman pa the tshom zos te mchi na/_tshad rnying ldang dub tu 'khru ba'i nad dam/_'or nad dam/_skya rbab kyi nad dam/_skran nam/_
[\[118a.6\]]dmu rdzing lta bu'i nad dmigs lta bu gang yin mi shes na/_nad thabs rnam pa de snyed du na ba de nyin gcig nad ldang zhing tshabs che bar gyur na gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thabs 'di lta bus btab pa'i rjes la gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gzhang
[\[118a.7\]]gi nang na thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung zhig yod pa de phyir log ste gyen du 'khyil nas dri ma bshang ba 'gags te 'byung du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/bshang ba 'gags pas khong pa'i nang na rlung gzhan yod pas dbang po rnams dang lus kyi nang thams cad dkrugs te nad bslangs/_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]de bzhin du bshang gci dang mkhris pa dang bad kan khong na yod pa dang /_lus kyi srog zungs bdun dang /_'di rnams kyang dkrugs te bslangs na pho ba'i me drod kyang nyams te chung du gyur nas/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de de ltar gzhang 'brum gyi nad
[\[118b.2\]]'byung ste/_lus rab tu skem/_ci byed kyang mi nus te bskyod pa'am bya ba'i bsam pa med/_nyam chung /_khong rmya/_bzhin mdangs med par 'gyur/_lus zhig cing khong lhod bzhin gyi mdog nyams so/_/shing gi sdong po la srin bu zhugs te ma rungs pa bzhin du nad kyi sna grangs
[\[118b.3\]]gong du bshad pa de snyed kyis lus kyi srog gi nad la gnad du babs pas lus la gnod par gyur te/_nad gzhan yang de'i steng du byung ba ni/_lud pas bkar/_skom dad che/_kha zas ro bro bar mi tshor/_dbugs mi bde/_cham pas 'debs/_sgyid skyur/_lus dang rkang lag
[\[118b.4\]]chag grugs su gyur pa bzhin na/_slon/_sbrid pa 'byung /_lus skrang /_rims kyis 'debs/_khu chu dang khrag zad/_rna ba 'on/_mig rab rib khyer/_khu ba bsdus te rde'ur chags pa dang /_dri ma snyigs pa las rde'ur chags te chu sri/_lus zhig ste khong rmya la skad 'gags
[\[118b.5\]]yang dang yang sems khong du chud cing mchil ma 'dor/_yi ga 'chus/_rus pa'i tshigs rnams dang snying dang /_lte ba dang /_gzhang gi nang dang chu so g.yas g.yon du zug cing na/_tshad pa thur du sla mo 'byar bag sran khu lta bur 'khru ste/_de yang res 'ga' ni sri/_res
[\[118b.6\]]'ga' ni mi sri bar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni rtug skam/_res 'ga' sla mor 'khru/_res 'ga' ni ma zhu ba rtsam par 'khru/_res 'ga' ni zhu bar 'khru/_tshad pa'i spu mdog kyang skya bo ser po sngon po dang /_khrag bag spyi zhing 'khyil ba'i bag tu 'khru'o/_/'di lta bu ni gzhang
[\[118b.7\]]'brum mo cog gi spyi'i nad thabs yin no/_/rlung nad kyi dkyel che ba las gzhang 'brum du gyur na/_gzhang 'brum skam la bag chung /_zug cing na ste/_tsha rab rab byed/_gzhang 'brum de rnyi rnyi po rtsa gnag cing dmar bag yod de spyir smug_/la la ni sra la rtsub/_che chung yod/_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]rtse mo phra la thor to rdol/_gzhang 'brum che chung yod la/_nang mi mthun/_me tog ka dam+pa dang /_ku ba'i me tog 'dra/_ke ri ka 'dra/_la la ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu 'dra/_la la ni tsha go 'dra/_la la ni shing tog 'bi 'bi 'dra/_la la ni ras
[\[119a.2\]]bal ka ra ba sa'i 'bras bu 'dra/_la la ni me tog ka dam+pa'i 'bras bu 'dra/_gzhang 'brum la la ni yungs kar 'dra ba 'dug ste/_gzhang 'brum tshul de lta bu byung na klad pa dang /_rtsib logs dang /_phrag pa dang /_rked pa dang /_brla dang /_chu so g.yas g.yon dang 'di
[\[119a.3\]]rnams su lhag par zug cing na/_sgregs pa dang sbrid pa mang /_thur du bshang ba'i dri ma sri/_snying na/_kha zas yi ga 'chu/_lud pas bkar/_dbugs mi bde/_pho ba'i drod mi snyoms/_rna ba sgra 'byung ste 'bod/_mgo 'khor/_de rnams kyis btab ste na ba dang /_
[\[119a.4\]]rtug skam du 'byung ba'i tshe mkhregs shing na na 'byung ba'i tshe sgra can du 'byung zhing na/_spyi bag dang skam bag tu 'dres pa thur du 'byung /_pags pa'i mdog dang sen mo dang mig dang kha gdong dang bshang gci 'di rnams kyi mdog nag por snang /_rlung nad kyis gzhang 'brum byung na
[\[119a.5\]]khong du skran 'byung /_mcher pa na/_dmu rdzing lta bu dang /_glo g.yas g.yon lta bur dbab pa lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ni rlung nad las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi nad thabs shes par bya'o/_/mkhris pa rgyas pa las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni gzhang 'brum
[\[119a.6\]]gyi mdog smug nag rtsa ser la thor to sngo/_thur du khrag sla mor 'byung ste rul cing mnam la gzhang 'brum nyid ni 'jam la khong lhod/_gzhang 'brum gyi dbyibs ne tsho'i mchu dang /_srin bu pad pa'i mchu 'dra la/_gzhang 'brum de tsha zhing rul bag tu 'dug_/lus la rims nad
[\[119a.7\]]'byung /_lus rngul/_skom/_brgyal/_lus tsha/_yi ga 'chus/_myo myo por 'gyur/_dri ma bshang ba thur du 'byung ba ni sri/_bag la dron po tsha bar 'ong ngo /_/spu mdog sngo zhing ser la khrag dang be'u snabs su 'dres pa dang /_nas rul pa'i nang 'dra bar 'ong /_pags pa
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dang sen mo dang bzhin mdog kyang ljang sngon rtsa ser bag tu snang ste/_'di lta bu ni mkhris pa las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa'i nad thabs yin no/_/de la bad kan rgyas pa las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni gzhang 'brum de drung sbom po sdug_/na ba chung /_myug myug por 'byung bar snang la/_
[\[119b.2\]]gzhang 'brum gyi sha che la 'jam/_reng reng por zlum la lci/_gzhang 'brum brten por 'dug_/gzhang 'brum de 'byil zhing 'byar bag yod sra la 'jam/_'brum bu de rtag tu g.ya'/_reg na dga'/_gzhang 'brum gyi dbyibs ni shing tog ka ri ra dang /_pa na sa'i 'bras bu'i
[\[119b.3\]]rus pa dang /_ba'i nu ma'i dbyibs 'dra/_chu so g.yas g.yon du zug cing spo'o/_/lte ba dang chu so dang gzhang gi nang na dri ma bshang ba yod pa 'di dag bcad pa snyam byed cing na/_lud pas bkar/_dbugs mi bde/_snying na/_kha nas bad kan dang mchil ma mang du
[\[119b.4\]]'dor/_yi ga 'chus/_cham pas 'debs/_mong mong por byed/_klad pa tshabs cher na/_tom bag tu 'dug_/grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur/_khu ba dang khrag zag_/pho ba'i drod nyams/_slon/_rtag tu kha zas ma zhu ba dang be'u snabs su 'khru/_bad
[\[119b.5\]]kan lta bu dang tshad pas 'debs te 'khru/_yang gzhang 'brum de ni mi rdol mi zag go/_/lus kyi pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mdog ni dkar la 'jam mo/_/bad kan las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni de lta bu yin no/_/de la nad sna gnyis 'dres pa'i
[\[119b.6\]]gzhang 'brum gyi nad dam/_rlung dang bad kan 'dres pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi nad dam/_mkhris pa dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad gang yang rung /_nad sna gnyis 'dres pa'i nad thabs de ni gzhang 'brum gyi nad thabs 'dres pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dus pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi
[\[119b.7\]]nad thabs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi gzhang 'brum gyi nad dkyel du stsogs stsogs pa las/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'byung ste nad sna gsum gyi nad thabs sna tshang bar na ba de ni 'dus pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi nad thabs zhes bya'o/_/de la khrag nad rgyas pa
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni gzhang gi nang du 'brum bu byung ba 'di dbyibs ni shing 'ba' ta'i lo ma kha 'bus pa 'dra/_mdog ni 'ol ma se'i 'bras bu dang /_byu ru'i mdog 'dra'o/_/gzhang 'brum de nad khrag gis brgyal la/_dro zhing tsha bar
[\[120a.2\]]'dug pa de mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum de dri ma thur du 'byung ba'i shugs kyis btsir ba dang /_'phral du khrag ngan pa [(]tshen [,]tshan [)]por 'byung zhing 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/nad dang khrag zad pas mdog dang nyams 'tshag kyang nyams te/_mdog nyams pa'i dpe ni sbal pa ser po
[\[120a.3\]]'dra la mdangs nyams/_dbang po rnams mi gsal bar gyur pa 'di ni khrag nad las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum zhes bya'o/_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad las gzhang gi nang nas gyen du slong zhing 'khyil ba zhes bya ba ni nad slong ba'i kha zas mon sran sde'u mung+ga ba dang /_ko dra ba dang /_
[\[120a.4\]]'dzur na dang /_ka ri ka dang /_mon sran tsa na la sogs pa kha zas rtsub mo dri ma thur du bshang ba mi 'byung zhing sri bar byed pa de lta bus/_rlung nyid kyis rang gi gnas su nad bslangs te dkyel du gyur nas dri ma bshang gci thur du rgyu ba'i sbu gu rnams rlung gis 'gags nas/_bshang
[\[120a.5\]]gci dang dbugs thur du 'byung ba rnams rlung gis bskams te/_'gags nas 'byung du mi rung ba dang /_rab tu na bar 'gyur te/_khong ba'i nang na rgyab dang snying dang rtsib logs dang 'di rnams su nad 'gro zhing zug la lto sbo/_rgyu ma'i nang bskor zhing gcus pa snyam byed/_snying
[\[120a.6\]]na/_snying dang chu so'i thad ka lgang pa gnyis gzhogs shing bcad pa snyam byed la rab tu na/_thor bu 'byung /_skrang par 'gyur/_rlung de ro stod yan chad kyi nang du song na/_de'i gzhis slon pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang rims nad du 'gyur/_snying na/_tshad rnying la sogs
[\[120a.7\]]pa'i 'khru ba'i nad dang chu sri ba dang tshad pa mkhregs shing 'khru ba dang /_rna bas mi thos pa dang /_mig rab rib khyer ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_lud pas bkar ba dang /_cham pas 'debs pa dang /_sems 'gyur ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_khrag
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]dang mkhris pa'i nad dang /_skran nad dang /_dmu rdzing la sogs pa'i rlung nad yang ba mi bzad pa rnam pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur te 'di ni gzhang 'brum ming ngan gyen du 'khyil ba zhes bya ste/_nad 'di ni rab tu gnod pa yin te/_khong pa'i nang du rlung nad kyi dkyel cher zhugs
[\[120b.2\]]la/_gzhang 'brum gyis ma btab par yang /_bshang gci'i nad gyen du 'khyil ba 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad de snyed kyi nang na gso dka' ba ni dang po btsas pa nas lhan cig tu byung ba'i gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang /_'dus pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi nad
[\[120b.3\]]dang gnyer ma phugs na yod pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi nad 'di rnams ni gso dka'o/_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad de lta bus btab kyang pho ba'i me drod che ste/_kha zas 'ju ba dang nyams 'tshag dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang /_rlung ngam mkhris pa lta bu gang yang rung ba sna gnyis
[\[120b.4\]]las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa dang /_gzhang gi gnyer ma gnyis man chad kyi nang na gzhang 'brum yod pa dang /_'di lta bu ni nad rtse zhil tsam du gsor rung ngo /_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad byung nas lo gcig lhag lon pa ni rab tu gso dka'o/_/gzhang gi nang na gnyer ma tha mar gzhang
[\[120b.5\]]'brum 'byung ba dang /_rlung ngam mkhris pa lta bu gang yang rung ba'i nad sna gcig las gzhang 'brum du gyur pa dang /_gzhang du gsar du byung ma thag pa dang /_pho mtshan las byung ba dang /_lte bar byung ba dang /_rna ba'am sna'i nang du thor bu rta bla ba lta bu 'byung ba 'khyil zhing
[\[120b.6\]]'jam pa zhig 'byung ste/_de ni snying la gnas pa'i rlung khyab byed ces bya ba zhig yod pa des bad kan gyi nad byas te pags pa'i phyi rol du mdzer ba 'dra ba'i thor bu 'byung bar byed do/_/pags pa sra la rtsub pa byung ba ni mdzer pa zhes bya ste/_rlung nad kyis pags pa la zug cing rtsub/_
[\[120b.7\]]mkhris pa las gyur na gnag la rtsa dmar ro/_/bad kan las gyur na 'jam la mdzer pa de mdog mi sdug pa yang ma yin no/_/de ltar gzhang 'brum gyi nad la dpyad myur du ma byas na thur du bshang ba'i dri ma rnams gzhang khar myur du 'gags nas bshang bas myur du
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gang ste/_gso dka' bar 'gyur gyi myur du gsos shig_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad thabs sna tshogs bshad pa ste le'u bdun pa rdzogs so//_//tshad pas 'khru ba dang pho ba'i grang ba las tshad rnying du 'khru ba'i nad gzhi bstan pa'i le'u brgyad
[\[121a.2\]]pa bshad par bya'o/_/tshad pas 'khru ba'i nad gzhi ni drug ste/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum gyi nad 'dus pa las kyang tshad par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang mya ngan las kyang tshad par 'gyur te/_nad gzhi 'di dag gis tshad pas rab tu 'khru'o/_/tshad pa
[\[121a.3\]]la gnod pa ni chu rab tu 'thungs pa dang /_sha rid sha bskams pa dang /_kha zas ma lobs pa gnod pa zos pa dang /_til khur dang /_nas la sogs pa 'bru ma smin pa zos pa dang /_chang 'thung ba dang /_kha zas rtsub po dang /_kha zas tshod ma zin te drags pa dang /_gzhang
[\[121a.4\]]'brum gyi nad dang /_zas snum bag drags pa dang /_khong na srin bu yod pa dang /_bshang ba 'ong bar gyur na gnag pa dang /_de 'dra ba gnod par 'gyur ba bsten pas rlung nad langs te rlung nad des bad kan gyi nad langs te khong pa'i kha zas nang grol dang /_bshang ba kun
[\[121a.5\]]kyang des khyab nas me'i drod nyams te tshad pas thur du 'khru'o/_/tshad pas rab tu 'khru ba ni bshang ba sla bar byung ba ni tshad pa'o/_/tshad par gyur pa'i nad thabs ni snying dang khong pa'i nang dang /_gzhang gi nang du zug cing na/_lus zhig_/dri ma bshang ba thur du mi 'byung ste
[\[121a.6\]]sri/_lto sbo/_kha zas mi 'ju'o/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i tshad pa ni bshang ba chu sla mo dang 'dres pa nyung shas su 'byung ba'i tshe/_sgra dang bcas par 'byung la/_'khru ba'i tshe rgyu zhabs su zug cing na/_tshad pa babs cher mi 'ong /_nyung shas su sri zhing 'ong /_tshad
[\[121a.7\]]pa'i spu mdog ni rtsub po dbu ba can dang /_bar yang dang yang du 'khru ba dang /_yang na ril ril po dang 'dres pas yang dang yang du 'khru ste/_bu ram tshig pa 'dra bar snang ba dang /_spyi bo 'byar bag tu 'dres shing tshad pa 'byung /_tshad pa 'byung ba'i tshe gzhogs shing bcad pa
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]snyam byed/_kha skam/_gzhang gi nang nyams te phyir 'byung bar byed/_ba spu langs/_tshad pa mkhregs shing 'khru ba 'di ni rlung las gyur pa'i tshad pa yin no/_/de la mkhris pa las gyur pa'i tshad pa'i nad thabs dang /_spu mdog ni ser la gnag_/ser la ljang sngon du yang
