[\[121b.2\]]snang /_khrag dang 'dres pa dri rab tu mnam/_skom/_brgyal/_lus rngul/_khong tsha/_rgyu mar zug cing gzhang gi nang tsha/_gzhang gi nang na thor bu 'byung ba de ni mkhris pa'i nad las gyur pa'i tshad pa yin no/_/de la bad kan gyi nad las tshad par gyur pa'i tshad pa'i
[\[121b.3\]]spu mdog dang nad thabs ni tshad pa gar ba 'byar 'byar po 'byil bag dang /_nal nal por 'ong /_spu mdog skya la 'jam/_be'u snabs dang bad kan du 'khru yang dang yang 'ong /_tshad pa nyid lci/_mnam/_tshad pa phal cher mi 'ong /_zug pa'i nad tshabs mi che/_gnyid che/_
[\[121b.4\]]khong snyom/_kha zas mthong na yi ga 'chu/_tshad pa dang bshang bar 'dres pa nyung shas nyung shas su 'byung zhing cung zad tsam mkhregs/_ba spu rnams gyen du langs shing slon/_chu so dang /_lto ba dang /_gzhang dang 'di rnams lci/_tshad pas 'khru zhing bshang yang ma 'khrus pa snyam
[\[121b.5\]]byed pa 'di lta bu ni bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i tshad pa'i nad thabs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi tshad pa'i spu mdog dang nad thabs tshang bar na ba yin no/_/'jigs skrag pa las tshad par 'gyur ba ni 'jigs pas sems
[\[121b.6\]]'khrugs pa dang /_mkhris pa g.yos te/_khong na bshang ba yod pa sla bor byas nas rlung gis phyi rol tu 'khru bar byed do/_/de ni khong na bshang ba yod pas myur du tsha zhing sla ba nur nur por byas pas tshad par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_de ni rlung dang mkhris pa'i tshad pa'i tshul dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[121b.7\]]mya ngan las gyur pa'i tshad pa'i tshul de dang 'dra'o/_/mdor na tshad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_zas ma zhu ba can du 'khru ba dang /_ma zhu ba med par 'khru ba'am/_khrag med par 'khru ba'o/_/de la zas ma zhu ba can du 'khru ba ni tshad pa de chu'i nang du bor na 'bying /_rab tu mnam
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]mo/_/tshad pa 'di lta bur 'khru bar 'gyur na sngar lto sbo/_rtug skam du 'gyur/_zug cing na/_kha nas bad kan dang mchil ma mang du 'dor te/_'di ltar byed na zas ma zhu ba'i tshad pas 'khru ba yin no/_/kha zas ma zhu ba med pa'i tshad pas 'khru ba ni
[\[122a.2\]]nad thabs dang tshad pa'i tshul 'di rnams dang mi 'dra ste bzlog par shes par bya'o/_/yang bad kan las tshad par gyur na ni kha zas zhu bar gyur kyang tshad pa chu'i nang du 'bying bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad pa gsar pa gso ba'i dpyad myur du ma byas na pho ba grang ste zas ma zhu ba khong du
[\[122a.3\]]sogs shing 'khru ba'i tshad rnying gi nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la tshad pas rab tu 'khru zhes bya ba ni khong pa'i drod nyams par 'gyur ba'i kha zas bsil ba'i sha dag zos pas/_zas ma zhu zhing be'u snabs can du 'khru ba de ni nad rnying zhes bya'o/_/be'u snabs med kyang rung /_zhu
[\[122a.4\]]nas 'khru bar byed pa de ni tshad pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu ni rang bzhin gyis myur du ma rungs par byed pa'o/_/de yang kha zas ma zhu ste zas rjen pa dang /_be'u snabs su 'dres pa khong na stsogs stsogs shing /_'khru'am yang na zhun yang rlung gis 'gags te 'ong du mi rung /_
[\[122a.5\]]res 'ga' ni tshad pa sla mor yang dang yang 'khru ste tshad rnying 'di lta bu'i nad ni pho ba grang ste zas ma zhu ba khong na stsogs stsogs shing /_skams skams su 'khru ba 'di ni tshad rnying yun ring du na bar byed pa yin te/_de yang rnam pa bzhi las tshad rnying gi nad du 'gyur ro/_/bzhi
[\[122a.6\]]gang zhe na/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan sna re re las tshad rnying du 'gyur ba dang /_nad 'dus pa las tshad rnying du 'gyur ba dang bzhi'o/_/de la pho ba grang ba'i tshad rnying gi nad du gyur na de'i nad thabs sngar 'byung ba ni pho ba'i nad kyi drod nyams zas yun ring du mi 'ju/_kha zas zos
[\[122a.7\]]pas gre ba sgyur bar 'gyur/_kha nas bad kan dang mchil ma mang du 'dor/_khar ro ci bro ba mi tshor/_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_skom zhing khong snyom/_klad pa 'khor/_lto sbo/_slon bro/_rna ba'i nang sgra tsi ri ri zer/_rgyu ma'i nang na sgra khru lu lu zer/_sgregs pa mnam por 'byung /_
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]dbugs mi bde/_rims kyis 'debs/_brgyal/_klad pa na/_bshang ba thur du 'byung du mi rung ste sri/_rkang lag skrang pa'i thabs 'di lta bu sngar byung na pho ba grang zhing 'khru ba'i tshad rnying spyi'i nad thabs yin no/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i tshad rnying du 'khru ba'i nad thabs ni rkan skams/_
[\[122b.2\]]mig rab rib za/_rna ba gnyis nas sgra 'byung /_rtsib logs dang brla dang chu so g.yas g.yon dang /_mgul pa 'di rnams na/_yang dang yang khong sbo zhing gsud/_kha zas kyi ro bro ba kun la chags/_kha zas zhur nye na khong sbo/_zhu na bkres shing skom/_kha zas zos na
[\[122b.3\]]bde bar 'gyur/_rlung nad de las rnying nad dang /_skran dang gzhang 'brum dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /_skya rbab kyi nad 'di rnams 'byung ba'i tshul du 'gyur/_tshad pas 'khru ba'i tshe 'gags/_skom po yang sla ba zhig 'byung ste/_de yang myur du 'ong du mi rung zhing sri ste 'byung dka'/_
[\[122b.4\]]tshad par 'byung ba'i tshe na sgra can ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs su 'byung /_gzhang na/_dbugs mi bde zhing lud pas bkar/_nad thabs 'di rnams lta bur na zhing 'khru ba'i tshad rnying ni rlung nad la pho ba grang ba'i tshad rnying 'khru ba zhes bya ste/_'di rlung nad las gyur pa'i tshad rnying gi
[\[122b.5\]]nad thabs yin no/_/de la mkhris pa las gyur pa'i tshad rnying gi mdog dang nad thabs ni lus kyi sha mdog sngo la ser por 'dug_/tshad pa sla mo ser por 'khru/_sgregs pa mnam zhing skyur bar 'byung /_snying dang gre ba na zhing tsha/_yi ga 'chu/_skom pas gdungs pa
[\[122b.6\]]'di lta bu ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i tshad rnying gi rlung nad la pho ba grang ba'i tshad rnying gi nad thabs zhes bya'o/_/de la bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad rnying gi nad thabs ni bad kan che bas kha zas 'ju dka'/_slon/_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_kha'i nang na yang bad kan gyis
[\[122b.7\]]gang ste kha nas bad kan dang mchil ma mang du 'ong zhing 'dor/_lud pas bkar/_cham pas 'debs/_dong ga na/_lci ba mer mer por byed/_lto ba yang sra la lci/_sgregs pa mnam por 'byung /_khong pa'i pho ba drod nyams/_bud med la dga' bar byed/_tshad pa
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]be'u snabs lta bu dang /_bad kan dang 'dres par 'khru la/_bshang ba thur du 'byung ba lci/_rid cing skems pa ma yin yang /_nyams stobs chung ste zhan/_'di lta bu'i nad thabs ni bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad rnying zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dus pa las gyur
[\[123a.2\]]pa'i tshad rnying gi nad thabs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi tshad rnying gi nad thabs kun dang mthun pa yin no/_/pho ba'i nang gi me'i drod ma snyoms pa rnam pa gsum la sogs pa rtag tu bshad pa ltar gyur na pho ba grang ba las ma zhu ba'i tshad rnying gi nad du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[123a.3\]]pho ba'i nang gi me drod snyoms par gyur na/_bde zhing nad med par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yang de yin te/_tshad rnying gi nad du mi 'gyur ro/_/nad kyi nang na dkyel che ba gso dka' ba ni rnam pa brgyad yod de/_gang zhe na/_rlung nad dang /_chu so na rde'u yod pa dang /_mdze nad dang /_
[\[123a.4\]]za gu dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_pho ba grang nas tshad rnying du gyur pa'i nad thabs dang rnam pa 'di brgyad yin no/_/tshad pa dang pho ba grang ba'i tshad rnying du 'khru ba'i nad thabs bshad pa'i le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[123a.5\]]gcin 'gags pa dang gcin snyi ba za gu'i nad dmigs bstan pa'i le'u dgu pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la lgang pa dang lgang pa'i mgo dang /_pho mtshan dang rked pa dang /_pho mtshan gyi 'bras bu gnyis dang /_gzhang dang 'di rnams ni gzhang gi rus pa'i nang du bstan cing gcig
[\[123a.6\]]tu 'brel par bshad do/_/lgang pa de kha sbub tu thur du bltas kyang /_lgang pa de'i rtsa'i sbu gu'i kha g.yas g.yon nas/_gcin gyi rgyun phre'u rgyun mi 'chad par zag pas lgang pa'i nad du 'gag par byed do/_/gcin rtsa sgo nas rgyu ste lgang par zhugs shing stsogs pa de las gcin
[\[123a.7\]]nad chus bkag pa'i nad dang za gu'i nad spyir sna nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/gcin snod lgang pa de yang srog gi gnad la brten pas nad che ste/_de la rlung nad las gyur te chus 'gags na lgang pa dang chu so g.yas g.yon dang /_pho mtshan 'di rnams rab tu na ste gcin 'gags nas/_gcin cung
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]zad cig yang dang yang sri zhing 'byung ngo /_/mkhris pa'i nad las gyur te gcin 'gags na gcin gyi mdog ser ram dmar la tsha zhing na'o/_/bad kan las gyur te gcin 'gags pa ni lgang pa dang pho mtshan lci bar 'gyur la skrangs/_gcin gar la sbyin bag nal nal po
[\[123b.2\]]zhig dal gyis 'byung ste thogs shing sri ba'i tshul du 'ong ngo /_/'dus pa'i nad las kyang gyur te gcin 'gags na nad thabs gong ma sna gsum ltar snang na yang chu sri bar byed do/_/de la chu sor rde'u chags pa'i tshul dang nad thabs ni nam lgang ba'i kha rlung gis chod pa dang /_chu so
[\[123b.3\]]na gcin nam mkhris pa 'am/_bad kan nam khu chu gang yod pa de skams par byas nas de las rde'u chags te/_bags kyis rde'u nad dkyel du skyes pa ni dper na glang gi gi wang chags te cher skyes pa dang 'dra'o/_/chu sor rde'u chags par gyur na nad kyis 'debs pa'i nad thabs kyi
[\[123b.4\]]tshul ni lgang pa sbo/_lgang pa'i drung dang nyen kor kun na/_lgang pa dang gcin dbre la mnam/_gcin 'gags/_rims kyis 'debs/_kha zas yi ga 'chu/_lte ba dang /_pho mtshan gyi 'bras bu'i srubs thog thag dang /_lgang pa chu so'i klad 'di rnams su zug cing na/_
[\[123b.5\]]gcin sri zhing 'byung ba'i tshe gcin gyi sbu gu subs shing 'gags pas gcin 'byung ba'i tshe/_gcin gyi rgyun zhig ste thigs pa brul brul por 'byung /_gcin de lta bu phyin na gdod bde'o/_/gcin 'byung ba'i mdog ni ba lang gi tshil 'dra bar snang ngo /_/de lta bu la res 'ga'
[\[123b.6\]]lus 'gul zhing bskyod pa lta bu byas pas lgang pa dang chu so'i nang 'gags te snad na rab tu na zhing mi bde'o/_/nad 'di lta bu ni chu sor rde'u chags pa'i spyi'i nad thabs lngar 'byung ba yin no/_/de la rlung nad las rde'ur chags pa'i nad thabs ni/_nad tshabs rab tu che la so
[\[123b.7\]]'thams par bsdams/_lus 'dar/_pho mtshan nas zin te/_lag pas nyed/_lte bar zug cing na/_rab tu mkhun cing 'gags te 'od du mi rung ba'i tshe/_'phyen dang bshang bar bcas te 'byung /_gcin ni thigs par nyung shas nyung shas yang dang yang 'ong /_chu so'i
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]nang na rde'u yod pa ni gnag cing rtsub ste/_nyams la chu so'i nang na tsher ma bsags pa gang ba snyam byed/_mkhris pa las rde'ur chags pa'i nad thabs ni mkhris pa tsha ba drod kyis lgang pa de btsos pa bzhin du tsha/_rde'u'i dbyibs ni ga bo'i 'bras bu'i rus
[\[124a.2\]]pa 'dra/_mdog ni dmar zhing ser la rtsa gnag go/_/lgang pa'i nang du zug cing na'o/_/bad kan gyi nad la rde'ur chags na rde'u bsil zhing lci la bongs che 'jam/_rde'u'i mdog ni sbrang rtsi lta bu'am dkar por 'dug go/_/rde'u'i nad 'di rnams lta bu ni byis pa chung ngu
[\[124a.3\]]lta bu la phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lus dang sha chung bas rde'u yang mi che'o/_/rde'u nad 'di lta bu la dral zhing rde'u 'byin pa'i tshe bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mi chen po lta bu la chu sor rde'u chags pa'i nad ni khu ba las gyur te/_de yang khu ba gnas 'phags la phyir ma
[\[124a.4\]]byung ma btang ste/_pho mtshan gyi 'bras bu'i bar du rlung gis bskams te/_khu ba bsdus par gyur pa de ni khu ba las rde'ur chags pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i nad thabs ni lgang pa dang chu sor zug cing na/_gcin 'gags/_pho mtshan gyi 'bras bu skrang ngo /_/khu ba las rde'u chags
[\[124a.5\]]ma thag tu khu ba zhu ste/_sla mor 'gyur/_na zhing zug pa'i tshe rde'u chags pa der lag gis mnam shing mnyes na rdob bzhin du rab tu sra zhing mkhrang ngo /_/khu ba las de ltar rde'u chags pa de yang rlung gis phye mar dkrugs nas zhib mo de gcin dang lhan cig thur du tha mal par 'byung ba yang
[\[124a.6\]]yod de/_de ni tshul bzhin 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de la rde'u phye mar mi 'khrugs pa ni gcin 'gag par byed de/_de yang lgang pa'i kha 'gags nas na zhing gcin 'gags te 'ong du mi rung bar byed do/_/de ltar chu so na rde'u chags pa des nal g.ya' bar byed do/_/gal te rlung
[\[124a.7\]]nad kyis lgang pa de rang gi gnas nas rab tu sbags te bskyod nas lgang pa de rgyas shing gnag ste che zhing sbom du gyur nas/_lgang pa rgyas te log par 'dug par gyur na na tsha g.yo zhing 'phar/_gcus pa snyam byed/_gcin yang 'gags te thigs pa thigs tsam du 'ong ste/_de lta bu
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]la lgang pa btsir te gcin phyung shig_/de bas na gong ma ltar lgang pa'i kha rlung gis chod de 'gags pa dang /_lgang pa log pa 'di rnam gnyis ni rlung las gyur pa'i lgang pa'i nad ces bya ste/_gso dka' ba dang /_gso rab tu dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/yang gzhang dang lgang pa gnyis
[\[124b.2\]]kyi bar na rlung rab tu mthu che ba zhig yod pa de rdo ba'i gtun bu dang 'dra bar sra zhing stug pa cig yod pa des lgang pa mdud pa bor te/_mi g.yo ba mthon por 'jog par byed de de ltar gyur na chu so'i thad kar sbos shing bshang gci gnyi ga rlung gis thogs te 'gags par byed do/_/
[\[124b.3\]]nad 'di ni rdo ba'i gtun bu lta bu'i rlung nad kyis gcin 'gags pa zhes bya'o/_/yang chu 'gags pa'i nad dang /_rlung nad kyis 'khyil bar byed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa des ni lgang pa rab tu na bar byed cing gcin gyi nang du rlung de zhugs nas gcin 'khyil zhing 'khor/_rem rem
[\[124b.4\]]por gyur/_gcu ba snyam byed/_lci/_gcin sri ste nyung shas tsam 'byung /_yang na gcin dang bshang ba gnyis lhan cig tu 'byung bar byed de/_nad 'di ni rlung nad kyis 'khyil bar byed pa'i chus 'gags pa zhes bya'o/_/yang chus 'gags pa'i nad rnam gcig ni rlung
[\[124b.5\]]nad lta bu'i nad gzhi med par gcin rang 'gags te yun ring du ma byung ngam/_yang na chu cung zad 'gags pa las mjug tu gcin 'byung bar gyur na/_de ni nad mi che ba zhes bya ba yin no/_/yang lto bar gcin 'gags pa zhes bya ba'i nad yod de/_de ni gcin snyoms pa
[\[124b.6\]]las rnags te 'gags pa las/_lte ba'i 'og lto ba'i nang lgang par gcin gyis gang ba dang /_de'i tshe rlung gis thogs nas bsdus te skams pa dang /_de'i tshe rab tu na/_chu sor sbo/_kha zas mi 'ju/_bshang gci gnyis ka 'gags so/_/chus 'gags pa'i
[\[124b.7\]]nad 'di ni lto bar gcin rnags pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/yang chus 'gags pa'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin 'byung ba'i sbu gu 'chus shing log gam/_yang na gcin snod lgang pa'am/_yang na gcin 'byung ba'i sbu gu'i nang ngam/_yang na pho mtshan gyi nang rlung gis 'gags na
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]gcin nyung shas sam sri zhing 'byung ba'i rjes la na yang rung mi na yang rung /_gcin 'gag cing skabs skabs su 'byung la lhag ma yang lus te chus 'gags pa'i nad 'di ni pho mtshan lci bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/yang chus 'gags pa'i nad/_gcin gyi
[\[125a.2\]]mdud pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i nad thabs ni lgang pa'i kha'i nang zlum po chung ngu sra ba zhig tu 'phral du gyur pa dang /_chu sor rde'u chags pa'i nad dang 'dra ste/_nad tshabs che la gcin gyi phur mdud pa bcas te nad 'di ni gcin gyi mdud pa zhes bya'o/_/yang gcin snyoms pa las gcin
[\[125a.3\]]ma gcis par/_bud med la nyal po byas nas de'i rjes la gcin gcis pa ni yang na ni gcin sngar 'byung /_yang na ni khu ba sngar 'byung ste de ni gcin dang khu ba 'dres pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/yang na bshang ba sri zhing 'gags/_bad kan gyis chu sri zhing 'gags par 'gyur/_nad
[\[125a.4\]]thabs ni lus kyi khong rtsub la nyam chung bas rlung nad skyes te/_bshang ba thur du mi 'byung zhing nam sri la 'gags pa'i tshe na/_gcin 'byung ba'i sbu gu'i nang du bshang ba de song ste 'dres pas gcin 'byung ba'i dri ma mnam por bshang ba'i dri dang 'dra bar byung ba de ni bshang ba 'gags pa'i
[\[125a.5\]]gcin nad ces bya'o/_/yang gcin nad rnam pa gcig ni lus kyis las drag shul la sogs pa lta bu byas pa dang /_kha zas ro tsha ba dang /_drod che ba lta bu'i bag zos pa dang /_lam bgrod de chad cing nyi tshan la sogs pas gdungs pa dang /_mkhris pa'i nad cher skyes la de'i steng
[\[125a.6\]]du rlung nad kyis lgang pa dang /_lgang pa'i chu so g.yas g.yon gyi nang na zhugs na na zhing tsha bar 'gyur/_gcin gcis na mdog yang na ser/_yang na khrag 'dres/_yang na khrag dngos su 'byung ste/_'di 'dra ba'i gcin tshan po nyung shas su sri zhing 'byung ngo /_/de ni tsha ba
[\[125a.7\]]dang rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i nad ces bya'o/_/yang lus kyi khong rtsub la khong dub/_rmya bar gyur pa des lgang pa'i drung na mkhris pa'i nad tsha ba dang /_rlung yod pa gnyis gnyis gcin bskams na/_zad pa dang na zhing tsha ba la sogs pa dang sri bar 'gyur te/_
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]nad 'di yang lhag ma dang gcig go/_/yang na chu sri ba'i nad sna gcig ni mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis kyi nad lgang pa'i sa na yod pa'i steng du/_gal te rlung nad kyis kyang bsnan na gcin 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/gcin cung zad 'byung ba'i kha dog kyang ser/_dmar/_dkar
[\[125b.2\]]bar gar bo 'byung la tsha bar 'ong /_yang na gi wang gi kha dog 'dra/_yang na dung phye mar zhib tu btags btags pa 'dra ba skom po 'byung /_yang na nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po gsum 'dres pa'i kha dog 'di lta bu'i gcin 'byung ste/_'di ni gcin nyams pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/
[\[125b.3\]]chus 'gags pa'i nad dmigs zhib tu bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//gcin 'gags pa dang gcin snyi ba za gu'i nad dmigs bstan pa'i le'u bcu pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la gcin sri la za gur 'gyur ba'i nad ni rnam pa gnyis yod de/_de la
[\[125b.4\]]bad kan las nad za gur gyur pa'i nad ni bcu yod do/_/mkhris pa las za gur gyur pa'i nad ni drug yod do/_/gcin snyi zhing za gur gyur pa'i nad de ni kha zas bad kan dang /_tshil dang gcin du 'gyur ba de lta bu las za gu'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/de yang ji lta zhe na kha zas ro
[\[125b.5\]]mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_zas snum bag dang /_'ju dka' zhing lci ba dang /_zas 'byil bag dang /_bsil ba'i bag dang /_'bru sar pa'i chang dang /_yul ser che ba nas byung ba'i bya na lta bu dang /_bu ram dang /_bu ram shing dang /_dar ba dang /_kha zas 'di lta
[\[125b.6\]]bu'i bag za zhing 'thungs pa dang /_gnas gcig nas stan gcig gi thog tu rtag par 'dug pa dang /_sngon dang mi 'dra bar mal mi bde bar lus mi bde bar nyal ba dang /_'di rnams lta bus lgang par nad chags te za gur 'gyur ro/_/de yang ji lta zhe na kha zas gnod
[\[125b.7\]]pa de lta bu la sogs pa bad kan la gnod bar byed do/_/bad kan la gnod pa byas pas gcin sgo lgang pa'i 'khor dang lus kyi nang gi rul ba dang /_rngul ba dang /_tshil dang /_bcud dngas ma dang /_bya na sha zos pa dang /_'di rnams la yang gnod pa byas pa/_mkhris
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]pa dang khrag la yang gnod par byed de/_de lta bus bad kan dang lus kyi rul ba dang /_rngul ba la sogs pa gcin gyi gzhir gyur pa 'di rnams gcin za gur 'ong bas zad pa dang /_lus kyi srog zungs bdun po yang /_rlung gis lgang pa'i nang du 'khus
[\[126a.2\]]shing drangs te zad par byed do/_/kha zas de lta bu las gcin snyi ba za gu'i nad du gyur na gsor mi sos pa'i nad dang /_gsor rung ba'i nad dang mi thul ba tsam du 'gyur bar bya ba dang /_rnam pa 'di gsum yod do/_/de la gsor rung bar bya ba'i dpyad dang rnam pa gsum
[\[126a.3\]]yod de/_legs par mthun par bya ba dang mi mthun par bya ba'i dpyad dang /_nad dmigs chen po la dpyad du bya ba dang gso ba'i thabs 'di ltar bya'o/_/de la gcin snyi ba za gu spyi'i nad thabs ni gcin rab tu mang la dul dul por 'ong ngo /_/de la rlung dang mkhris pa dang
[\[126a.4\]]bad kan dang gsum gyis srog zungs bdun la gnod par byed pa'i bye brag dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_srog zungs bdun du 'dres pas gcin gyi kha dog la sogs pa brtag par bya ba'i dmigs ni gcin snyi ba za gu'i bye brag las shes par bya'o/_/
[\[126a.5\]]de la gcin mang /_gcin mdog gsal la dkar/_bsil/_dri mi zhim pa med la chu lta bur 'dug na/_de ni ming chu'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad thabs rnam gcig ni/_cung zad rnyog rnyog pa'i bag yod la/_'byil bag tu 'dug_/bu ram shing gi khu ba
[\[126a.6\]]dang 'dra bar ro rab tu mngar te nad 'di'i ming ni bu ram shing gi khu ba lta bu'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin ska bar 'byung la/_zhag lon na yang gar por 'dug pa 'di ni gcin gar po'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin
[\[126a.7\]]'byung ba chang dang 'dra la/_steng rim dang /_zhabs ni gar por 'dug ste 'di ni chang gi za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni ba spu 'ang langs shing 'greng bar 'gyur la gcin 'byung ba yang 'bras btags pa'i phye bzhin gar la mdog skya bor 'byung ba 'di ni
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]'bras phye ltar 'byung ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin 'byung ba khu chu dang 'dra'am/_yang na khu chu dang 'dres par 'byung ste/_'di ni khu chu'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin gyi nang na rdul ltar tsig tsig por bye ma lta
[\[126b.2\]]bur 'byung ste 'di ni bye ma'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin babs cher yang dang yang du 'byung la/_gcin rab tu bsil te 'di ni grang zhing bsil ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam pa gcig ni gcin dal gyis gcin 'byung ba dang nyung shas
[\[126b.3\]]nyung shas su gcin 'byung ste/_'di'i ming ni bags kyis 'byung ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin 'byung ba'am gcin za gur 'byung ba de kha chu bzhin nal nal po 'byil dag tu 'byung ba 'di'i ming ni kha chu ltar 'byung ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za
[\[126b.4\]]gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin gyi mdog nas tshig 'khus pa'i tsha ya bak+Shar 'dra ba'i mdog dang /_ro dang dri yang 'dra la reg pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_'di ni nas tshig gi tsha ya bak+Sha ra dang 'dra ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin 'byung ba'i mdog sngon por 'ong ste
[\[126b.5\]]'di ni gcin sngon po'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin snag tsha bzhin nag por 'ong ste/_'di ni za gu nag po zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin gyi mdog skyer ba'am/_yung ba'i kha dog bzhin mdog ser la rab tu tsha ste/_nad du bsregs
[\[126b.6\]]pa bzhin du 'ong ste/_'di ni za gu ser por 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam pa gcig ni gcin gyi mdog btsod khu bzhin dmar po mnam por 'ong ba 'di'i ming ni btsod khu lta bu'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin gyi mdog khrag 'dra ba tsha ba
[\[126b.7\]]mnam po lan tshwa bro bar 'byung na 'di'i ming ni khrag gi za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin dang zhag tu 'dres pa'am/_zhag dngos po yang dang yang 'byung ba 'di'i ming ni gcin zhag tu 'byung ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin dang rkang
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]du 'dres pa yang dang yang 'byung ngam rkang dngos su yang dang yang 'byung ba 'di'i ming ni rkang du 'byung ba'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni glang po che smyon pa smyos pa dang 'dra bar gcin gyi rgyun mi drag par dal bus rgyun mi 'chad par
[\[127a.2\]]'byung la/_gcin ni chu ser du 'ong ste/_chu ser gyi nang na sru srus po'am/_tsig tsig po 'byung ste/_'di ni glang po che myos pa ltar gcin sri ba zhes bya'o/_/yang za gu'i nad rnam gcig ni gcin sbrang rtsi dang 'dra bar 'byung ba 'di'i ming ni za gu sbrang rtsi ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ste/_
[\[127a.3\]]de la yang rnam pa gnyis shig yod ces zer te/_gcig ni srog zungs bdun lta bu zad pa las za gur 'gyur ro/_/yang rnam pa gcig ni rlung dang mkhris pa 'am/_bad kan lta bu'i nad kyis lgang pa nas gcin 'byung ba'i sbu gu kha 'gags sam/_yang na rlung
[\[127a.4\]]gis 'gags par gyur na de lta bu las gcin sbrang rtsi ltar 'byung ba'i za gur 'gyur ro/_/de la mkhris pa'am rlung nad dang /_bad kan gyi nad kyis lgang pa skad cig tu stong par 'gyur/_skad cig cing gcin gyis gang bar 'gyur te/_nad thabs 'di lta bu ni gso dka'
[\[127a.5\]]ba yin te/_dpyad mi byed par yun ring por yal bar bor na nad 'di lta bu kun ni za gu'i nang gcin sbrang rtsi lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gcin za gu sbrang rtsi ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni sbrang rtsi ltar 'byung ba phal cher ro mngar por 'byung ba'o/_/de bas na gcin gyi ro mngar
[\[127a.6\]]por 'byung ba kun ni lus kyi ro yang mngar por 'gyur ba yin no/_/gcin za gu mngar po sbrang rtsi ltar 'gyur na de'i nad bla thabs kyang kha zas mi 'ju/_zas yi gar mi 'ong /_slon/_gnyid che/_lud pas bkar/_cham pas 'debs te nad 'di lta bu ni bad kan las gyur pa'i
[\[127a.7\]]za gu'i nad thabs zhes bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad thabs ni pho mtshan gyi 'bras bur zug cing na la/_gzhigs shing bcad pa snyam byed/_rims kyis 'debs/_tsha la skom dad che/_skyur/_brgyal/_tshad par 'khru ba 'di lta bu ni mkhris pa las
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gyur pa'i za gu'i nad thabs yin no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i za gu'i nad thabs ni bshang ba sri ste 'ong du mi rung /_lus 'dar/_snying na/_kha zas ming gi 'dod pa snyam byed la zug cing na/_gnyid med/_kha skam/_lud pas bkar/_dbugs mi bde ba 'di ltar 'gyur
[\[127b.2\]]ro/_/de ltar gcin snyi ste za gu'i nad kyis btab pa las/_sman dpyad kyis mi gso bar yal bar bor na 'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_me dbal dang /_'brum bu dang /_shur bu la sogs pa nad kyi nyen rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/'bras dang 'brum bu la sogs pa nad kyis
[\[127b.3\]]rkang lag gi rus tshigs dang srog gi gnad dang sha gnad gar che'o cog gi dmigs dmigs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'bras nad deb tshe chen po tsam kham phor sha ra'i dbyibs lta bu'i nad 'bras 'byung ba'i dbyibs ni/_mtha' ni mthol dbus ni dma'/_mdog ni rtsa
[\[127b.4\]]gnag_/nang rul na ste/_dbyibs ni 'bras nad kham por shar ba 'dra bas na de'i phyir 'bras nad kham por shar ba lta bu zhes bya'o/_/de las 'bras nad rus sbal lta bu'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni/_nang du zug cing na la nyen kor cher mched cing /_rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra bar sgur
[\[127b.5\]]sgur po 'jam po skrangs pa 'di ni rus sbal lta bu'i 'bras nad ces bya'o/_/yang 'bras byer ba rgya mo lta bu zhes bya ba ni/_rtsa rnams ni sra zhing rengs par 'gyur/_'brum bu rgya mo lta bu 'byung ba ni 'jam la na zhing zug_/'brum bu phra mo mang po sha stag 'byung ste/_rdol cing
[\[127b.6\]]zag la lus kun la khyab par byed de/_'di ni rgya mo lta bu'i 'bras mched pa zhes bya'o/_/bi na ta zhes bya ba ni/_lto'am rgyab tu 'bras 'dra ba che la mdog sngo ba zhig byung nas/_khong du zug cing na/_rul zhing rnags par byed de 'bras 'dra bar 'byung ba de 'bur po mthon por
[\[127b.7\]]mi 'byung ste/_'di ni nye 'khor cher khebs pa ste/_'bras nad lus sgur por byed pa'i nad byin ta zhes bya'o/_/me dbal phra mo ni 'brum bu thog ma byung ba na/_sha mthong gi pags pa tshig par byed la/_lus kun la mi bzad cing rab tu tsha ba'i me dbal gyis khyab cing
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]mched/_me dbal gyi 'brum bu byung ba'i mdog ni dmar la gnag_/lus tsha zhing myos/_rims kyis 'debs te/_nad thabs 'di lta bu ni me dbal phra mo zhes bya'o/_/'brum bu'i dbyibs dang /_tshad sran chung lta bu zhes bya ba ni/_'brum bu che chung
[\[128a.2\]]gi tshad dang dbyibs sran chung dang 'dra bas na de ni 'brum bu sran chung lta bu zhes bya'o/_/de la 'brum phran shur bu'i dbyibs dang tshad 'brum phran yungs kar lta bu zhes bya ba ni 'brum phran shur bur byung ba'i dbyibs dang tshad yungs kar tsam du 'byung ste/_nad tshabs kyang che la myur
[\[128a.3\]]du smin par 'gyur/_'brum phran yungs kar lta bu byung na de'i 'khor yang 'brum phran yungs kar lta bus gang zhing 'khor bar 'byung ste/_'di ni 'brum phran shur bu yungs kar lta bu zhes bya'o/_/de la 'brum phran bu dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba ni 'brum bu chen po mang du 'byung
[\[128a.4\]]ba'i nyen kor na 'brum bu rab tu phra mos gang bar 'byung ba de ni 'brum phran bu dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ldum bu bi da ri'i rtsa ba dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni/_thor bu byung ba'i dbyibs ni mtho zhing ring ba myug myug po ldum bu bi da ri dang la phug gi dbyibs dang 'dra la sra ste 'di
[\[128a.5\]]ni ldum bu bi da ra zhes bya'o/_/de la khong 'bras byung ba ni nad dkyel che ste/_phyi nas logs shig tu zhib tu bstan to/_/de ltar nad rnam pa de bcu'i nang na dang po gsum dang 'brum bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dang /_ldum bu bi da ri'i rtsa ba 'dra ba'i 'brum bu dang /_'di rnam pa lnga
[\[128a.6\]]ni tshil ches pa las gyur te nad dkyel che bas bzod par yang dka' la dpyad kyang dka'o/_/mkhris pa'i nad che ba las nad de lta bu byung ba ni nad tshabs kyang mi che ste/_brnags su rung la gso sla'o/_/tshil chung ba las kyang nad 'di lta bu 'byung ba yang yod de/_/yang 'bras
[\[128a.7\]]dang phol mig dang 'brum bu de lta bu ni gcin snyi ste za gur gyur pa de'i steng du rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gang che bar gyur pa las de bzhin du 'bras dang 'brum bu dang me dbal la sogs pa sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/la la ni gcin snyi ba za gu'i nad med kyang tshil
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]che ba las rlung ngam mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad zhugs par gyur/_'bras dang 'brum bu la sogs pa'i nad de lta bur 'gyur ba yang yod na 'bras dang 'brum bu la sogs pa'i nad gang yin pa dngos su ma byung gi bar du/_nad thabs nyi tshe gang yin pa thog tu mi phebs so/_/
[\[128b.2\]]gcin snyi la za gu'i nad thabs su gyur pa med par gcin gyi mdog ser po 'am dmar po byung ba de ni za gu'i nad ces mi bya ste/_khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad las gyur par shes par bya'o/_/gcin snyi ba za gur gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_lus rngul/_lus dang rkang lag dri mi zhim pa dang khong
[\[128b.3\]]lhod par 'gyur/_stan gyi thog na 'dug pa dang /_mal na nyal na bde ba snyam byed cing 'dug cing nyal chags/_snying dang mig dang lce dang rna ba dang 'di rnams kun la bad kan gyis stug po ljin bag tu byugs shing yogs pa snyom byed/_skra dang sen mo lhag par ring por 'gyur/_
[\[128b.4\]]lus kyi nyams bsil ba la dga'/_gre ba dang rkan ni skam/_kha'i nang gi ro mngar bar bro/_rkang mthil dang lag mthil tsha/_gcin gar gcis par grog ma kun 'du bar 'gyur te/_nad kyi tshul 'di 'dra ba ni za gu thams cad kyi nad thabs yin no/_/za gu'i nad dmigs gang
[\[128b.5\]]yin pa so sor dbye ba ni rnam pa gnyis yod de/_gcin za gur byung ba sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra la/_'khyil zhing gcin gyi ro yang mngar/_lus kyi sha yang gang zhing rgyas na de ni bad kan las gyur pa'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gur gyur la lus kyang rke ste zad na de ni kha bdun zad pa
[\[128b.6\]]zhes bya ste rlung las gyur pa'i za gu zhes bya'o/_/yang za gur gyur pa'i nad thabs sngar ni bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i tshul yin la/_phyis bags kyis rlung nad kyi za gur gyur pa'i nad 'di ni gso sla ba yin no/_/mkhris pa'i nad las za gur gyur pa ni dkyel mi skye mi la
[\[128b.7\]]bar gsor rung ngo /_/tshil la rlung ngam mkhris pa'am/_bad kan gyi nad ma zhu ba lta bu'i za gu ni gsor rung ngo /_/gcin snyi ba za gu'i nad kyi bye brag bshad pa dang /_za gu'i nad kyi nyen gzhan du 'gyur ba bshad pa'i le'u bcu pa rdzogs so//_//'bras nad dang /_
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]rgyu rlugs dang /_skran nad dang /_nad sna 'di gsum gyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la khong 'bras su gyur pa'i nad kyi gzhi ni/_kha zas khong du zhag lon pa dang /_kha zas ha cang tsha ches pa dang /_kha zas rtsub pa
[\[129a.2\]]dang /_kha zas skam bag dang /_kha zas tsha bar 'gyur ba 'di rnams lta bu zos pa dang /_rkang lag bskams te mi bde bzhin du nyal ba dang /_khrag nad rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bag byas pas lus kyi pags pa dang /_sha dang tshil dang rus pa dang khrag dang chu ba phre'u dang chu ba
[\[129a.3\]]chen po rnams dang 'di kun kyang khrag nad du gyur pa'i nad nang du zhen pa dang /_de las phyi nang gnyis kar skrangs te/_khong 'bras kyi rtsa ba khong du ring du zug la nad tshabs che ste/_khong 'bras kyi dbyibs ni zlum po'am 'jing ba ring por 'byung ngo /_/de yang nad gzhi tha dad pa'i bye
[\[129a.4\]]brag gi nad sna drug yod do/_/gang zhe na rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang gsum las khong 'bras nad sna re re 'byung ba dang /_'dus pa las khong 'bras su gyur pa dang /_khrag nad rgyas pa las nad du 'gyur ba dang rmas te rma byung ba las khong 'bras su gyur pa dang rnam
[\[129a.5\]]pa drug go/_/de dag la'ang rnam pa gnyis yod de/_phyi rol du 'byung ba dang /_nad du 'byung ba dang /_rnam pa gnyis so/_/de la phyi rol du 'byung ba ni lus kyi yan lag de dag tu mi bzad pa'i nad rdog rdog par brgyus pa 'dra ba mthon por 'byung ngo /_/de la nad nang du 'byung
[\[129a.6\]]ba ni nang gi zabs su skran dang 'dra ba mkhrang ba mi bzad par 'byung ngo /_/de 'byung ba'i dbyibs ni grog ma'i sa phung spungs pa mthon por 'dug pa de lta bu lte ba dang /_chu so dang /_mchin pa dang /_mcher pa dang /_glo ba dang /_snying dang /_lto ba dang /_chu so g.yas
[\[129a.7\]]g.yon dang /_mkhal ma g.yas g.yon dang /_gzhang kha dang 'di rnams kyi sar 'byung ste/_de ni me dang mtshon gyis phog pa bzhin myur du 'chi bar byed do/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i nad thabs ni mdog smug por 'dug la myur du 'byung du mi rung ste ring du thogs/_
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]mgo smin cing rnags pa yang mi snyoms la na zhing tsha/_mgo 'khor/_nyam chung /_phal phal byed cing sgra yang yod de 'di ni rlung nad las gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de la mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad thabs ni skom dad che/_rmongs bag tu 'gyur/_khong tsha/_rims kyis
[\[129b.2\]]'debs/_nad 'byung ba'i mdog ni zangs kyi mdog bzhin dmar la rtsa nag nad dmigs myur du 'byung zhing myur du rnags par 'gyur te/_'di lta bu ni mkhris pa las gyur pa yin no/_/de la bad kan las gyur pa'i nad ni khong bsil zhing gyen du slon/_kha glal/_lus lci/_zas
[\[129b.3\]]yi gar mi 'ong /_nad dmigs gar byung ba der sra la mdog skya/_g.ya'/_mig myur du 'byung du mi rung /_nad dmigs kyi nye 'khor tsha ba 'di ni bad kan las gyur pa yin no/_/de la 'dus pa'i nad las gyur pa'i nad thabs ni nad dmigs kyi tshul las/_nad phyi rol du 'byung ngam
[\[129b.4\]]nang du 'byung ba shes par bya ste nad byung ba'i 'brum bu nag pos khebs par byung la/_'brum bu nag po de rab tu tshal na/_rims kyis kyang 'debs so/_/de la khrag nad las gyur pa'i nad ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad thabs dang 'dra ste khrag las nad du gyur na phyi rol gyi sha dang
[\[129b.5\]]pags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med rnams la ni nang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon la sogs pas rmas te rma byung ba las mi 'phrod pas rma red de/_rma kha tsha ba rlung gis phul nas khrag dang mkhris pa mched de khrag dang mkhris pa de las nad bla thabs rne'u lhags
[\[129b.6\]]shing de dag tu na bar 'gyur ro/_/nad gnas tha dad pa so sor byung na nad kyi bye brag ni lte bar byung na skyigs bus 'debs so/_/chu sor byung na chu 'gags pa dang /_gcin rnag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchin pa la byung na dbugs mi bde'o/_/mcher pa la byung na rngam pa
[\[129b.7\]]drag tu 'phul zhing dbugs mi bde'o/_/glo ba la byung na lkog ma dang mgul pa na zhing skom dad che'o/_/snying la byung na lus kyi yan lag thams cad rab tu gzir bar byed do/_/mchin ngogs kyi nang du 'byung na lud pas lu/_snying gar g.yogs pa snyam byed/_myos/_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]snying mug mug cing mun sros pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rtsib logs kyi nang du byung na phrag pa dang lto ba skrang ngo /_/chu so g.yas g.yon mdoms phrag tu byung na/_brla thog thag tu na bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhal ma la byung na rked pa dang rgyab dang rtsib
[\[130a.2\]]logs su na bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhang la byung na bshang ba dang dbugs thur du 'byung ba 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/ma zhu ba'i gnas pho ba dang /_zhu ba'i gnas long ka dang phyed ma zhur gnas pa nang grol 'di dag gi thog tu byung na de dag gi 'or nad dang 'dra'o/_/de la khong du
[\[130a.3\]]lte ba yan chod du byung na ni rnag khar 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/ro smad lte ba'i 'og man chad khong du byung na/_rkub tu rnag zag par 'gyur ro/_/lte ba'i nang du byung na stod smad gnyis ka nas rnag zag par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rnam drug lta bu'i phyi'am nang du 'byung na/_rlung dang
[\[130a.4\]]mkhris pa dang bag kan dang khrag rgyas pa dang /_rma red pa'i rmen bu la sogs pa so so'i nad dmigs bzhin du gso ba'i dpyad bya'o/_/'dus pa'i nad las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni gso dka' te ma gtogs so/_/de la snying dang lte ba dang lgang pa chu so 'di dag tu phyi rol
[\[130a.5\]]du 'byung yang rung /_nang du 'byung yang rung ste/_smin te rnag zag par gyur kyang mi 'tsho'o/_/khong du 'byung ste/_smin nas rnag kha nas zag cing 'ong yang nad pa nyam chung la nad bla thabs na ba gzhan yang yod na/_de lta bu'ang mi 'tsho'o/_/de dang 'dra bar
[\[130a.6\]]bud med kyi nu ma la byung na yang rtsa sgo kha bye ba yin pas gso dka' ste mi 'tsho'o/_/bud med la bu btsas pa dang /_sbrum ma dang /_nu zho yod pa dang /_nu zho med pa lta bu la byung ba ni phyi rol du byung ba zhes bya ste/_'or nad dang 'dra bar stug por skrangs pa sra ste/_'di
[\[130a.7\]]yang de bzhin du gso dka'o/_/bu mo chung ngu'i nu ma'i rtsa ba'i sbu gu rnams ni phra bas na de lta bu la ni mi 'byung ngo /_/rgyu rlugs kyi nad gzhi bshad pa/_rgyu rlugs kyi nad ni rgyu ma'i nang gi rlung yan man rgyu ba 'gags te/_thogs pa dang nad du gyur nas na zhing skrangs te rgyu ma
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]thur du rnu zhing chu so nas pho mtshan gyi 'bras bu'i nang du son pa dang /_pho mtshan dang pho mtshan gyi pags pa'i rtsa yang rgyu ma rlugs pas btsir nas/_pho mtshan gyi pags pa yang cher skye bar byed do/_/rlig rlugs kyi nad de yang rnam pa bdun te/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad
[\[130b.2\]]kan gyi nad skyed pa dang /_khrag nad skye ste lud pa dang tshil nad du gyur pa dang /_lgang pa skyes pa dang rgyu ma skyes pa'i nad dang rnam pa 'di bdun no/_/de la lgang pa skyes pa dang rgyu ma skyes pa 'di gnyis kyang rlung nad kyis skye bar 'gyur te/_rlig rlugs kyi nad kyi rgyu ni tha dad do/_/de la
[\[130b.3\]]rlung nad las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad thabs ni/_rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba 'dra la/_rlung las gyur pas nan par gyur pa'i gzhi med pa bzhin du na'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs ni rlig pa'i mdog shing u dum+bA ra'i 'bras bu 'dra bar dmar por snang la dro che zhing tshal
[\[130b.4\]]'drul ba de lta bu yin no/_/bad kan las rlig rlugs su gyur pa ni grang la lci/_'jam la g.ya'/_sra la nad tshabs mi che ba de lta bu yin no/_/khrag nad rgyas pa las rgyu rlugs su gyur pa ni 'brum bu nag pos gang ba yod de/_tshul gzhan ni mkhris pa las rgyu rlugs kyi nad du gyur
[\[130b.5\]]pa dang 'dra'o/_/tshil nad las rgyu ma skyes te rgyu rlugs kyi nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni spyi bad kan dang 'dra ste/_'jam la rlig pa'i dbyibs ni shing ta la'i 'bras bu ltar 'dug go/_/gcin snyoms na brnags pa sha stag byed pa des gcin stsogs shing lgang pa cher skyes pa
[\[130b.6\]]las rlig rlugs su gyur na rkyal pa chus gang ba bzhin rnyog rnyog zer la na/_rlig pa'i pags pa 'jam/_chu 'gag par byed/_pho mtshan gyi 'og pags pa'i bar du glo glo bor 'byung ngo /_/rgyu ma nar te rlig rlugs su gyur pa'i nad thabs ni rlung nad slang bar gyur pa'i kha zas dang /_
[\[130b.7\]]zas bsil ba'i bag dang /_chu'i nang du rkyal ba dang /_bshang gci snyoms na nan gyis brnags pa dang /_mi bro bzhin btsir pa dang /_khur dang lam gyis dub pa dang lus dang lus kyi yan lag log par gcu zhing /_skyod/_gsig ste/_rgyu ma'i nang 'khrugs par 'gyur/_
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]de lta bu'i bag byas pas/_de'i tshe rgyu ma phre'u kha cig rang gi gnas nas rlung gis thur du log par phul te/_chu so dang mdoms kyi phrag tu phyin par byas nas mdud pa ltar glo bo zhig tu de'i tshe skrang ngo /_/'di ltar gyur kyang yal bar bor te sman dpyad mi byed
[\[131a.2\]]na rlig rlugs cher skyes te/_khong sbo na rem rem por byed la nang du rlung gis rab tu gzir ba dang /_rgyu ma sgra can khru lu lu zer zhing rlig pa'i nang du gang bar byed/_rgyu ma khong pa'i nang du slar phul te btang nas yang slar bzhin snga ma kho ba bzhin gang bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas
[\[131a.3\]]na rgyu ma nar zhing skyes pa'i rlig rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste/_rlung nad las rlig rlugs su gyur pa dang 'dra la rtsa phra mo dra ba skar khung ris ltar 'dug pa rtsa kun rtsub la smug go/_/skran nad rnam pa brgyad kyi nad gzhi dang nad thabs bshad pa skran rnam pa brgyad yod do/_/rlung dang
[\[131a.4\]]mkhris pa dang bad kan re re'i skran dang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum las gnyis gnyis su 'dres pa las/_skran rnam gsum du gyur pa dang /_'dus pa'i nad las skran du gyur pa dang /_bud med zla mtshan mngal du rlung nad dam mkhris pa'am bad kan gyi nad kyis
[\[131a.5\]]'gags te skran du gyur pa dang /_skran rnam pa de brgyad do/_/skran nad du gyur pa'i nad gzhi ni/_rims kyis btab pa dang /_slon pa dang /_tshad pa la sogs pas 'khru ba dang /_skyug sman dang /_bkru sman la sogs pa btang bas/_lus kyi sha zad de skam por gyur
[\[131a.6\]]pas/_lus rlung can du gyur pa'i steng du bkres pa las chu grang 'thungs pa dang /_zas bcad de smyung ba byas pa dang /_ha cang drags ches pa las/_chu'i nang du rkyal ba la sogs te lus la gnod cing rlung nad slong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bag bsten pa dang yang na slon mi bro zhing /_
[\[131a.7\]]nan gyis bkug pa dang /_yang na slon bro na brnags te/_ma slon pa dang /_bshang gci dang dbugs thur du 'byung ba snyoms shing 'ong na yang brnags pa dang /_'di dag mi 'ong bzhin du nan gyis btsir ba dang /_skyug sman dang /_bkru sman zhig btang na sngar sman mar gyi
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]dpyad dang /_dugs kyi cho ga ma byas par skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang /_yang na cho ga bzhin du skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba'i rjes la kha zas drod po che tsha ba'i nad myur du ldang ba rnams zos pa'am/_yang na bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas 'byil bag de lta bu zos pa las nad
[\[131b.2\]]dkyel du 'gyur te/_de ltar rlung nad cher skyes pas rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi nad so so na 'doms par gyur tam/_yang na nad sna gnyis su gyur tam/_yang na rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad du gyur tam/_yang na khrag nad dang 'dres pa de lta bus lus kyi rtsa chen po bcu'i
[\[131b.3\]]nang du nad zhugs pa dang /_lus kyi stod smad kha zas dang bshang gci rgyu zhing 'byung ba'i lam srang yang nad kyis chod de 'gags nas na zhing mi bde ba'i sa bon gyis lus kyi sha bri ste skam par gyur pas bad kan dang mkhris pa dang /_bshang gci'i dri mas rtsa sgo dang /_bshang gci rgyu ba'i
[\[131b.4\]]srang 'gags sam/_khong pa nang grol gyi nang du rlung zhen te/_lus kyi nang rtsub cing sra bar gyur pas rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi rang gi gnas su skran zhugs na de'i ming ni skran nad rang dbang can zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi skran de mkhris pa'i sar rlung gi skran
[\[131b.5\]]zhugs sam bad kan gyi sar mkhris pa'i skran zhugs sam rlung gi sar bad kan gyi skran zhugs sam rlung gi sar mkhris pa'i skran zhugs pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi sar skran zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar nad dkyel 'dus pa las nad de gong gong por gyur pas nad de gzugs yod pa ma yin
[\[131b.6\]]yang gzugs su gyur nas/_skran ril ril po lag gis myang du yod pa rdog rdog po mdud pa ltar 'dug pa 'di'i ming ni skran nad ces bya'o/_/de la rlung nad las gyur pa'i skran gyi nad thabs ni/_lgang pa'i chu so dang lte ba dang snying ga dang rtsib logs g.yas g.yon/_'di rnams
[\[131b.7\]]gang yang rung bar skran gnas shing 'dug ste/_rlung skran de dag tu byung bas mjing ba dang klad pa na/_rims nad kyis 'debs/_mcher pa na/_rgyu ma'i nang sgra khru lu lu zer/_na zhing zug_/thur du bshang ba sri zhing 'gags/_dbugs mi bde ste/_dbugs phyir yang dang yang
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]'byung ba mi phyin/_lus sra bar rengs bag tu 'gyur la/_kha skam/_lus rid cing skam/_pho ba'i me drod mi snyoms/_lus kyi pags pa sha mdog gnag la rtsub pa de lta bu ni rlung skran gyi nad thabs yin te rlung skran de khong pa nang na dbyibs tshul ji lta bu zhig
[\[132a.2\]]tu 'dug pa dang /_rlung skran de gang na 'dug pa rtag tu mi mngon la/_rlung skran de res 'ga' ni skye/_res 'ga' ni 'bri zhing na ste/_nyams la rlung skran de srog chags grog ma zhig gis gang ba snyam du p+r+wa p+r+wa byed pa zug cing na ba 'di lta bu ni rlung skran gyi nad thabs yin no/_/de la mkhris
[\[132a.3\]]pa las skran nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_lus tsha la sgregs pa skyur por 'ong ngo /_/brgyal/_thur du 'khru/_lus rngul/_skom/_rims nad kyis 'debs bzhin mdog dang lus kyi mdog dang /_sen mo rnams ser por snang /_mkhris pa'i skran de lag pas reg na mi
[\[132a.4\]]bzod/_skran de rab rab byed cing me bzhin 'bar/_skran yod pa'i 'khor mes bsregs pa bzhin che'o/_/nad thabs 'di lta bu ni mkhris pa'i skran nad ces bya'o/_/de la bad kan las skran du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni glo bag tu gyur la kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_pho ba'i drod
[\[132a.5\]]chung /_grang ba'i rims nad dang cham pas 'debs/_khong snyom/_dang ga mer mer por byed/_lud pas bkar/_bzhin mdog dang /_sen mo dang /_sha mthang gi mdog dkar por 'dug_/bad kan las skran du gyur pa nyid ni/_khong pa'i nang gi phugs na skran sra zhing
[\[132a.6\]]lci la/_'pho zhing 'gul ba dang /_skyed dbri med de mal gcig na brtan par 'dug la/_skran bem bem por 'dug_/bad kan gyi skran rang gi gnas su 'dug pa de na ba ni bad kan gyi nad kyi dus dus su ldang zhing na'o/_/de la rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gang
[\[132a.7\]]yang rung ba las/_rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu nad sna gnyis las skran du gyur pa ni skran na ba'i nad thabs kyang nad sna gnyis 'dres pa'i nad thabs su 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan sna gsum las skran du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rab tu na la tsha/_skran de stug
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]cing sra la 'bur 'bur po mthor 'gyur/_skran de myur du smin par 'gyur ro/_/nad 'dus pa tshang ba'i nad 'di ni gsor mi rung ngo /_/de la khrag skran ni bud med 'ba' zhig la 'byung ste/_zla mtshan zag gam gsar du bu bcas sam/_'on te mngal gyi nad dang gcig
[\[132b.2\]]yod pa las kha zas rlung nad du 'gyur ba'i bag zos pa dang /_rlung nad slong bar 'gyur ba'i bag bsten pas rlung nad langs nas zla mtshan zla re zhing dus su 'ong ba nang du 'gags te/_lto ba cher skyes te/_rum na bu chags pa 'dra bar snang /_snying na/_kha zas kyi ro kha cig
[\[132b.3\]]yid la 'dod pa snyam byed/_nu zho yang chang chung snang /_khong rmya ste/_de lta bu las bags kyis rlung nad dang phrad pa dang skran de mkhris pa'i gnas su zhen nas khrag skran te/_rlung dang mkhris pa las 'byung ba na la khong pa'i nang sra ba mer mer po'i bag dang khong tshab dang /_tshad pas
[\[132b.4\]]'khru/_skom/_rims nad kyis 'debs/_'di lta bu'i nad bla thabs su yang 'gyur ro/_/yang na mngal gyi nang na khrag yod pa bas nad tshabs rab tu che'o/_/mngal gyi nang nas kyang zag la dri mi zhim pa dang /_zug pa'i nad thabs dang /_na la g.yo zhing 'phar ba yang /_
[\[132b.5\]]de ni mngal du bu chags pa zhes mi bya'i skran mngal du chags pa yin te/_skran de la p+r+wa p+r+wa byed/_skran de nyid gong bur gyur te 'dug kyang gal te tshigs ring zhig lon zhing 'gul te par par byed na yang de lta bu yang rum na bu yod ces mi bya'i mngal du skran de nyid cher skyes zhes bya'o/_/
[\[132b.6\]]yang na skran no cog rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so'i nad kyi gnas la brten te skran du gyur pa dang /_'dus pa'i skran du gyur pa de dag ni gal te yun ring po zhig na skran smin te rdol bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na ni smin cing rdol du mi rung ngo /_/khong 'bras kyi nad byung ba ni skran dang mi
[\[132b.7\]]'dra ste/_de nad khrag ngan pa la brten pas/_myur du smin cing rdol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de ni myur du tsha bar byed pas na de'i phyir zhes bya'o/_/de la skran gyi phyi nang gi bar na yod pa'i nad thabs ni chu so dang /_lto ba dang /_snying dang /_mcher pa dang /_khong pa'i drod chung zhing mdog
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]nyams/_nyams 'tshag bri/_bshang gci sri zhing 'gags/_phyi rol du skran 'byung ba ni nad thabs 'di dang mi 'dra'o/_/nang grol gyi mtha' ma na skran yod pa ni/_nad tshabs mi che'o/_/skran 'dug pa de'i 'khor na sha mdog kyang 'gyur la phyi rol du glo glo bor
[\[133a.2\]]cher snang ngo /_/de la rlung nad las hen kyir 'gyur ba yang yod de/_de ni rlung gyen du rgyu ba dang /_thur du rgyu ba rnams 'gyil te 'gags pas lto ba rab tu cher gyur la hen gyis byung ste/_shin tu na ba de ni rlung nad kyis hen kyir gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de yang rdo ba'i gtun bu 'jong po
[\[133a.3\]]ltar lto ba nas yar gyen du sra zhing mkhrang ba stug po mdud pa can rdo ba'i gtun bu 'jong 'jong po ltar phyir 'bur zhing glo bar 'byung ba de ni hen gyi gyen du byung ba zhes bya'o/_/hen gyi lto ba nas drang por 'dug pa ni/_hen gyi thad kar 'dug pa zhes bya'o/_/long ka nas rgyu
[\[133a.4\]]zhabs gzhang dang /_dku do'i bar du thur du zug cing gsang la bar du na ba de ni thur du zug pa'i rlung nad ces bya'o/_/nad thabs de las bzlog ste tshul de 'dra ba las thad kar zug ste na'am gyen du zug ste na ba de ni gyen du zug pa'i rlung nad ces bya'o/_/sbrags pa rab tu
[\[133a.5\]]mang ba dang /_bshang ba 'ong du mi rung ste/_'gags pa dang kha zas 'grangs shing tshim par za ba'i nus pa dang /_rgyu ma'i nang na sgra khru lu lu zer zhing drod chung ste/_zas mi 'ju ba dang /_hen gyis 'bur 'bur por byung na/_de lta bu'i skran nye bar 'ongs pa'i nad thabs
[\[133a.6\]]yin zhes zer ro/_/'bras nad dang /_rgyu rlugs dang /_skran dang /_'di sna gsum gyi nad gzhi bshad pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa bshad par bya'o/_/yang na nad do cog thams cad kyang
[\[133a.7\]]pho ba'i ma drod chung ba las nad du 'gyur ro/_/pho ba'i me drod chung na dmu rdzing gi nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la dmu rdzing gi nad du gyur pa'i nad gzhi ni zas ma zhu ba dang /_kha zas mi 'phrod pa'i bag dang /_kha zas rtsub mo khengs bu zhag lon pa dang /_zas kyi ro dang mdog
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_bud med kyi skra dang /_sen mo dang /_shing tsher lta bus rgyu ma brtol ba dang /_dri ma ltar song ba dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang /_bshang gci lta bu'i dri ma 'di rnams khong du bsags pas lus kyi srog zungs bdun stod smad du rgyu ba dang /_
[\[133b.2\]]bad kan rgyu ba'i rtsa rnams 'gags te/_lus khong na yod pa'i rlung srog ces bya ba dang /_pho ba'i drod kyis me dang thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'di rnams la gnod par byas/_pags pa dang sha mthangs kyi bar du yang nad zhugs nas gsus pa cher skyes pa de ni dmu rdzing
[\[133b.3\]]gi nad ces bya'o/_/de la yang rnam pa brgyad de/_rlung gi dmu rdzing dang /_mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing dang /_bad kan gyi dmu rdzing dang /_'dus pa'i dmu rdzing dang /_mdzer pa las dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_spu dang skra dang rta rnga'i bag lta bu dang /_kha zas 'dres pa zos
[\[133b.4\]]pa dang /_rgyu ma'i nang du 'khris te bshang ba 'gags nas/_bshang ba de mang du 'khyil pa las dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_kha zas kyi nang du rus pa dang /_gra ma dang /_nya'i gra ma dang /_rtsa dang /_shing bu dang /_gseg ma rnon po'i bag ltor song ba des rgyu ma rdol te bu byung
[\[133b.5\]]ngam ha cang 'grangs ches pa zhig las glal ba'i dbugs nang du rngubs drags pas rgyu ma gas te lto ba'i nang du zag cing 'khyil bas dmu rdzing chags pa dang /_zas ma zhu ste pho bar be'u snabs chags pa'i steng du snum bag dang /_'tshal nan du chu'i bag 'thungs pa dang /_'tshal
[\[133b.6\]]nan du chu ha cang mang du 'thungs pa dang /_pho ba'i drod chung bas ma zhu ba'am/_yang na ha cang skem por gyur pa de lta bu las drod chung zhing grang nad rlung skyes pas kha zas zos pa'i bcud dngas ma rtsa so sor 'gro ba'i rtsa sgo yang 'gags la bad kan gyis kyang chod la bad kan dang /_
[\[133b.7\]]dmu chur 'dres nas cher skyes pa de ni dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dmu rdzing rnam pa de brgyad gang ltar gyur kyang rung ste dmu rdzing du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rkan dang mchu skam/_rkang lag dang lto ba skrangs/_sems dran pa dang nyams 'tshag dang kha zas 'di rnams lnga las bri ste
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]nyams/_lus sha rid de skem/_gsus pa cher skye ste lus gzugs spyir bltas na dmu rdzing gis btab pa'i mi de yi dgas 'dra'o/_/de ltar dmu rdzing gi nad du gyur pa de bkres te kha kha byed pa yang nyams te med/_kha zas zos na yang yun ring du mi 'ju
[\[134a.2\]]la 'ju ba'i tshe na yang dang ga tsha zhing skyur bzhin du 'ju la kha zas zhu'am/_ma zhu ba'i drod kyang ma zin la 'grangs par mi nus/_nyams 'tshag kyang nyin gcig pas nyin gcig cing bri la cung zad cig las byas pas bskyod na yang dbugs mi bde ste rngam pa drag tu 'byung /_
[\[134a.3\]]bshang ba khong du bsogs shing sri la rkang pa cung zad skrang /_chu so'i mtshams su na zhing gang ste rgyas/_kha zas yang ba cung zad zos kyang sbos pa bzhin du 'gyur te/_gsus pa'i gnyer ma ni rangs/_rtsa ni rgyas/_dmu rdzing du gyur pa'i nad thabs 'dra ste/_myos shing
[\[134a.4\]]slon bag tu 'gyur la khong pa'i drod ni dro/_bshang ba'i dri ma sri zhing 'gags na drod chung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus ni tsha zhing skrangs la gsus pa cher skyes te/_mjug tu lto ba'i nang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la dmu rdzing gi nad rlung las gyur pa'i shas che na sha mdog smug
[\[134a.5\]]skrang pa med/_gsus pa khur thogs pa bzhin lci ba yin/_rtsa mang po'i dra ba skar khung ris bzhin du gsus pa bkra/_lto ba'i nang na rtag par sgra 'u ru ru zer/_lte ba dang rgyu mar zug cing rab tu na/_rlung nad las gyur na snying dang rked pa dang lta ba dang gzhang dang chu so g.yas
[\[134a.6\]]g.yon du zug cing na/_dbugs thur du sgra can du 'byung /_gcin sri ste cung zad tsam du 'byung /_pho ba'i drod ha cang che ba yang ma yin/_khar ro mi bro ba yang ma yin te/_zas yi gar 'ong zhing 'dod de 'di lta bu ni rlung nad kyi shas che ba las dmu rdzing du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rlung
[\[134a.7\]]nad kyi dmu rdzing ni lag pa dang /_gzhang dang pho mtshan gyi 'bras bu dang lto ba 'di rnams skrang /_lto ba'i stod dang lto ba'i smad dang /_rtsib logs dang rked pa dang rgyab dang /_'di rnams su na/_rus pa'i tshigs bya ba snyam byed/_lud pa skam lud kyis bkar/_lus kyi yan lag
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]na/_ro smad lci/_bshang ba sri zhing 'gags/_lus kyi pags pa'i sha mdog dang /_skra dang sen mo la sogs pa gnag la rtsa dmar/_gsus pa glo bur du res 'ga' ni skye/_res 'ga' ni 'bri/_gsus pa zug cing na/_rtsa phra mo zug cing rgyas/_gsus pa rkyal pa bus pa
[\[134b.2\]]bzhin du rgyas te/_gsus pa rgyas na rkyal pa bus pa brdabs pa skad zer la lto ba'i nang phan tshun yan man kun du rlung rgyu lan zhing zug_/de la mkhris pa las dmu rdzing du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rims nad kyis 'debs/_brgyal/_khong tsha/_skom dad che/_kha'i nang tsha/_mgo
[\[134b.3\]]'khor/_tshad pas rab tu 'khru/_pags pa'i sha mdog dang sen mo la sogs pa ser por snang /_gsus pa'i mdog kyang ser/_lto ba'i rtsa rnams kyi mdog kyang ser la zangs kyi kha dog bzhin dmar/_lus rngul la tsha zhing bsregs pa snyam byed la lus kyi ngad par
[\[134b.4\]]'gyur/_reg na 'jam/_myur du smin cing rnags te zag par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las dmu rdzing du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rkang lag gi lhu tshigs na/_rkang lag tshor ba'i bag med de bem bem por 'dug_/gsus pa skrangs la lci/_gnyid che/_rtag tu slon/_zas
[\[134b.5\]]yi gar mi 'ong /_dbugs mi bde/_lud pa lu/_pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mdog skya bor 'gyur ro/_/dmu rdzing skyes pa'i lto ba sra zhing mkhrang la 'jam/_gsus pa'i steng du rtsa dkar po chen pos gang /_gsus pa bags kyis cher skyes te sra zhing mkhrang /_
[\[134b.6\]]lag pas myangs na grang /_gsus pa lci/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum car 'dus pa las dmu rdzing du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so'i dmu rdzing gi nad thabs bshad pa ste/_de lta bu'i nad sna tshang ba'i dmu rdzing de ni 'dus pa'i dmu
[\[134b.7\]]rdzing zhes kyang bya ste/_'dus pa'i dmu rdzing gi nad du gyur pa ni bud med kyi kha zas kyi nang du skra dang /_sen mo dang dri ma dang gnod par 'gyur ba'i dbyig dug dang /_dug la sogs pas khong pa nang du khrag dang nad rnams bstsags pas/_gsus pa yang dmu rdzing ltar skyel/_
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]kha skam/_mgo 'khor/_brgyal ba'i nad thabs 'di lta bu ni 'dus pa'i dmu rdzing gi nad thabs yin te/_grang lhags dang /_rlung dang nam rmus na nad na bar 'gyur/_myur du smin cing rnags te mi bzad par na bar 'gyur ro/_/de las mcher pa las dmu
[\[135a.2\]]rdzing du gyur pa ni kha zas ha cang cher zos pas nang du 'khrugs te mi bde ba dang /_phan tshun du song zhing drag shul cher bskyod pa byas pas bud med la ha cang drags pa dang /_las ches pas dub pa dang /_lam rings kyis dub pa dang /_bkru sman dang skyug sman lta bu drags pas lus rke
[\[135a.3\]]ste mcher pa glo g.yon na 'dug pa thur du lhung nas mcher pa skrangs sam/_khrag gis rgyas sam yang na zas kyi bcud khu ba ma zhu bas cher skrangs pas rdo ba'i gtun bu bzhin sra bar 'gyur te/_rus sbal gyi rgyab bzhin du sngar mkhrang bar gyur pa las bags kyis cher skyes nas lto bar
[\[135a.4\]]dmu rdzing ltar chags pa dang /_na ba'i thabs ni dbugs mi bde/_lud pa lu/_skom dad che/_kha zas khar ro ci bro mi tshor/_lto ba cher rgyas lan/_rims kyis 'debs/_kha gdong gi sha mdog skya bo rbab rbab por 'dug_/brgyal/_slon/_khong tsha zhing myos pa de lta bur 'gyur
[\[135a.5\]]ro/_/rtsa rnams ni dmar zhing smug pa'am/_sngo zhing ser la mi sdug pa de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/bshang ba thur du 'ong du mi rung ste/_'gag cing na/_gsus pa cher skyes pa dang /_mong mong por gyur pa dang /_skom dang skyes pa dang /_khong tsha zhing rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_lus lci zhing
[\[135a.6\]]zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_gsus pa rgyas te sra bar 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta bu'i bye brag las mcher pa'i dmu rdzing de rlung dang mkhris pa'am bad kan gyis gang che ba las mcher pa'i dmu rdzing dang 'dra bar glo g.yas na mchin pa 'dug pa de yang kha zas ha cang cher zos pas nad du 'khrugs te mi bde
[\[135a.7\]]ba dang /_phan tshun du song zhing drag shul cher bskyod pa byas pa dang /_bud med la ha cang drags pa dang /_las chen pos dub pa dang /_lam rings kyis dub pa dang /_bkru sman dang /_skyug sman lta bu drags pas lus sha rke ste mchin pa g.yas na 'dug pa de thur du lhung nas mched pa bzhin skrangs
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]te dmu rdzing du 'gyur ro/_/de la bya sgro dang skra dang rta rnga la sogs pa kha zas dang 'dres te zos pa des/_rgyu ma'i nang 'khris te 'khums pas bshang ba kun nang du 'khyil zhing 'gags pa dang gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab bam/_bshang ba 'gags te 'byung du mi rung ba'am kha zas kyis rgyu ma'i
[\[135b.2\]]nang gi ngos la chags pas mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang bshang gci rnams 'gags te/_'khyil bas rlung thur du sel ba zhes bya ba zhig_/lto na gnas pa de 'gags shing 'khyil bas nad du gyur te/_rlung des lus kyi khong tsha/_rims nad kyis 'debs/_skom/_sbrid pa 'byung /_lud
[\[135b.3\]]pa lu/_dbugs mi bde/_brla na/_klad pa na/_snying na/_lte ba na/_gzhang dang 'di rnams na bas bshang ba 'gag cing 'khyil/_zas yi gar mi 'ong /_slon/_lto ba'i nang du rlung sgra 'u ru ru zer/_rtsa kun rgyas te sngo la smug_/lte ba'i gong du ba mjug 'dra ba shur shur po snang ba'i hen
[\[135b.4\]]gyi 'byung ba 'di ni/_skra dang rta rnga la sogs pa rgyu ma'i nang du mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/de la rgyu ma ral ba las dmu rdzing du gyur pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_kha zas dang rus pa rnon pos sam/_gseg ma rnon po'i bag dang 'dres pas rgyu ma rdol ba'am/_ha cang ma 'os par drags ches
[\[135b.5\]]pas rgyu ma gas par gyur pa de lta bu las/_khong pa'i nang du yang kha zas kyi snyags snyigs dang /_be'u snabs su bcas te lug par gyur pa dang /_thur du yang bshang ba nyung shas nyung shas mnam po she'u rul lta bu spyi bag tu 'byung ba mdog dmar ser can du 'byung ste/_de lta bus lto ba'i
[\[135b.6\]]nang yang gang /_thur du yang 'di bzhin du 'byung ste/_lte ba man chad lte ba chus gang ba bzhin cher skye la lus kun khyab/_dbugs mi bde/_skom dad che/_mgo 'khor ba 'di lta bu'i nad thabs ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/yang kha cig na re nad de lta bu la rgyu ma zag pa'i dmu rdzing zhes
[\[135b.7\]]kyang zer ro/_/de la dmu chu'i dmu rdzing zhes bya ba ni/_snum bag la sogs pa rtag tu 'thung ba la zhugs pa dang /_'phral du chu mang du 'thungs pa dang /_ha cang chu ma 'os par drag tu 'thungs pa dang /_'di lta bus khong pa'i drod bri ste pho ba'i drod chung ba dang yang na ha cang skem par gyur pa'am
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]'di lta bu'i khong grang zhing rlung bag cher skyes pas bad kan dang chu 'dres pa 'khyil te rdzing ba las je che je cher skyes pa de nyid dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_skom dad che/_rkub tu chu zag cing na/_lud pas bkar/_dbugs mi bde/_zas yi
[\[136a.2\]]gar mi 'ong /_rtsa rnams mdog sna tshogs su bkra la rgyas shing gang /_gsus pa la myangs shing bltas na rkyal pa chus gang ba bzhin 'dug la/_bskyod na khong na skyog skyog zer/_lus 'dar/_de ltar gsus pa dmu rdzing du gyur na che la 'jam/_sra/_lte ba'i thad kar zlum/_nad 'di lta
[\[136a.3\]]bu la dpyad mi byed cing mi gso bar yal bar bor na nad dkyel skyes te/_khong du rul te rnags nas rnag sla mor zag la rus pa'i tshigs dang rtsa kun gyi nang du yang 'gro/_khar yang 'byung /_lus kyi rngul du yang 'byung ngo /_/yang dmu rdzing de gal te thur du 'byung du mi rung zhing 'gags na rgyu ma'i
[\[136a.4\]]nang du 'khyil te/_lto ba g.yas g.yon du thad kar gang zhing 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur na gsus pa lci la sra zhing zlum/_brdabs na sgra 'byung /_gsus pa mdog 'jam/_gsus pa'i rtsa mi snang ste lte ba'i thad kar bsgul na mer mer byed de 'di lta bu'i nad ni chu'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/
[\[136a.5\]]de ltar dmu rdzing gi nad rnam pa de snyed la gso dka' sla'i bye brag ni/_rlung las dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du bad kan las dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_mcher pa las gyur pa dang /_chu las dmu rdzing du gyur pa
[\[136a.6\]]'di rnams ni gong ma bas 'og ma rim bzhin du gso dka'o/_/de ltar dmu rdzing ngo cog gi nad ni/_zla ba phyed lon phan chad dmu rdzing gi nad gang yin pa rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa'i dmu rdzing dang lto bar chu 'khyil ba'i dmu rdzing dang /_dmu rdzing lta bur gyur pa las nad bla brnan lta bus
[\[136a.7\]]btab pa dang /_dmu rdzing gi nad gang yang rung mi 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i 'chi ltas byung ba dang /_dang po skyes pa nas dmu rdzing du gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu ni gso dka'o/_/de la gso sla ba ni dmu rdzing gsar du byung ba dang /_chu'i dmu rdzing lta bur gyur pa dang /_nad pa'i nyams 'tshag gis thub pa
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]dang /_gsos dang sman dpyad du yang rung ba 'di rnams lta bu ni gso sla'o/_/dmu rdzing rnam pa brgyad bshad pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//skya rbab dang /_'or nad dang /_me dbal gyi nad gzhi bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la skya rbab
[\[136b.2\]]kyi nad ni sngar ji skad du bshad pa/_kha zas tsha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa la sogs pa de lta bus mkhris pa'i nad lhag par slong bar byed pas mkhris pa'i nad cher langs pa dang /_mkhris pa snying la gnas pa de rlung gi stobs kyis rtsa chen po bcu'i nang du bkram ste gyes nas lus
[\[136b.3\]]thams cad du khyab ste/_bad kan dang /_pags pa dang /_khrag dang /_sha rnams kyi nang du zhugs te gnod pa'i nad du gyur na/_mkhris pa dang sha dang pags pa'i nang na brten cing 'dug pa des pags pa'i mdog kyang 'gyur te skya ba/_ser ba/_ljang sngon gyi bag yod pa de ni skya
[\[136b.4\]]rbab kyi nad ces bya ste/_kha dog de gsum gyi nang nas skya ba'i shas che bas de'i phyir skya rbab kyi nad ces bya'o/_/de'i phyir nad des lus lci ba dang /_srog zungs kyi khams rnams lhod pa dang /_mdangs dang yon tan yang zad pas/_khrag dang tshil rnams kyang bri ste/_chung du gyur/_lus
[\[136b.5\]]kyi snying po yang med/_dbang po rnams kyang lhod/_lus kyi yan lag kyang brdung ba snyam byed/_nad pa de nyams la snying gnas zag pa snyam byed/_mig dang mig phugs skrangs/_nyams la bying ba snyam byed cing na/_mchil ma mang /_gcom chung ste mang du smra mi phod/_kha zas la
[\[136b.6\]]tshig pa za zhing mi 'dod/_grang ba'i bag mi bzod/_ba spu rnams kyi pho ba'i drod nyams/_dpyi man chad ro smad thur du bying ba snyam byed de lci/_rims kyis 'debs/_dbugs mi bde/_rna ba 'bod cing sgra tsi ri ri zer/_khong ngal/_mgo 'khor te/_skya rbab kyi nad thabs spyi ni de lta bu yin
[\[136b.7\]]no/_/skya rbab kyi nad de yang rnam pa lnga ste/_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_sa zhag lta bu zos pa las skya rbab tu gyur pa rnam pa de lnga'o/_/skya rbab kyi thog ma'i nad thabs ni snying 'phar/_pags
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]pa'i sha mdangs rtsub/_yi ga 'chus/_gcin gyi mdog ser/_rngul med khong pa'i pho ba'i drod chung /_nyams bying ste lci/_khong ngal lo/_/rlung nad las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad thabs ni/_lus kun na zhing zug la 'dar/_mdog gnag cing rtsub/_rtsa rnams
[\[137a.2\]]dang sen mo dang mig dang bshang gci rnams kyi mdog smug_/lus ni skrang /_lto ba na zhing sbo/_khar ro bro ba mi tshor/_rtug skam du 'byung /_rtsib logs dang /_klad pa'i spyi bor zug cing na ba de lta bu yin no/_/mkhris pa las skya rbab tu gyur pa'i nad thabs ni rtsa dang sen mo dang mig la
[\[137a.3\]]sogs pa'i mdog ljang sngon las rtsa ser por snang /_rims kyis 'debs/_dbugs mi bde ste mun pa bzhin rmugs zhes byed pa dang /_skom dad skye/_lus rngul/_brgyal/_nyams la bsil ba'i bag 'dod/_lus mnam ste dri mi zhim/_kha'i nang tsha/_thur du 'khru/_sgregs pa skyur
[\[137a.4\]]la tsha bar 'byung ba 'di lta bu yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad thabs ni rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mdog dkar por snang /_nyams glo bag tu 'dug_/kha'i nang lan tshwa'i ro bro/_ba spu rnams langs te brtse/_skad 'gag_/lud pas bkar/_slon par byed do/_/'dus pa
[\[137a.5\]]las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad thabs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi skya rbab kyi nad thabs kyi sna grangs 'dres par na la tshabs che ste brnags par dka' ba de lta bu yin no/_/sa zhag sbyin po zos pa las skya rbab kyi nad thabs su gyur pa ni/_sa zhag ro bska ba zos na rlung nad kyi skya rbab tu 'gyur
[\[137a.6\]]ro/_/tsha bro ba'i sa zhag zos na mkhris pa'i nad kyi skya rbab tu 'gyur ro/_/sa zhag ro mngar ba zos na bad kan gyi nad kyi skya rbab tu 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sa de lta bu'i bag zos pas lus kyi srog zungs rnams la yang gnod pa'i nad du 'gyur bar byed do/_/kham pa'i sa zhag rtsub mo zos na lus
[\[137a.7\]]kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/_nang gi rgyu ma yang btsos pa snyam byed cing gang la/_khong pa nang du 'gags te nad thabs ni gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar kham pa'i sa zhag zos pas rkang pa dang /_lte ba dang /_kha dang pho mtshan rnams skrang /_bshang ba thur du srin bu can du 'byung zhing bkra bag dang
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'dres par 'ong /_khar bad kan dang khrag tu 'dres par 'ong ngo /_/skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pa'i nad pa de la/_mkhris pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas bsten na mkhris pa'i nad cher skyes pas/_khong pa'i nang grol dang /_lus kyi yan lag gi sha khrag rnams mkhris pa las bsregs
[\[137b.2\]]nas/_mig ser gyi nad du 'gyur te mig dang /_gcin dang /_pags pa dang /_sen mo dang /_kha gdong dang /_bshang ba rnams kyi mdog ser por snang /_lus tshal zas mi 'ju/_skom dad che/_lus kyi mdog ni sbal pa bzhin ser por snang /_dbang po rnams nyams pa 'di lta bu yin
[\[137b.3\]]no/_/mkhris pa'i nad rgyas na/_skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab par mig ser gyi nad kyis 'debs so/_/'or nad kyis btab pa zhig la dpyad mi byed par yal bar bor na lus phyogs su cher skrang ste/_nad gso dka' ba mig ser 'or thabs zhes bya ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/mig ser 'or
[\[137b.4\]]thabs kyi nad de la dpyad 'phyis na/_nad ha li ma ka zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de'i nad thabs ni gdong pa dang /_sha mdog ljang nag ser bar snang ste/_rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis kyi nad kyis mgo 'khor/_skom dad che/_bud med la 'dod pa'i bag med/_rims nad kyis cung zad 'debs/_khong
[\[137b.5\]]snyom/_nyam chung /_pho ba'i drod bri/_khrag ngan pa nad khrag tu 'gyur/_zas ma zhu ba'i tshul du sbo la/_mi slon mi 'khru ba de'i tshe na/_nad de ni ha li ma ka zhes bya ste/_mig ser gyi nad 'di rnams kyang /_skya rbab kyi nad las dpyad 'phyis pa'i bla brnan dang mig ser gyi nad rnams lta bur 'gyur
[\[137b.6\]]ro/_/mig ser gyi nad de lta bu las dpyad 'phyis te/_bying na mig ser gyi nad de lta bu dag gi bla brnan gyi nang na gtsor ni 'or nad du 'gyur ba'i nad mang bas de'i phyir 'di'i rjes la 'or nad kyi dmigs bstan cing bshad de/_'or nad de yang ji lta bu las 'byung zhe na/_mkhris pa dang /_khrag dang /_
[\[137b.7\]]bad kan gyis rlung gi nad bslang ste/_'dus pa'i nad dkyel du bsags pa de yang /_rlung nad kyis rtsa rnams kyi nang 'phros te/_gram pa las rtsa 'gags nas sha dang pags pa'i nang du zhugs te/_skrangs la mkhrang bar 'gyur ba de ni 'or nad thams cad kyi tshul yin no/_/'or nad de yang nad
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]gzhi'i bye brag dang /_nad thabs kyi bye brag las/_'or nad rnam pa dgur yang bshad de/_de ni rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad sna gsum dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan nang gi gnyis gnyis su 'dres pa'i 'or nad sna gsum
[\[138a.2\]]dang /_'dus pa'i 'or nad dang dug gis phog pa'i 'or nad rnam pa dgu'o/_/yang na rtag tu 'or nad du skrang ba dang /_glo bur du 'or thabs su skrang ba dang gnyis so/_/yang lus thams cad 'or thabs su skrang ba'i nad dang /_yan lag rkang lag skrang pa'i 'or nad rnam pa gnyis so/_/yang
[\[138a.3\]]'or nad rnams gsum yod de/_phyogs su rgyas par khyab pa'i 'or nad dang /_mi na bar glo bor skrang ba'i 'or nad dang /_mdud pa bzhin 'bar 'bur du skrang ba'i 'or nad kyi bye brag rnam pa gsum mo/_/de ltar sna tshogs rnam pa 'di ni 'or nad do cog gi spyi'i nad du 'gyur ba'i gzhi las 'byung ngo /_/
[\[138a.4\]]de la 'or nad so so'i nad gzhi'i rgyu tha dad pas/_'or nad so so'i 'gyur ba ni 'or nad du 'gyur ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang /_las dang /_zas smyung ba la sogs pa byas pa dang /_rid cing nyam chung la/_zas sla bag zos pa dang /_zas kyi tshod ha cang drags pa dang /_yang zas spyi bag dang /_
[\[138a.5\]]skyur bag dang /_snum bag dang /_bsil bag dang /_lan tshwa ches pa dang /_thal sman rnon po k+Sha ra lta bu btang ba dang /_zas tsha ba'i bag dang /_ha cang dro ches pa dang /_mya ngan gyis btab pa dang /_chu mang du 'thungs pa dang /_nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo mi nyal ba dang /_kham pa sbyin
[\[138a.6\]]po zos pa dang /_grong khrod na gnas pa bya phag la sogs pa'i sha za ba dang /_sha skam za ba dang /_zas ma zhu ba dang /_khong ngal ba dang /_bud med la drags pa dang /_rkang pas lam ring por song song ba dang /_rta mi bde ba las lus gsigs pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pas
[\[138a.7\]]bkar ba dang /_tshad pas btab pa dang /_gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang /_lto ba'i nad dang /_mngal nas khrag zag pa dang /_rims nad kyis btab pa dang /_sbos te zug pa dang /_sbos te 'khyil nas mi slon pa'i 'khru ba dang /_slon pa drags pa dang /_bud med sbrum ma dang /_me dbal gyi nad kyis
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]btab pa dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_'di lta bu'i bag gzhan yang lus la gnod par 'gyur ba log par bsten pa byas pas 'or nad kyi dkyel 'bras bu 'dus shing babs na/_ro stod yan chad 'or nad skrang ngo /_/ro smad du chu sor nad babs te dkyel du zhugs na/_ro smad man chad skrang ngo /_/
[\[138b.2\]]rked par babs na lus kyi bar rked pa'i 'khor skrang ngo /_/'or nad lus kun du zhugs na lus thams cad skrang ngo /_/lus kyi yan lag rkang pa'am lag pa la babs na yan lag tu skrang ngo /_/de ltar 'or nad kyis 'debs na nad thabs sngar rtsa rnams tsha/_lus dang rkang lag lci ba de rnams
[\[138b.3\]]ltar ltar byed do/_/de las gyur pa'i 'or thabs ni skrang ba mal gcig tu mi skrang bar phan tshun du 'pho la lus dang ba spu rtsub/_sha mdog rtsa gnag la dmar/_lus kyi pags pa 'khums/_rkang lag 'dar/_ba spu brtse zhing sha mthangs la reg na na zhing mi bde/_zug la rus pa kun kha bye
[\[138b.4\]]ba'am chag pa tsam du na/_sha mdangs bem bem por 'gyur te reg pa mi tshor/_nad myur du ldang zhing myur du zhi/_skrangs pa'i steng du mnan cing btsir na khung bu ngor zhes 'byung /_til gyi 'bru mar ram/_'bri mar lta bu dron por byas te/_bsku zhing mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan
[\[138b.5\]]mo ni skrang ba bri/_nyin par ni cher skrang /_pags pa'i sha mdangs yungs mar gyis bskus pa bzhin tsha bar byed/_sha mdangs kyi mdog ni rtsa ser dmar gyi mdog la nag por snang ngo /_/mkhris pa las 'or nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni pags pa dang ba spu zangs mdog tu snang /_skrang ba
[\[138b.6\]]myur du lus la mched cing myur du zhe na/_sngar lus kyi rked par 'or nad 'byung /_skom dad che/_lus tsha/_rims nad kyis 'debs/_lus rngul/_lus rngul bag tu mnam/_myos bag la mig 'khor/_grang zhing bsil ba'i bag 'dod/_tshad pas thur du 'khru zhing mnam/_sha mthangs
[\[138b.7\]]la reg na mi bzod la mdog 'jam mo/_/bad kan las 'or nad du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni lus g.ya'/_sha mthangs dang /_ba spu rnams mdog dkar/_sha mthangs khong mkhrang zhing grang la lci/_mdog snum/_'jam/_na ba la ldang dub med par rtag_/glong bag tu 'dug la gnyid che/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]slon/_pho ba'i me drod nyams/_skrangs pa'i steng du mnan na khung bu lcongs zhes byed/_bad kan gyi 'or nad 'di 'byung ba yang dkon/_byung na yang gso dka'/_mtshan mo ni tshabs cher skrang /_bad kan gyi 'or nad la gtar ga btab na yang khrag myur du mi phyin/_dro zhing
[\[139a.2\]]tsha ba'i bag rag na dga'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan lta bu gnyis gnyis su 'dres pa'i nad thabs ni bad kan dang /_mkhris pa'i 'or nad sna gnyis kyi nad thabs su na ba yin no/_/'dus pa'i 'or nad kyi nad thabs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyi 'or nad sna gsum
[\[139a.3\]]gyi nad sna tshang ba'i nad thabs su na ba yin na/_de la snad pa'i 'or nad kyi nad thabs ni mtshon la sogs pas tshad dam dral tam/_rmas sam/_lhags pa'am kha bas rul tam mes tshig gam/_mtshor zhugs te lus skrangs sam/_bse rtsi'i 'bras bu go be'am/_sman ka pi ka tsu'am/_
[\[139a.4\]]gra ma la sogs pas reg cing phog na skrangs pa mched par 'gyur te/_mdog dmar por snang la rab tu tsha ste/_'di lta bu snang ba'i rtags tshang ba mkhris pa'i bag tu gtogs so/_/dug gis phog pa'i 'or zhes bya ba ni srog chags gdug pa'i bag lus la song ba'i gcin gyis phog pa dang /_
[\[139a.5\]]so dang mche ba dang /_sen mos zug cing skrangs pa dang /_srog chags gdug pa'i bag ma yin pas rtug gcin dang /_khu ba lta bu'i dri ma phog pa dang /_dug gi shing gi rlung khar babs pa dang /_dbyig dug gam dug sbyar ma'i phye ma reg pa 'di lta bu las 'or nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la 'or nad
[\[139a.6\]]gso ba ni/_skrang ba phan tshun du 'pho ba mi mkhrang ste snyi/_lus myur du tsha zhing rtse 'jil/_'or gsar du byung ma thag la de'i steng du nad bla brnan gyi bag med pa de lta bu ni gso sla'o/_/'or nad gso dka' ba ni sngar logs shig tu bshad pa yin no/_/de la me dbal gyi nad thabs ni rnam pa
[\[139a.7\]]gnyis te/_mtshon dang rdo dbyug gis snad pa las me dbal gyi nad du 'gyur ba dang /_rlung ngam mkhris pa'am bad kan gyis nad bslang ste/_me dbal du 'gyur ba ni 'or nad kyi nad gzhi las 'or nad du gyur pa dang 'dra'o/_/me dbal de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_phyi rol na gnas pa dang /_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]nang na gnas pa dang /_gnyi ga na gnas pa dang gsum mo/_/'di gsum la gso dka' sla yang rim bzhin te/_phyi'i me dbal ni gso sla/_nang gi me dbal ni gso dka'/_phyi nang gnyis ka'i me dbal ni de bas kyang gso dka'o/_/yang na me dbal gyi nad kyang rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_
[\[139b.2\]]bad kan gyis nad slong bar 'gyur ba'i nad langs te/_me dbal gyi nad du 'gyur mod kyi/_lhag par ni tsha ba'i bag gis nad bslang ste/_lus kun la me dbal gyis khyab par byed de/_nang gi me dbal nang na gnas/_phyi'i me dbal phyi na gnas/_phyi nang gnyis ka'i me dbal yang phyi nang gi
[\[139b.3\]]bar na gnas te/_nad des lus kyi nad rnams la tsha bas gdungs la myos bag tu byed/_rtsa rnams kyi sgo 'gag_/skom dad lhag par che/_bshang gci res 'ga' ni mang du 'ong /_/res 'ga' ni 'gag par byed cing sri/_pho ba'i drod dang nyams 'tshag myur du nyams te/_bri ba yin te nad
[\[139b.4\]]thabs 'di lta bu ni nang gi me dbal zhes bya'o/_/phyi'i me dbal ni nad thabs 'di rnams lta bu las tshul bzlog ste shes par bya'o/_/phyi nang gnyis ka'i me dbal ni nad thabs de rnam gnyis ltar na'o/_/me dbal gyi nad thabs spyi ni de lta bur blta'o/_/rlung nad las me dbal du gyur pa'i nad
[\[139b.5\]]thabs ni/_rlung nad las rims su gyur pa'i nad thabs dang 'dra ste/_tsha ba'i nad lus kun tu mched la skrang /_zug cing ph+r+wa ph+r+wa byed/_lus dang yan lag rnams brdung brdung ba snyam byed/_ba spu rnams langs shing brtse ba 'di lta bur byed do/_/mkhris pa las me dbal du gyur pa'i nad
[\[139b.6\]]thabs ni lus kun tu me dbal gyi nad myur du mched cing 'gro/_spyi ni mkhris pa las rims tsha bar gyur pa dang thabs gcig ste/_lus dang bzhin mdog rab tu dmar ro/_/bad kan las me dbal du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni me dbal gyi 'brum bu'i 'khor g.ya' la pags pa 'jam ste/_nad thabs
[\[139b.7\]]spyi ni bad kan gyi rims dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar me dbal dang 'bras la sogs pa byung na sman dang dpyad mi byed par yal bar bzhag na rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so'i nad kyi tshul las bsags pa smin te rdol ba dang rma'i tshul la so so'i nad gang yin pa gsal bar shes par 'gyur ro/_/de la
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]rlung dang mkhris pa sna gnyis 'dres pa las me dbal du gyur pa'i nad thabs ni/_rims nad kyis 'debs/_slon/_brgyal/_tshad pas rab tu 'khru/_skom dad che/_mgo 'khor/_lhu tshigs kyi rus pa chag
[\[140a.2\]]pa snyam byed/_pho ba'i me drod nyams/_dbugs mi bde/_snying mug mug byed cing mun thibs thibs byed pa bzhin du mi dran/_kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_lus dang yan lag la me dbal mched do cog me dbal gyi nad rgya sol gyi me mdag 'bar ba bzhin du tsha/_
[\[140a.3\]]sha mdog gnag la sngo/_yang na khrag nag rgyas pa'i dkyil du yang stsogs shing me dbal gyi 'brum bu de mes tshig pa 'dra ba zhig yod de/_des lus thog thag tu myur du mched de khyab pa dang gnad kun gyi nang du yang 'jug cing 'gro la chu ser lta bu'i bag zag go/_/gal te me dbal rlung nad kyi shas
[\[140a.4\]]che na/_lus dang yan lag rab tu na la/_mi dran te myos/_gnyid che/_dbugs mi bde/_dbugs kyi rngam pa drag tu 'byung /_skyigs bus 'debs pa'i nad thabs 'di lta bur gyur na/_nad pa de sngas gar bor yang dga' ba dang bde ba med do/_/skabs skabs su rkang lag brkyang
[\[140a.5\]]zhing bya rmyang byas na yang /_lus dang sems mi bde zhing khong ngal bar 'gyur/_sems rmongs bag gis gsal te go dka'/_gnyid che ba de lta bu ni me dang 'dra bar me dbal zhes bya'o/_/de la mdzer ba 'dra bar 'byung ba las me dbal du 'gyur ba'i nad thabs ni/_bad kan cher skyes pas
[\[140a.6\]]rlung 'khyil zhing 'gag ste/_rlung 'gags shing 'khyil ba des/_bad kan rdol te rlung de khrag gi nang du zhugs te/_khrag nad bslangs nas pags pa dang /_rtsa phran dang /_chu ba dang /_sha kun gyi nang du khrag nad zhugs nas thor bu phra mo ring po dang /_thor bu sbom po sra ba mdzer ba dang
[\[140a.7\]]'dra bar 'byung ste/_mang po phreng ba bzhin du chags te mdog dmar por 'dug pa sde lta bur byung rab tu na/_rims kyis 'debs/_dbugs mi bde/_lud pas bkar/_tshad pas rab tu 'khru/_kha skam/_skyigs bus 'debs/_slon/_mgo 'khor/_rmongs bag tu
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'gyur/_pags pa'i sha mdog mi sdug_/brgyal/_lus dang yan lag kun brdung brdung ba snyam byed/_pho ba'i me drod nyams par gyur pa'i nad thabs 'di lta bu ni mdzer pa lta bu'i me dbal gyi nad bad kan dang rlung gnyis kyis slong ste bad kan dang mkhris pa las ni rims su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[140b.2\]]bad kan gyis ni lus dang yan lag rengs pa'i bag la gnyid che/_glo bag tu 'dug_/klad pa na/_lus kyi yan lag na zhing brkyang bskum byed 'dod/_tshig mang du smra/_zas yi gar mi 'ong /_mgo 'khor/_brgyal/_pho ba'i me drod nyams/_rkang lag gi rus pa rnams chag pa
[\[140b.3\]]snyam byed/_skom dad che/_dbang po rnams mi gsal la lci/_tshad pa be'u snabs su 'khru/_dang ga rdzing zhing gang ba snyam byed/_de nas rtsa chen po kun gyi nang du zhugs shing 'gro la/_phal cher ni pho ba'i nang du nad zhugs nas/_lus kyi phyogs yan gar na ba ni ma yin gyi/_lus
[\[140b.4\]]kun du na ste/_des na thor bu ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar pos gang bas na/_nor bu skar phran ltar snang ste/_lus mdog gnag la 'jam/_dri ma can du 'gyur/_'or thabs su skrang /_lus lci/_thor bu rnags pa'i zabs che/_rab tu dred che ste tsha la rul zhing rnags/_
[\[140b.5\]]sha kun kyang rul zhing rnags zhig nas/_rtsa rgyus nyi tshe gsal bar snang ste/_lus mi ro ltar gyur pa 'di ni 'dam 'dra ba'i me dbal gyi nad ces bya'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum 'dus pa'i me dbal gyi nad ni/_me dbal gyi nad thabs thams cad tshang bar na ste/_'dus
[\[140b.6\]]pa'i me dbal gyi nad des/_lus kyi srog zungs bdun la myur du khyab par byed do/_/mtshon gyis rmas pa las khrag nad langs te/_chu ser dang tsha ba skyes na me dbal gyi nad thabs su 'gyur te/_de la rlung nad kyis kyang mched nas/_mon sran dkar ru 'dra bar 'byung ste/_skrangs la
[\[140b.7\]]rims nad lta bur 'gyur ro/_/tsha la dmar smug tu 'gyur ro/_/me dbal gyi nad de la gso dka' sla'i bye brag tu rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan sna re'i me dbal ni gso sla'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu sna gnyis las me dbal du gyur la nad bla brnan gyis btab na yang gso sla'o/_/me
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dbal gyi nad de la gso dka' ba ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu sna gnyis las me dbal du gyur pa mtshon gyis rmas te rma red pa'i me dbal dang /_nad thams cad 'dus pa'i me dbal gyis lus kyi gnas kun du khyab pa dang /_rtsa dang /_chu ba dang /_sha dang 'di rnams
[\[141a.2\]]kun rul te/_ro bzhin mnam por gyur pa 'di lta bu'i me dbal ni gso dka'o/_/skya rbab dang /_'or nad dang /_me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//mdze nad dang /_ltor srin bu 'jug pa'i nad gzhi bshad pa ste/_le'u bcu bzhi
[\[141a.3\]]pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la mdze nad kyis 'debs pa'i nad gzhi ni/_kha zas mi 'phrod pa gnod pa lta bu la sogs pa zos pa dang lus kyi bya ba bskyod pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba la sogs pa gnod pa mi 'phrod par 'gyur ba'i bag byas pa dang /_dge ba'i mi dam pa dag la smod pa
[\[141a.4\]]dang /_srog gcod pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la sogs sdig pa'i las la brten pa dang /_'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe byas sam/_da lta 'phral du byas pa'i sdig gis/_khong nas nad bslang /_nad rtsa kun gyi nang du gram ste zhugs nas/_sha dang pags pa dang /_khrag dang chu ser gyi
[\[141a.5\]]nad langs te nang gi sha rnams kyang khong sla bar gyur nas/_mdze nad lus kyi phyir 'byung ngo /_/mdze nad 'byung ba'i thabs ni mdze nad ngan pas pags pa'i mdog mi sdug par byed do/_/mdze nad kyis thebs pa las sman dpyad mi byed par yal bar bor na/_lus thams cad ma rungs
