[\[161b.5\]]kan dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sman gyis byug pa dang /_sna nas btang ba'i sman dang /_mkhur bar bcang ba rnams byas na phan no/_/lus zungs rnams la brten pa'i rims grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_snum pa dang /_rtsub pa la sogs
[\[161b.6\]]pa'i cho ga byas kyang ma zhi na de la ni lag pa gnyis las rim gyis khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/rims mi bzad pa la cho ga gong ma des kyang zhir mi 'dod na nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang shas che ba brtags te/_so so'i bya ba
[\[161b.7\]]bzhin du spang bar bya zhing 'og nas smos pa bzhin du gso bar bya ste/_de yang pa to la dang /_pu tse shel dang /_gla skang dang /_a ru ra dang /_shing mngar dang /_'di rnams lan bzhi lnga bskol ba'i rjes su blud na rims mi bzad pa rnams sel
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bar byed do/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_a ru ra dang /_sle tres dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'di rnams gang yang rung ba'i khu ba bskol ba dron mo'am grang mo yang rung ste/_de bzhin du mar dang /_'dag gu dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[162a.2\]]ri lu la sogs pa re re'i sbyor ba bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bzhin du bya ba'am yang na go bye'u gnyis dang sbyar ba byin na ni rims mi bzad pa zhi bar byed do/_/nyi ma gang la nyin bzhi pa'i rims la sogs pas btab pa'i dus su nad gzhi rnams brtag ste/_lus
[\[162a.3\]]'phel bar bya ba'i cho ga tshul bzhin du bya'o/_/sgog skya'i til mar dang bcas pa tho rangs sam kha zas kyi gong du btung ba'am de bzhin du mar rnying pa dang /_zho dang /_'o ma dang /_dar ba dang /_srang drug pa zhes bya ba'i mar gcong chen po'i skabs su
[\[162a.4\]]bshad pa dang /_dge ba'i sman mar smyo byed kyi skabs su 'byung ba dang /_ba'i rnam lnga'i sman mar brjed byed kyi skabs su 'byung ba dang /_tig ta'i sman mar mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa dang /_ba sha ka'i sman mar khrag mkhris kyi nang nas 'byung
[\[162a.5\]]ba'am/_'di rnams gang yang rung ba nang par ram zas kyi gong du rims mi bzad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_rgya shug dang /_ag ni man+tha dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i nang du mar dang mar gyi nyis 'gyur gyi zho dang /_mar gyi bzhi
[\[162a.6\]]cha'i seng phrom gyi shun phrags gi phye ma btab ste/_yang bskol ba'i mar las ran par 'thungs na rims mi bzad pa 'joms pa'i mchog yin no/_/'bras bu'i chang dang /_'bru'i chang legs par smin pa dang /_rma bya dang /_sreg pa dang /_khyim
[\[162a.7\]]bya'i sha gtsang ba dro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa zas dang lhan cig ci 'dod pa tshim tshad du zos la/_zhag de nyid la gnyid log pa'am/_yang na slon du gzhug go/_/yang na sman mar thun tshad chen po 'thungs la de'i 'og tu skyug sman bya'o/_/thog mar snum chos dang
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]dugs byas la/_de nas ni li ni dang /_a dza gan+d+ha dang /_dur byid dang /_pu tse shel dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dang bskyos te/_rims kyis btab pa'i zhag btung ngo /_/ldong ros dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_pi pi ling dang /_til mar dang
[\[162b.2\]]lhan cig sbyar ba'i mig sman yang gzhug go/_/shing kun dang /_stag gi tshil cha mnyam pa rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'i sna sman gtang ngo /_/yang na mar rnying pa gcig pu'am/_yang na seng ge'i tshil rgyam tsha dang sbyar te sna sman gtang ngo /_/yang na ba la ka sha dang /_
[\[162b.3\]]nim pa'i lo ma dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_a ru ra dang /_yungs kar dang /_nas dang /_mar dang sbyar bas bdug par byas na rims ma rungs pa sel to/_/yang na byi la'i rtug pa'i bdug pa yang de bzhin du phan no/_/bya ma ka dang /_shu dag
[\[162b.4\]]dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_nim pa dang /_a ka dang /_a ka ru dang /_thang shing dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba'i dud pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i bdug pa zhes bya ste/_rims thams cad la sbyar ro/_/gzhan yang 'jigs pa las rims su gyur pa
[\[162b.5\]]dang /_sems bsgyur ba las rims su gyur pa dang /_'byung po dang /_smyo byed dang /_brjed byed kyi nad du bshad pa'i bdug pa dang /_sna sman dang mig sman du bshad pa rnams skabs 'dir rims thams cad la sbyar ro/_/gzhan yang lha bstan pa dang nor
[\[162b.6\]]bu bcang ba dang /_sngags dang /_gtor ma gtong ba dang /_lha mchod pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_nye bar gso sbyong bya ba dang /_bde legs dang phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa byas na/_rims nad thams cad sel to/_/glo bur du byung ba'i rims mi bzad pa ni
[\[162b.7\]]phal cher gdan las gyur pa ste/_de la ni lha la bsnyen cing mchod na de nyid de'i sman yin no/_/rims mi bzad pa la grang ba dang /_dro ba la sogs pa rang rang gi gso ba rnam pa thams cad byas kyang ma zhi na/_khrag gtar bar bya'o/_/rlung dang /_me dbal dang /_
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'brum bu las gyur pa'i rims nad la ni sman mar dang /_byug pa grang mo dang /_blugs pa dang /_sha khu dang /_bza' ba dang /_khrag tu dbyung ba la sogs pa rang rang gi gso ba bzhin du bya'o/_/zhag gsum pa'i rims la ni nam tshong gi
[\[163a.2\]]rtsa las gtar ro/_/zhag bzhi pa la ni rgyab kyi nam tshong gi drang thad kyi rtsa las gtar ro/_/dngas ma la rims ma rungs pa zhugs pa la ni smyung ba dang skyug sman gtong ngo /_/rims de khrag gi nang du zhugs na ni khrag la phan pa'i sman bskol ba'i chu lus la gtor
[\[163a.3\]]ba dang /_bsku ba dang /_gtar ga rnams bya'o/_/rims de sha la gnas na ni bkru sman rnon po gtong ngo /_/tshil la gnas na ni tshil dbri ba'i sman bya'o/_/rims de rus pa dang rkang la gnas na ni dugs dang /_mnye ba dang /_bsku byug dang /_rlung
[\[163a.4\]]nad zhi ba'i sman rnams bya ste/_khyad par du 'jam rtsi mas gtong na phan no/_/'byung po'i gdon las gyur pa'i rims la ni sngags dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na phan no/_/sman bdugs pa'i dris phog pa las rims su gyur pa la ni mkhris
[\[163a.5\]]pa zhi bar byed pa'i sman rnams sbyin na phan no/_/dug gis phog pa las rims su gyur pa la ni dug gso ba'i dpyad bya'o/_/khros pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni gang la dga' ba'i nor sbyin pa dang /_snying dga' ba'i gtam bya'o/_/des ma zhi na
[\[163a.6\]]phan pa'i zas dang sman bsten par bya'o/_/des kyang ma zhi na mi phan pa'i zas dang sman gyis gso'o/_/de dag gis ma phan na bkru sman gtong na phan no/_/khro ba las rims byung ba la ni 'dod pa bsten pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa la chags pa
[\[163a.7\]]las rims su gyur pa la khro ba bskyed pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan dang 'jigs pa las rims su gyur pa la ni khro ba dang snying du sdug pa dang gnyis ka bsten pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dmod pa dang drag shul gyi las las rims su gyur pa la ni srid srung gi
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]rig byed kyi cho ga'am/_lha la sogs pa la mchod pa byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/glo bur du byung ba'i rims de rnams thog mar ni gcig pu byung ba yin na phyis ni nad gzhi 'dres nas byung ba yin te/_de bas na glo bur du byung ba'i rims la ni sman dang dpyad
[\[163b.2\]]nad gzhi dang ji ltar mthun par gso'o/_/rims de rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi mi ldan gyi bar du ni/_gting zug par mi 'gyur ro/_/rims ldang ba'i dus su sems pa las rims su gyur pa la ni yul yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon du byas na dran pa
[\[163b.3\]]zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la yid dga' bar bya ste/_snying rjes sems brlan par gyur na rims 'joms so/_/skyes bu rims dang bral zhing nyams stobs ma skyes pa la ni lus kyi rtsol ba dang /_'khrig pa dang /_de bzhin du kha
[\[163b.4\]]zas lci ba dang /_ma goms pa dang tsha ba bskyed pa dang /_gzhan rims skyed pa'i rgyu thams cad spang bar bya'o/_/rims las byang ba yin na yang kha zas thams cad 'chol bar mang du mi bza' ste/_/nyam chung bas kha zas 'chol bar zos na nad byang ba yin na
[\[163b.5\]]yang phyir nad ldog par byed do/_/de bas na bag ma byas pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten pa las ni srog 'phral la 'phrog par byed pa yin pas khyad par du nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags te/_smyung ba dang /_dugs dang /_nas kyi thug pa dang /_tig ta'i khu ba
[\[163b.6\]]dang /_smin par byed pa'i sman dang /_'o ma dang mar la sogs pa gso ba thams cad sbyar bar bya'o/_/lha khyab 'jug gis gtong ba'i rims shin tu drag po la ni sman dang /_nor bu dang /_sngags rnams mgo la gdags so/_/gzhan yang pha ma
[\[163b.7\]]la sogs pa dam pa rnams dang /_bla ma dang /_bram ze dang /_lha rnams la mchod pa dang /_yid dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod pa'i yul rnams bsten par byas pas kyang rims rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gso ba'i gnas las rims nad gso ba'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs so//_//_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]de nas khrag mkhris gso ba'i le'u gnyis pa bshad par bya ste/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan zhing khrag stod du shugs mi drag par 'byung ba de yang gsar du dgun nam grang ba'i dus su bla brnan med par 'byung na/_mdo'i gnas nad med par 'gyur ba'i tshul
[\[164a.2\]]bstan pa'i le'u las khrag mkhris shas che bar 'gyur ba'i gso ba 'dir sbyar ro/_/khrag mkhris thur du byung ba dang /_nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las 'byung ba dang /_ldang dub byed pa dang /_stod du byung ba'i khrag kha dang /_sna dang /_mig dang /_rna ba'i bu gar 'pho zhing 'byung ba dang /_
[\[164a.3\]]smad du byung ba'i khrag pho mtshan dang /_rkub nas 'byung ba dang /_yang na khrag stod smad du phyin ci log tu 'byung ba rnams la ni rim pas khad kyis brdal la gso'o/_/stod smad gnyis ka las khrag cher 'byung zhing me'i drod chung ba dang /_nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa dang /_
[\[164a.4\]]stod smad gang yang rung ba las tshabs cher 'byung ba rnams ni spang bar bya'o/_/de la nad gzhi dang /_nyi ma ring thung nur ba'i dus dang /_khrag mkhris de nad gzhi gang dang 'brel nas stobs che chung du song ba dang /_yul dang dus la sogs pa brtags nas khrag gong 'og
[\[164a.5\]]gang nas byung ba la sogs pa bye brag shes par byas nas/_de'i 'og tu smyung ba'am/_lus 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba'am/_lus sbyang ba'am/_sman gyis zhi bar bya ba rnams gang rigs par bya'o/_/kha zas dro ba dang rno ba la sogs pas mkhris pa'i nad skyes pa de yang /_
[\[164a.6\]]nad gzhi mang po dang 'dres te nyams stobs dang ldan la khrag stod du byung ba la ni bkru sman btang la/_smad du byung ba la ni skyug sman gtang ngo /_/lus 'phel zhing nyams stobs dang ldan na ni smyung ba bya'o/_/gal te lus smyung ba byas pa dang /_rid pa yin na ni nyams stobs
[\[164a.7\]]skyed pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/khrag stod du byung ba la ni kha ba dang /_bska ba'i sman gyi khu bas zhi bar bya'o/_/smyung ba byas pa la ni bca' sga ma gtogs pa'i yan lag drug pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/khrag thur du byung ba la ni mngar ba'i khu bcud kyis zhi bar bya'o/_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]khrag stod du byung ba la ni thog mar skyo ma blud do/_/smad du byung ba la ni sman thug blud do/_/khrag mkhris can nyams stobs yod cing sha ma zad pa la zas za nus pa de ni skyon gyis khrag byung du zin kyang dang bor khrag bcad du mi rung ngo /_/bcad sngas na nad mang du skyed do/_/gzhan
[\[164b.2\]]du na nyams zad cing zas za mi nus te/_nyes pa dag cing khrag mang du 'byung ba la ni khrag ma bcad na mes tshig pa bzhin du myur du 'chi bar byed do/_/dur byid dang /_sha ma dur byid gnyis bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du yang de nyid btags pa'i phye ma dang /_sha kha ra'i phye ma
[\[164b.3\]]dang sbyar nas lag pa'i mthil du bzhag ste bldag go/_/dur byid dang /_sha ma dur byid dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sha kha ra dang sbyar ba'i ri lu byas te/_de las ran par zos na/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag stod du lud pa dang /_skrang
[\[164b.4\]]ba dang /_rims rnams 'joms so/_/yang na dur byid dang /_sha kha ra cha snyoms te/_kha ra'i bzhi cha'i pi pi ling dang /_de rnams sbrang rtsi dang /_ri lu byas te zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/yang na khrag thur du 'byung ba la ni skyug sman btang ste/_chu dang skyo
[\[164b.5\]]ma sbyar ba'i nang du/_po son cha dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra btab pa'am/_yang na po son cha dang /_kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_chu dang sbyar ba btang ba'am/_yang na shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du po son cha btab pa'am/_yang na bu ram chu po son cha dang
[\[164b.6\]]sbyar ba'am/_sbyor ba de dag las gang yang rung ba byas na skyugs par 'gyur te/_thur du 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris la bsngags so/_/de ltar slon khrus kyis lus dag par byas nas/_nyams stobs bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_rang rang gi gso ba skyo ma dang /_thug
[\[164b.7\]]pa la sogs pa rim bzhin sbyar ro/_/de la skyo ma ni rims nad gso ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rgun 'brum mam/_shing tog ma du ka la sogs pa'i skyo ma'am/_yang na mkhris pa 'joms pa'i 'bras bu'i rigs rgun 'brum dang /_skyu ru ra la sogs pa'i skyo ma blud do/_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]yang na 'bra go dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_ma du ka dang /_pa ru sha ka dang /_'di rnams kha ra dang sbyar ba ni snying po lnga'i skyo ma zhes bya ste blud pa'am/_yang na snying po lnga'i sman khu'i nang du mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_'bras yos kyi phye ma dang 'di
[\[165a.2\]]rnams chu dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud do/_/gal te skyu ru ra la dga' zhing me drod chung ba yin na ni skyu ru ra dang se'u 'bru lta bu gdab po/_/de la thug pa ni pad+ma ge sar dang /_ut+pa la'i ge sar dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_pri yang ku rnams bskol ba'i thug pa'am/_yang na pu
[\[165a.3\]]shel tse'am/_seng phrom dkar po dang tsan+dan dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i thug pa'i nang du bca' sga btab pa'am/_yang na ba la ka dang /_da ta ka'i me tog dang /_bil ba'i rkang dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba'i thug pa'am/_yang na tig ta dang /_
[\[165a.4\]]pu shel tse dang /_gla sgang dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba'i thug pa'am/_yang na sran chung dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni sbyar ba'am/_yang na sa la par+Ni 'am/_mon sran sde'u dang sbyar ba'i thug pa'am/_yang na ba la dang /_ha re Nu ka dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'am/_gong gi thug pa'i
[\[165a.5\]]sbyor ba de rnams bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa grang mo'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang kha ra btab ste/_sbyor ba re re nas de ltar sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sha khu'i nang du mngar la
[\[165a.6\]]dad pa yin na mar dang brngos la sha kha ra dang ldan par sbyin no/_/skyur la dad pa yin na ni skyur la btang ba blud do/_/kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing shes pa'i le'u las yang zhing bsil ba'i kha zas grang ba dang /_gang bu las skyes pa'i 'bru dang /_tshod ma yang ba dang
[\[165a.7\]]bsil ba'i nus pa can khrag mkhris la rab tu bsngags so/_/btung ba ni gong du smos pa'i yan lag drug pa'i sman las dong gra spangs pa'i btung ba'am/_yang na rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol ba'am/_yang na chu bskol ba bsgrangs pa'am/_yang na sbrang rtsi'i chu'am/_yang na
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]mkhris pa 'joms pa'i 'bras bu rgun 'brum dang /_'bra go la sogs pa bskol ba'i chu blud do/_/rtug pa 'gags pa la ni rgya sne'u dang /_ri bong gi sha dang sbyar ba phan no/_/rlung shas che ba'i rtug pa 'gags pa la ni sreg pa'i sha dang u dum+bA ra bskol ba blud pa'am/_yang
[\[165b.2\]]na shing p+lag sha bskol ba'i nang du rma bya'i sha dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na n+ya gro d+ha dang khyim bya'i sha dang bskol ba blud do/_/mdor na khrag dang mkhris pa skye ba'i rgyu dro ba dang rno ba thams cad spang bar bya'o/_/ba sha ka bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du pri yang ku dang /_sa nag po
[\[165b.3\]]dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_seng phrom dang /_sbrang rtsi sbyar ba 'thungs na khrag mkhris 'joms so/_/yang na ba sha ka nyi tshe bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na ba sha ka bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra btab pa 'thungs na de ma thag tu khrag mkhris 'joms so/_/
[\[165b.4\]]khrag mkhris la ni ba sha ka 'di las lhag pa med do/_/pa to la dang /_su ma na dang /_tsan+dan rnam gnyis dang /_nim pa dang /_shug pa dang /_de rnams lhan cig sbyar ba'am/_yang na seng phrom dang /_ba sha ka dang /_mon sne'u dme ru dang /_sa nag po dang /_ma du
[\[165b.5\]]yan ti ka zhes bya ba sen rtsi rnams sbyar ba'am/_yang na nye'u shing thal tres dang /_ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang shing mngar dang 'di rnams sbyar ba'am/_sbyor ba de gsum gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa 'thungs na/_khrag
[\[165b.6\]]mkhris 'joms so/_/yang na rgya skyegs shing gi shun pa bskol ba'i nang du ka ra btab pa 'thungs na yang phan no/_/yang na ba glang gi lci ba dang /_rta rtug btsir ba'i khu ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang mar btab pa btung ngo /_/khrag ska bar byung ba la ni bya phug ron gyi rtug
[\[165b.7\]]pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bldag go/_/khrag shas cher 'byung ba la ni skam sa na gnas pa'i bya dang /_ri dgas kyi khrag sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba btung ngo /_/yang na ra'i mtshan ma mkhris pa dang bcas pa btsos pa'am/_ma btsos pa yang rung zos na phan no/_/yang na
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]sman pa la ni bskol ba'i khu ba srang drug tsam gyi nang du tsan+dan dang /_pu shel tse dang /_gla sgang dang /_'bras yos dang /_mung+ga dang /_pi pi ling dang /_nas dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma bcug la spangs te/_nang par btsags la tshigs ma
[\[166a.2\]]bor te/_dngas ma blud na khrag mkhris 'joms so/_/tsan+dan dang /_pad+ma dang /_pu shel tse dang /_de gsum gyi khu ba'i nang du bong ba bsregs pa dmar por gyur pa bcug ste/_spangs pa'i dngas ma bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra btab pa blud na khrag mkhris shas che ba
[\[166a.3\]]las rgyal lo/_/bu ram shing gi tshigs ma brdungs pa chu dang mnyes pa'i khu ba rdza snod gsar pa'i nang du bcug la/_khang pa'i phyi rol du bzhag ste bsrungs la tho rangs ras la btsags te tshigs ma bor/_dngas ma sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa me tog pad+ma kha phye ba'i dris
[\[166a.4\]]bsgos pa 'thungs na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/mkhris pa'i rims 'joms pa'i sman dug mo nyung la sogs pa'i sman thams cad kyang khrag mkhris la sbyar bar bya'o/_/gong ma'i sman khu ba'i sbyor ba de dag gis me drod skyes te/_bad kan zad pa dang /_khrag
[\[166a.5\]]mkhris da rung ma zhi zhing /_rlung dang 'dres nas 'khrugs pa la ni ra'i 'o ma'am/_ba'i rnam lnga chu lnga 'gyur dang bskol la chu du ba dang blud na phan no/_/yang na rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang /_ba'i rnam lnga dang ra'i 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra btab pa btung ngo /_/yang na
[\[166a.6\]]rgun 'brum dang /_bca' sga dang /_ba la dang /_gze ma dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_de rnams re re yang chu dang bskol ba'i nang du 'o ma dang /_mar btab pa sbyar te gtang ngo /_/yang na 'o ma dang kha ra dang bskol te mar dang sbyar la gtang ngo /_/gze ma dang nye'u shing 'o ma dang
[\[166a.7\]]bskol ba'am/_yang na 'dab ma rnam bzhi 'o ma dang bskol ba 'thungs na khrag nad myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_khyad par du gcin 'ong ba'i bu ga nas khrag 'byung ba la phan no/_/khrag rkub nas 'byung ba la ni chu shing gi khu ba dang 'o ma sbyar ba blud na phan no/_/yang na n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu 'o ma dang
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bskol ba'am/_yang na bca' sga dang /_u di tsa dang /_ut+pal dang 'o ma bskol ba blud na phan no/_/yang na khrag tu 'khru ba'i gso ba dang /_gzhang 'brum khrag tshad can gyi gso ba ji snyed pa'ang 'dir sbyar ro/_/sman khu ba 'thungs pa'i 'og tu bza' ba yang gong
[\[166b.2\]]ma'i 'og ma bskol ba dang sbyar ro/_/yang na gong gi sbyor ba de dag mar dang sbyar ba gtang ngo /_/ba sha ka'i lo ma dang /_sdong bu dang /_rtsa ba dang bcas pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi chu srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bskol te/_brgyad cha lus pa
[\[166b.3\]]dang /_tshigs ma bor ba'i nang du mar srang brgyad dang /_ba sha ka'i me tog srang gnyis phye mar byas te btab pa yang bskol te bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang ldan par 'thungs na/_khrag mkhris dang /_mkhris pa'i skran dang /_rims dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_
[\[166b.4\]]lud pa dang /_snying nad dang /_mig ser dang /_rab rib dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_me dbal dang /_skad 'gags pa rnams 'joms so/_/rgya skyegs shing gi lo ma btsir ba'i khu ba dang /_de'i bzhi cha'i mar dang bskol ba'i nang du mar gyi bzhi cha ba la sha
[\[166b.5\]]rgya skyegs shing gi lo ma dang /_sbrang rtsi btab ste 'thungs na khrag mkhris 'joms so/_/de bzhin du kyi lce ba'i lo ma yang sbyor ba de ltar byas na phan yon de dang 'dra'o/_/mgul pa nas khrag lbu ba can dang bad kan dang bcas pa ska bar 'byung ba la ni ut+pa la'i
[\[166b.6\]]sdong bu bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /_mar dang sbrang rtsi rnams 'dag gur byas te sbyin no/_/yang na ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_pri yang ku dang /_shing ma du ka dang /_de rnams re re thal sbyor gong ma dang byas na yang phan no/_/rkub nas mar khrag shas cher 'byung ba
[\[166b.7\]]la ni ru ha dang /_khrag mkhris 'joms pa'i sman gyis 'jam rtsi bya'o/_/sna nas khrag skyon med par 'byung ba la ni/_sna nas gzhug pa dang blugs pa'i sman bya ste/_de yang gong gi sbyar sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du 'o ma dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba la sogs
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa dang bsres te blugs par bya'o/_/yang na 'o ma la sogs pa de dag kha ra dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na chu nyi tshe blugs na phan no/_/yang na se'u'i me tog dang /_a mra dang /_shar du la dang /_
[\[167a.2\]]de gsum gang yang rung ba'i sna sman btang ngo /_/yang na sman bsil ba'i sman rtswa dUr ba dang /_byi tsher ba la sogs pas lus byug pa dang /_bsku mnye dang /_rgyun blugs pa dang /_sman khu grang mo'i nang du lus 'jug pa la sogs pa yang bya'o/_/
[\[167a.3\]]mkhris pa'i rims kyi nad du bshad pa'i lus kyi nang dang /_phyi rol nas sman du bya ba thams cad dang /_glo 'grams pa dang /_zad byed kyis gso ba thams cad kyang khrag mkhris 'di la phan pa yin par sbyar ro/_/gso ba'i gnas las khrag
[\[167a.4\]]mkhris gso ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas lud pa dang glo nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_de la rlung 'ba' zhig las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad la ni/_thog mar rlung la phan pa'i sman sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i snum gyi cho ga spyad
[\[167a.5\]]par bya ste/_de yang snum dang sbyar ba'i thug pa dang /_khu bcud gtang ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_bsku ba dang /_dugs dang /_dud pas bdug pa dang /_de bzhin du bza' ba dang /_btung ba thams cad snum dang bcas par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rtug pa 'gags
[\[167a.6\]]pa la ni 'jam rtsi mas gtong bas bsal bar bya'o/_/rlung las gyur ba'i lud pa de mkhris pa dang bcas par gyur na/_thog ma zas zos la de'i 'og tu mar dang 'o ma nyal kar btung ngo /_/rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa bad kan dang bcas pa yin na ni/_snum dang bcas
[\[167a.7\]]pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung la phan pa'i sman ni sle tres dang /_kaN+Da ka ri gnyis srang sum cu bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te/_chu ni du/_mar ni lus pa dang de nas blud na rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel zhing me'i drod skyed
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]par byed do/_/ya bak+Sha ra dang /_ra sna dang /_shu dag dang /_shing kun dang /_pa tha dang /_shing mngar dang /_'u su dang /_tsha ba rnam lnga dang /_de rnams zho re re dang /_mar khu bre gang dang /_rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang lhan
[\[167b.2\]]cig bskol la/_mar lus pa dang /_de las ci ran tsam 'thungs pa'i rjes la 'bras thug blud na/_lud pa lu ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_skran la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/yang
[\[167b.3\]]na ra sna dang /_rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_nye'u shing dang /_'di rnams srang bcu gnyis bcu gnyis dang /_rgya sran dang /_rgya shug dang /_nas 'di rnams srang brgyad brgyad dang /_ra sha srang bcu dang /_chu srang lnga brgya dang /_'di rnams lhan cig
[\[167b.4\]]bskol te bzhi cha lus pa dang /_de dang mnyam pa'i mar dang /_mar gyi tshad kyi 'o ma dang /_dzi ban ti'i sde tshan lhan cig bskol te/_mar lus pa dang /_de las btung ba dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_'jam rtsi mas gtong ba la sogs pa byas na/_rlung las
[\[167b.5\]]gyur pa la sogs pa'i lud pa rnam lnga dang /_mgo 'dar ba dang /_mo mtshan dang /_brla brag gi nad dang /_lus dang yan lag gang yang rung ba la rlung nad byung ste na ba dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_ro stod man chad kyi rlung nad sel to/_/yang na byi ri'i sde tshan chu dang
[\[167b.6\]]tshul bzhin du bskol ba bzhi cha lus pa dang /_khu ba'i bzhi cha'i mar dang lhan cig bskol la/_mar lus pa dang /_bi da ra'i phye ma nyung zad btab ste/_de las ran par zos na lud pa'i nad sel to/_/yang na shing a shwa ka'i sa bon dang /_shing mngar dang /_bi
[\[167b.7\]]da ka dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_shug pa dang /_lan tshwa byil dang /_kha ru tsha dang bcas pa 'di rnams mar dang tshul bzhin du sbyar ba'am/_yang na sman de rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin zhing de'i 'og tu 'o ma blud pas nad zhi bar byed do/_/yang na byi dang ga dang /_dong
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]gra dang /_ra sna dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shing kun dang /_lce myang tsha dang /_bar gyi zhes bya ba ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_ya bak+Sha ra dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma chu don dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na mar ci ran tsam dang sbyar ba 'thungs na/_rlung dang bad
[\[168a.2\]]kan las gyur pa'i lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skyigs bu dang /_me'i drod chung ba rnams zhi bar byed do/_/yang na rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni byi tsher ba dang /_sring ga bi ra zhes bya ba bca' sga dang /_zur pa dkar po dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_kha ra
[\[168a.3\]]dkar po dang /_sring ga ta ka dang /_'di rnams til mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/yang na dus par sha zhes bya ba byi tsher ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_mu ta zhes bya ba gla sgang dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_kar ka ta sring gi ni dang /_
[\[168a.4\]]Sha Ti zhes bya ba zur pa dkar po dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma bu ram rnying pa dang /_til mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/pi pi ling dang /_bca' sga dang /_kar ka ta sring ga dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma bu ram rnying pa dang til mar
[\[168a.5\]]dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/pi pi ling dang /_sen da pa gnyis kyi phye ma chu dron mo dang sbyar ba rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa can la sbyin no/_/yang na bca' sga dang /_kha ra dkar po'i phye ma zho ga chu'i nang du btab ste blud pa'am/_yang
[\[168a.6\]]na pi pi ling dang /_lce myang tsha gnyis kyi phye ma chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar khol thag chad pa cung zad blugs te/_chang ngam zho ga chu gang yang rung ba dang bsres pa blud na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/lud pa dang bcas pa'i cham pa la ni thog mar 'o ma
[\[168a.7\]]dang /_sha khu dang bcas pa'i bza' ba sbyin la/_de'i 'og tu snum dang bcas pa'i dud pa'i cho ga gong du bstan pa rnams bya'o/_/gzhan yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la dud pa btang ba'i cho ga 'og nas bstan pa rnams la yang lud pa'i cham pa bzhin du/_thog
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]mar 'o ma dang sha khu'i bcud byin la/_de'i 'og tu dud pa gtang bar bya'o/_/kha zas ni dro ba dang /_thang dang chu la gnas pa'i srog chags kyi sha khu dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_ad ma kub ta zhes bya ba kha sral phre'u'i khu ba gang yang rung ba 'bras sA lu dang /_nas
[\[168b.2\]]dang gro dang /_zhag drug cu pa'i 'bras gang yang rung ba dang sbyor ba'i zas byin na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/yang na la la phud dang /_pi pi ling dang /_bil ba'i rkang dang /_dong gra dang /_rtsi tra ka dang /_ra sna dang /_a dza dzi zhes bya ba za ri dang /_kr-iSh+Na
[\[168b.3\]]par+Ni dang /_pa la sha dang /_zur pa dang /_ma nu dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa'i nang du snum dang skyur dang lan tshwas btab pa blud na/_rked pa na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba
[\[168b.4\]]dang /_skyigs bu rnams sel to/_/lhag par yang rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa rnams sbyong ngo /_/rtsa ba bcu bskol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa'i nang du tsha ba lnga'i phye ma dang bu ram btab ste blud na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/yang na til dang /_
[\[168b.5\]]'bras sA lu dang /_skyur dang /_snum dang bcas pa'i thug pa'am/_yang na 'bras kyi 'o thug rgyam tshas btab pa blud na/_rlung gi lud pa la phan no/_/gong du smos pa'i rked pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed do/_/nya dang /_khyim bya dang /_phag dang /_'di
[\[168b.6\]]gsum gang yang rung ba'i sha khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa mar dang rgyam tsha dang ldan par blud na phan yon gong dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan yang ba spru ka dang /_ba yu si zhes bya ba mon sne'u dme ru dang /_ka sa g+ha nan ti dang /_kaN+Da ka ri'i lo ma dang /_'bras bu dang /_la phug gzhon
[\[168b.7\]]nu dang /_skam po dang /_'di rnams la g.yos su byas pa'i tshod ma rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa can la sbyar ro/_/zas ni snum chen po bzhi dang /_'o ma dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba dang /_bu ram las sbyar ba'i btung ba go d+hi ka zhes bya ba dang /_de rnams dang lhan cig sbyar ba
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]bza'o/_/skom du ni zho ga chu dang /_rtsab mo dang /_se'u 'bru'i btung ba chu dang sbyar ba la sogs pa dang /_chang dang /_skom 'di rnams rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa can la blud do/_/mkhris pa dang bad kan las
[\[169a.2\]]gyur pa'i lud pa la ni snum dang bcas pa'i skyug sman btang na phan te/_de bzhin du po son cha dang /_tang pa la dang /_shing mngar dang /_'di gsum chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/slon par byas na phan no/_/yang na po son cha dang /_shing mngar
[\[169a.3\]]gyi phye ma bu ram shing gi khu ba'am/_bi da ra'i khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du btab ste blud na skyugs par 'gyur te/_mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa bad kan gyi shas chung na ni/_shing nye rong gcig pu rgun 'brum
[\[169a.4\]]la sogs pa'i mngar bag dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang ngo /_/ci ste bad kan gyi shas che na shing nye rong sman kha ba'i bag dang sbyar la btang ngo /_/de ltar slon khrus kyis nad dag par byas nas/_de yang mkhris pa shas che zhing bad kan chung ba'i lud pa'i nad la ni/_mngar
[\[169a.5\]]bag dang /_snum bag dang sbyar ba'i thug pa grang mo blud do/_/bad kan shas che zhing mkhris pas shas chung ba'i lud pa la ni/_sman kha ba dang /_rtsub pa dang sbyar ba'i thug pa grang mo blud do/_/mkhris pa nyi tshe las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni/_si da zhes
[\[169a.6\]]bya ba'i kha ra dkar po dang /_ut+pa la dang /_'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas nas byin na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bad mkhris dang bcas pa'i lud pa la ni/_gong ma'i sman gyi steng du gla sgang dang /_na le sham gyis btab ste sbyin no/_/mkhris pa
[\[169a.7\]]dang rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni/_gla sgang dang /_na le sham ma gtogs pa gong ma'i sbyor ba sman gyi steng du mar gyis btab pa'i lde gu bldag tu bcug na phan no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni rgun 'brum lnga bcu pa dang /_ka ni li zhes bya ba'i pi pi ling
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]sum cu dang /_sha kha ra srang gcig dang /_'di gsum sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas te sbyin no/_/yang na be'u rtswa ma zos pa'i tshan bu'i khu ba btsir ba dang /_sbrang rtsir sbyar ba zos na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/yang na star ga zhes bya ba'i shing tsha dang /_
[\[169b.2\]]byo sha zhes bya ba'i tsha ba gsum dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_ma nu dang /_'bras yos dang /_gla sgang dang /_zur pa dkar po dang /_ra sna dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_sha kha ra 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na snying nad dang /_lud
[\[169b.3\]]pa'i nad sel to/_/yang na srog chags thang la gnas pa'i mngar ba'i sha dang /_khre dang khre rgod kyi bza' ba dang /_mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i khu ba dang /_tshod ma kha bar sbyar ba zos na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/bad kan shas che ba la ni sman kha ba dang /_
[\[169b.4\]]sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin no/_/bad kan gyi shas chung ba la ni 'bras drug cu pa'i chan 'o ma la sogs pa'i khu ba dang lhan cig sbyin no/_/btung ba ni sha kha ra dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na rgun chu'am/_bu ram shing gi khu ba'am/_'o ma bskol la bsgrangs pa blud
[\[169b.5\]]par bya'o/_/ka ko la zhes bya ba ram nye'u pa rnam gnyis dang /_me da rnam gnyis dang /_bri ha ti rnam gnyis dang bri sha zhes bya ba rnam gnyis dang /_ba sha ka dang /_dong gra dang 'di rnams zhib tu btags te/_sha khu'am/_'o ma'am/_thug pa gang yang rung ba 'u shar
[\[169b.6\]]sbyar te blud na/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/rgun 'bru dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rtswa'i rtsa ba lnga chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_'o ma dang yang bskol ba'i chu ni du/_'o ma lus pa dang /_bsgrangs pa'i steng du sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ra btab pa 'thungs na/_mkhris
[\[169b.7\]]pa las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar byed do/_/yang na gong ma'i sman khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa blud pa'am/_yang na zur pa'am/_hri be Da zhes bya ba u di tsa dang /_bri ha ti dang /_sha kha ra dang /_bi sha be sha rtsa zhes bya ba bca'
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]sga dang /_'di rnams chu dngas su byas te/_ras las btsags la tshigs ma bor ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar gyis bsres te 'thungs na/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad zhi bar byed do/_/sha kha ra dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_mung+ga par+Ni/_
[\[170a.2\]]ma sha par+Ni dang /_dur ba la zhes bya ba byi tsher ba dang /_'di rnams cham chom brdungs te/_mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang chu dang lhan cig bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa dang /_de las btung ba dang /_bza' ba dang bsku ba la sogs pa byas na mkhris pa las
[\[170a.3\]]gyur pa'i lud pa las rgyal lo/_/yang na sman gong ma de rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa 'thungs na phan no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad la ni thog mar lha shing zhes bya ba thang shing dang mar bskol
[\[170a.4\]]la mar lus pa'i nang du/_tsha ba gsum dang /_nas tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye ma btab pa'i mar gyi snum gyi cho ga bya ste/_de'i 'og tu skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang /_sna sman la sogs pa gong ma'i mar las gzhi blangs te/_nyams dang sbyar ba
[\[170a.5\]]ci rigs par gtang ngo /_/nad pa nyams stobs chung ba la ni slon khrus dang /_sna sman drag po mi gtong ngo /_/de ltar slon khrus byas pa'i rjes la/_nas dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_rgya sran la sogs pa rtsub pa dang /_na le sham la sogs pa tsha ba'i sman
[\[170a.6\]]sbar ba'i thug pa dron mo blud do/_/ka sa mar da ka dang /_brta ka zhes bya ba dang /_bya gr-i zhes bya ba kaN+Da ka ri dang /_de rnams kyi tshod ma ya bak+Sha ra dang /_pi pi ling dang ldan par byas la sbyin no/_/srog chags thang la gnas pa dang /_khung na gnas pa'i sha khu til
[\[170a.7\]]dang /_yungs kar dang /_bil ba dang /_de rnams gang yang rung ba mar dang sbar ba'i khu ba sbyin no/_/skom du ni rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu'am/_chu bskol ba'am/_yang rtag tu chang 'thung ba yin na yang chang ngam/_yang na sbrang rtsi dang chu sbyar ba blud do/_/yang
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]na ma nu'i rtsa ba dang /_dong ga'i rtsa ba dang /_pa to la'i rtsa ba dang /_de rnams cham chom brdungs la chu dang nub gcig spangs te/_de'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'tshal nan du blud na bad kan las gyur ba'i lud pa sel to/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_
[\[170b.2\]]srid kha be re zhes bya ba bca' sga dang /_ba ru ra dang de rnams sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas pa byin na bad kan gyi lud pa 'phrog go/_/yang na rma bya dang /_khyim bya'i sgro zhig kha gab can gyi nang du bcug ste bsregs la/_snag tsha bzhin du nag po song ba dang /_nas tshig
[\[170b.3\]]'khus pa'i thal ba dang bsres la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/_bad kan las gyur ba'i lud pa zhi bar byed do/_/yang na bi sha la zhes bya ba shing nye rong dang /_in+d+ra ba ru ni dang /_pi pi ling dang /_gla sgang dang /_dri bi rtsa zhes bya ba shing nye rong dang /_
[\[170b.4\]]'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud pa'am/_yang na na le sham dang /_sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na rdzong ga ka zhes bya ba a ka ru dang /_sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'am/_yan na kaN+Da ka ri dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na par pa ta dang /_sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'am/_yang na bri ka ra dza dang /_
[\[170b.5\]]sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'am/_yang na ka sa ga na dang /_sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'am/_yang na rta nag po'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'am/_sbyor ba 'di rnams gang yang rung ba zos na/_bad kan las gyur pa'i
[\[170b.6\]]lud pa zhi bar byed do/_/thang shing dang /_zur pa dang /_kar ka ta shring gi dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_'di rnams til mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na/_bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar byed do/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_dong gra dang /_gla sgang
[\[170b.7\]]dang /_a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_kha ra dkar po dang /_'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang /_til mar dang sbyar ba dang /_yang 'bras yos dang /_kha ra dkar po dang /_skyu ru ra'i shing gi myu gu dang /_'di rnams til mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sbyor ba gsum po de
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dag gang yang rung ba zos na/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/yang na se'u 'bru srang gnyis dang /_bu ram srang brgyad dang /_tsha ba gsum srang re re dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma zos na yang yi ga 'bye zhing me'i drod skyed pa dang /_
[\[171a.2\]]skad snyan par 'gyur ba dang /_cham pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na bu ram srang gnyis dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba zho gcig dang /_pi pi ling dang na le sham zho gnyis gnyis dang /_se'u 'bru
[\[171a.3\]]srang phyed dang 'di rnams kyi phye ma zos na/_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na rims nad gso ba'i skabs su/_a ru ra la sogs pa'i sbyar sman bstan pa'i nang du kar ka ta shring gi bsnan la bskol ba'i khu ba blud na lud pa la rab tu phan no/_/
[\[171a.4\]]yang na d+hi s+ya zhes bya ba la la phud dang /_dur byid dang /_bi sha la dang /_gla sgang dang /_puSh+kar mU la dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'di rnams ba gcin nam chu gang yang rung ba dang bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[171a.5\]]yang na pi pi ling zho gnyis dang /_kha ra dkar po zho gnyis kyi phye ma dang /_til mar zho bzhi dang bskol nas ri lur byas la/_rgya sran bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mnyes te 'thungs na bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa 'joms so/_/yang na rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i
[\[171a.6\]]khu ba srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_puSh+kar mU la dang /_zur pa dang /_bil ba dang /_byi'u rug pa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_shing kun dang /_'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang lhan cig bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig
[\[171a.7\]]lus pa dang /_thog mar thug pa blud la de las ran par 'thungs na/_rlung dang bad kan gyi nad thams cad 'joms so/_/yang na nir gun thig le zhes bya ba shes pa la'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba'i bzhi 'gyur gyi mar dang bskol te mar lus pa 'thungs na lud pa 'joms
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]so/_/yang na byi tang ga bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang tsha ba gsum bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na/_lud pa zhi bar byed do/_/yang na ba spru ba me tog dmar po can dang bye'u rug pa dang /_ka sa ma ra dang /_a ru ra dang /_pa to la dang /_bri ha ti dang /_pha
[\[171b.2\]]na dzi ka dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang /_'o ma dang /_tsha ba gsum dang yang legs par bskol nas mar lus pa dang /_de las ran par 'thungs na/_lud pa lu ba dang /_rims mi bzad pa dang /_zad byed kyi nad dang /_gzhang
[\[171b.3\]]'brum la sogs pa las thar bar byed do/_/yang na kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /_'o ma dang bcas pa chu dang tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i khu ba srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du/_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_sman pa la dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_byi dong ga
[\[171b.4\]]dang /_zur pa dang /_bal po se'u dang /_se'u rtsa la zhes bya ba kha ru tsha dang /_ya bak+Sha ra zhes bya ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_ma nu'i rtsa ba dang /_bri k+Shi ba zhes bya ba ba spru ba dang /_bri ha ti dang /_a ru ra dang /_la la phud dang /_kru trug
[\[171b.5\]]tres dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_dbyi mo dang /_pur+Na rna ba me tog dmar po can dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_a ma la po ta sa zhes bya ba lta bu dang /_kar ka ta shring gi ni dang /_ta ma la ki dang /_b+har gi zhes bya ba ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_ra sna dang /_gze ma dang /_'di
[\[171b.6\]]rnams cham chom brdungs pa dang /_'di rnams lhan cig bskol te/_mar lus pa'i ming ni kaN+Da ka ri'i sman mar zhes bya ba ste/_de las ran par 'thungs na/_lud pa'i nad rnam pa lnga dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad rnam pa lnga dang /_skyigs bu'i nad rnam pa lnga po
[\[171b.7\]]rnams la rab tu bsngags te/_bad kan 'joms par byed pa yang yin no/_/yang na kaN+Da ka ri srang brgyad btags pa'i phye ma chu srang nyis stong bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bskol te/_srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad lus pa'i nang du mar srang bcu drug dang /_kha ra dkar po srang bzhi
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]bcu dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_ra sna dang /_sle tres dang /_kru trug tres dang /_kar ka ta shring gi dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_gla sgang dang /_pi pi ling mU la dang /_da na ya zhes bya ba byi tsher ba dang /_'di rnams srang phyed phyed zhib tu btags
[\[172a.2\]]pa blugs la lhan cig bskol te/_khu ba du zhing mar lus te/_dril du btub pa dang /_phyir phyung ste/_snod kyi nang du bsgrangs pa dang /_pi pi ling srang brgyad dang /_smyig rkang srang brgyad dang /_sbrang rtsi rnying pa srang bcu drug dang /_'di rnams mnyes te lde gur byas
[\[172a.3\]]nas ran par zos na/_skran dang /_snying nad dang /_skrangs pa dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa thams cad las nges par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa rtag tu 'byung ba la ni/_dud pa kha nas brngub pa'i cho ga
[\[172a.4\]]bya ba dang yang na bkru sman btang na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_shing mngar dang /_gan+d+ha man si zhes bya ba spang spos dang /_gla sgang dang /_shing ing gu da'i shun phrags dang /_'di rnams dang dud pa brngub pa'i cho ga mdo'i gnas su
[\[172a.5\]]bstan pa bzhin du ji srid lud pa sos kyi bar du bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu bu ram dang /_'o ma dro 'jam tsam du sbyar ba skom du blud na lud pa rtsa ba nas 'joms so/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur ba'i lud pa ni sman khong pa'i dud pa brngub pa byas na/_rgyun gyi lud pa dang
[\[172a.6\]]'phral gyi lud pa 'joms so/_/bad kan gyi lud pa bar bar du mun pa bzhin du snang na ni mkhris pa dang 'brel pa yin no/_/de la ni mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gso ba'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/_/bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa'i lud pa'i nad la ni dang po bad
[\[172a.7\]]kan 'ba' zhig gso ba'i dpyad gong du bstan pa bzhin du bya'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum 'dus pa'i lud pa la ni thog mar mkhris pa gso bar bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan gyi lud pa skam po 'byung ste/_rlung shas che ba la ni snum gyi cho ga bya'o/_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]de nyid phyi sa sla bar 'byung ste/_bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni rtsub pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/mkhris pa'i shas che na ni kha ba'i bag bsten par bya'o/_/glo 'grams te khrag dang bcas pa'i lud pa 'byung ba la ni de ma thag rgya skyegs dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang 'di gsum sbyar
[\[172b.2\]]ba blud do/_/de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na 'bras chan 'o ma dang sha kha ra dang bcas pa sbyin no/_/lud pa lu ba'i tshe rtsib logs gnyis dang /_chu sor zug gzer byed cing mkhris pa'i me drod chung ba la ni rgya skyegs chang dang sbyar ba blud do/_/lud pa lu zhing phyis sla bar 'byung
[\[172b.3\]]ba la ni me'i drod nyams chung na de la ni rgya skyegs dang /_gla sgang dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_pa ca dang /_dug mo yungs kyi shing shun dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dang sbyar ba blud do/_/lud pa lu zhing me drod tshabs cher skyes pa la ni rgya skyegs dang /_mar
[\[172b.4\]]dang /_spra tshil dang /_sman 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang /_smyig rkang dang 'di rnams cha snyoms te 'o ma dang bskol ba blud na phan no/_/glo 'grams te khrag ma chod pa la ni/_ish+t+r+wa ri ka dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i tshigs dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_'di
[\[172b.5\]]rnams cham chom brdungs te/_'o ma dang bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa 'thungs na khrag chod par byed do/_/yang na nas rjen btags pa'i 'o ma dang bskol ba'i thug pa mar dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na kha ra dkar po'i phye ma dang /_'o ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
[\[172b.6\]]ba'i thug pa blud na/_glo 'grams pa'i nad dang rims sel to/_/zad byed kyi lud pa la ni mngar ba'i sman rgun 'brum dang /_shing mngar la sogs pa sbyar ba'i mar byin na phan no/_/yang na bu ram chu bskol ba dang bsgrangs pa'i nang du na le sham dang sbrang rtsi btab pa blud
[\[172b.7\]]pa'am/_yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang 'o ma dang bskol ba mar dang ldan pa blud pa'am/_yang na bcud kyis len gyi skabs su pi pi ling gi cho ga bstan pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/lud pa lu ba dang /_tshigs dang rus par zug cing na ba la ni sbrang rtsi dang /_shing mngar dang /_
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]shing tog ma du ka dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_tu kash+ki ra zhes bya ba'i smyig rkang dang /_ba la dang /_pi pi ling dang 'di rnams mar dang sbyar ba byin na phan no/_/yang na tri dza tra zhes bya ba dri sna gsum zho re re dang /_pi pi ling srang phyed dang /_kha
[\[173a.2\]]ra dkar po dang /_shing tog ma du ka dang /_khar dzu ra zhes bya ba 'bra go dang 'di rnams zho re re zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dang ri lu byas pa ni sug smel gyi ri lu zhes bya ste/_de las ran par zos na ro tsa bar byed de/_khrag dang mkhris pa dang /_lud pa dang /_dbugs
[\[173a.3\]]mi bde ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_skyugs pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_skyigs bu dang /_rmongs pa dang mgo 'khor ba dang /_glo gcong zad byed kyi nad dang /_glo 'grams pa'i nad dang /_skad nyams pa dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_skem byed kyi nad dang /_
[\[173a.4\]]dreg dang /_lud pa khrag tu 'byung ba dang /_snying dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_rims sna tshogs la yang phan no/_/lud pa khrag tu 'byung ba la ni ba spru ba me tog dmar po can dang /_sha kha ra dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_sA lu
[\[173a.5\]]dmar po'i phye ma rgun chu dang /_'o ma dang chu bzhin du bskol ba'i nang du mar btab pa blud do/_/yang na shing mngar dang /_shing tog ma du ka dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_'o mar sbyar ba'i thug pa blud na phan no/_/glo 'grams te kha dang sna la sogs pa las
[\[173a.6\]]khrag mang po lud pa la ni khrag dang /_mkhris pa'i gso ba thams cad bya'o/_/glo 'grams pa'i lud pa rlung gis lam gzhan du song ste/_lud pa ma thon zhing 'gags pa la ni/_ra'i tshil ran par bzhus la chang gi nang du rgyam tsha dang ldan par byas te blud na phan
[\[173a.7\]]no/_/glo 'grams pa dang /_nyams stobs chung ba dang glo gcong zad byed dang /_gnyid mi 'ong ba dang /_me drod rno ches pa la ni 'o ma bskol te/_spris ma ska bar gyur pa'i nang du sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'i bza' ba sbyin no/_/yang na kha ra
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am 'o ma sbyar ba'i thug pa sbyin no/_/khrag dang sha zad pa'i nad la ni srog chags sha za'i sha bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang mar khu dang /_sbrang rtsi dang pi pi
[\[173b.2\]]ling sbyar ba zos na sha khrag skye bar byed do/_/glo 'grams pa dang /_glo gcong zad byed dang /_sa bon dang /_dbang po rnams nyams pa la ni/_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_u dum+bA ra dang /_shing a shwad+tha dang /_p+lag sha dang /_shing sA la dang /_gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang /_
[\[173b.3\]]shing ta la'i rtse mo dang /_shing 'dzam bu'i shun pa dang /_shing pi ya li dang /_shug pa dang /_shing a shwa karna dang /_'di rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar dang 'bras chan dang bcas pa zos na phan no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las
[\[173b.4\]]gyur pa'i glo 'grams pa'i nad btsugs pa ltar na ba la ni lus la mar gyis bsku byug bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i glo 'grams shing btsugs pa snyam byed pa'i nad la ni/_rlung 'joms pa'i sman sna tshogs dang /_til mar du sbyar bas bsku byug bya'o/_/
[\[173b.5\]]snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa'i nad la ni sman 'tsho byed sna bcu bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang yang bskol la/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa blud do/_/yang na snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa na rlung dang mkhris pa dang khrag gang las gyur pa legs par brtags te/_so
[\[173b.6\]]so dang mthun pa'i sman gtang bar bya'o/_/shing mngar dang /_na ga ba la dang /_'di gnyis bskol ba'i khu ba'i bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du sman khu'i phyed kyi mar dang de dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma btab pa dang /_pa ya s+ya dang /_pi pi ling smyig rkang dang /_'di
[\[173b.7\]]rnams cham chom brdungs te/_lhan cig bskol la mar 'ba' zhig lus pa dang /_de las ran par 'thungs na glo 'grams pa'i nad zhi bar byed do/_/sman dzi ban ti'i sde tshan bca' sga dang /_nye'u shing dang /_bi ra zhes bya ba ram nye ba dang /_ba spru ba rnam
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]gnyis dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_ri di dang /_kha sral phre'u dang /_zur pa dang /_ta ma la ka dang /_shing ga tra ka dang /_pa ya s+ya dang /_rtsa ba chung ngu lnga dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_a sho zhes bya ba star ga la sogs pa'i 'bras bu
[\[174a.2\]]mngar zhing snum pa dang /_nyams stobs skyed pa'i sman de rnams zho gnyis zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'o ma dang /_skyu ru ra btsir ba'i khu ba dang /_bi da ri btsir ba'i khu ba dang /_ra sha 'di bzhi srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang
[\[174a.3\]]chu srang brgya drug cu dang /_'di rnams tshul bzhin du bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang bcu drug dang /_sha kha ra srang bcu drug gi phye ma dang /_na le sham dang /_sug smel dang /_shing tsha dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_nA ga ge
[\[174a.4\]]sar dang /_'di lnga srang phyed phyed kyi phye ma dang /_'di rnams dang lde gur byas te/_de las 'ju stobs che chung dang sbyar te bsten na ji ltar lha rnams dang /_klu'i mchog rnams la bdud rtsi bsten na mi 'chi ba bzhin du sman mar 'di yang sngon gyi drang srong chen po rnams kyis
[\[174a.5\]]mi rnams la bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar bshad de/_de las ci ran par 'thungs na/_sa bon nyams pa dang /_glo gcong dang /_glo 'grams pa dang /_nad ma rungs pa rnams kyis lus nyam chung ba dang /_nyal po mi nus pa dang /_mdog dang skad nyams pa
[\[174a.6\]]'phel ba dang /_lud pa dang /_skyigs bu dang /_rims dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa sel bar byed do/_/gzhan yang bu bzang po ster ba dang /_skyugs pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_
[\[174a.7\]]mngal na ba dang /_gcin nad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/gze ma dang /_pu shel tse dang /_btsod dang /_ba la dang /_ka ma li zhes bya ba tang pal dang /_b+hu ti ka dang /_rtswa dUr ba'i rtsa ba dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_pa la sha'i rtsa ba
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]dang /_thal tres dang /_sa la par+Ni dang /_sman de rnams srang re re dang /_chu srang brgya bdun cu rtsa drug dang bskol te/_khu ba srang bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi lus pa'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ba'i 'o ma srang brgya bdun cu rtsa drug gi nang du/_ad ma
[\[174b.2\]]kub ta dang /_dzi ban ti dang /_med rnam gnyis dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_rid d+hi ka dang /_rgun 'brum rnam gnyis dang /_sha kha ra dang /_sra ma na dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams zho drug cham chom brdungs te lhan cig bskol te/_mar
[\[174b.3\]]srang sum cu rtsa gnyis lus pa dang de las ran par 'thungs na/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_snying 'dzag cing na ba la phan no/_/gzhan yang gcin sri ba dang /_gcin nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_lud pa dang /_lus skem pa dang /_zad byed rnams la
[\[174b.4\]]phan zhing gzhu 'dren pas dub pa dang /_bud med kyis dub pa dang /_khur chen pos dub pa dang /_chang gis dub pa dang /_lam gyis dub pa rnams la phan te stobs dang sha skyed par byed do/_/shing mngar srang brgyad dang /_rgun 'bru srang bcu drug dang /_chu
[\[174b.5\]]srang sum brgya brgyad cu rtsa drug dang bskol te/_srang dgu bcu rtsa bdun lus pa'i khu ba'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang yang tshul bzhin du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa'i nang du/_pi pi ling srang brgyad dang /_nas kyi phye srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /_sha
[\[174b.6\]]kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi srang brgyad brgyad zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas btab ste 'dag gur byas nas de las ran par zos na/_glo gcong zad byed dang /_glo 'grams pa dang /_khrag skran dang /_de rnams la phan no/_/yang na da dri zhes bya ba skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu dang /_bi da ri dang /_bu ram shing
[\[174b.7\]]dang /_sman 'tsho byed sna bcu dang /_'di rnams srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang /_ba'i 'o ma bre re re dang 'di rnams lhan cig bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa dang /_phyir phyung ste btsags la bsgrangs pa'i nang du kha ra
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dkar po dang /_sbrang rtsi bre re re btab ste de las ran par 'thungs na/_gcong chen po'i nad dang /_mkhris pa dang /_khrag dang /_lud pa dang /_skem byed dang /_zad byed rnams la phan te/_/gzhan yang tshe ring ba dang /_na tshod brtan pa
[\[175a.2\]]dang /_sha dang /_khu chu dang /_stobs 'phel bar byed do/_/gzhan yang sman gyi lde gu de ni rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas che ba yin na yang sman mar nyung ngus zhi bar byed cing zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/gong du bshad pa'i sman mar gsum po sug smel gyi sman mar dang /_
[\[175a.3\]]bdud rtsi'i sman mar dang /_skyu ru ra'i sman mar 'di gsum gyi phan yon gyi dmigs ni lus nyam chung ba dang /_rid pa dang /_zad byed rnams la phan no/_/gzhan yang zad byed dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rid pa rnams la ni cu gang dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'bras
[\[175a.4\]]yos rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na phan no/_/de'i 'og tu mar dang bu ram sbyar ba'i btung ba blud na/_ro tsa bar byed cing bud med la phod pa dang /_nyams stobs dang ldan zhing lus myur du rgyas par byed do/_/yang na ku
[\[175a.5\]]sman da'i phyi shun dang /_snying po bor ba'i lhag ma srang brgya rlangs pa'i nang du btsos te/_tshos pa dang phyir phyung la/_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du yang bskol la dkrug cing sbrang rtsi dang 'dra bar gyur pa dang /_de'i nang du hwags srang brgyad dang /_pi pi ling
[\[175a.6\]]dang /_bca' sga dang /_tha we dang /_'di gsum srang gsum gsum dang /_dri sna gsum dang /_d+ha rna yang zhes bya ba 'u su dang /_na le sham 'di rnams srang phyed phyed kyi phye mas btab la phyir phyung ste/_snod snum can gyi nang du bcug la bsgrangs te/_sbrang
[\[175a.7\]]rtsi srang bcu drug dang bsres la dkrugs te/_lde gu snod kyi nang du bzhag pa ni lha'i sman pa tha skar gyi bu gnyis kyis bshad pa/_ku sman da zhes bya ba'i bcud kyis len yin te/_de las ran par zos na/_lud pa dang /_skyigs bu dang /_rims dang /_dbugs
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]mi bde ba dang /_khrag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_glo gcong zad byed dang /_glo 'grams pa sel to/_/blo dang /_dran pa dang /_stobs skyed par byed do/_/mahA ba la zho gcig 'o ma dang /_sha sbyar ba dang po'i zhag la zho gcig bza'o/_/de nas zhag brgyad kyi bar du zho re res bskyed de/_srang
[\[175b.2\]]gcig tu gyur pa dang /_de la zhag brgyad kyi bar du zho re res mar phri la/_de nas zhag drug gi bar du zho re res yar bskyed do/_/de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du cho ga de ltar byas te/_kha zas gzhan mi bza' bar sbyor ba de dag byas na/_lus kyi nyams stobs dang tshe dang mdog gsal
[\[175b.3\]]bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/yang na mung+ga par+Ni'i lo ma'am/_shing mngar ram/_bca' sga 'di gsum gang yang rung ba'i cho ga gong ma ltar byas na phan yon yang gong ma dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/mahA ba la srang brgyad chu srang brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du bskol
[\[175b.4\]]te/_khu ba bzhi cha lus pa dang /_de'i nang du khu ba dang mnyam pa'i mar dang /_de dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma dang /_ba la dang /_a ti ba la dang /_shing mngar dang /_ba sbru ba dang /_pra puN+Da rI ka dang /_tang pa la dang /_pi la ya dang /_kha sral phre'u dang /_
[\[175b.5\]]a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_kha ra dkar po dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_me da rnam gnyis dang /_gzem dang /_ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang /_pa ya s+ya dang /_zi ra rnam gnyis dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang /_'bra go dang /_shring ga ta ka dang /_ka she
[\[175b.6\]]ru ka dang /_'di rnams srang phyed phyed cham chom brdungs te bsres la lhan cig bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa ni ma hA ba la'i mar zhes bya ste/_de las ran par 'thungs na/_khrag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_glo gcong zad byed dang /_glo 'grams pa las rgyal

[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]gnyer ma dang skra dkar 'joms par byed pa yin la/_zla ba drug gi bar du bsten na/_rgan po yang gzhon nur 'gyur ro/_/gong du smos pa'i sman mar de dag ni nyams stobs che zhing me drod che ba la gtang ba yin gyi/_nyams stobs chung ba dang /_me drod
[\[176a.2\]]chung ba la yang ma yin te/_de ltar drod chung ba las ni phyi sa sla ba 'byung ba yin te/_de la ni gcong chen po gso ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/_/rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_sran ma ad ma kun ta dang /_shang ka puSh+pa dang /_zur pa dang /_ba la dang /_hasti pi pi ling dang /_a
[\[176a.3\]]pa mar ga dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_ma nu'i rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams srang gnyis gnyis cham chom brdungs pa dang /_nas srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_a ru ra bzang po rdog ma brgya dang /_chu srang sum brgya nyi shu
[\[176a.4\]]dang /_'di rnams lhan cig bskol la/_nas tshos pa dang /_phyir phyung la btsags te/_a ru ra ma gtogs pa tshigs ma bor te/_a ru ra btsos pa de nyid sman khu dang /_bu ram srang brgya dang /_mar srang brgyad dang /_til mar srang brgyad dang /_pi pi ling srang bzhi dang /_'di rnams bskol
[\[176a.5\]]te bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang brgyad btab pa ni/_drang srong ri byi'i lde gu zhes bya ste/_de las rtag tu a ru ra rdog ma gnyis gnyis dang bcas pa'i lde gu zos na bcud kyis len du 'gyur te/_gnyer ma rangs pa dang /_skra dkar med cing mdog dang /_che dang /_
[\[176a.6\]]stobs kyang 'phel bar byed do/_/gzhan yang lud pa rnam pa lnga dang /_zad byed kyi nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skyigs bu dang /_rims mi bzad pa dang /_skran dang /_gcin nad dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_snying nad dang /_yi ga

[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dang /_a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_a pa marga dang /_kha sral phre'u dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_sle tres dang /_ba la dang /_bil ba dang /_tri bi ta zhes bya ba shing nye rong dang /_dan ti dang /_tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang /_lo mar bcas pa dang /_pa yas s+ya zhes bya ba k+Shi ri
[\[176b.2\]]ni dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_spang spos dang /_bi za ka zhes bya ba a sa na'i shing gi snying po dang /_'o mar bcas pa dang /_bo ta s+tha bi ra zhes bya ba'i shing dang /_go bye dang /_byi dang ga dang /_nye'u shing dang /_bu ta ka rany+dza
[\[176b.3\]]dang /_sha mya ka zhes bya ba dong ga dang /_tsan+d+ra me kha dang /_sa ha ra tsa zhes bya ba ba spru dang /_shi kru dang /_nim pa'i shun phrags dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba dang /_'di rnams srang re re dang /_a ru ra stong chig brgya dang /_nas srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad
[\[176b.4\]]dang /_sman de rnams kyi brgyad 'gyur chu dang bskol ba gong ma ltar nas tshos pa dang phyung ste/_khu ba btsir la a ru ra ma gtogs pa'i snyigs ma bor te/_yang a ru ra tshos pa de dang /_bu ram rnying pa srang brgya dang /_til mar dang /_mar dang /_skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang /_'di
[\[176b.5\]]rnams srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis rnams me mi che ba la yang bskol te/_dril du btub pa tsam na phyung ste/_bsgrangs nas de'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_pi pi ling skam po srang bzhi dang /_dri sna gsum srang re re zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste/_de
[\[176b.6\]]rnams legs par bsres nas dkrugs te/_snod rdza ma rnying pa'i nang du bcug nas zla ba gcig gi bar du nas kyi phung po'i nang du bzhag ste/_de nas gong ma bzhin du a ru ra gnyis gnyis lde gu dang bcas par zos na/_drang srong chen po gnas 'jog gis bshad pa'i
[\[176b.7\]]bcud kyis len gyi lde gu zhes bya ste/_gong du smos pa'i lde gu thams cad pas khyad par du phan yon lhag pa yin no/_/nad med pa rnams la yang cho ga bsrung mi dgos par dus thams cad du bsngags so/_/lce myang tsha dang /_bca' sga srang re re dang kha ru tsha srang
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gnyis dang /_da trig dang /_se'u 'bru dang /_ardza ka zhes bya ba zhim thig le dang /_de rnams srang brgyad brgyad dang /_na le sham dang /_go snyod zho re re dang /_'u su zho gnyis dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags

[\[177a.3\]]bal po se'u dang /_da trig dang /_'di rnams srang phyed phyed dang /_kha ru tsha srang gnyis dang /_bca' sga zho gnyis dang /_ka pid ta dang /_a ru ra srang phyed dang gsum gsum dang /_sha kha ra srang bcu drug dang bsres pa'i ka pi da ta ro drug pa'i phye ma zhes
[\[177a.4\]]bya ste/_bza' ba dang btung ba dang lhan cig zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/glo gcong zad byed la ni/_gcong chen po gso ba'i cho ga ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/_/gong du bstan pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba de dag gis glo gcong zad byed kyi nad zhi ste/_nyams
[\[177a.5\]]stobs dang ldan zhing bad kan skyed par gyur na/_de'i rtags mgo bo dang brang na bar gyur pa de la ni dud pa brngub pa'i cho ga rnams bya ste/_de yang me da rnam gnyis dang /_ba la rnam gnyis dang /_shing mngar dang /_btso ma'i shun phrags dang /_'di
[\[177a.6\]]rnams chu thags su bya ste/_reng bur byas nas bskams te me la bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub bo/_/de'i 'og tu dzi ban ti'i sde tshan gyi sman mar 'u sha dang lhan cig btung ngo /_/yang na ldong ros dang /_shing p+lag sha dang /_a dza gan+d+ha dang /_cu gang
[\[177a.7\]]dang /_dong gra dang /_'di rnams yang btso ma'i shun phrags dang chu thags su bya ste/_reng bu'i dud pa brngub par byas nas de'i 'og tu sha kha ra'i chu'am/_bu ram shing gi khu ba'am/_bu ram gyi chu gang yang rung ba blud do/_/yang na ldong ros dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu rlon
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]pa cha snyoms te btags la mar dang sbyar nas reng bu byas te dud pa brngub bo/_/de'i 'og tu sreg pa'i sha khu dang bza' ba dang btung ba sbyar la sbyin no/_/zad byed kyi lud pa la ni thog ma nyams stobs dang me drod bskyed par bya'o/_/nad gzhi mang po las skyed par byed pa dang /_nad gzhi

[\[177b.3\]]dang sbyar ba'am/_'di gsum gang yang rung ba lus zad byed dang nyam chung ba dag par bya ba'i phyir bkru sman de dag bshad do/_/mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_lus zungs bdun zad pa dang /_zad byed kyi nad dang /_lud pa zad byed de la ni kar ka ta sring gi dang /_
[\[177b.4\]]ba la rnam gnyis cham chom brdungs te/_mar bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang bskol te blud do/_/gcin sri zhing mdog sna tshogs su snang ba la ni bi da ri dang ka dam pa gnyis 'o ma dang mar du sbyar ba'am/_yang na shing ta la'i 'bras bu mar dang 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud do/_/

[\[177b.6\]]srog chags khung na gnas pa'i sha dang /_sha sar pa za ba'i srog chags kyi sha dang /_sha za'i srog chags thams cad kyi sha dang /_'di rnams yas kyi go rims bzhin bza'o/_/thang la gnas pa'i srog chags de dag thams cad kyi sha ni shin tu dro zhing rtsa'i rgyun dag pa nas 'jug ste/_
[\[177b.7\]]'dis lus rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes drang srong chen po sgra grag gi bus bshad do/_/dbyi mo dang 'bras bu gsum dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_ku lad+tha zhes bya ba rgya sran dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_pa tha
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]dang /_rgya shug skyur po dang /_nas dang /_de rnams cham chom brdungs te chu dang bskol ba'i nang du/_dong gra dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_zur pa dang /_ma nu dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags
[\[178a.2\]]pa'i phye ma dang /_mar srang gis cha snyoms te tshul bzhin du bskol la mar 'ba' zhig lus ba'i nang du/_ya bak+Sha ra dang /_sardzi ka'i thal ba dang lan tshwa rnam lnga dang /_'di rnams btab ste de las ci ran par 'thungs na/_zad byed dang lud pas nyam thag pa
[\[178a.3\]]sel to/_/ka sa mar da dang /_a ru ra dang /_gla sgang dang /_pa tha dang /_kad pa la dang /_dong gra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pu tse shel dang /_tang pa la dang 'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_
[\[178a.4\]]'o ma dang /_rgun 'brum srang drug cu rtsa bzhi bzhi dang bskol te mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/_skrangs pa dang /_rims dang /_mchin pa dang /_lud pa thams cad 'phrog cing zhi bar byed do/_/bri sha zhes bya ba ba sha ka dang /_kaN+Da ka ri
[\[178a.5\]]dang /_sle tres dang de gsum gyi rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu dang myu gu dang /_lo ma rnams cham chom brdungs pa'i khu ba dang mar du bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa 'thungs na/_lud pa dang yi ga 'chus pa rnams sel to/_/yang na se'u 'bru'i khu ba
[\[178a.6\]]mar ci tsam pa'i nyis 'gyur du bskol te mar lus pa las/_de'i nang du tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma btab ste blud na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/yang na ya bak+Sha ra dang mar sbyar ba zas zos pa'i 'og tu blud do/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_bu ram dang /_mar gyi
[\[178a.7\]]bzhi 'gyur gyi ra'i 'o ma dang 'thungs na/_phan yon gong ma dang mthun no/_/sman mar de dag gis blud na phan yon ni me drod bskyed cing zad byed kyi nad dang /_lud pa'i nad thams cad dang /_brang dang /_rgyun srang dang gre bar nad gzhis lud pa 'gags
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]pa rnams sbyong bar byed do/_/nas srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba rdog ma nyi shu dang /_chu dang tshul bzhin du bskol te nas tshos pa dang /_a ru ra phyir phyung ste mnyes la gong gi nas khu'i nang du a ru ra de nyid dang /_bu ram rnying pa srang drug
[\[178b.2\]]dang /_ldong ros zho gnyis skyer khaN+Da zho gnyis dang 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu sbyar te lde gu zos na lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/srog chags swa bid+ha zhes bya ba la mod 'dra ba'i spu yod de/_de bsregs pa'i thal ba mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sha kha rar sbyar
[\[178b.3\]]ba'am/_rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs pa'i thal ba mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'dag gu zos na lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na e raN+Da'i lo ma bsregs pa'i thal ba dang tsha ba gsum dang til mar dang bu ram bcas par sbyar ba'i 'dag gu'am/_
[\[178b.4\]]yang na e raN+Da dang /_byi'u rug pa'i lo ma bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_til mar dang /_bu ram dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na/_zad byed kyi lud pa 'joms so/_/yang na tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang /_bu ram rnying pa dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'i lde
[\[178b.5\]]gu zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/yang na shug pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_byi dang ga dang /_thang shing gi 'bras bu gsum dang /_ba la dang /_ra sna dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma dang /_phye ma spyi dang mnyam pa'i sha kha ra dang sbyar
[\[178b.6\]]ba'am/_yang na phye ma de mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na/_lud pa sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/de bzhin du na le sham phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/yang na a ru ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_gan+d+ha zhes bya ba
[\[178b.7\]]gla sgang dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang ri lur byas te mur na/_lud pa'i nad thams cad dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad thams cad la phan no/_/yang na ba ru ra gcig pu mur na yang phan yon gong dang 'dra'o/_/seng phrom dang sha kha ra btags pa'i phye ma mar
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]dang bskol ba dang bsres te thug pa'i nang du btab nas btung ba'am/_yang na nas sam gro rjen btags grang zan thabs su sbyar ba'i nang du sman gong ma mar dang bcas pa zos na/_skyugs pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_lud pa dang 'khru
[\[179a.2\]]ba rnams sel to/_/yang na kaN+Da ka ri bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mon sran sde'u dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_se'u 'bru la sogs pa'i skyur dang /_legs par sbyar ba'i yu sha byin na lud pa thams cad kyi sman du bsngags so/_/yang na rlung la phan pa'i sman sna tshogs
[\[179a.3\]]dang 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na srog chags bi ka ra la sogs pa dang /_par gu do zhes bya ba shang shang te'u la sogs pa dang /_ba la zhes bya ba khung na gnas pa'i srog chags sbrul la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi sha khu'am/_yu sha blud na zad byed kyi lud
[\[179a.4\]]pa 'joms so/_/glo gcong zad byed kyi lud pa la ni dud pa gtang ba'i cho ga'i skabs su 'byung ba'i bza' ba'am/_btung bar sbyar ba'am/_yang na 'og nas gcong chen po gso ba'i skabs su bstan pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba thams cad 'dir sbyar ro/_/
[\[179a.5\]]mdor na nyams stobs dang /_me'i drod skyed pa dang /_rgyun srang sbyor bar byed pa'i sman thams cad ni zad byed kyi lud pa gso ba/_stobs che ba mchog tu bsngags so/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i zad byed kyi lud pa ni shin tu mi bzad pa yin te/_de la ni thog
[\[179a.6\]]mar nyes pa gang gi shas che ba brtags nas so so dang mthun pa'i sman bstan par bya'o/_/lud pa gso ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_de la skyigs bu dang
[\[179a.7\]]dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gzhi gcig tu bstan pas gso ba'i dpyad kyang 'dra ste gcig tu bstan pa yin no/_/thog mar skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rtsa'i rgyun srang rnams su bad kan rgyu ba rlung gis bsgongs shing 'gags pa las skyigs bu 'byung ste/_de
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]la ni thog ma snum pa'i sman dang /_lan tshwa dang til mar du bcas pa'i snum dugs legs par byas nas bad kan 'gags pa de zhu zhing slon bya ste/_phyir khong pa'i nang du log nas kha la sogs pa la phyir phyung ste/_de 'byung ba dang rlung legs par rgyu zhing dbugs
[\[179b.2\]]kyang tshul bzhin du 'byung ngo /_/de ltar dugs byas pa'i 'og tu snum dang srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha dang bcas pa'i bza' ba sbyin no/_/yang na snum ma 'byor na zho'i spris ma dang bcas pa sbyin no/_/de'i 'og tu skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad
[\[179b.3\]]pa la skyug sman 'jam po btang ste/_khyad par du lud pa dang /_snying nad dang brang la phan pa'i sman btang na bzang ngo /_/de yang pi pi ling dang /_lce myang tsha dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na skyugs par 'gyur te/_rlung la phan pa'i sman rnams kyang de ltar sbyar ro/_/
[\[179b.4\]]de ltar bad kan rlung gis 'khrugs pa de sman gyis phyir phyung na nad med cing bde ba thob bo/_/de bas na skyug sman gyis slon te/_bad kan phyung na rgyun srang dag ste dbugs legs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbugs mi bde zhing rtug pa 'gags te/_mi dran pa ltar
[\[179b.5\]]byed na de ni mun 'thibs zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad yin te/_de la ni ma du lung ga dang /_star bu dang /_shing kun dang /_bi lu dang /_bi da kha ru tsha dang bcas pa'i zas byin na/_dbugs tshul bzhin du 'byung ngo /_/yang na ma du lung ga la
[\[179b.6\]]sogs pa'i shing tog skyur ba rnams dang /_rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman dro 'jam tsam btang ste/_de ltar bad kan bsgongs pa las rlung 'khrugs te/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba 'byung ba gang yin pa slon khrus gnyis kyis rgyun srang dag par bya ste/_ji
[\[179b.7\]]lta zhe na/_dper na chu'i rgyun bab pa la chu lon gyis bkag na chu lam gzhan nas 'gro ba dang 'dra bar/_rlung rgyu ba bad kan gyis bkag pa yang de dang 'dra bas slon khrus gnyis kyi gong 'og tu dag par bya ba gces so/_/cho ga de ltar byas kyang ma zhi ste/_nang du
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]cung zhig lus pa ltar na dud pa brngub pa'i cho gas zhi bar bya ste/_de yang yung ba dang /_e raN+Da'i lo ma dang /_rtsa ba dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_ldong ros dang /_thang shing dang /_ba bla ba dang /_spang spos dang /_'di rnams zhib tu
[\[180a.2\]]btags pa mar dang sbyar ba'i reng bu bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang na nas zhib tu btags pa mar dang sbyar ba'i reng bu bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang na spra tshil dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'i reng bu'i dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang
[\[180a.3\]]na a ka ru dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'i dud pa brngub pa'am/_tsan+dan bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang na glang gi rwa dang /_ba la dang /_ra sna dang /_'di gsum gyi dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang na srog chags ri shi dang /_go d+ha dang /_ku rang ga ri dgas dang /_
[\[180a.4\]]'di rnams gang yang rung ba'i pags pa dang /_rmig pa dang /_rwa'i dud pa dang /_yang na gu gul lam/_ldong ros sam/_shing tha la'i thang chu de rnams gang yang rung ba'i dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang na sra rtsi pog dang /_a ka ru dang /_shug pa dang /_de
[\[180a.5\]]rnams mar dang sbyar ba'i dud pa brngub bo/_/de la gong du dugs zhes smos pa yang dugs byar mi nus pa'i gnas su ni dugs spang ba yin la/_byar rung ba'i gnas su ni nges par dugs bya ste/_de gang zhe na/_kha ra dkar po dang /_'o ma dro 'jam tsam dang sman snum
[\[180a.6\]]bag can btags pa'i phye ma dang bsres pas blugs pa'i dugs bya'o/_/gzhan yang blugs pa'i dugs dang /_glan pa'i dugs kyi skabs su bstan pa'i sman rnams kyang 'dir sbyar ro/_/glo gcong zad byed dang /_mgrin pa zad byed la yang cho ga 'di ltar sbyar ro/_/
[\[180a.7\]]skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba ma zhu ba dang bcas pa la ni ma zhu ba'i cho ga smyung ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/ji ste dugs dang skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa drags te/_rlung cher 'khrugs pa mthong na de la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman sna tshogs dang /_snum dang bcud kyis
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]len la sogs pa dro 'jam tsam du sbyar la/_de las bza' ba dang btung ba dang /_bsku ba la sogs pa byas na zhi bar byed do/_/ji ste bad kan zad dam dugs byar mi rung ba'i gnas su dugs byas sam/_nyam chung ba la slon khrus byas na/_rlung rnams 'khrugs
[\[180b.2\]]shing gnad rnams skam pa dang /_myur du srog 'phrog par byed do/_/de la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman gyi khu ba dang /_snum dang lde gu la sogs pa sbyar na/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/khams zad cing lus skem pa dang /_tshad pas 'khru
[\[180b.3\]]ba dang /_mkhris pa dang /_tsha ba 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba dang 'dres par gyur pa la ni sman mngar ba'i bag dang /_snum pa dang /_bsil ba la sogs pas gso bar bya'o/_/srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha dang rgya sran dang /_
[\[180b.4\]]rtsa ba bcu pa 'di rnams lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba blud na/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na na le sham dkar po dang /_bar da ka dang /_ka sag na dang /_ba sha ka dang /_la phug skam po dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba byin na
[\[180b.5\]]yang sel to/_/yang na nim pa'i lo ma dang /_ku la ka dang /_bri hi ta dang /_kha lung dang 'di rnams yu shar sbyar ba blud pa'am/_yang na kaN+Da ka ri dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_bil ba'i rkang dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang /_gze ma dang /_sle tres dang /_tsi
[\[180b.6\]]tra ka dang /_rgya sran dang 'di rnams chu dang lhan cig bskol ba'am/_btung ba'am/_yang na ra sna dang /_rtsa ba chung ngu lnga dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba yu sha blud pa'am/_sbyor ba de rnams las gang yang rung ba blud
[\[180b.7\]]na skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/kru trug tres dang /_go snyod dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_de rnams las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa sbyin no/_/yang na rtsa ba bcu pa dang sbyar ba'i thug pa blud na/_lud pa dang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]bde ba rnams la phan no/_/rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_ra sna dang /_zur pa dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_bil ba rnam gnyis kyi rkang dang /_puSh+kar mU la dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang /_pi pi ling dang /_lca ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sle tres dang /_bca' sga dang /_de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba blud la/_de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na de
[\[181a.2\]]rnams las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa sbyin no/_/'bras drug cu pa dang /_gro dang nas dang mon sran sde'u dang /_rgya sran ku lang+tha dang /_de rnams g.yos su byas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba byin na lud pa dang /_ro stod rdzings pa dang /_rtsib logs su zug pa dang /_skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde
[\[181a.3\]]ba rnams zhi bar byed do/_/yang na arka'i myu gu skam po btags te 'o ma dang sbrus la de nas skams nas yang 'o mas sbru zhing bskams pa lan mang du byas la/_tha mar sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bza' ba'am/_yang na rtsa ba bcu pa bskol te khu ba nas phye dang sbyar ba'i lde gu btung
[\[181a.4\]]ngo /_/yang na ya bak+Sha ra dang /_rtsi bo che dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_se'u 'bru dang /_'di rnams mar dang sbyar la bza' ba gtang ba'am/_yang na ma nu dang /_zur pa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_kha lung dang /_star bu dang bcas pa'i bza' ba sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[181a.5\]]gzhan yang skom du rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'am/_yang na thang shing bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na chang gi nying khu gang yang rung ba blud na/_skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_a ru ra dang /_
[\[181a.6\]]byi dang ga dang /_kru trug tres rnams zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu phru ba snum can gyi nang du bskus la/_bcud rad par gyur pa dang /_dar ba chus ma reg pa'i nang du bskus la/_zla gcig gi bar du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na/_me drod skyed pa dang /_lud pa
[\[181a.7\]]dang /_dbugs mi bde ba las nges par rgyal lo/_/yang na pa tha dang /_mur pa dang /_thang shing gi 'bras bu dang /_sa ra ko nyon tse dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags nas chang gi nying khu'i nang du btab ste/_lan tshwa dang bcas pa nub gcig bzhag la/_zhag
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]rer khyor re blud na dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bu sel to/_/yang na ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_bca' sga dang /_'di gnyis btags pa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam btung ba'am/_yang na ya bak+Sha ra dang /_na le sham gyi phye ma chu dron dang gtang ngo /_/yang na bI shu ba
[\[181b.2\]]bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du bI shu ba de dang mnyam pa btags pa'i phye ma dang skyo mar byas te blud do/_/yang na sap+ta par+Ni'i khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsi dang ldan par byas te btung ba'am/_yang na shri sha'i me tog sbrang rtsi dang ldan par byas te blud na/_mkhris pa dang
[\[181b.3\]]bad kan las gyur pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/cu gang dang pi pi ling dang 'bras kyi bye brag ma du zhes bya ba dang /_dong gra dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbyar pa glan pa'i dugs zan thabs su byas te zos na/_des skyigs bu dang
[\[181b.4\]]dbugs mi bde ba dang /_mkhris pa dang ldan pa rnams la phan no/_/skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba rlung dang ldan pa la ni shwa bi tse zhes bya ba'i sha dang /_ri bong gi sha dang /_pi pi ling dang /_mar dang /_ri dgas shal l+ya ka zhes bya ba'i khrag dang /_'di rnams
[\[181b.5\]]gong ma ltar byas la zos na phan no/_/yang na lcam pa'i khu ba dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan zos la/_skom du 'o ma 'thungs na/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bcas pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed do/_/yang na
[\[181b.6\]]ra'i 'o ma bzhi 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol la/_'o ma lus pa dang /_bu ram dang /_dong gra'i phye ma btab pa btung ngo /_/pi pi ling mU la dang /_shing mngar dang /_bu ram dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma glang dang /_rta rtug gnyis btsir ba'i khu ba dang /_mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig zos
[\[181b.7\]]na skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na rta dang /_glang po che dang /_glang dang /_phag dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_lug dang /_ra dang /_'di rnams gang yang rung ba'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bya ste/_de las ran par zos na bad kan
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]shas che ba'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na srog chags rkang bzhi pa'i pags pa dang /_rus pa dang /_spu dang /_rmig pa dang /_rwa dang /_de las byung ba dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bza' ba'am/_yang na a
[\[182a.2\]]shwa gan+d+ha btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na/_bad kan shas che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/yang na zur pa dang /_puSh+kar mU la dang skyu ru ra dang btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na ma nu dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sbrang rtsir
[\[182a.3\]]sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/yang na btsag yug snam dang /_dngul rdo dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na ka pid tha'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na ka pid tha bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du skyu
[\[182a.4\]]ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rgyam tsha'i phye ma btab pa'i lde gu byas pa'am/_yang na a ru ra btags pa'i phye ma dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na na le sham dang /_byi dang ga dang /_pi pi ling btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar
[\[182a.5\]]ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na rgya shug dang /_'bras yos dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_pi pi ling dang /_dong gra dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na yung ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_ra sna dang /_na le sham btags
[\[182a.6\]]pa'i phye ma dang /_bu ram dang til mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_sman gyi sbyor ba de dag las nad gzhi legs par brtags te/_so so dang mthun pa'i khu ba dang /_chu dron dang /_chang dang /_dar ba dang /_zho ga chu dang /_rtsab mo la sogs pa gang dang mthun pa'i nang
[\[182a.7\]]du mnyes te btang na/_bad kan shas che ba'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/_/dzi ban ti dang /_gla sgang dang /_bye'u rug pa dang /_dwa tsha dang /_sug smel rnam gnyis dang /_tsan+t+ra dang /_ta ma la ki dang /_a ka ru dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_dong
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]gra dang /_ba la ka dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang /_zur pa dang /_pi pi ling dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_tsa rong dang /_de rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi sha kha ra dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba'i nang du btab ste ci 'dod pa zos na rtsib logs na ba dang /_
[\[182b.2\]]rims na ba dang /_lud pa dang /_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/dong gra dang bu ram cha snyoms pa bza' ba'am/_yang na sna sman du btang ba'am/_yang na sgog skya dang /_kun dong dang /_grin dza na zhes bya ba sgog pa'i rigs dang /_de
[\[182b.3\]]dag gi rtsa ba chu dang bskol te snar blugs ba'am/_yang na tsan+dan bdar ba snar blugs pa'am/_yang na sbrang ma'i rtug pa bud med kyi nu zho dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na le brgan rtsi dang /_sbrang ma'i rtug pa sbyar ba snar blugs so/_/yang na mar gyi snying khu dang
