[\[243b.1\]]shing dang /_rgya skyegs shing dang /_ha ti pi pi ling dang /_shi kru dang /_a shwa kar+Na dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba'i lde gus dmu rdzing gi phyi rol nas bsku'o/_/yang na brish+tsi ka li dang /_shu dag dang /_bca' sga dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_ba spu ba dang /_
[\[243b.2\]]'u su dang /_ru rta dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na ba gcin gang yang rung bas phyi rol nas dkrugs so/_/de ltar khrus la sogs pa byas nas nad phyung ste/_lto ba zhum par gyur pa dang /_yang lto ba rlung gis mi sbo ba'i phyir sa la dang /_ba la'i sde tshan dugs
[\[243b.3\]]kyi skabs su bshad pa bzhin du dugs byas te/_ras kyis lto ba bcing bar bya'o/_/de ltar legs par khrus byas nas lto ba yang sbo ba lta na snum dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang bcas pa'i bkru sman drag po bya'o/_/rlung bad kan dang bcas pas lto sbo bar byed pa la ni sman rno ba dang /_thal
[\[243b.4\]]sman dang gcin dang bcas pas 'jam rtsi mas gtong bar bya'o/_/de ltar gong du bstan pa'i bya ba de dag ni dmu rdzing spyi'i cho gar grags pa yin no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing can nyams stobs dang ldan pa la ni/_sman byid ri'i sde tshan mar dang bskol ba blud la khong snum par
[\[243b.5\]]gyur pa dang /_yan lag thams cad la dugs bya ste/_seng phrom gyi mar ram/_'dres pa'i sman mar gyis bsku sman bya'o/_/de ltar khrus byas pa'i 'og tu nyams stobs bskyed par bya ba'i phyir thug pa dang 'o ma sbyin no/_/nyams rnyed nas rim gyis 'o ma spang bar bya ste/_yang
[\[243b.6\]]khong pa ltam mam/_sngo bar byed na ni gong du smos pa'i bkru sman yang bya'o/_/de nas me drod chung zhing rtug pa 'gags par gyur pa la ni/_sha khu skyur dang lan tshwa cung zad dang ldan pas yang snum chos bya ste/_de nas dugs byas la rtsa ba bcu pa dang sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi mas
[\[243b.7\]]gtong ngo /_/de nas sman rno ba dang lhan cig 'jam rtsi mas gtong ngo /_/rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing khong rtsub cing phyi sa dang 'phyen 'gags pa dang me'i drod che ba dang /_khong pa 'khrug cing gyo la rus pa dang tshigs dang rtsib logs dang rgyab dang /_mjug to rnams su zug cing na ba la ni til
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dang /_e raN+Da'i mar dang /_rlung nad 'joms pa'i sman dang /_skyur dang ldan par lhan cig bskol te/_mar lus pa des ha nu ba sa mas gtong ngo /_/nyams stobs chung zhing khrus mi theg pa la ni dmu rdzing zhi bar bya ba'i sman 'jam rtsi dang 'o ma dang
[\[244a.2\]]mar dang /_sha khu la sogs pa sbyar ro/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing can gyi nad pa nyams stobs dang ldan pa la ni sman mngar ba dang sbyar bas snum chos bya ste/_sha ma dur byid dang /_'bras bu gsum dang mar lhan cig bskol te khrus bya'o/_/de nas n+ya gro d+ha'i
[\[244a.3\]]sde tshan las bskol ba'i nang du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang mar mang du blugs te/_bkru sman drag po byas na phan no/_/de bzhin du n+ya gro d+ha'i sde tshan bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi mas gtong ngo /_/dmu rdzing can gyi nad pa nyam chung ba la ni/_dang po a nu ba sa na gtang ngo /_/de nas 'o ma'i
[\[244a.4\]]'jam rtsis dag par bya'o/_/me stobs skyes pa la ni snum chos bya ste/_yang dang yang du bkru sman bya'o/_/'o ma 'am dur byid sbyar ba 'am/_e raN+Da'i mar dang sbyar ba'am/_yang sa la 'am/_kyi lce ba 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na dong ga 'o ma dang sbyar bas
[\[244a.5\]]bkru sman bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing bad kan dang bcas pa la ni ba gcin dang sbyar ba'i 'o mas bkru sman bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing rlung dang bcas pa la ni tig ta'i sman mar 'o ma dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bkru sman bya'o/_/'bras
[\[244a.6\]]gang yang rung ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig sbyin pa'am/_yang na byi da ri'i sde tshan 'o ma dang bskol ba sbyin no/_/'o thug sbyar bas dmu rdzing gi phyi rol nas bsku'o/_/'jam rtsi dang bkru sman dang 'o ma btang ba de dag yang dang yang du rim pa de lta bu 'bad pa dang bcas pas ma
[\[244a.7\]]yengs par byas na nges par mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing las rgyal bar byed do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing la ni dug mo yungs kyi sde tshan la mar dang bskol bas btung ba la sogs pas snum chos byas la/_de'i 'og tu dugs byas nas nyams stobs dang
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]ldan pa zhig na shri khaN+Da mar dang sbyar bas khrus bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu me'i drod bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_bad kan 'joms pa'i sman tsha ba dang thal sman dang ldan pa'i bza' ba thug pa la sogs pa rim gyis sbyin no/_/yang na mu ka ka'i sde tshan dang /_tsha ba gsum dang ba
[\[244b.2\]]gcin dang sbyar ba'i til mar dang 'di rnams lhan cig bskol la/_bkru sman drag po mas gtong ngo /_/de'i 'og tu mu ka ka'i sde tshan til mar dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsis btang ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/kha zas ni tsha ba gsum dang /_'o mar bcas pa'am yang na rgya sran
[\[244b.3\]]gyi khu bcud dang ldan par sbyin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing 'bur ba dang brtan pa dang /_rlongs bag tu 'dug pa dang yi ga 'chus pa dang /_snying na ba dang /_me drod chung ba dang /_chang nad che ba la ni a riSh+Ta'i chang dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba chu dang sbyar
[\[244b.4\]]ba ras kyis btsags la btung bar sbyin no/_/shing kun dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_thang shing dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_bse shing gi 'bras bu dang /_na le sham dkar po dang /_pu tse shel dang /_seng phrom dang /_shu dag dang /_bca'
[\[244b.5\]]sga dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_gla sgang dang /_ru rta dang /_sa ra la zhes bya ba ko nyon tse dang /_lan tshwa rnam lnga dang 'di rnams zhib tu btags la zho dang snum rnam bzhis sbrus la rdza ma kha sbyar gyi nang du du ba ma shor bar bsregs pa'i thal ba phyung la de la zho gnyis gnyis chang gi
[\[244b.6\]]dngas ma dang /_zho ga chu dang /_chu dron dang /_a riSh+Ta dang /_a sa ba'i chang dang /_nas chang dang /_'di rnams gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig sbyar ba 'thungs na dmu rdzing dang skran dang gtun lta bu'i nad dang /_tu ni dang /_skrang ba dang /_gsus pa dang mcher pa na ba dang /_
[\[244b.7\]]snying na ba dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_rtug pa 'gags pa rnams zhi bar byed do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing nyam chung ba la ni ha ri sta'i chang dang /_ba gcin gyi btung ba dang /_sman gyi phye ma dang /_lcags las byas pa'i btung ba dang /_til mar thal sman
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]dang bcas pa'i btung ba dang /_de dag gang yang rung ba dang sbyar na rgyal bar byed do/_/yungs kar dang /_phabs dang /_la phug gi sa bon dang /_de dag btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang lde gur byas pas dmu rdzing bskus la/_phyi rol
[\[245a.2\]]nas dugs bya ste/_de ltar yang dang yang du bya ba'i rim pa sbyar ro/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing lus stobs dang me drod chung zhing nad gzhi rnams tshabs che ste/_gcig la gcig gnod par gyur pa ni gsor mi rung ste spang ngo /_/de ni gal te ma byas na ni nges par
[\[245a.3\]]'chi la/_byas na ni 'tsho yang srid pas gso ba 'di dag bya ste/_dan ti dang tra ban ti'i 'bras bu'i mar gyi btung ba byin na rab tu bsngags so/_/'dus pa'i dmu rdzing la nad gzhi gsum gyi gso ba tshul bzhin du byas kyang ma thub na/_nye du rnams la dris nas ka ka da ni dang /_'ol
[\[245a.4\]]ma se dang /_ka ra bI ra dang /_'di gsum gyi rtsa ba btags pa'i phye ma chang dang lhan cig btung ngo /_/yang na bza' ba dang btung ba'i nang du bstan pa'i dug dag pa sbyin no/_/yang na sbrul khros pa'i khar shing tog bcug la gdug pas zos zin pa'i shing tog byin na nad gzhi
[\[245a.5\]]rnams gcig tu bsdus nas dug gi mthus dkrugs te phyi rol du 'byin cing 'jig par byed do/_/sbyor ba'i rim pa de dag byas nas gal te dug de nad kyi steng du bab na ni nad de 'jig par byed la/_lus tha mal pa la bab na ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dug gi nad zhi ba
[\[245a.6\]]ltar na chu grang mos lus khrus byas la de'i 'og tu 'o ma sbyin no/_/yang na dug dang /_dur byid dang /_man du ka par ni dang /_rgya sne'u dang /_nas dang /_ka la sha ka dang /_de rnams las gang yang rung ba'i rang gi khu ba skyur dang /_lan tshwa dang /_snum med par slon
[\[245a.7\]]pa'am skam po gang yang rung ste/_kha zas gzhan mi bza' bar zla ba gcig tu bza'o/_/gal te skom na yang de rnams rang gi khu ba blud do/_/de bzhin du gong ma'i cho ga de dag gis zla ba gcig nas nad med par 'gyur te/_lus nyam chung na srog bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir rnga mo'i
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]'o ma blud do/_/mcher pa'i nad dmu rdzing la ni nad gzhi ji lta bar snun chos dang dugs bya ste/_zho dang 'bras chan du bcas pa zos la lag pa g.yon pa la gtar gas khrag dbyung ngo /_/nad pa des nyams stobs rnyed pa dang /_yang snum chos byas te/_nyes pa'i lhag ma
[\[245b.2\]]slon khrus kyis lus dag par byas la/_rgya mtsho'i nya phyis kyi phye ma dang /_thal sman dang 'o mar sbyar ba blud do/_/de bzhin du pu ti ka rany+dza la rtsabs skyur po dang sbyar te/_bskyos pas ras kyis btsags pa'i nang du lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling shas cher btags pa'i phye mas
[\[245b.3\]]btab pa blud do/_/yang na shi kru bskol ba'i nang du/_rgyam tsha dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_pi pi ling gi phye ma btab pa blud do/_/yang na shing kun la sogs pa'i phyi ma skran nad gso ba'i le'ur bshad pa dang /_thal sman sna tshogs dang /_sman mar srang drug pa che chung dang
[\[245b.4\]]sbyor ba de dag gang yang rung ba me drod ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_dong gra dang /_dan ti cha mnyam pa dang /_a ru ra sna gcig gi nyis 'gyur dang /_lce myang tsha sna gcig gi phyed dang /_'di rnams phye mar byas te chu dron la gtang ngo /_/
[\[245b.5\]]byi dang ga dang /_kru trug tres dang /_phye dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shu dag dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrus te rdze'u kha sbyar gyi nang du bsregs la/_de'i thal ba 'o ma dang lhan cig 'thungs na/_skran dang mcher ba'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/yang na rgya shug gi 'o ma
[\[245b.6\]]btags pa'i til mar dang bsres pa lde gur byas pa mcher pa'i dmu rdzing gi steng du bskus la legs par mnyes la/_gtun shing gis brdung ba dang btsir te/_de nas 'o ma 'thungs na mcher pa'i dmu rdzing 'joms so/_/yang na shing ro hi ni'i lcug ma rtsa ba nas bcad de
[\[245b.7\]]bskams la/_a ru ra dang lhan cig btags pa'i phye ma chu dang zhag bdun gyi bar du sbangs la 'thungs na/_mig ser dang /_mcher ba dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_srin bu dang /_skrang ba dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_de rnams la phan no/_/ro hi ta'i
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]shun phrags srang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_rgya shug skam po srang sum cu rtsa gnyis cham chom brdungs te bskol ba bzhi cha lus pa dang /_tshigs ma bor ba'i nang du tsha ba rnam lnga srang re re dang de spyi dang mnyam pa'i ro hi ta'i shun phrags rnams btags pa'i
[\[246a.2\]]phye ma dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'o ma srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang yang bskol te/_mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na mcher pa'i dmu rdzing tshabs che ba yang myur du sel bar byed do/_/yang na chu shing dang /_til gyi sdong bu dang /_gze ma rnams bsregs
[\[246a.3\]]pa'i thal ba til mar dang bskol ba las ran par 'thungs na bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i mcher pa'i dmu rdzing las rgyal lo/_/sbyor ba de dag gis ma zhi ste rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mcher pa'i dmu rdzing rnag tu red pa ni skran gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du me'i las
[\[246a.4\]]bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing la ni/_'tsho byed sna bcu mar dang bskol ba rab tu bsngags te/_de bzhin du 'o ma'i 'jam rtsi dang /_khrag dbyung ba dang /_slon khrus kyis lus dag par bya ba dang /_'o ma'i btung ba sbyar ba rab tu bsngags so/_/mchin pa'i dmu
[\[246a.5\]]rdzing gi gso ba ni/_mcher pa'i dmu rdzing gi gso ba thams cad bya ste/_khyad par du lag pa g.yas pa la gtar ga bya'o/_/gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing la ni thog mar dugs byas la ba gcin sman rnon po dang /_til mar dang lan tshwa sbyar bas bkru sman drag po
[\[246a.6\]]dang /_'jam rtsi mas gtong ba dang /_phyi sa sla bar gyur pa'i zas dang bkru sman rnon po rnams gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang rlung gis rtug pa 'gags pa dang /_rlung la phan pa'i gso ba thams cad kyang 'dir spyad do/_/rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing la dugs ma
[\[246a.7\]]gtogs pa'i bad kan gyi dmu rdzing gi gso ba thams cad bya'o/_/sman pas chu ser la sogs pa bzhin du yang dang yang du gzags par bya'o/_/lto ba chus gang ba'i dmu rdzing la ni ba gcin dang /_sman rno ba dang /_thal sman dang sbyar ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba sbyar
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ro/_/me'i drod skyed pa dang /_bad kan 'joms pa'i bza' ba nye bar bsten par bya'o/_/ra'i ril ma bsregs pa'i thal ba ba gcin dang sbyar te ras la btsags la bskol te/_ska bar gyur pa dang /_de'i nang du pi pi ling dang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang bca' sga dang /_
[\[246b.2\]]lan tshwa rnam lnga dang /_dur byid dang /_dan da dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_khron bu dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang /_swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang /_shu dag dang /_sa ta la dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis bcug la/_rgya shug gi 'bras bu tsam
[\[246b.3\]]gyi ri lu byas te/_rang skyur gyi nang du mnyes la ran par 'thungs na ma zhu ba dang skrang ba dang dmu rdzing shas che ba rnams sel to/_/de la dmu rdzing mtshon gyis dral ba ni/_dmu rdzing rnam pa brgyad las/_gsum ni dral ba'i cho ga bya ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_gzhang 'gags
[\[246b.4\]]pa'i dmu rdzing dang /_rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang /_lto ba 'chus pa'i dmu rdzing dang gsum mo/_/thog mar ni dmu rdzing brgyad po kun kyang sman gyis gso bar bya'o/_/des ma thub na sman pas mtshon gyis khong phye ba'i dpyad bya ste/_thog mar nad pa'i dpyad rtsom
[\[246b.5\]]pa yang gya tshoms su byar mi rung ste/_nad pa'i nye du rnams kyis rgyal po la thugs tshod du gsol nas sman pas bdag nyid kyi spyad kyi mtshon legs par bya ste brtags la sbyor ba brtsam par bya ste/_de la dmu rdzing brtol bar 'dod pas dang por gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu
[\[246b.6\]]rdzing dang /_rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing gnyis la thog mar snum gyi cho ga dang dugs bya ste/_nad pa'i lte ba'i 'og tu sor bzhi bcal la/_de nas g.yon ngos dku'i phyogs su sor bzhi bcal bar rma kha sor bzhi tsam dral lo/_/rgyu ma la ma phog par bag bya'o/_/dral zin pa
[\[246b.7\]]dang /_rma'i nang nas rgyu ma'i nang du spu'i gong bu 'am rdo 'am/_dring ba'i ril bu 'byar bas rgyu ma 'gags pa 'am/_shing tshal lam/_rus pa 'am/_zug rngu gang yang rung bas rgyu ma rdol ba gang yin pa de legs par brtags te/_de yang lag pa snum gyis bskus pas myang zhing
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]lta'o/_/gal te spu'i gong bu'am/_dri ma'i ril bus 'gags pa yin na/_de la ni rgyu ma'i phyi rol nas cung zad mnyes la snga ma'i gnas nas 'gog pa'am bskyod pa 'am/_btsir ba tsam gyis dbyung bar 'gyur ro/_/zug rngus rdol ba la
[\[247a.2\]]ni/_zug rngu phra 'am drang du 'dod pa lta bu la ni/_spre'u'i so lta bu'i skam pas phyir drangs la dbyung ngo /_/zug rngu lci ste dbyung du mi 'dod pa 'am sbom pa la ni/_rgyu ma dang mtshams su bcad do/_/gal te chu ser dang /_dri ma ngan pa rgyu ba yod na yang bu ga btsir la de nyid nas phyir
[\[247a.3\]]dbyung ngo /_/de nas mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pas rgyu ma bsku'o/_/cho ga de nyid byas zin pa dang /_rgyu smad kyi nang grol ro stod phyogs su dbugs ring pos phyogs gcig tu drangs pa ltar byas pas rgyu ma snga ma'i gnas su bde bar rang 'dug pa'i rigs so/_/de nas phyi'i lto ba'i
[\[247a.4\]]rma dar skud kyis btsems la/_sa nag po dang /_shing mngar chu dang sbyar ba'i lde gus rma dang lto ba bskus la/_ras kyis rma dang rked pa dkris te gzhag go/_/de nas rlung med pa'i gnas su 'o ma 'ba' zhig gis gsos la/_mal snum can bcas la bsnyal
[\[247a.5\]]lo/_/lto ba chus gang ba'i dmu rdzing la ni rlung dang mthun pa'i sman dang til mar du sbyar bas lus bsku bar bya'o/_/de nas lto ba ras kyis dkris te chu dron pos steng du blugs la dugs bya'o/_/de la mtshon gdab sa ni gong ma dang mthun/_rma kha ni sor gcig gi thad du dbug
[\[247a.6\]]go/_/mtshon ni 'bras kyi rtse mo 'dra bas dral lo/_/de ltar dral ma thag tu shing sbu gu can 'jam po'i tham bus thabs su bcug la/_sbubs kyi nang nas nad cung zad phyung la gzag go/_/de nas ras sam pags pas dam du bcings la rlung mi shor bar bya'o/_/de nas zhag
[\[247a.7\]]gsum gyi bar du mi bsgul bar gsum pa nas zhag bcu drug gi bar du nyin re khad kyis dbyung ngo /_/zhag bcu drug lon nas sbu gu phyung ste/_til mar dang lan tshwa btab pas rma kha bskus la ras kyis lto ba bcing la/_de nas zhag gsum pa nas zhag bcu drug gi bar
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]du ras bkrol zhing rma btsir la gong ma'i sman gyis kyang de bzhin du bsku/_ci ste brtol ma thag tu 'phral nad dus gcig tu phyung bar gyur na skyon 'di dag yod de/_skom dad che ba dang /_tsha ba skye ba dang /_yan lag zug cing na ba dang /_'khru ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_
[\[247b.2\]]lud pa lu ba dang /_lag pa dang rkang pa tsha ba dang /_'di rnams 'byung bas khad kyis zhag re dbyung bar bya'o/_/nad 'byin pa'i tshe dal bus btsir ro/_/de nas rlung med pa'i gnas su bzhag nas zhag dang po smyung bar bya'o/_/de nas zhag gnyis pa la tshwa dang snum
[\[247b.3\]]med pa'i 'bras thug sbyin no/_/de nas zla ba drug gi bar du kha zas gzhan mi bza' bar 'o ma 'ba' zhig sbyin no/_/de nas zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'o ma las gzhi blangs pa'i 'bras thug sbyin no/_/de nas zla ba gsum gyi bar du ci tse dang /_khre'i thug pa la 'o ma dang lan
[\[247b.4\]]tshwa cung zad btab ste/_se'u 'bru bskol ba'i khu ba bsres pa btung ngo /_/de ltar byas pa'i rim pas lo gcig gi bar du bsrungs na ni/_lto ba chus gang ba'i dmu rdzing 'joms par byed do/_/srog 'tshol ba'i slob dpon sman pas ji ltar bstan pa'i lung mnyan par byas
[\[247b.5\]]nas cho ga bsrung ba la 'bad par bya ste/_zas thub par bya zhing lto 'dun la sogs pa mi bya'o/_/gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing dang /_rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing gnyis kyi cho ga dang /_bsrung ba yang 'di dang 'dra bar lo gcig gi bar du bya'o/_/de ltar lo gcig gi
[\[247b.6\]]bar du bsrung ba byas nas phyis nad mi skye zhing brtan par bya ba'i phyir sman gyi sbyor ba 'og nas 'byung ba 'di dag bya'o/_/de la dmu rdzing brgyad po kun kyang phal cher nad gzhi 'dus pa la sogs pa las 'byung ba ste/_de bas na rlung la sogs pa gso bar bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad
[\[247b.7\]]du bsngags te/_de yang rlung la sogs pa khong pa'i nang du zhugs te drod nyams par byed na/_de nas ni kha zas dro ba dang yang bar byas pa'i nad du rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_lan tshwa dang /_skyur dang /_snum cung zad dang bcas pa'i thug pa sbyin no/_/yang na nas rnying pa dang /_'bras
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]zhag drug cu pa gcin gyis bran te bskams la 'o mas gzhi blangs te thug pa bya ste ci 'dod pa sbyin no/_/skom du ni bu ram shing bskol ba'i khu ba blud na nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing las bzlog ste/_rang rang gi gnas su zhi bar byed do/_/
[\[248a.2\]]dmu rdzing can kun gyis bsrung bar bya ba ni/_shin tu dro ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_lan tshwa dang /_phyi sa 'gags pa'i zas dang /_grang ba dang /_lci ba dang /_bu ram dang /_til las byas pa'i zas dang /_chu 'thung ba dang /_sngo rngad dang /_rlan la
[\[248a.3\]]'dug pa dang 'di rnams shas cher mi spyad mi bsten gzhan yang spang bar bya ba 'di dag bya ste/_lus kyi rtsom pa dang /_lam du 'gro ba dang /_bzhon pa'i 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba spang bar bya'o/_/skom du ni dar ba ha cang sla ba yang ma yin ska ba yang ma yin mngar ba
[\[248a.4\]]yang ma yin pa'i btung ba bsngags te/_de yang nad kyi gzhi dang sbyar te btung ngo /_/de yang rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing la ni/_na le sham dang /_kha ras btab pa sbyin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni la la phud dang rgyam tsha dang zi ra dang sbrang rtsi dang /_tsha ba gsum
[\[248a.5\]]'di rnams kyis btab pa sbyin no/_/'dus pa las gyur pa la ni ba tsha can gyi tsha dang /_tsha ba gsum gyis btab pa'i dar ba sbyin no/_/gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing la ni/_spa ma'i 'bras bu dang /_la la phud dang /_lan tshwa dang /_zi ra rnams btab pa sbyin no/_/
[\[248a.6\]]rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing la ni pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsis btab pa sbyin no/_/lto ba chus gang ba'i dmu rdzing la ni/_tsha ba gsum gyis btab pa'i dar ba sbyin no/_/mchin pa'i dmu rdzing la ni/_sbrang rtsi dang /_shu dag dang /_sga dang /_nye'u shing dang /_ru rta dang /_
[\[248a.7\]]rgyam tsha dang /_til mar dang 'di rnams btab pa blud do/_/khyad par du dar ba'i skom gyi phan yon ni/_lus lci ba dang /_me'i drod nyams pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_tshil rgyas pa'i nad dang /_'khru ba drag pos lus shin tu nyam chung bar gyur pa la ni 'o ma
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/gso ba'i gnas las dmu rdzing gso ba'i le'u bco lnga ba rdzogs so//_//de nas skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_skyes bu gang skya rbab na ba la ni/_thog mar dge ba'i sman mar dang /_ba'i rnam
[\[248b.2\]]lnga'i sman mar dang /_tig ta chen po'i sman mar mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa dang /_dong ga'i sde tshan bskol ba'i sman mar 'di rnams gang yang rung ba blud do/_/se'u 'bru rang gi khu ba srang brgyad dang /_'u su srang gnyis dang /_tsi tra ka srang gcig dang /_bca'
[\[248b.3\]]sga srang gnyis dang /_pi pi ling srang phyed dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar srang nyi shu dang /_chu srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang tshul bzhin du bskol te mar lus pa dang ran par 'thungs na snying nad dang skya rbab dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_mcher pa dang /_
[\[248b.4\]]rlung dang bad kan gyis nyam thag pa sel to/_/de'i me drod skyed pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa 'joms shing rlung lam log par zhugs pa lugs bzhin 'byung la/_bud med bu 'byung dka' ba la yang rab tu bsngags so/_/de nas skya rbab na ba'i nad pa de snum
[\[248b.5\]]chos legs par bya ste/_sman rno bas slon bya'o/_/de nas yang snum chos bya ste/_'o ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba 'am/_re re yang rung bas lan mang du bkru sman bya'o/_/dan ti'i 'bras bu'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du tang pal gyi 'bras bu dang /_rgun 'bru'i 'bras
[\[248b.6\]]bu srang bzhi bzhi bcug ste nub gcig sbangs la/_nang par mnyes nas btsags pa 'thungs na/_skya rbab kyi nad las rgyal bar byed do/_/yang na ba gcin gyi nang du a ru ra'i phye mas btab ste btung ba 'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum ba gcin dang bskol ba'i nang du
[\[248b.7\]]a ru ra'i phye ma btab pa 'am/_yang na khron bu dang /_sha ma dur byid dang /_thang shing dang /_bca' sga dang /_'di rnams ba gcin dang btags te btung ba'am/_yang na sman de dag nyid ba gcin dang bskol ba btung ngo /_/yang na sman de dag nyid 'o ma dang tshul bzhin du
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bskol la 'thungs na nyes pa rnams 'joms so/_/yang na lcags phye ba gcin dang 'o ma gang yang rung ba'i nang du bzhag la sbyin no/_/de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na 'o ma 'am mngar ba'i khu ba gang yang rung ba lhan cig bza'o/_/de ltar slon khrus kyis
[\[249a.2\]]stod smad du lus dag par byas nas/_a ru ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin no/_/byi sha la dang /_pu tse shel dang /_gla sgang dang /_ru rta dang /_thang shing dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang /_mur ba srang phyed dang /_bong nga
[\[249a.3\]]zho gcig dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang 'thungs na/_de nas sbrang rtsi bldags na skya rbab dang /_rims dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_skran dang /_lto sbos pa dang /_ma zhu ba rlung dang
[\[249a.4\]]bcas pa dang /_khrag mkhris rnams las rgyal bar byed do/_/yang na ba sha ka dang /_kru trug tres dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pu tse shel dang /_tig ta dang /_nim pa dang /_'di rnams cham chom brdungs te bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa
[\[249a.5\]]'thungs na skya rbab dang /_mig ser dang khrag mkhris 'joms par byed do/_/yang na tsha ba gsum dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_byi dang ga dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_ga dur dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma spyi dang mnyam pa'i lcags nag po'i phye ma mar dang sbrang
[\[249a.6\]]rtsi dang sbyar te/_dar ba 'am chu dron po dang 'o ma dang bcas par 'thungs na/_mig ser dang /_skya rbab dang /_snying nad dang /_mdze dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_gcin nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/dong gra dang /_lcags phye dang /_til dang /_bu ram 'di rnams
[\[249a.7\]]cha mnyam pa dang /_sman sna gcig gi nyis 'gyur gyi pi pi ling dang /_de rnams ri lur byas pa zos na skya rbab la phan no/_/yang na ta bya dang /_skyer pa'i shun pa dang /_dbyi mo dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_thang shing dang /_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa sbyor ba gong ma'i
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]sman dang /_de rnams spyi'i nyis 'gyur gyi lcags phye dang phye mar byas la sman re re'i brgyad 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang /_sman sna so sor bskol la ri lur byar 'dod pa tsam gyi skan ter gyur pa dang gcig tu bsres te ri lur byas pa ni lcags phye'i ri lu zhes bya ste/_de las
[\[249b.2\]]ci ran dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na skya rbab kyi nad rnams la srog sbyin par byed do/_/gzhan yang mdze dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_skrang ba dang /_brla rengs pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_mig ser dang /_gcin nad dang mtsher pa'i nad rnams
[\[249b.3\]]kyang zhi bar byed do/_/yang na ta bya dang /_brag zhun dang /_dngul dang /_lcags kyi dri ma dang /_de rnams srang lnga dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_byi dang ga dang /_de rnams srang re re dang /_sha kha ra srang brgyad dang /_'di
[\[249b.4\]]rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na/_skya rbab dang /_dug dang /_lud pa dang /_gcong chen po dang /_rims mi bzad pa dang /_mdze dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_gcin nad dang /_skrang ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa rnams la phan te/_khyad
[\[249b.5\]]par du brjed byed kyi nad dang /_mig ser dang /_gzhang 'brum rnams 'joms par byed do/_/yang na dug mo yungs dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_nim pa dang /_pa to la dang /_ga dur dang /_dong gra dang 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du brag zhun srang brgyad
[\[249b.6\]]bcug ste/_zhag bcu'am/_nyi shu 'am/_sum cu'i bar du yang sbang zhing yang skam pa lan mang du byas pa dang /_brag zhun dang mnyam pa'i sha kha ra dang /_smig rkang pa dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_kar ka ta sring gi srang re re dang /_kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang 'bras
[\[249b.7\]]bu gnyis srang gcig dang /_dri sna gsum zho gnyis gnyis dang /_sbrang rtsi srang gsum dang lhan cig ri lu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas la/_zas gzhan ma 'dres par zos pa'i 'og tu se'u 'bru'i khu ba dang 'o ma dang /_thang la gnas pa'i bya'i sha khu dang /_chu dron po
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]dang /_a sa ba'i chang dang /_nas chang dang /_de rnams gang yang rung ba 'thungs na/_skya rbab dang /_mdze dang /_rims dang /_mcher pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_rma rnags pa dang /_
[\[250a.2\]]snying nad dang /_khu chu dang /_gcin dang /_tsha ba'i nad zhi bar byed de/_de bzhin du skem byed dang /_sbyar ba'i dug dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_lud pa dang /_rtsa ba'i nad dang /_khrag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_skrang ba dang /_skran dang /_mgul pa'i nad dang /_de bzhin du rgyu
[\[250a.3\]]rlugs dang /_mgo 'khor ba yang ri lu 'dis 'joms par byed de/_nad thams cad 'phrog cing zhi bar byed do/_/rgun 'brum dang /_pi pi ling srang bcu drug bcu drug dang /_sha kha ra srang lnga bcu dang /_de bzhin du shing mngar dang /_bca' sga dang /_smig rkang dang /_'di
[\[250a.4\]]rnams srang gnyis gnyis phye mar byas te/_skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i khu ba srang lnga brgya bcu gnyis kyi nang du bcug ste/_me chung ngu la bskol te lde gur gyur pa dang phyung la bsgrangs pa'i nang du/_sbrang rtsi srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang sbyar ba'i lde gu lag pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/_de
[\[250a.5\]]las zho gnyis gnyis zos na/_ha li ma ka zhes bya ba'i nad dang /_skya rbab dang /_mig ser rnams sel to/_/yang rtsa ba lnga chung ngu'i khu ba dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_skyu ru ra rang gi khu ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_lhan cig sbyar ba btang na/_skya rbab kyi
[\[250a.6\]]nad dang /_mig ser gyis nyam thag pa sel to/_/de ltar gong du bstan pa de dag ni skya rbab kyi gso ba spyir bstan pa yin te/_de bzhin du sman pa mkhas pas nad so so'i dmigs shes par bya ste/_ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyar ro/_/rlung las gyur pa'i skya rbab la ni
[\[250a.7\]]gong du smos pa bzhin du snum shas cher sbyar ro/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni kha ba dang /_bsil ba'i bag sbyar ro/_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang dro ba'i bag sbyar ro/_/'dus pa las gyur pa la ni de rnams bsres pa sbyar ro/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]tsha ba gsum dang /_bil ba dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_ba spru ba rnam gnyis dang /_gla sgang dang /_lcags phye dang /_byi dang ga dang /_thang shing dang /_brish+tsi ka li dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams
[\[250b.2\]]cham chom brdungs te/_'o ma dang mar tshul bzhin du bskol ba 'thungs nas zhag zos pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi nad thams cad myur du zhi bar byed do/_/de bzhin du nA ga ge sar dang /_shing mngar dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rtswa ku sha dang /_'di rnams
[\[250b.3\]]cham chom brdungs te/_'o ma dang /_mar dang /_tshul bzhin du bskol ba 'thungs na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/sa zhag zos pa'i skya rbab kyi nad pa sa zhag la sred pa yin na ni/_de sun dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir byi dang ga dang /_nim pa'i
[\[250b.4\]]khu ba dang /_pa ta dang /_mur ba 'di rnams kyi khu ba gang yang rung ba sa zhag las brkos pa zos na phan no/_/sa zhag gi bye brag 'dod pa zos nas nad tha dad pa 'byung bar gyur na sman pas so so dang mthun pa'i sman sbyar ro/_/mig ser gyi nad kyis btab
[\[250b.5\]]pa la ni mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman nam/_skya rbab la phan pa'i sman gang yang rung ba sbyin no/_/a ru ra rdog ma brgya bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_a ru ra lnga bcu btags pa'i phye ma dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
[\[250b.6\]]tshul bzhin du bskol te/_mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/_skran dang mig ser dang /_skya rbab thams cad sel to/_/dong ga dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma bu ram shing ngam/_bi da ri 'am/_skyu ru ra'i khu ba gang yang rung
[\[250b.7\]]ba'i nang du btab ste/_srang gcig tsam 'thungs na/_mig ser gyi nad 'joms so/_/yang na dan da btags pa'i phye ma de'i nyis 'gyur gyi bu ram dang bcas pa chu grang dang btung ba'am/_gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba sbyin no/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]sle tres dang nim pa 'di rnams kyi khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab ste/_nang re nang re sbyar te 'thungs na/_mig ser gyis nyam thag pa la phan no/_/skyer pa dang /_btsag yug snam dang /_skyu ru ra rnams sbyar ba'i mig sman du
[\[251a.2\]]sbyar ba yang mig ser rnams 'joms so/_/mig ser gyis btab pa'i nad pa phyi sa til btags pa'i phye ma 'dra ba dkar po 'byung zhing bad kan gyis lam 'gags pa la ni bad kan dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sman gyis gso'o/_/kha zas rtsub pa dang /_grang ba dang /_lci
[\[251a.3\]]ba dang /_mngar ba dang /_rtsol ba byas pa'i rgyu rlung gis bad kan 'khrugs par byas te/_mkhris pa'i phyi rol nas bton pa'i dbang gis skyes bu de'i gcin dang mig dang pags pa rnams ser por gyur cing /_phyi sa dkar por 'byung la nad 'khrugs te/_phyi sa 'gags pa dang /_
[\[251a.4\]]snying lci ba la sogs par gyur te/_de'i dbang gis lus rjud pa dang /_me drod chung ba dang /_rtsib logs su zug pa dang /_skyigs bu dang /_lud pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_rims kyis 'debs te/_mkhris pas yan lag thams cad du khyab pa yin la/_
[\[251a.5\]]de la ni rim gyis brdal la gso'o/_/de ltar mig ser gyis khyab pa'i nad pa la ni/_rma bya dang /_khyim bya dang /_sreg pa'i sha khu dang /_yang na la phug skam po dang /_rgya sran gyi khu bcud gang yang rung ba'i nang du rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_skyur ba dang sbyar ba'i
[\[251a.6\]]zas sbyin no/_/gzhan yang shin tu tsha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_rno ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_shin tu dro ba rnams bsngags so/_/kha lung gi khu ba tsha ba gsum dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bldag par bya'o/_/de ltar gong ma'i gso ba de dag byas na/_mkhris pa rang gi gnas su
[\[251a.7\]]'ju ste/_des na phyi sa yang mdog tha mal par 'gyur zhing /_rlung sgra dang bcas pa yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mdog 'gyur te/_snga ma las log pa ltar snang na yang de brta bar bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_de la mig ser gyi nad gso ba 'phyis nas de
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]khong du zhugs te dkyel du gyur pa la ni brag zhun dang /_mak+Shi ka da ru dang /_gser gyi dri ma gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang sbyar ba zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten par bya'o/_/ha li sa ka zhes bya ba'i nad la ni/_sle tres kyi rang gi khu ba dang /_'o ma dang /_ma he'i mar 'o ma'i phyed dang /_
[\[251b.2\]]'di rnams bskol ba'i mar gyi btung ba la sogs pas lus kyi snum chos bya ste/_de nas skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang dur byid dang sbyar bas bkru sman bya'o/_/kha zas ni mngar ba dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms pa gtang ngo /_/de bzhin du gong du smos pa'i rgun 'bru'i lde gu
[\[251b.3\]]dang /_mngar ba'i sman dang sbyar ba'i zas bza' zhing 'og nas smos pa'i 'o ma'i 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba rnams yun ci ring du bya'o/_/btung bar ni rgun chang dang /_a ri ta'i chang me drod dang sbyar te ci rigs su sbyin no/_/yang na a ru ra'i lde gu lud pa gso ba'i skabs las
[\[251b.4\]]byung ba'am/_yang na pi pi ling dang /_shing mngar dang /_ba la dang /_de rnams gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang sbyar te nad gzhi dang me drod dang dpags la gtang ngo /_/de bzhin du sman pa mkhas pas skrang nad gso ba'i dpyad ji snyed pas skya rbab kyi nad thams cad la sbyar ro/_/
[\[251b.5\]]gso ba'i gnas las skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so//_//de nas 'or nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_de la nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa 'am ldan pa'am/_nad gzhi re re las gyur pa'i skrangs nad gang yang rung ba ma
[\[251b.6\]]zhu ba dang bcas pa de la ni thog mar lus sha sri zhing smyung ba bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu kha zas kyang yang ba bza' zhing skom du ni/_dong gra dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_thang shing dang /_byi dang ga dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_na le sham bskol ba'i chu dron po blud do/_/yang
[\[251b.7\]]na a ru ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_thang shing dang /_ba spru ba dang /_de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba blud pa'am/_yang na skya rbab kyi nang du bshad pa'i lcags phye cha dgu pa bskol ba blud do/_/'or nad shas che ba la ni de dag par bya ba'i phyir a ru ra'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ba blud do/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i nang du pu tse shel dang /_dur byid dang /_tsha ba gsum gang yang rung ba'i phye ma btab pa blud pa'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum gang yang rung ba'i nang du gu gul lam brag zhun btab pa blud
[\[252a.2\]]pa 'am/_'or nad skrangs pa de me drod chung zhing ma zhu bas khyab ste/_rtug pa 'gags pa'am/_yang na phyi sa sla bar 'byung ba la ni kha ru tsha dang /_tsha ba gsum sbrang rtsi dang /_dar ba dang sbyar ba bza' ba 'am/_yang na a ru ra dang bu ram bza' ba 'am/_yang na
[\[252a.3\]]bu ram dang bca' sga sbyar ba zos pa'i 'og tu dar ba btung bar bya'o/_/yang na sge'u gsher dang /_bu ram cha mnyam pa sbyar te/_dang po'i zhag srang phyed zos la/_de nas zhag bcu'i bar du srang phyed phyed kyis skyed de/_zhag bcu gcig pa nas srang phyed phyed kyi zhag
[\[252a.4\]]bcu'i bar du mi bri ste/_srang phyed du phyin pa dang /_yang zhag bcu'i bar du srang phyed phyed zhag re skyed de/_de ltar zla ba gcig gi bar du zos la/_sman de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na/_btung ba ni/_ma sha ka'i khu ba dang /_'o ma dang /_sha khu gsum bad kan dang /_mkhris
[\[252a.5\]]pa dang /_rlung gang yin pa brtags te/_nad gzhi dang re re nas sbyar te 'thungs na skran dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_'or nad dang /_gcin nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_cham pa dang /_lus snyom pa dang /_'ju stobs chung ba dang /_mig
[\[252a.6\]]ser dang /_skem byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_smyo byed dang /_lud pa dang /_bad kan rnams sge'u gsher dang /_bu ram gyi sbyor ba 'di byas na myur du rgyal bar byed do/_/sge'u gsher gyi khu ba dang /_dong gra'i phye ma dang /_'o ma dang mar lhan cig bskol te/_ran par 'thungs
[\[252a.7\]]na 'or nad dang /_cham pa na ba dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_me drod nyams pas nyam thag pa rnams zhi bar byed do/_/ma zhu ba med bzhin du phyi sa 'gags shing 'or nad kyis nyam thag pa la ni/_tsha ba gsum dang /_dur byid dang /_dan ti dang /_kru trug tres dang /_de rnams 'o ma dang
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]bskol te blud do/_/ba'am ma he gang yang rung ba'i gcin dang /_'o ma btung zhing bza' ba yang 'o ma dang bcas par bya'o/_/zhag bdun nam yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du rnga mo'i 'o ma nyi tshes nyams brta bar bya'o/_/ti mu sa dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba
[\[252b.2\]]dang /_la la phud dang /_tsha ba rnam lnga dang /_na le sham dang /_se'u 'bru dang /_pa tha dang /_'u su dang /_star bu dang /_ba la dang /_bil ba dang /_de rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang /_chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dang mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te
[\[252b.3\]]mar lus pa dang /_de las ran par 'thungs na 'or nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_skran dang /_gcin nad rnams 'joms so/_/tsi tra ka'i phye ma 'o ma'i nang du btab ste zhor red pa dang /_de las byung ba'i mar sar dar ba dang bcas pa'i nang du yang tsi tra ka'i
[\[252b.4\]]phye mas btab ste bskol la/_mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/_phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/_/nad kyi stobs dang /_dus shes pa'i sman pas thang la 'bar gyis sman mar gcin nad kyi skabs las 'byung ba dang /_tig ta chen po'i sman mar mdze nad gso ba
[\[252b.5\]]las bshad pa dang /_dge ba'i sman mar smyo byed kyi nang nas 'byung ba dang /_a ru ra'i sman mar dmu rdzing las bshad pa rnams ci rigs par sbyar ro/_/rtsa ba bcu pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_mar gyi bcu drug 'gyur gyi chu dang /_a
[\[252b.6\]]ru ra dang bu ram srang brgyad dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i nang du dri sna gsum dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba cung zad tsam dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma btab ste lde gur gyur pa dang /_bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang bcu drug btab ste/_de
[\[252b.7\]]las ran par bldags na/_'or nad tshabs che ba dang /_rims dang skran dang /_gcin nad dang /_lus skem zhing rid pa dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_khrag mkhris dang /_rlung dang /_sgregs pa skyur por 'byung ba dang /_mdog 'gyur ba dang /_gcin dang /_rlung
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dang /_khu chu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /_sbyar ba'i dug dang /_dmu rdzing rnams sel to/_/nas dang 'bras rnying pa'i kha zas rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba las gzhi blangs la/_lan
[\[253a.2\]]tshwa dang snum nyung shas btab ste byin na 'or nad la phan no/_/rgya sran ku lad tha dang /_mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud thal sman dang /_tsha ba gsum dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du srog chags thang la gnas pa rus sbal dang /_god dang /_sha ya ka dang /_'di rnams
[\[253a.3\]]kyi sha khu pi pi ling dang sbyar ba zos na yang 'or nad 'joms so/_/btung ba ni dar ba mi skyur ba 'am yang na rgun chang dang /_a riSh+Ta'i chang dang /_a sa ba'i chang gang yang rung ba tsha ba gsum dang ldan pa sbyin no/_/yang na zi ra dang zur pa dang /_dzi ban ti dang /_ka
[\[253a.4\]]ra bI ra dang /_ma nu dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_bil pa'i rkang dang /_ya bak+Sha ra dang /_da tri ga dang /_'di rnams re re yang rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad dang ldan pa'i thug pa mar dang til mar sbyar te 'thungs na/_'or nad dang /_skrang pa la phan pa'i mchog yin te/_
[\[253a.5\]]de bzhin du 'khru ba dang /_snying nad dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_me drod chung ba dang /_gcin nad rnams la phan no/_/de bzhin du tsha ba rnam lnga rgya shug gi tshad tsam dang /_mar dang til mar du brngos pa'i thug pa 'thungs na yang phan yon de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[253a.6\]]yang na rdo dreg dang /_ru rta dang /_sto ne ya dang /_ha re Nu ka dang /_a ru ra dang /_shug pa dang /_shri besh+ta ka dang /_chu srin sen mo dang /_'bu su hang dang /_thang shing dang /_bri yang ku dang /_spang spos dang /_pi pi ling dang /_dbyi mo dang /_ku tan na ta dang /_bya ma
[\[253a.7\]]ka dang /_ba la ka dang /_dri sna bzhi dang /_bal bu'i lo ma dang /_gla sgang dang /_gan+d+ha pa la sha dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang sbyar bas bsku ba dang phye ma chu dang sbyar ba'i khrus dang /_lde gu'i byug pa rnams bya'o/_/yang na nim pa dang /_ba spru ba me tog
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]dmar po can dang /_nag ta ma la dang /_arka bskol ba'i chus khrus bya'o/_/yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la ni ba spru ba dang /_ka ra bI ra dang /_king shu ka dang /_byi sha la dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_seng phrom dang /_na li ka zhes bya ba ka po da tsa ra na dang /_
[\[253b.2\]]thang shing dang /_spang spos dang /_ko sha ta ki dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_ta la'i lo ma dang /_dza yan ti zhes bya ba tang ga ri dang /_'ol ma se dkar po dang /_ka ka da ni dang /_sA la'i shing dang /_dbyi mo dang /_bri sha kar ni dang /_bri ti dang /_rid d+hi dang /_hasti kar
[\[253b.3\]]Na zhes bya ba e raN+Da dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang lde gur byas te bskus na phan no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad skrangs pa la ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du dur byid dang mar sbyar ba 'am yang na e raN+Da'i mar 'ba' zhig btung ngo /_/rlung gis
[\[253b.4\]]rtug pa 'gags pa la yang sbyor ba de nyid bya'o/_/e raN+Da'i mar 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan bar zas kyi gong du bza'o/_/rlung gi skrangs nad la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman gyis bsku byug bya'o/_/yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la/_kha lud dang /_ag ni man tha
[\[253b.5\]]dang /_spang spos dang /_bca' sga dang /_thang shing dang /_de rnams kyi lde gus bsku'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad la ni tig ta'i sman mar ram/_n+ya gro d+ha'i sde tshan mar dang bskol bas bsku'o/_/skom dad che ba dang /_rmongs bag tu 'dug pa dang /_lus tsha
[\[253b.6\]]ba la ni 'o ma dang mar dang byug pa dang bsku ba grang mo byas pas rab tu phan no/_/yang na pa to la'i rtsa ba dang /_kyi lce ba dang /_shing mngar dang /_pu tse shel dang /_a ru ra dang /_thang shing dang /_skyer ba dang /_tsan+dan dang /_dan da dang /_bi sha la dang /_lcang ma dang /_
[\[253b.7\]]pi pi ling dang /_'di rnams mar dang lhan cig bskol te 'thungs na khong pa tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_'dus pa'i nad dang /_me dbal dang /_skrang ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_rims mi bzad pa rnams sel to/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad la ni dong ga'i sde
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]tshan til mar dang bskol ba blud do/_/rtsa rgyun 'gags pa dang me drod chung ba dang yi ga 'chus pa dang /_rmongs bag tu 'dug pa la ni thal sman a sa ba'i chang dang /_a riSh+Ta'i chang dang /_ba gcin dang /_dar ba dang lhan
[\[254a.2\]]cig bskyos te gtang ngo /_/pi pi ling dang /_til mar la sogs pa'i tshigs ma rnying pa dang /_shi kru'i shun pa dang /_zar ma dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dro 'jam tsam dang sbyar te byug pa dang /_lus dril ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/ru rta dang /_ag ni
[\[254a.3\]]man+tha dang /_tsitra ka dang /_rgya sran dang /_dong gra rnams pa gcin dang chu dang tshul bzhin bskol ba'i chus lus khrus bya'o/_/tsa rong dang /_a ka ru'i lde gus lus byug go/_/ka la zhes bya ba nA ga ba la dang /_a dza shring gi dang /_ko nyon tse dang /_a dza gan+d+ha dang /_a shwa
[\[254a.4\]]gan+d+ha dang /_am paSh+Ta dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba'i lde gu ni yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la rab tu bsngags so/_/yang na rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi shes par byas la/_nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du gtar ga byas te khrag dbyung ngo /_/nad gzhi rnams 'dres na gang
[\[254a.5\]]shas che ba brtags te thog mar de gso bar bya'o/_/tha we dang /_pa tha dang /_gla sgang dang /_tsha ba sna lnga dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_skyer pa dang /_de rnams chu dron dang sbyar te gtang ba 'am/_yang na tig ta dang /_bca' sga dang de gnyis chu dron la sbyar te 'thungs na/_nad gzhi
[\[254a.6\]]gsum las gyur pa'i 'or nad yun ring du lon te tshabs che ba yang zhi bar byed do/_/bdud rtsi rnam pa gnyis shes bya'o/_/sle tres dang /_a ru ra dang /_ba spru ba dang /_thang shing dag gu gul dang /_de rnams ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_skrang pa dang /_dmu rdzing
[\[254a.7\]]dang /_mdze dang /_skya rbab dang /_srin bu'i nad dang /_bad kan dang gcin nad dang rlung stod du zhugs pa rnams 'joms so/_/gong du smos pa de dag ni nad gzhi las 'or nad las skrangs pa'i gso ba bshad pa yin no/_/de la snad pa las gyur pa la ni khrag dbyung
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bas nad sbyang bar bya ste/_de nas sman bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang /_mar bsres pa bsku ba dang /_byug pa rnams bya'o/_/dug gis phog pa'i 'or nad la ni dug gi gso ba rnams 'dir sbyar ro/_/srog chags chu dang thang gnyi ga la gnas pa dang /_rjud pa'i
[\[254b.2\]]sha dang /_pa to la la sogs pa tshod ma'i lo ma skam po dang /_til dang /_bu ram las byas pa'i kha zas dang /_'bras la sogs pa btags pa'i zas dang /_zho dang lan tshwar bcas pa dang /_zas kyi mi bag can dang /_chang skyur dang /_yos dang /_sha skam dang /_
[\[254b.3\]]phan gnod bsres pa'i zas dang /_zas lci ba dang /_zas mi bsod pa dang /_lus za bar byed pa'i zas dang nyin par nyal ba dang /_nyal po rnams spang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang skrang bar 'gyur ba'i bza' btung thams cad spang zhing dor ro/_/gso ba'i gnas
[\[254b.4\]]las 'or nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//_//de nas me dbal gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_de la thog mar me dbal byung ba la ni smyung ba dang /_rtsub chos dang /_khrag dbyung ba dang /_skyug sman dang /_khrus sman rnams
[\[254b.5\]]bya'o/_/kha cig tu ni snum chos bya zhes zer ro/_skyug sman ni po son cha dang /_dug mo yungs dang shing mngar sbyar ba 'am/_yang na til dang /_nim pa'i lo ma dang /_po son cha sbyar ba rnams kyi skyug sman btang na me dbal la phan no/_/me dbal nang du zhugs pa la
[\[254b.6\]]ni khyad par du kyi lce ba dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_de rnams kyi khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du dur byid btab pa 'am/_yang na 'o ma dang /_mar dang /_dur byid kyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman bya'o/_/nad gzhi chung ste slon khrus mi dgos pa la
[\[254b.7\]]ni/_tsan+dan dang ut+pa la sbyar ba 'am/_yang na gla sgang dang /_nim pa dang /_pa to la dang /_pu tse shel gyi sde tshan dang lhan cig sbyar bas zhi bar bya'o/_/yang na thal tres dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_pu shel tse dang /_gla sgang rnams lhan cig bskol ba'i chus zhi bar bya'o/_/
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]me dbal gyi nad skom dad che ba la ni/_byi tsher ba dang /_bar pa ta dang /_sle tres dang /_bca' sga dang /_de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'am yang na grangs pa blud do/_/yang na skyer pa dang pa to la dang /_pu tse shel dang /_sran chung dang /_
[\[255a.2\]]'bras bu gsum dang /_nim pa dang /_shing mngar dang /_kyi lce ba bskol te mar dang lhan cig 'thungs na me dbal gyi nad skom dad che ba la phan no/_/me dbal gyi nad yan lag rnams su nad khrag yod pa la ni thog mar nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du lce la srin bu
[\[255a.3\]]pad pa dang ku ba rnams kyis khrag dbyung ngo /_/gal te gtar ga ma byas na ni khrag rnag tu 'gyur te/_pags pa dang sha dang rus pa rnams su zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba de dag gis ma zhu ba med cing bad kan zad do/_/mkhris pa dang rlung shas che bar gyur pa la ni
[\[255a.4\]]tig ta'am/_tig ta chen po'i sman mar mkhris pa'i mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa'am/_kyi lce'i sman mar rnams gtang ngo /_/de ltar gtar ga dang slon khrus kyis khong pa'i me dbal dag ste/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi'i dbang gis pags pa dang sha la brten pa
[\[255a.5\]]la ni phyi rol nas byug pa byas nas/_me dbal de ma thag zhi bar byed do/_/de yang rlung las gyur pa'i me dbal ni shu ti dang /_gla sgang dang /_ba ra hi dang /_'od ma dang /_ar ta ka la dang /_'u su dang /_thang shing dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shi kru dang /_ru rta dang /_'di
[\[255a.6\]]rnams kyi byug pa byas na phan no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/_de bzhin du pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_nya lcibs dang /_chu'i nang gi 'dam bag dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_sring ga ta ka dang /_sha kha ra dang /_tsan+dan dang /_
[\[255a.7\]]ba la ka dang /_mu tig dang /_nor bu dang /_btsag yug snam dang /_pa ya s+ya dang /_pra puN+Da rI ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_shug pa dang /_mar dang /_'o ma dang /_de rnams sbyar ba'i byug pa bya ba'am/_n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa ba gzhon nu dang /_chu shing gi snying po rnams
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar dang lde gur byas pa'am/_yang na pad+ma'i tshogs mar dang sbyar ba gong ma ltar byas pas byug pa bya'o/_/yang na pad+ma skyes pa'i 'dam bag grang mo'am/_yang na mu tig dang /_dung dang /_byi ru dang /_nya phyis dang /_btsag yug snam dang /_'di
[\[255b.2\]]rnams gang yang rung ba btags pas byug go_/bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni 'bras bu gsum dang /_shug pa dang /_pu shel tse dang /_btsod dang /_ka ra bI ra dang /_'dam bu'i rtsa ba dang /_a nan da'i rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams kyi lde gus bskus na phan no/_/
[\[255b.3\]]yang na da ba dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_seng ldeng dang /_thang shing dang /_ku sman da ka dang /_gla sgang dang /_dong ga 'di rnams kyi lde gu 'am/_yang na bar na'i sde tshan gyi lde gus bsku'o/_/yang na dong ga'i lo ma dang /_sle sman ta ka'i shun pa dang /_in+d+ra ba ru na'i
[\[255b.4\]]lo ma dang /_ka ka hwa dang /_shi ri sha'i me tog dang /_'di rnams kyi lde gus byug go/_/gong du smos pa'i byug pa sbyor ba sman sha ta puSh+pa la sogs pa de dag nyid kyis so so'i nad gzhi bzhin du byugs pa dang /_bsku byug dang /_sman mar dang /_phye ma rnams kyang de las bya'o/_/
[\[255b.5\]]gang yang rlung shas che ba la ni sman mar shas cher gtang ngo /_/bad kan gyi gnas su me dbal ma zhu ba dang bcas pa la ni dro ba dang /_rtsub pa cher sbyar ro/_/mkhris pa'i gnas su zhugs pa la ni bsil ba dang mar dang ldan par sbyar ro/_/shin tu bsil bag dang ldan pa'i
[\[255b.6\]]shing mngar dang sbyar bas byugs te/_ras srab mos phyi rol nas dkris la de ltar yang dang yang du brje zhing lan mang du bya'o/_/gal te bar bar du thag khyer na ni nus pa chung bar 'gyur ro/_/ldan pa'i nad la ni gang gi sbyor ba gnyis gnyis bsres te btang na phan pa'i
[\[255b.7\]]mchog yin no/_/de dang 'dra ba'i me dbal la ni mar lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar nyi tshes bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na mar gyi snying khu'am/_shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_kha ra dkar po bskol pa'i chu'am/_pad+ma 'am/_ut+pa la'i chu'am/_'o ma 'am/_
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]bu ram shing bkol ba'i khu ba'am/_de rnams gang yang rung ba grang mo'i rgyun blugs so/_/tig ta chen po'i sman mar ni me dang 'dra ba'i me dbal la btung ba dang /_byug pa dang blugs pa rnams byas na phan pa'i mchog yin no/_/mdzer
[\[256a.2\]]pa lta bu'i me dbal la ni khrag mkhris gso ba'i bya ba ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gso ba ltar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bad kan dang rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang zan dugs dang /_byug pa la sogs pa byas na phan no/_/yang na mdzer pa lta bu'i me dbal zug gzer dang
[\[256a.3\]]bcas pa la ni rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_til mar bskol ba dron po 'am/_ba gcin dron po 'am/_chu dron mo gang yang rung bas blugs par bya'o/_/yang na shi kru'am/_nag ta ma la dang /_la phug skam po dang /_ba ru ra dang de rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chu dron po dang
[\[256a.4\]]lde gur byas te/_mdzer pa lta bu'i me dbal la bsku'o/_/dan ti dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_shing tsha dang /_shrI khaN+Da dang /_arga'i lo ma dang /_bu ram dang /_go bye'i rus pa dang /_nag tshur dang /_'di rnams lde gur byas pas bskus na phyi rol gyi rdo yang 'bigs par
[\[256a.5\]]'gyur na bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal mdzer pa lta bu'i phyi rol pags pa la brten pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_mdzer pa lta bu'i me dbal yun ring du gnas pa la ni la phug dang rgya sran ku lat+tha dang /_se'u 'bru dang bcas pa'i khu bcud sbyin no/_/rtag tu gro dang nas
[\[256a.6\]]kyi zas bza'o/_/rgun chang dang /_bu ram chang dang /_sha kha ra'i btung ba dang /_de bzhin du chang gi snying po sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du kha lung gi khu ba bcug pa'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na pi pi ling gi sbyor ba sbrang rtsi dang
[\[256a.7\]]sbyar ba'am/_yang na thang shing gi sbyor ba dang /_sle tres kyi sbyor ba dang /_yang na brag zhun gyi sbyor ba dang /_yang na gla sgang gi sbyor ba dang /_go bye'i sbyor ba dang /_yang na sbrang rtsi'i sbyor ba 'di rnams kyi btung ba gang yang rung ba sbyar ro/_/nam tshong yan chad du zhugs pa la ni
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]mgo'i bkru sman dang /_dud pa brngub pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/gzhan yang skran nad kyi gso ba thams cad kyang 'dir sbyar ro/_/gzhan yang lcags dang /_gser dang /_lan tshwa dang /_rdo dang de rnams gang yang rung bas bsreg go/_/gong du bstan pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs de dag
[\[256b.2\]]gis ma zhi ste/_mdzer pa lta bu'i me dbal rdo bzhin du sra ste nye bar ma zhi na/_thal sman dang /_rim gyis me dang /_gser gyis bsregs na phan no/_/mdzer pa lta bu'i me dbal rgyu de dag gis smin par byas pa dang /_mtshon gyis dral te dbyung bar bya'o/_/me dbal gyi
[\[256b.3\]]khrag rang gi gnas las nyams te 'khrugs pa la ni khrag dbyung ngo /_/de ltar yang dang yang du gtar ga byas pa'i 'og tu rlung dang bad kan 'joms pa'i sman gtang ngo /_/bsregs pa dang /_smin pa'i dbang gis rul zhing myags pa la ni phyi nang gnyi ga nas rma gso ba'i
[\[256b.4\]]cho ga ji lta ba bzhin bya'o/_/skyer pa dang /_byi dang ga dang /_kam bi l+ya dang de rnams til mar dang sbyar bas bskus na rma la phan no/_/bad kan dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i me dbal la ni/_dUr ba'i rang gi khu ba dang mar sbyar ba phan no/_/me dbal la ni slon khrus kyis
[\[256b.5\]]lus thams cad kyang bya bar 'os pa yin la/_khrag dbyung ba nyi tshe yang de dang 'dra bar las byed de/_de yang me dbal gyi nad de khrag mkhris dang ldan na ni khrag dbyung la mi ldan na ni mi dbyung ste/_me dbal de nyid khrag la brten pa yin pas lan mang du khrag dbyung bar
[\[256b.6\]]'os pa yin no/_/nad gzhi mang po 'dus pa'i me dbal la ni mar nyi tshe mi sbyin te/_gal te gtong na yang bkru sman dang sbyar la gtang ngo /_/ci ste mar nyi tshe byin na ni khrag de nyid gzhi tshos par byed de skyon du 'gyur ro/_/gso ba'i gnas las me dbal gso ba'i le'u
[\[256b.7\]]bco brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_de la mdze nad thams cad la ni thog mar snum gyi btung ba nye bar spyad par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad la ni rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_sle tres dang /_e
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]raN+Da dang /_sha rang ga sta dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma mar ram til mar gang yang rung ba dang bskol ba 'thungs na phan no/_/pa to la dang /_nim pa dang /_pu tse shel dang /_skyer pa dang /_pa ta dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_skra lo dang /_kyi lce ba
[\[257a.2\]]dang /_de rnams srang re re chu srang nyis brgya rtsa bcu drug dang bskol te/_brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du kyi lce ba dang /_gla sgang dang /_tig ta dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_pi pi ling dang /_tsan+dan dang /_de rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang /_mar srang bcu gnyis dang /_yang
[\[257a.3\]]bskol la mar lus pa ni tig ta'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_de las ran par 'thungs na mkhris pa dang /_mdze dang /_me dbal dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_g.ya' ba dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_'bras dang /_
[\[257a.4\]]rma 'grams pa dang /_'brum bu dang /_khong 'bras dang /_skran dang /_skem byed kyi nad dang /_smyo byed dang /_myos pa dang /_snying nad dang /_rab rib dang /_ngo shig dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_sha bkra dang /_mig ser dang /_mtshan par rdol ba dang /_brjed byed
[\[257a.5\]]dang /_bud med kyi zla mtshan gyi nad dang /_sbyar ba'i dug dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_khrag mkhris rnams la phan no/_/gzhan yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad shin tu gso dka' ba yang 'byang bar byed do/_/lo ma bdun pa dang /_par pa ta dang /_dong ga dang /_pu
[\[257a.6\]]tse shel dang /_shu dag dang /_'bras bu gsum pa dang /_shug pa dang /_pa tha dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_thal tres rnam gnyis dang /_pi pi ling dang /_nim pa dang /_tsan+dan dang /_shing mngar dang /_bi sha la dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_sle tres dang /_tig ta
[\[257a.7\]]dang /_pu shel tse dang /_ba sha ka dang /_mur ba dang /_nye'u shing dang /_pa to la dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_gla sgang dang /_kyi lce ba dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma dang /_mar dang mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi chu dang /_skyu ru ra'i khu ba mar gyi nyes 'gyur dang /_
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]'di rnams tshul bzhin bskol ba'i mar ni tig ta chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_phan yon gong ma bas kyang shas che ba bzang bar 'dod do/_/mdze nad bad kan las gyur pa la ni nim pa dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_ru rta dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_
[\[257b.2\]]bi la ya dang /_dong ga dang /_'di rnams mar dang tshul bzhin bskol ba blud do/_/mdze nad thams cad la ni ba la ka ta'i mar ram/_yungs kar gyi mar mchog tu bsngags te blud par bya'o/_/yang na byi dang ka dang /_a ru ra dang /_go bye rnams tshul bzhin bskol ba'i
[\[257b.3\]]mar blud do/_/yang na dong ga'i rtsa ba mar dang lan brgya bskol ba'i mar blud cing seng ldeng gi chu bsten te 'thungs na/_mdze nad las myur du rgyal lo/_/gong du bstan pa'i mar gyi sbyor ba de dag gis bsku byug la sogs pa yang des bya'o/_/de ltar snum chos byas pa'i 'og tu
[\[257b.4\]]me dbal gyi nad la smos pa'i slon khrus kyi sman 'dir yang sbyar te slon khrus bya'o/_/de nas sman pas nad pa'i nyams stobs brtags te/_dpral ba dang lag pa dang rkang pa rnams las khrag dbyung bar bya ste/_de yang ji ltar gtar ga bya zhe na/_mdze nad shas chung
[\[257b.5\]]ba la ni zhal zhal gyis khrag dbyung ba dang /_gzhan yang ku ba la sogs pas ji ltar khrag dbyung ba ni nad gzhi dang sbyar nas gtar ga'i le'u las bltas te bya'o/_/khrag phyung ba dang /_slon khrus byas pas khong pa stong pa la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i snum rim
[\[257b.6\]]gyis bsten na/_lus 'jig par byed pa'i rlung zhi bar byed de/_mi 'jig cing srung bar byed do/_/bla sha dang /_sle tres dang /_nim pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pa to la dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_ka rany+dza dang /_'di rnams chu dang tshul bzhin bskol ba'i
[\[257b.7\]]nang du sman de nyid kyi phye ma dang /_mar dang yang bskol te mar lus pa ni rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i sman mar yin te de las ran par 'thungs na/_me dbal dang /_rims dang /_mig ser dang /_khrag lud pa dang /_mdze nad rnams 'joms so/_/yang na 'bras bu
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]gsum dang tsha ba gsum dang /_kaN+Da ka ri rnam gnyis dang /_pu tse shel dang /_dur byid dang /_dan da dang /_dong ga dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_pa tha dang /_de rnams zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags pa dang /_su d+ha
[\[258a.2\]]k+Shi ri'i 'o ma sar pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te/_mar lus pa las ran par btung ba dang /_snum chos dang bkru sman du sbyar na/_mdze ma rungs pa dang /_sha gzi gu dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /_rgyu rlugs dang /_rde'u 'gags pa dang /_skran dang /_de rnams
[\[258a.3\]]gso dka' ba yang rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'dis zhi bar byed do/_/yang na dan ti srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dang bskol te/_bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dmar ga zhes bya ba ko sha ta ki'i phye ma srang gcig
[\[258a.4\]]btab ste ran par 'thungs na gong 'og gnyis kar dag par 'gyur ro/_/yang na a brta ka zhes bya ba sA t+ya ba srang brgya chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis kyi nang du bskol te/_brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi lus pa'i nang du a brta ka'i phye ma dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang yang
[\[258a.5\]]bskol la mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/_de yang zhag re mi bza' bar zhag res bar bcad cing zos la sman de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na/_khre rgod kyi zas dang /_rtsabs kyi rang skyur dang lhan cig zos na/_mdze dang /_sha bkra dang /_a ba'i rnams la phan
[\[258a.6\]]te/_gzhan yang 'bras kyi phreng ba las rgyal bar 'dod pa dang /_bu mang po skyed par 'dod pa dang /_dran pa 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang bsten par bya'o/_/ni li ta ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi dang dzA ti'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'am/_yang na mar dang ni li ta ka cha snyoms pa
[\[258a.7\]]'am/_yang na seng ldeng dang /_a sa na bskol ba'i chu dzA ti'i khu ba dang ldan par 'thungs na mdze nad 'joms so/_/bza' ba ni 'bras dmar po la sogs pa dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_ci tse dang /_khre dang /_sran mung+ga dang /_sran chung dang /_tu ba ri dang tshod ma kha ba
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rnams dang /_skam sar gnas pa'i sha khu 'bras bu gsum dang /_pa to la dang /_seng ldeng dang /_nim pa dang /_go bye rnams sbyar ba sbyin no/_/btung bar ni chang sman mthun pa dang sbyar ba'am/_dar ba'i nang du so mar dza btab pa blud do/_/bza' ba dang btung ba de dag kyang
[\[258b.2\]]mi skyur ba dang /_mi tsha ba dang /_mi rno ba byin na mdze nad la phan no/_/gzhan du na/_zho dang 'o ma dang /_bu ram dang chu dang thun mong du gnas pa'i sha dang /_til dang mon sran gre'u rnams ni mdze na ba rnams kyis thag ring du spang bar bya'o/_/pa to la'i rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu gsum
[\[258b.3\]]dang /_bi sha la dang /_lnga po de dag re re yang ma sha bcu drug bcu drug dang /_kyi lce ba dang /_pu tse shel zho phyed phyed dang /_dong gra bzhi cha dang /_de rnams spyir srang gcig yod pa de btags la chu dang tshul bzhin bskol ba 'thungs na/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi sbyong bar
[\[258b.4\]]byed do/_/sman de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na skams la gnas pa'i ri dgas dang bya rnams kyi sha khu 'bras rnying pa'i chan dang sbyar te zos na mdze nad thams cad dang /_skrangs pa dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_gcin sri ba dang /_ha li ma ka zhes bya ba'i nad rnams la phan te/_zhag
[\[258b.5\]]drug tu sbyor ba de ltar byas na snying dang chu sor zug pa dang /_rims mi bzad pa rnams kyang zhi bar byed do/_/byi dang ga'i nang gi snying po dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_a ru ra dang /_de dag srang re re dang /_da na tri srang gsum dang /_bu ram srang bcu gnyis dang /_'di rnams ri
[\[258b.6\]]lur byas te byin na mdze dang /_sha bkra dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_gcin nad dang /_mcher ba na ba dang /_thor bu'i nad dang /_tshigs kyi steng na gnas pa'i 'brum bu'i nad dang /_skran rnams 'joms te sbyor ba 'di ni gnod
[\[258b.7\]]sbyin nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba des/_nyan thos kyi dge slong gcig nad kyis srog 'dor du nye ba dang /_de'i don du sbyor ba 'di bshad pas/_ril bu 'di'i ming yang nor bu bzang po zhes grags pa yin no/_/tig ta dang /_nim pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_shug
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pa dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_pi pi ling dang /_mur ba dang /_pa to la dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_pu tse shel dang /_in dra ba ru ni dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_shu dag dang /_'di rnams cha snyoms pa dang /_dan ti dang /_de'i nyis
[\[259a.2\]]'gyur gyi dur byid dang /_de'i nyis 'gyur gyi bram+hi dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas pa ran par zos na mdze dang gcin nad dang /_rmongs bag tu 'dug pa rnams la phan pa'i mchog yin no/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_pi pi ling dang /_byi
[\[259a.3\]]dang ga dang /_'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang /_til mar dang /_mar dang lde gur byas pa 'am/_yang na ka ko u dum bA ra dang /_byi dang ga dang /_nim pa dang /_gla sgang dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma brik+Sha bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na pags
[\[259a.4\]]pa'i nad thams cad 'joms so/_/dug mo yungs dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_nim pa dang /_thang shing dang /_seng ldeng dang /_a sa na dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i nang du mar dang /_a ru ra'i phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang ldan par zos na mdze nad 'joms so/_/seng ldeng dang /_
[\[259a.5\]]nim pa dang /_sle tres dang /_pa to la'i rtsa ba dang /_byi tsher ba dang /_'di rnams bskol ba ni seng ldeng la sogs pa sman gyi sbyor ba drug ces bya ste/_ji ltar lha ma yin khyab 'jug gis bcom pa bzhin du/_mdze nad thams cad 'joms so/_/skyer pa dang /_nim
[\[259a.6\]]pa dang /_seng ldeng dang /_'di rnams kyi shun phrag bskol ba 'thungs na mdze nad sel to/_/yang na skyer pa dang 'bras bu gsum dang /_nim pa dang /_pa to la'i rtsa ba dang /_pu tse shel dang /_shu dag dang /_btsod dang 'di rnams bskol ba 'thungs na/_bad
[\[259a.7\]]kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad gcod do/_/dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsten pas 'khor ba'i 'ching ba gcod pa bzhin no/_/gong gi sman de dag ba'i mar dang bskol ba'i mar ni rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel ba'i mchog yin te myur du rgyal bar byed do/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]de bzhin du seng ldeng dang /_nim pa dang /_skyer pa dang /_sle tres dang /_thang shing dang /_'di rnams re re nas ba'i mar dang sbyor ba gong ma ltar byas na phan no/_/pa tha dang /_skyer pa dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_dan ti dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_pu tse shel dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma
[\[259b.2\]]ba gcin dang /_chu dron po gang yang rung ba las zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na/_mdze'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_gcin gyi nad dang /_skrangs pa dang /_skya rbab dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_srin bu'i nad la phan no/_/rgya skyegs dang /_dan da dang /_mur ba dang /_
[\[259b.3\]]'bras bu gsum dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_pa tha dang /_byi dang ga dang /_a ba ma rga dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_skyer pa dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_ba sha ka dang /_btsod dang /_nim pa dang /_thang shing dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa che chung dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba zla ba
[\[259b.4\]]gcig gi bar du btung zhing phan pa'i zas dang lhan cig bsten na/_mdze nad thams cad 'joms so/_/skyer pa dang /_pi pi ling dang /_dong gra dang /_byi dang ga dang /_to ba ri dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_ta bya dang /_'di rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma ba gcin
[\[259b.5\]]dang bcas pa 'thungs na/_mdze nad shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyang 'joms so/_/tsha ba gsum dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_til dang /_go bye dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dkar po dang sbyar ba'i ri lu ni/_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i cha bdun
[\[259b.6\]]pa'i ri lu zhes bya ste/_de las ran par zos na/_mdze nad las rgyal zhing bcud kyis len du 'gyur la/_bud med la nyal phod par 'gyur ro/_/so ma ra dza dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_skyer pa dang /_byi dang ga dang /_tu pa ra'i rus pa dang /_go bye dang /_'bras bu
[\[259b.7\]]gsum dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang ri lur byas te/_rtag tu goms par byas na mdze nad thams cad sel to/_/byi dang ga dang /_go bye dang /_so ma ra dza dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_ba ra hi dang /_a ru ra dang /_lang ga li dang /_pi pi ling dang /_til nag po dang /_'di rnams kyi
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]phye ma bu ram dang ri lur byas te zos na mdze nad 'joms so/_/so ma ra dza dang /_byi dang ka'i snying po dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_de rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang lde gur byas te zos na/_mdze nad
[\[260a.2\]]gso dka' ba yang 'joms so/_/yang a ru ra dang /_go bye dang til mar dang de rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang ri lur byas te zos na mdze nad las rgyal bar byed do/_/'dir bu ram dang /_sman gyi tshad ma smos pa rnams ni sman spyi'i nyes 'gyur gyi bu ram dang sbyor cig_/yang
[\[260a.3\]]na go bye dang /_byi dang ga dang /_so ma ra dza rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang /_ri lur byas te zos na phan yon yang de dang 'dra'o/_/yang na byi dang ga dang /_seng ldeng dang /_brag zhun gyi phye ma las ran par zos na 'brum bu phra mo dang /_sha gzi gu dang /_shu ba rnams 'joms so/_/
[\[260a.4\]]byi dang ga dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_pi pi ling dang /_kha ra rnams btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang btags pa'i lde gu bldags na/_mdze nad gso dka' ba las rgyal bar byed do/_/gla sgang dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_'bras bu
[\[260a.5\]]gsum dang /_btsod dang /_thang shing dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_nim pa dang /_shing tsha dang /_bi shal dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_mur ba rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang /_sman sna gcig gi dgu 'gyur gyi nas phye dang /_sbrang rtsi cha gcig dang /_
[\[260a.6\]]mdze 'joms pa'i sman rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang bskyos te rtag tu 'thungs na mdze nad zlog par byed do/_/de bzhin du 'or nad dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_sha bkra dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_rlig rlugs dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_'brum bu
[\[260a.7\]]phra mo dang /_'brum bu dang /_'brum chen gyi nad 'joms so/_/tu par zhes bya ba a ta ka'i rus pa dang /_go bye dang /_so ma ra dza dang /_tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams re re yang bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba bzhin du sbyar te bsten par bya'o/_/gong ma'i sman gyi sbyor ba
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]gong du bstan pa de dag gis khong pa'i nang gi mdze nad dag ste/_pags pa'i phyi rol du byung ba la ni sman gyis byugs pa phan te/_lus dri ma dang bcas pa la sman rnon po'i byug pa bskus pas mdze nad tshabs cher thu bar snang ste/_mdze nad 'khor ling can dang gting zug pa dang /_
[\[260b.2\]]sra ba rnams la ni 'bru'i thum bu la sogs pas dugs byas te/_snyi zhing mthon por gyur pa dang /_mtshon gyis zhal zhal bya zhing phyi ste/_de'i 'og tu sman gyis byug par bya'o/_/mdze nad gang lus kyi dbang po rnams nyams shing pags pa mtshon gyis zhal zhal byar mi rung
[\[260b.3\]]ba de la ni dang po khrag phyung ste/_de'i 'og tu thal sman rnon pos bsreg par bya'o/_/mdze nad sra ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_bem bem por mi tshor bar 'dug pa dang /_yun ring du lon pa dang /_brtan pa rnams la ni mdze nad 'joms pa'i sman gyi byug pa dang btung bar blud
[\[260b.4\]]do/_/de'i 'og tu dug 'joms pa'i sman dang dug sngags kyis btab pa bsres te sbyin no/_/mdze nad gang lus rengs shing gyong pa dang /_tshor bag med pa dang /_rngul mi 'byung ba dang /_shin tu g.ya' ba rnams la ni ba lang gi lci ba skam po dang /_rgya mtsho'i dbu ba
[\[260b.5\]]'am/_mtshon gang yang rung bas bzhar te/_de'i 'og tu sman gyis byug par bya'o/_/gla sgang dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_po son cha dang /_ka rany+dza dang /_dong ga dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_ru rta dang /_pri yang ku dang /_skyer pa dang /_
[\[260b.6\]]yungs kar dang /_'di rnams tshul bzhin bskol ba ni yungs kar gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_lus bkru ba dang /_byug pa dang /_des bzhar ba dang /_slon khrus kyang byas na/_pags pa'i nad dang /_mdze dang /_skrang pa dang /_skya rbab kyi nad rnams kyang 'joms so/_/
[\[260b.7\]]ka ra bI ra dang /_nim pa dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_dong ga dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_'di rnams kyi rtsa ba ba gcin dang lhan cig bskol te/_dril du btub pa tsam phyung ste/_de'i lde gus bskus na mdze nad 'joms so/_/ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_dug mo
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]yungs dang /_ka ra ny+dza'i 'bras bu dang /_skyer pa'i shun pa dang /_su ma na'i lo ma dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma lde gur byas pas bskus na yang mdze nad 'joms par kun gyis mngon sum du mthong zhing grags pa yin no/_/shri sha'i shun pa dang /_
[\[261a.2\]]ras bal gyi me tog dang /_dong ga'i lo ma dang /_mon sran sde'u dme ru'i rtsa ba dang /_lo mar bcas pa dang /_'di bzhi btags pa'i phye ma'i lde gus bskus na yang phan no/_/nim pa dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_bye'u rug pa dang /_pa to la dang /_ru rta dang /_
[\[261a.3\]]a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_thang shing dang /_shi kru dang /_yungs kar dang /_g.yer ma dang /_'u su dang /_bla ba zhes bya ba ku Tan na Ta dang /_tsan+dan dang 'di rnams cha snyoms pa'i phye ma dar ba dang btags te/_thog mar til mar gyis lus byugs la/_de nas lde gu dril ba
[\[261a.4\]]byas na mdze nad g.ya' ba dang /_'brum bu dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_mdze dang skrangs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na gla sgang dang /_skyer khaN+Da skam po dang /_skyer pa dang /_nag tshur dang /_kam pi l+ya dang /_ru rta dang /_seng phrom dang /_mu zi dang /_sra rtsi
[\[261a.5\]]pog dang /_byi dang ga dang /_ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_ka ra bI ra'i shun pa dang /_'di rnams phye mar byas la sngar til mar gyis lus bskus pa'i steng du btab na/_shu ba dang /_g.yan pa dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_khyi rngo dang rkang shu la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i
[\[261a.6\]]nad sel bar byed do/_/shri khaN+Da'i shing gi sdong bu'i nang du yungs kar btags pa bcug ste/_rdza slang gi nang du me mi che ba la btsos la/_de las lde gur byas pas bskus na rkang shu sel bar byed do/_/ji ltar 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa dag ngo tsha spangs
[\[261a.7\]]pa bzhin no/_/ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_na le sham dang /_de rnams til mar dang /_shing a rka'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba bskus na/_mdze 'phrog par byed do/_/de bzhin du ka rany+dza dang /_tsakra mar da dang /_ru rta dang /_de rnams ba gcin dang btags pa 'thungs na yang
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]phan no/_/yang na gu gul dang /_na le sham dang /_byi dang ga dang /_yungs kar dang /_nag tshur dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_gla sgang dang /_ko nyon tsi'i thang chu dang /_ba bla dang /_mu zi dang /_ldong ros dang /_ru rta dang /_kam pi l+ya dang /_ser po gnyis dang /_de
[\[261b.2\]]rnams kyi phye ma tsakra mar da'i mar dang bsres pa'i lde gur byas la/_thog mar mtshon gyis bzhar la/_de'i steng du bskus pa nyi ma la bzhag ste 'dug na mdze nad gtan du zhi bar byed do/_/yang na na le sham dang /_shing ta la'i lo ma dang /_ru rta dang /_ldong ros dang /_nag
[\[261b.3\]]tshur dang /_'di rnams til mar dang sbyar ba zangs ma'i snod la zhag bdun bzhag ste des zhag bdun gyi bar du nyi ma tsha ba la bsku zhing bsten na sha bkra 'joms so/_/sha bkra gsar ba la ni lus kyi phyi khrus mi bya bar slon khrus byas la de'i sbyor ba gong ma zla ba gcig bsten na
[\[261b.4\]]phan no/_/a pa marga bsregs pa'i thal ba chu nang du bskyos te/_lan bdun btsags la pri yang ku'i mar dang sbyar la bskol bas lus bsku byug byas na sha bkra sel to/_/ka ka dzang ga'i rtsa ba dang /_ras bal gyi 'dab ma dang /_la phug gi sa bon dang /_de rnams dar ba dang btags te
[\[261b.5\]]sbyar ba/_gza' mig dmar la bab pa'i dus su bskus na/_sha bkra sel bar grags pa yin no/_/dzi ban ti dang /_btsod dang /_skyer pa dang /_kam pi l+ya dang /_spangs ma dang /_de rnams cham chom brdungs te mar dang til mar dang /_mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma
[\[261b.6\]]dang bskol ba'i nang du sra rtsi pog dang /_spra tshil gyis btags pa bskus na 'bras byer ba 'jig par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du pags pa gcig pa'i mdze dang /_'brum bu phra mo'i mdze nad dang /_'bras mi 'byor ba rnams kyang zhi bar byed do/_/lo ma bdun pa'i rtsa ba dang /_
[\[261b.7\]]shri sha'i shun phrag dang /_a shwa mar dang /_a rka dang /_su ma na dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_thal tres dang /_nim pa dang /_'di rnams kyi shun phrags dang /_ka rany+dza'i 'bru dang /_yungs kar dang /_tsakra mar da dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_byi dang ga dang /_tsha ba
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gsum dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_'di rnams phye mar byas la til mar dang /_de'i bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa ni rdo rje can zhes bya ba rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i lde gu yin te/_de las bsku byug byas na/_
[\[262a.2\]]pags pa'i nad thams cad dang /_rma 'grams pa dang /_rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel to/_/e raN+Da dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_ga pur dang /_shing nim pa dang /_ka taM pa dang /_ga ba'i rtsa ba dang /_kam pi l+ya dang /_byi dang ga dang /_in dra ba ru Ni dang /_nir
[\[262a.3\]]gun thi dang /_go bye dang /_thang shing dang /_khron bu dang /_shing ko nyon tse'i thang chu dang /_gu gul dang /_ldong ros dang /_lan tshwa dang /_shing ta la dang /_bca' sga dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang /_til mar bskol ba'i nang du su d+hA k+Shi ra zhes bya ba shi ri
[\[262a.4\]]khaN+Da'i lo ma dang /_a rka'i lo ma cha mnyam pa dang lhan cig lde gur byas pa ni/_rdo rje chen po'i lde gu zhes bya ste/_des bskus na phan yon rdo rje can dang 'dra ste/_lhag par yang 'dis ni sha bkra dang /_'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_gzhang 'brum rnams 'joms so/_/
[\[262a.5\]]ru rta dang /_a sho mar zhes bya ba te dzo ba ti dang /_su d+hA k+Shi ra dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang /_til mar dang sbyar ba'i nang du cung zhig btab ste 'thungs na mdze nad las rgyal ba'i mchog yin no/_/yungs kar gyi mar spra tshil dang /_
[\[262a.6\]]shi kru dang /_gu gul dang /_spangs ma dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na mchan khung gi nad dang /_rkang shu rnams myur du zlog par byed do/_/rgya skyegs dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_tsakra mar da dang /_ko nyon tse'i thang chu dang /_ru rta dang /_
[\[262a.7\]]yungs kar dang /_la phug gi sa bon dang /_ser po rnam gnyis dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma dar ba dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bskus na/_shu ba thams cad la phan no/_/zhes drang srong rnams kyis gsungs so/_/tsi tra ka dang /_shi kru dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na sle tres dang /_a
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]pa marga dang /_thang shing zho ga chu dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na seng ldeng dang /_shing dwa ba 'am/_yang na dan ti dang /_dra ban ti'am/_yang na rgya skyegs dang /_skyer khaN+Da 'am/_yang na sug smel dang /_purna ba'am/_sbyor ba drug po de rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma
[\[262b.2\]]zho ga chu dang sbyar ba bskus na/_rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel to/_/dza la zhes bya ba bA lu ka dang /_b+ha bya zhes bya ba ru rta dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_tsan+dan dang /_u shi ra dang /_de rnams gong ma'i cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma lde gur byas te bskus na/_
[\[262b.3\]]bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel to/_/mdze nad lus tsha ba dang bcas pa la ni/_gong du smos pa'i tig ta'i sman mar dang /_mar lan brgyar bkrus pa dang /_til mar dang tsan+dan dang /_shing mngar dang /_pra puN+Da rI ka dang /_ut+pa la dang /_tshul bzhin
[\[262b.4\]]bskol ba'am/_'di rnams gang yang rung bas bskus na phan no/_/gang gi lus 'drul zhing yan lag chad pa dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_'brum bu byung ba dang /_pags pa myags pa dang bcas pa la ni bsil ba'i byug pa dang /_blugs pa dang /_gtar ga dang /_bkru sman
[\[262b.5\]]dang /_tig ta'i sman mar rnams byin na phan no/_/seng ldeng dang /_ba sha ka dang /_nim pa dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_byi dang ga dang /_sle tres dang /_'di rnams ba gcin dang sbyar bas nang dang phyi rol nas btung ba dang /_blugs pa la sogs
[\[262b.6\]]pa byas na/_srin bu las gyur pa'i mdze nad 'joms so/_/de la rlung shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni thog mar sman mar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad la ni thog mar skyug sman gtang ngo /_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni/_dang po gtar gas khrag dbyung ba dang
[\[262b.7\]]bkru sman rnams bya'o/_/de la mdze nad thams cad la khrag gi nyes pa med cing /_slon khrus kyis khong dag na ni/_gong du smos pa'i bsku byug la sogs pa'i sman byas na/_de ma thag phan par 'gyur gyi khrag gi nyes pa dang bcas shing khong ma dag na ni de ltar ma yin no/_/de ltar
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]khrag gi nyes pa yang med/_khong pa yang dag par byas gong du smos pa'i snum la sogs pa'i sman dus dang mthun par sbyar na/_mdze nad thams cad nges par bzlog ste gso sla'o/_/de la nad gzhi mang po 'dus pa'i mdze tshabs che ba la ni slon khrus la
[\[263a.2\]]sogs pas khong pa yang dang yang du sbyang bar bya'o/_/de ltar sbyang ba byas pas nad pa nyams stobs chung zhing rlung gis nyam thag par gyur na/_srog myur du 'jig par 'gyur bas de bas na sman pas srog bsrung ba la 'bad do/_/de ltar gso ba thams cad kyis mdze nad
[\[263a.3\]]sos par gyur na/_phyis mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir lus kyi ro stod dag pa'i ched du zla ba phyed phyed cing slon sman bya'o/_/lus kyi rma dag par bya ba'i phyir zla ba re re zhing bkru sman bya'o/_/mgo bo dag par bya ba'i phyir zhag gsum zhing mgo bo'i bkru sman bya'o/_/de bzhin du zla ba
[\[263a.4\]]drug cing gtar ga bya ste khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/gal te mdze nad las slon khrus ma legs shing khong dag par ma gyur na phyir nad gzhi cher 'khrugs te/_nad slar skye zhing gsor mi rung bar 'gyur bas de bas na mdze'i nad gzhi ma lus par rtsad bcad cing drungs dbyung bar bya'o/_/
[\[263a.5\]]gso ba'i gnas las mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas sha bkra dang srin bu'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_de la sha bkra'i nad ni/_mdze nad pas kyang shin tu smad pa yin no/_/de bas na myur du gso ba'i cho ga la 'bad de ma
[\[263a.6\]]byas na gsor mi rung bar 'gyur te me nyung ngu las 'bar bas khyim tshig pa dang 'dra'o/_/de bas khyad par du lus kyi sha bkra la thog mar slon khrus kyis lus dag par bya'o/_/sha bkra la ni shri khaN+Da dang /_so mar dza bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_yang na rang gi khu ba bu ram dang bcas
[\[263a.7\]]pa blud nas/_de'i 'og tu nyams stobs ji lta ba bzhin du bsku byug byas la/_nyi ma la ji srid bzod kyi bar du gzhag par bya'o/_/sbyor ba de dag zhag gsum gyi bar du bsten la/_skom dad skyes par gyur na thug pa blud do/_/de ltar nyi ma la zhag gsum bzhag pas chu skyes
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa la ni tsher mas brtol la gzag par bya'o/_/de nas so ma ra dza dang /_a sa na dang /_pri yang ku dang /_shu ti dang /_'di rnams cho ga bzhin du nang re nang re bzhin zla ba phyed kyi bar du gtang ngo /_/yang na rgya skyegs shing gi khu ba dang /_hwags dang sbyar ba'i chu gong ma ltar nyams
[\[263b.2\]]stobs dang sbyar te gtong ngo /_/shing phal gu dang /_skyu ru ra'i shing dang /_dug mo yungs kyi shing gi shun pa btags pa so ma ra dza'i khu ba'i nang du btab pa 'thungs pa dang /_lus dro bar 'gyur te chu bur byung na tsha ba med pa'i zas dar ba dang lhan cig bza'o/_/yang na
[\[263b.3\]]ba gcin gyi nang du tsi tra ka dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba snod snum can gyi nang du bcug pa zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzhag la de las ran par btung ngo /_/gzhan yang btung ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad mdze nad kyi cho ga ltar bya'o/_/yang na bring
[\[263b.4\]]gar dza til mar dang brngos te/_lcags snod kyi nang du bcug pa bza' zhing a sa na'i sa bon 'o ma dang bskol ba 'thungs na sha bkra 'joms so/_/yang na pu ti ka rany+dza dang /_dong ga dang /_arka dang /_shri khaN+Da'i shing dang /_dzA ti dang /_de rnams kyi shun pa btags
